courses.title: Guerrilla Marketing School
courses.bio: A global pioneer in guerrilla marketing teaches you how to develop creative, effective marketing ideas for your business
objectives: Learn Guerrilla Marketing
Creative Thinking Tips
Think Out The Box on a Tight Budget
PR Stunt Inspiration

Introduction: Guerrilla Marketing Through the Ages - a quick romp through history.
Ingredients of a Guerrilla Marketing Idea
Extra: When it doesn't go to plan....
NEW! Online Global PR: Emotional Support: Global Online PR: Emotional Support Beer Case Study
The GMS Rough Guide to Brainstorming: 9 Steps for Successful Brainstorming PDF download

requirements: A Blank Sheet of Paper and a Pen
courses.description: An interactive workshop exploring guerrilla marketing ideas and non-traditional marketing From ancient Greece to the world's most successful small car launch, you will explore guerrilla and non-traditional marketing as its evolved throughout the  ages. Hayes shares his personal case studies from his 15 year career as a Creative Director and global pioneer in modern guerrilla marketing. You will discover the tricks and creative techniques to develop effective guerrilla marketing ideas. The final lectures will give you the opportunity to apply what you've learned and flex your creative muscles in answer to two fun, challenging briefs. Finally, submitted student work will be subject to a kind but fair critique which will help you sharpen your skills and abilities to sell creative thinking.
target_audience: Primary: Marketing, Advertising and Communication professionals and agencies (all levels), Secondary: Those interested in creative development

courses.title: 【初心者向け】Kindle電子書籍出版のメリット・デメリットを全解説
courses.bio: 本を出版したいこと思ったことはありませんか？Kindle電子書籍出版なら誰でも無料で電子書籍を出版することができます。Kindle出版のメリットデメリットについて解説していきます。
objectives: Kindle電子書籍出版ってなんだろう？
Kindle電子書籍出版の動向について
Kindle電子書籍出版のメリット・デメリットについて
Kindle出版の全体像

Kindleの市場規模からみる、Kindle出版するべき理由: Kindleの市場規模からみる、Kindle出版するべき理由
Kindle出版をする6つの圧倒的メリット: このセクションで学ぶこと
圧倒的メリット①印税収入
圧倒的メリット②お手軽に出版できる
圧倒的メリット③キャンペーン広告が打てる
圧倒的メリット④自分の商品になる
圧倒的メリット⑤圧倒的な実績になる
圧倒的メリット⑥人脈が増える
このセクションのまとめ
Kindle出版をするデメリット: このセクションで学ぶこと
Kindle出版をするデメリット
このセクションのまとめ

requirements: 特にありません。
courses.description:
本を出版してブランディングしたい。印税がほしい。本からメルマガリストを取得したい。そう思っている方であれば、このコースはきっとお役に立てるはずです。
紙の本であれば、自費出版すると300万円ほども費用がかかってしまいますが、Kindle出版であれば無料で電子書籍を出すことができます。しかも、出版先はあのAmazonです。第3の検索エンジンとも言われているAmazonにあなたの本が出版されるのです。
このコースでは、全く電子書籍を出したことがない、作ったことがない人に、メリット・デメリットをすべて詳しく解説しています。
紙の本2冊、電子書籍30冊以上出版した経験をもとに、コースを作りました。
はじめての方でもつまずくことがないように、解説しています。
出版事業で起業した僕が、40冊出版した歴史を元に効果的なKindle出版のノウハウをお伝えしています。
もし出版に興味のある方は受講してみてください。それでは、コースの中でお会いしましょう。
target_audience: 毎月5万円以上の収入の柱を増やしたい方
良質なリストを取得したい方
これから電子書籍出版したい方
電子書籍出版とは何かを知りたい方
自分にとってのメリットとデメリットを知りたい方
電子書籍出版で集客に役立てたい方
印税生活を狙っている方

courses.title: Sıfırdan Sermayesiz Amazon Dropshipping Eğitimi |Sertifikalı
courses.bio: DOLARLA PARA KAZANIN // Aliexpress'ten Amazon'a YÖNLENDİRME ile satış yapabilirsin... Stok tutmadan
objectives: Sadece Alıcı ve Satıcı Arasında Aracılık Yaparak Dolar Kazanmayı Öğreneceğiz | Amazon Dropshipping
Amazon'da Satıcı Hesabı Oluşturup Doğrulatacağız | Amazon Dropshipping
Shopify İle Kendi Sitemizi Kuracağız | Amazon Dropshipping
Amazon İçin Herşeyi Otomatik Yapacak Olan SellerRunning'i Tanıyacağız | Amazon Dropshipping
Shopify İçin Herşeyi Otomatik Yapacak Olan Oberlo'yu Tanıyacağız | Amazon Dropshipping
Facebook Ads İle Reklam Vereceğiz | Amazon Dropshipping
Google Analytics İle Veri Çekecek ve Analiz Edeceğiz | Amazon Dropshipping
Türkiye'den Ödeme Alma Sistemlerini İnceleyeceğiz | Amazon Dropshipping

Amazon Seller Central: 1- GÜNCELLENMİŞ DERS: Amazon Kayıt Ekranı Güncellemesi
Kanada Adresi İle Profil Bilgilerini Tamamlama
SELLER RUNNING - Tüm Bu İşlemler Otomati: Competition Paket Özellikleri ve Çalışma Sistemi
Eklenti İle Amazon Mağazamıza Ürün Ekleme
Shopify Mağazamızı Açıyoruz: Shopify Admin Panel Ayarları - İnce Ayarlar
Sitemizin Alanını Genişletiyoruz: Google Analytics İle Shopify'dan Veri Çekiyoruz
\"Türkiye'de E-Ticaret ve Dijital Pazarl: "Dijital Pazarlama | E-Ticaret | SEO" 3'ü Bir Arada Eğitim

requirements: Amazon Dropshipping için herhangi bir ön koşul bulunmamaktadır.
courses.description:
Amazon ve Shopify platformlarında sadece alıcı ve satıcı arasında aracılık yaparak elinizde ürün bulundurmadan satış yapabilirsiniz.


Amazon'daki ürünlerin üstüne komisyonunuzu ekleyerek satabilir yada Aliexpress'ten Amazon'a yönlendirme ile satış yapabilirsin.


Bu işlemleri manuel olarak yapabileceğiniz gibi, hem Amazon hem Shopify için kullanabileceğiniz, işlemleri sizin yerinizi otomatik olarak yapacak olan otomasyon yazılımları da bulunmaktadır.


(NOT: Amazon'un her zaman satış yapma şartlarında değişiklik yapabileceğini unutmamak gerekir. Güncel satış şartları için Amazon ile iletişime geçerek güncel bilgileri sorgulamak zarara uğramamak için her zaman önemlidir)


Bu Eğitimimizden sonra;
Amazon'da bir mağaza açarak dolar üzerinden ürün satışı yapabileceksiniz.
Dilerseniz Shopify kullanarak kendi online satış sitenizi oluşturabileceksiniz.  "Kendim site açıp o kadar ürünü yüklemekle uğraşamam" demeyin, işinizi kolaylaştıracak çok güzel eklenti ve uygulama önerilerimiz var...


İnternette bir çok yerde gördüğünüz kopyala-yapıştır yöntemleri unutun.


Eğitim İçeriğinde Dropshipping'e Ek Olarak;
Google Analytics veri çekme, analiz etme,
Facebook ile reklam verme,
Oberlo uygulamasını kullanma,
SellerRunning yazılımını kullanma konularına değiniyoruz.


Amazon | Shopify | Payoneer | SellerRunning | Oberlo | Google Analitycs | Facebook Ads | Dropshipping | Pazarlama | E-Ticaret
target_audience: Yurtdışı pazarında "dropshipping" ile dolar üzerinden gelir elde etmek isteyen herkes eğitime katılabilir. | Amazon & Shopify

courses.title: MAÎTRISER L’ART DE LA VENTE PRATIQUE : ATTIREZ, CONVERTISSEZ
courses.bio: STRATÉGIES ESSENTIELLES POUR RÉUSSIR EN VENTE : ATTIREZ PLUS DE CLIENTS, MAXIMISEZ VOS VENTES ET CRÉEZ UNE CLIENTÈLE FID
objectives: IDENTIFIER LES EMPLACEMENTS COMMERCIAUX IDÉAUX : Apprenez à choisir des emplacements stratégiques qui attirent prospects et favorisent des ventes optimales.
DÉVELOPPER DES STRATÉGIES DE VENTE EFFICACES : Découvrez des techniques pour convertir les passants en clients et booster vos ventes en espace commercial.
FIDÉLISER LA CLIENTÈLE : Renforcez la satisfaction client, instaurez une confiance durable et garantissez des achats répétés grâce à des techniques éprouvées.
OPTIMISER LA PRÉSENTATION DES PRODUITS ET SERVICES : Apprenez à présenter vos produits et prix efficacement pour attirer les clients et maximiser vos ventes.

ATTIRER LES NON-PASSANTS À VOTRE MAGASIN: ATTIRER LES NON-PASSANTS À VOTRE MAGASIN
ATTIRER LES PASSANTS À ENTRER DANS VOTRE: ATTIRER LES PASSANTS À ENTRER DANS VOTRE MAGASIN
PRÉSENTATION DES OFFRES AVEC L'AIDE D'UN: PRÉSENTATION DES OFFRES AVEC L'AIDE D'UN VENDEUR
RENFORCER LA CRÉDIBILITÉ SUBJECTIVE DE V: RENFORCER LA CRÉDIBILITÉ SUBJECTIVE DE VOTRE QUALITÉ
LA FIDÉLISATION - LES TECHNIQUES DE FIDÉ: LA FIDÉLISATION - LES TECHNIQUES DE FIDÉLISATION DE LA CLIENTÈLE
LA GESTION DES CLIENTS DÉSAGRÉABLES OU D: LA GESTION DES CLIENTS DÉSAGRÉABLES OU DIFFICILES

requirements: Aucun prérequis n’est nécessaire pour suivre ce cours. Il est conçu pour être accessible aux débutants comme aux professionnels souhaitant améliorer leurs compétences en vente.
courses.description:
Vous souhaitez améliorer vos compétences en vente et augmenter vos revenus ? Ce cours est conçu pour vous guider pas à pas dans l’art de la vente en espace commercial.
Que vous soyez un entrepreneur, commerçant ou gestionnaire, vous apprendrez à choisir des emplacements stratégiques, à attirer efficacement les clients, à les convertir en acheteurs fidèles et à maximiser vos ventes grâce à des stratégies testées et approuvées.
Nous couvrirons des thématiques essentielles telles que :
La sélection d’emplacements commerciaux idéaux.
Les techniques pour attirer passants et non-passants.
La création d’offres irrésistibles et la présentation visuelle des produits.
La fidélisation de la clientèle pour garantir des revenus récurrents.
La gestion des clients difficiles pour préserver une bonne image de marque.
Avec des exemples concrets, des conseils pratiques et des exercices adaptés, ce cours vous donnera toutes les clés pour exceller dans votre activité commerciale.
En suivant cette formation, vous apprendrez à optimiser vos stratégies de vente, à comprendre les besoins de vos clients, et à développer des compétences solides pour faire face à la concurrence. Vous découvrirez également des techniques avancées pour augmenter votre panier moyen, tout en créant une expérience client unique et mémorable.
Inscrivez-vous maintenant pour transformer vos compétences en vente et atteindre vos objectifs professionnels grâce à des techniques simples, efficaces et adaptées !
target_audience: Ce cours s'adresse aux entrepreneurs, commerçants, gérants de magasins, et toute personne souhaitant améliorer ses compétences en vente et booster ses performances commerciales.

courses.title: Gamificação em marketing de varejo
courses.bio: Gamificação e ações promocionais para impulsionar as vendas do varejo
objectives: Aplicação de sistemas de gamificação para o departamento de marketing de varejo
Gamificação e ações promocionais para impulsionar as vendas do varejo
Cases de gamificação de sucesso pelo mundo, incluindo Metaverso
Inserção de gamificação nos processos de gestão

Gamificação na prática: Gamificação simples - Produto misterioso - Engajamento e branding

requirements: Conhecimento de básico de varejo e marketing
courses.description:
O sistema que mais traz engajamento e contribui para um relacionamento duradouro e que gera vendas para o varejo. O CRM e ações de promoções tornaram-se cada vez mais modernos com o correto os dados e da tecnologia
Com ações promocionais transformadas em sistemas de recompensas, é possível conquistar apoio financeiro dos fornecedores e criar marcas com grande diferenciação da concorrência.
O curso é prático e mostra que diversas ações podem ser transformadas e games, elevando e mudando a ótica do cliente em relação a marca ou produto.
O que vai aprender?
Gamificação "gamification" e ações promocionais para impulsionar as vendas do varejo
Inserção de gamificação nos processos de gestão
Cases de gamificação de sucesso pelo mundo, incluindo Metaverso
Aplicação de sistemas de gamificação para o departamento de marketing de varejo
Utilização de sistemas de recompensas para atração e manutenção de clientes.
Para quem se destina:
Profissionais que queiram transformar ações comuns em ações com recompensas, incluindo a utilização do Metaverso.
Case/ exemplos: Bear
Ações de trade utilizando gamificação, marketing viral e engajamento, case de loja do Canadá
Utilização de Dados (BI) através da gamificação - Coleta e uso dos dados.
Dados para gerar MIX e buscar recursos dos fornecedores objetivando a persona adequada para cada hora, momento, categoria ou produto.
target_audience: Profissionais de promoção de vendas, trade marketing, marketing, gestores do varejo
Pessoas que queiram adquirir conhecimentos em gamificação

本講座は、無料版ChatGPT（生成AI）を活用して、補助金申請書を誰でも簡単に作成できるようになる実践型講座です
対象となるのは、小規模事業者持続化補助金（令和7年6月版対応）をはじめとした補助金にチャレンジしたい事業者や、事業計画書の書き方に不安を感じている個人事業主・フリーランスの方です。
中小企業診断士として10年以上の支援経験と2,000件超の審査経験を持つ講師が、現場で実際に使っているノウハウをベースに、様式２（経営計画書・補助事業計画書）の書き方を分かりやすく解説します。
ChatGPTの基本操作から、実際のプロンプト例、たたき台の作成、申請フォームへの入力まで、ステップバイステップで丁寧にフォロー。特別な知識や文章力は一切不要で、「なんとなく事業アイデアはあるけど、文章にするのが苦手…」という方でも安心して受講できます。
さらに、本講座では実際のプロンプト文例もプレゼント。すぐにChatGPTにコピペして活用することができます。

· تساعدك هذه الدورة التدريبية على بدء استراتيجيات فعالة لعملك على منصات السوشيال ميديا ، سواء من خلال خطوات أو طرق تفكير تساعدك على النجاح
· هذه الدورة كما شرحت لغير المبتدأين ولكن المقصود بكلمة مبتدئين هنا أنهم على الأقل يعرفون استخدام القنوات المختلفة حتى ولو بشكل محدد فقط
· أحب أن أقول إن المعلومات ليست مجرد معلومة عادية بدون أن تختلط بأكثر من 20 سنة من الخبرة في مجال التسويق الإلكتروني ووسائل التواصل الاجتماعي.
بنهاية هذه الدورة ستتمكن من :
· التعرف على مبادى نموذج SOSTAC العالمي للتخطيط الإعلامي
· القدرة على تحليل الوضع الرقمي لتغطية SWOT، وتحليل المنافسة
· القدرة على تحديد الأهداف باستخدام نموذج (5Ss) لوضع الأهداف الذكية.
· استراتيجيات التطوير بما في ذلك تقسيم وتحديد الأهداف وتحديد المواقع
· التعرف على الخصائص الأساسية للتكتيكات الرئيسية للتسويق الرقمي
· التكيف مع وسائل الاعلام الاجتماعية، الإعلانات عبر الإنترنت، والهاتف المحمول ...
· التحكم في خطتك من خلال الرصد والقياس والمقارنة
· استخدام Google Analytics لتحليل أداء الحملة
· التعرف علي الخصائص القياسية للقنوات المختلفة


من المستفيدون ؟
· مدير التسويق .
· مدير العلامة التجارية.
· المدير الإعلامي
· مدير العلاقات العامة.
· مدير التسويق الرقمي.
· فريق التسويق الرقمي.


محتوي الدورة:
· تحليل الموقف
1. مراجعة الشركات وتسويق مؤشرات الأداء الرئيسية.
2. تحليل أفضل ممارسات SWOT
3. تحليل المنافسين وأبحاث السوق.
4. وضع الأهداف
5. كيفية وضع أهداف SMART


· أهداف نموذج (5Ss) للتخطيط
1) بيع - زيادة مبيعاتك
2) الخدمة - قيمة مضافة للعملاء.
3) التحدث - الاقتراب من العملاء.
4) حفظ - تقليل تكاليف التشغيل الخاصة بك.
5) توسيع نطاق العلامة التجارية الخاصة بك على الانترنت.


· تطوير الإستراتيجيات
1) تجزئة السوق واستراتيجية الاستهداف.
2) مبادىء تحديد المواقع والعلامات التجارية
3) إستخدام أسلوب التسلسل والتكامل للإستراتيجيات.
4) استراجية اكتساب العملاء مقابل استراتيجية الاحتفاظ بالعملاء الحاليين


· تطوير التكتيكات
1) التكتيكات الرقمية المختلفة للوصول إلى العملاء على الإنترنت
2) الخصائص التسويقية لوسائل الاعلام الاجتماعية
3) قواعد التواجد على شبكة الإنترنت
4) خصائص الإعلان على شبكة الإنترنت.
5) خصائص محركات البحث والتسويق.
6) الخصائص التسويقية للمحمول
7) خصائص البريد الإلكتروني والتسويق
8) خصائص تسويق المحتوى

requirements: Para tomar un curso sobre ChatGPT, es recomendable que los estudiantes tengan algunos conocimientos y habilidades previas para aprovechar al máximo la experiencia de aprendizaje. A continuación, se detallan algunos requisitos sugeridos:

Familiaridad con conceptos de marketing y redes sociales: Los estudiantes que tengan experiencia previa o conocimientos básicos sobre estrategias de marketing y el uso de redes sociales para promocionar productos o servicios tendrán una base sólida para aplicar los conocimientos de ChatGPT en este contexto.

Acceso a una computadora con conexión a Internet: Dado que gran parte del aprendizaje se llevará a cabo en línea, los estudiantes necesitarán acceso a una computadora o dispositivo con conexión a Internet para acceder a recursos, ejemplos y plataformas donde se pueda utilizar ChatGPT.
courses.description:
¡Bienvenidos al curso "Potencia tu Estrategia de Marketing con ChatGPT: Domina la Inteligencia Artificial para Redes Sociales"!
En este emocionante curso, te sumergirás en el fascinante mundo de la inteligencia artificial y aprenderás cómo utilizar el modelo de lenguaje ChatGPT para revolucionar tus estrategias de marketing en redes sociales. Si eres un profesional del marketing digital, un emprendedor, un creador de contenido o simplemente alguien interesado en mejorar su presencia en línea, este curso es para ti.
El objetivo principal de este curso es proporcionarte todas las herramientas y conocimientos necesarios para aprovechar al máximo el potencial de ChatGPT en tus estrategias de marketing. Aprenderás los fundamentos de la inteligencia artificial y el procesamiento del lenguaje natural (NLP), y cómo ChatGPT se integra en estas disciplinas para generar respuestas coherentes y relevantes.
En cada sección del curso, te guiaré a través de ejemplos prácticos y demostraciones en vivo, mostrándote cómo interactuar con ChatGPT para crear contenido publicitario atractivo, responder preguntas frecuentes de los clientes y detectar tendencias y temas de interés en redes sociales.
Además, abordaremos las limitaciones y riesgos de ChatGPT, para que puedas utilizar esta tecnología con responsabilidad y ética. Aprenderás cómo evitar respuestas inapropiadas o sesgadas y cómo combinar el uso de la IA con la intervención humana para garantizar una experiencia positiva para tus seguidores y clientes.
Además de este curso, también te invito a visitar mi canal, donde encontrarás contenido adicional relacionado con marketing, tecnología y el fascinante mundo de la inteligencia artificial. En mi perfil de instructor, tendrás acceso a una variedad de videos que complementarán lo aprendido en este curso y te ayudarán a estar al día con las últimas tendencias en el ámbito del marketing en línea.
Así que, ¿estás listo para llevar tu estrategia de marketing al siguiente nivel con ChatGPT? ¡Únete a este emocionante viaje de aprendizaje y descubre cómo la inteligencia artificial puede potenciar tu éxito en las redes sociales! ¡Te espero en el curso!
target_audience: Este curso sería ideal para:      Profesionales del marketing digital: Gerentes de marketing, especialistas en redes sociales, creadores de contenido y cualquier persona involucrada en estrategias de marketing en línea que desee incorporar inteligencia artificial para crear contenido más atractivo y personalizado.      Propietarios de negocios y emprendedores: Aquellos que buscan mejorar su presencia en línea y aumentar la interacción con los clientes a través de estrategias de marketing más efectivas.      Community managers y responsables de atención al cliente: Personas encargadas de gestionar las redes sociales y responder a preguntas de los clientes, quienes pueden beneficiarse del uso de ChatGPT para brindar respuestas rápidas y precisas.      Profesionales de la inteligencia artificial y desarrolladores: Aquellos con conocimientos en IA que deseen explorar cómo aplicar modelos de lenguaje como ChatGPT en el ámbito del marketing y las redes sociales.      Estudiantes y entusiastas de la tecnología: Cualquier persona interesada en aprender sobre las últimas tendencias en inteligencia artificial y su aplicación en marketing y redes sociales.

courses.description:
AI Marketing for Agencies & Marketers: Mastering Ideal Customer Profiles (ICP)


Are you an ambitious marketing agency or professional marketer looking for a simple yet powerful way to transform your client campaigns fast? Do you want to slash research time, pinpoint the perfect audience, and boost ROI using the power of AI marketing?


If the answer is YES, then you’re in the right place. The online landscape is crowded, but you can stand out—and thrive—when you know how to target the right people with the right message at the right time.


With AI-driven tools like M1-Project Elsa (featured in this course) at your side, you can turbocharge your marketing strategies, craft spot-on ICPs (Ideal Customer Profiles), and deliver results your clients will rave about. Leverage the latest AI innovations to scale your agency and elevate your marketing career.




Why This Course Is a Game-Changer
Think about this: how many hours have you and your team wasted brainstorming customer avatars, only to miss the mark on who your real buyers are? How many times have you tweaked your ad copy, hoping you’d strike gold, but ended up feeling stuck?




In this course, you’ll discover:
AI-Driven ICP: Quickly create data-backed Ideal Customer Profiles using advanced AI marketing strategies.
Faster Campaign Rollouts: Cut your campaign development time by half (or more) and focus on what really drives revenue.
Higher ROI: Pinpoint your audience and customize your messaging to ignite engagement and sales.
Competitive Advantage: Outperform your competition by optimizing your marketing approach with precise ICP insights.


No more guesswork, no more hours of manual research. This course hands you the step-by-step system to dominate your niche through AI marketing and ICP mastery.




Who Should Enroll?
Marketing Agencies aiming to scale client acquisition and streamline their workflow.
Professional Marketers eager to speed up audience targeting and improve ad performance.
Business Owners wanting a hands-on, cost-effective approach to AI-driven growth strategies.
Freelancers keen to add a premium skill to their offering and charge for AI-savvy marketing solutions.




By the End of This Course, You Will:
Master AI-Powered ICP Creation: Identify and segment your perfect customer faster than ever before.
Generate High-Converting Campaigns: From Facebook Ads to LinkedIn strategies, unlock content that speaks to the right audience.
Save Hours of Research: Cut ICP and market analysis time drastically and focus on profit-driving tasks.
Leverage Data-Driven Insights: Ditch the guesswork—use targeted AI insights to optimize every marketing touchpoint.
Accelerate Agency Growth: Multiply your revenue opportunities by delivering fast, accurate ICPs and streamlined campaigns for clients.
Gain a Competitive Edge: Stay ahead in the rapidly evolving AI marketing world with up-to-date, practical tactics.




Inside the Course
Short, Powerful Modules: Each section is laser-focused on AI marketing & ICP steps.
Live Demonstrations: See exactly how to use M1-Project Elsa to generate, validate, and refine ICPs.
Actionable Case Studies: Learn from real-life marketing agency examples to avoid pitfalls and fast-track success.
Hands-On Exercises: Practice building your own ICP and get immediate feedback to ensure you’re on the right track.
Fast Results: Because we focus on AI tools and efficient workflows, you’ll see tangible outcomes within days.


Your Path to Success
Step 1 – Enroll: Secure your spot to gain unlimited access to the course content.
Step 2 – Learn: Watch the lessons, download the resources, and explore real-life use cases.
Step 3 – Implement: Apply AI-driven ICP strategies to your clients or your own marketing campaigns.
Step 4 – Grow: Witness higher conversions, lower costs, and greater client satisfaction—and your reputation soars.


Why Wait?


Each day you hesitate is a day your competitors could be optimizing their campaigns with AI. If you’re serious about staying relevant and ahead, you owe it to yourself—and your clients—to master AI marketing now.


Ready to transform your marketing game?
Click “Enroll Now” and start harnessing the power of AI-driven ICP creation for unparalleled growth.


Diego Davila

courses.description:
O que você aprenderá:
Este curso abrange os fundamentos do Endomarketing, uma estratégia essencial para o sucesso empresarial. Durante o curso, você adquirirá conhecimentos e habilidades que o capacitarão a:
Compreender o Endomarketing: Explore os conceitos e princípios do Endomarketing, compreendendo sua importância na construção de uma cultura corporativa sólida e no engajamento dos colaboradores.
Implementar Estratégias Eficazes: Aprenda a aplicar estratégias de Endomarketing, como comunicação interna efetiva, programas de reconhecimento, desenvolvimento de lideranças e promoção da saúde e bem-estar.
Gerenciar Mudanças Organizacionais: Desenvolva habilidades para gerenciar resistências à mudança, envolver os colaboradores em processos de mudança e adaptar a cultura corporativa em tempos de transformações.
Avaliar Resultados e ROI: Saiba como medir o sucesso das estratégias de Endomarketing por meio de indicadores, calcular o Retorno sobre o Investimento (ROI) e promover a melhoria contínua.
Aplicar o Conhecimento: Por fim, você elaborará um plano de ação personalizado para aplicar o Endomarketing em sua própria empresa, levando em consideração suas necessidades específicas.
Áreas de Atuação:
Ao concluir este curso, você estará preparado para aplicar seus conhecimentos em diversas áreas, incluindo:
Recursos Humanos: Como profissional de RH, você poderá implementar estratégias de Endomarketing para melhorar o ambiente de trabalho, aumentar a satisfação dos colaboradores e reter talentos.
Gestão de Equipes: Seja como líder de equipe ou gerente, você poderá utilizar o Endomarketing para fortalecer a cultura de colaboração, engajar sua equipe e alcançar resultados mais positivos.
Gestão de Mudanças: Caso esteja envolvido em processos de mudança organizacional, o conhecimento em Endomarketing será valioso para gerenciar resistências e promover a aceitação das mudanças.
Liderança: Como líder, você poderá aplicar princípios de Endomarketing para influenciar a cultura da empresa, motivar sua equipe e alinhar todos aos objetivos organizacionais.
Consultoria Empresarial: Se você atua como consultor, poderá oferecer serviços de consultoria em Endomarketing para empresas que buscam melhorar seu desempenho interno.
Empreendedorismo: Se você é empreendedor, poderá aplicar estratégias de Endomarketing para construir uma cultura sólida desde o início e promover um ambiente de trabalho positivo.

courses.description:
Elevate Your Export Marketing: Practical Export Marketing Tips & Generating Trade Leads
Welcome to a transformative course that unlocks the practical secrets of export marketing, taught by an industry expert with years of experience teaching and training MBA students and working executives. This course titled "Practical Export Marketing Tips & Generating Trade Leads" which is a VJ Export Import Mastery Series Course is your ticket to mastering a set of hard-to-find and smarter export marketing techniques, helping you gain valuable insights into effective methods of export management, particularly business development area, and discovering the art of easily communicating and dealing with importers. Whether you're an aspiring exporter or a seasoned professional, this course equips you with practical skills to conquer the global market. #ExportMarketingSkills #PracticalExportTips #ImporterRelationships #SmartExportTechniques #UdemyCourse #ExportSuccess #OverseasLeads #GlobalMarketStrategy #ExportMarketingMastery


Practical Export Marketing Skills Unleashed
Export marketing is both an art and a science, and this course covers it all:
Practical Export Tips: Gain insider knowledge and practical skills to excel in export marketing.
Smart Exporting Techniques: Learn rare and smart strategies for exporting successfully that set you apart from the competition.
Buyer Relationship Management Mastery: Discover how to effectively communicate, engage, and manage relationships with overseas buyers.
Learn how to generate export leads effectively, the most effective tips and techniques
Harnessing the power of ChatGPT to reveal market intelligence with simple tricks and techniques. Learn how to train LLM AI Assistants like ChatGPT to better understand your product line and generate useful leads


Why This Course? A Personal Insight and Perspective
This course originates from my tremendous experience in the areas of teaching, training, and education in topics directly related to export operations and business development. Having created several successful export-import related courses on Udemy, I noticed the large untapped opportunities as well as challenges being faced by the exporters worldwide.
It was clear to me that exporters needed more than just business ideas; they required practical export advertising and lead generation skills that would assist them to take off with their new export products, create overseas leads, and make their new or existing companies successful in the international markets. These ideas prompted me to create this step-by-step course to empower the exporting community to adopt the best and most practical strategies to develop their business worldwide.


Don't wait. Enroll Now and Master the Art of Export Marketing
Join me in this course, "Practical Export Marketing Tips & Generating Trade Leads," and embark on a journey that equips you with practical skills, real-world insights, and techniques to excel in a highly competitive global marketplace. With expert guidance, actionable strategies, and a dedication to help you grow, this course will surely help you to be able to generate workable and serious trade leads, raise your export enterprise, and help you thrive in a fast-changing international marketplace.
So what is this course all about?
I'll be delivering this course to you, based on my 30 years of import and export experience in the industry, research, training, and academics. Friends, I have run my own company, an export company, and presently I'm into services exports. I have my own service exports. So, friends throughout my export career, I have realized that the main skills which are required in the export business are very practical. These skills actually cannot be learned from books. These skills can only be learned through practical experiences. So, Friends, what I will be doing in this course, I'll be sharing with you different types of knowledge, different types of skills, different types of tools, different types of sources for getting information, and the different types of experiences that you get in export marketing. So my approach will be very different from the typical approach of going into marketing concepts.
I'll be talking about some marketing concepts, definitely, but not in the way it is traditionally taught. So what I will be doing I'll be sharing with you some of the incidents. I'll be sharing with you, some of the case studies I will be sharing, which I worked on in the sense that I did some work in some company and that I converted into a kind of case study, wherein I will tell you how I went about getting business or promoting a business or getting international orders, what problems I faced and how I managed those problems. And very importantly, how do I start contacting buyers? How do I start talking about my products and services? How do I create initial interest? When you are contacting the buyers for the first time, they are very wary about your genuineness, your capability, or about ability to complete the orders, or they will have several questions in mind. They will have N numbers of apprehensions about you when you first contact them.
And the point is that when buyers give their requirements digitally or in any form, they give you a requirement. You come to know about some leads. So several people are ready to respond; they are ready to give their offers to the buyer according to the requirements. The point is, how do you attract the attention of these buyers? So there are different things. One is, first, how to create the lead. How to identify the market, how to identify the buyers, and, of course, how to identify the exact Import requirement of a particular buyer? So that is one part of it. The second part is that you have the lead, which may not be exclusive to you. That lead may be available to many of your competitors. The point is, how to convert that lead into a genuine, practical interest of the buyer in your offer. So that is also a skill, export marketing skill, which has to be learned, and that, in bookish terms, we say business communication. So-called business communication.
But in business communication, when we talk, it is very general. What we want to talk about the business communication is the business communication for generating interest in the buyer about your offer. So how do you do that? So I'll be touching upon several practical aspects, several practical information, several practical tools and techniques of export marketing, and the practical methods of bringing buyers towards your product range. So these will be my objectives. These will be my goals in this course. And I will try to give you the examples and case studies that I have gone through. I'll be taking mostly those kinds of examples and case studies that I have dealt with. So I may not tell you the exact name of the company that I dealt with, as I may change the name of the company for training and education. I would not like to share with you, in all the cases, the exact names of the companies, but with whatever name, the incident and case will be real cases, very practical things. And I'll be touching upon those skills, techniques, and tools that are relevant today.
I will not talk about things that were of Yesteryear or that were relevant in the past. So that will not help you. I'll be talking more about the digital channels. I will talk about the participation in international trade fairs, which are needed for you can participate after identifying the countries where you can market your products and services. And very importantly, how do you identify the right countries to participate in or to target? And how do you find out the list of buyers or the prospective partners, business partners in different countries, so there are a whole lot of things which is there in export marketing, and with these skills, you can conquer the international markets. It is not difficult. You have to have very good knowledge about your products if you have good knowledge about your product. You can impress the foreign buyers. And I will also tell you what goes into the minds of international buyers, what they normally look for when they want to deal with prospective suppliers, especially from developing countries like India, Brazil, Mexico, Vietnam, Cambodia, and Malaysia. So what goes on in the minds of the international buyers? What are their expectations from the prospective supplying partners in these countries, and to what extent does price matter, to what extent do the things that are other than price matter? So these are the different things that I'll be discussing in this course. And Friends, there is one more area which I would like to cover in this course, which is very much part of the export marketing skills, and is also the operational part.
What are the operational things that you should know about export marketing, which is in terms of the sales and distribution of your products? Because of this, sales and distribution, the cost of making the goods available to the end-users, and the importers have a strong bearing on the possibility of getting business. How do you manage these operations? That is very much part of the export marketing skills. Because even the minutest of things, a very new thing, a very innovative thing, if you can do it, it has the potential to drastically reduce the unit price of your goods. So I will give you some examples of what the facilities available are, for example, for the Indian exporters on the operation side, which means the distribution side. What government support is available, or any third-party support, which is available? How do you reduce the cost of your offering and make your product available in a particular market? How do you bring down that price? Because if you can bring down the price, it can drastically change your offer. It can drastically make your offer much more attractive to the international buyer.
For this reason, I'll be discussing with you the operational part also, which is a very important part of the export marketing skills. So with so many of these kinds of practical tools and techniques, methods of doing exporting, Friends, I am very sure that by the end of this course, you will feel very confident about the process of exporting, getting buyers, getting orders, getting information, and understanding the market and the consumers in the international market. So that is my purpose. That is my goal for this course. I would encourage you to watch all the upcoming episodes in this course and try to write down some of the tips and techniques that I share with you.
So, Are You Ready to Raise the Level and Quality of your Export Marketing Efforts?
Let's embark on this journey collectively. By enrolling in this course, you also get:

courses.description:
Welcome to the comprehensive course on International Marketing! In today's globalized business environment, companies are increasingly expanding their operations beyond domestic borders to capitalize on opportunities in international markets. This course is designed to provide you with a deep understanding of the principles, strategies, and challenges involved in marketing products and services across borders.
Throughout this course, you will embark on a journey to explore various facets of international marketing, starting from the fundamental concepts and theories to practical strategies for market entry, distribution, branding, pricing, and promotion in diverse cultural and economic contexts.
By the end of this course, you will not only have a solid grasp of the theoretical frameworks that underpin international marketing but also the practical skills and insights needed to develop effective international marketing strategies and navigate the complexities of global business environments.
Whether you are a marketing professional looking to expand your expertise, an entrepreneur planning to take your business global, or a student interested in exploring the dynamics of international trade, this course will equip you with the knowledge and tools to succeed in the exciting and ever-evolving field of international marketing.
Join us as we embark on this enlightening journey into the world of international marketing and discover the keys to success in global business!
Section 1: Introduction
In this section, students will be introduced to the foundational concepts of international marketing. They will learn about the key terms and phases involved in international marketing, gaining a solid understanding of the unique challenges and perspectives that characterize this field.
Section 2: International Trade Theories and Barriers
This section delves into the theoretical frameworks that underpin international trade. Students will explore various theories such as mercantilism, absolute advantage, comparative advantage, and the product life cycle theory. Additionally, they will examine the barriers that hinder international trade, including tariffs and non-tariff barriers.
Section 3: International Market Entry Methods
Students will learn about the different methods companies use to enter international markets. They will understand the objectives behind going international, factors influencing market selection decisions, and various entry modes such as licensing, franchising, contract manufacturing, and wholly-owned subsidiaries.
Section 4: Researching Foreign Markets
This section focuses on the importance of market research in international marketing. Students will learn about the research objectives, methods, and processes involved in gathering primary and secondary data for foreign markets. They will also explore the challenges associated with conducting research in diverse cultural contexts.
Section 5: Culture and Buyer Behavior
Culture plays a significant role in shaping consumer behavior in international markets. Students will study the elements of culture such as language, religion, aesthetics, and social institutions, and understand how these factors influence consumer preferences and purchasing decisions. Cross-cultural training methods will also be discussed.
Section 6: Governmental and Political Risks
Governmental and political factors can have a significant impact on international business operations. Students will learn about the political environments of home and host countries, regulatory frameworks, and mechanisms for settling disputes. They will also explore the legal implications of operating in diverse international markets.
Section 7: Financial Risks and Currency Concerns
Financial considerations are crucial for companies engaged in international trade. Students will gain insights into exchange rates, financial instruments, and the implications of currency fluctuations on business operations. They will also examine strategies for managing financial risks associated with international transactions.
Section 8: Organizing For International Markets
Organizational structure and human resource management are key determinants of success in international markets. Students will learn about the organizational structures adopted by multinational corporations, factors influencing international marketing decisions, and strategies for managing human resources across borders.
Section 9: International Distribution Strategy
Distribution channels play a critical role in reaching customers in international markets. Students will explore the complexities of international distribution, including the selection of distribution channels, the role of intermediaries, and logistics management. They will also learn about warehousing and distribution coverage strategies.
Section 10: International Product Strategy and Segmentation
Product planning and segmentation are essential components of international marketing strategy. Students will learn about the factors influencing product decisions, the process of new product development, and strategies for segmenting international markets based on demographic, psychographic, and behavioral factors.
Section 11: Branding Internationally
Branding is crucial for creating a competitive advantage in international markets. Students will study the role of branding in global marketing, brand drivers, and the factors influencing branding decisions. They will also explore strategies for building and managing brands across diverse cultural contexts.
Section 12: International Price Strategy
Pricing decisions can significantly impact a company's competitiveness in international markets. Students will learn about the factors affecting international pricing decisions, different costing methods, and pricing strategies adopted by multinational corporations. They will also explore techniques for managing pricing in diverse market environments.
Section 13: International Promotion Strategy
Promotion is essential for building brand awareness and driving sales in international markets. Students will examine various promotion techniques, the role of promotion mix in global marketing campaigns, and the challenges of advertising in diverse cultural contexts. They will also explore the debate between standardized and adapted promotional strategies.
Section 14: International Marketing Strategy
This section focuses on the development of comprehensive international marketing strategies. Students will learn about the international market planning process, key considerations for formulating effective marketing strategies, and the importance of ethical conduct in international business practices.
Section 15: Case Study On Starbucks Corporation
In this concluding section, students will analyze a case study on Starbucks Corporation, a global leader in the coffee industry. They will gain insights into Starbucks' international marketing strategies, successes, and challenges, applying the knowledge acquired throughout the course to real-world scenarios.
target_audience: Undergraduate and graduate students studying international business, marketing, or related fields.
Professionals working in multinational corporations or aspiring to expand their careers internationally.
Entrepreneurs seeking to enter global markets or expand their existing businesses internationally.
Marketing managers and executives responsible for formulating and implementing international marketing strategies.
Anyone interested in gaining a comprehensive understanding of the complexities and challenges of international marketing and expanding their knowledge in this area.

requirements: Eagerness to master online psychology and increase conversion rates.
A (very) basic understanding of Conversion Rate Optimization and A/B testing is useful but not required.
Useful (free) tools will be discussed in the course.
courses.description:
***Highest rated course on Online Psychology, by a best selling instructor***

If you are a Conversion Rate Optimization specialist or someone working on optimization and experimentation you often hear that online psychology is very important to increase your successes. And this is true, data shows that teams with knowledge about psychology get more A/B test winners, get a higher conversion rate and get better insights about their website visitors. If you want to achieve this, then this is the right course for you.


By taking this course, you will learn:
How to build a behavioral model with online psychology.
How to verify your behavioral model through A/B testing and psychology.
How to apply the four optimization directions and all psychological tactics.
How to apply your knowledge to every step in the customer journey.
How to use online psychology to increase your A/B test winners and conversion rates.
This helps you to greatly increase your success in your job and contribute to the growth of the whole organization.
This course will not simply cover 100 psychological tricks you can apply to your website today. Instead, this course will teach you how to really apply online psychology and persuasion into conversion rate optimization practices. You will learn how it fits within your CRO process, how to use it in your experimentation, and how to create and validate a behavioral model of your website visitors that helps you to increase your conversion rates and realize valuable long term learnings.


Online psychology and persuasion course setup
In this course, you will start by building a behavioral model for your website visitors. This model will help you to properly apply online psychology and persuasion into practice.
Next, you will learn everything about our brain and dual processing. We will cover System 1, System 2, and their characteristics.
After that, we deep dive into the four psychological directions for optimization and cover the psychological tactics which you can use in your A/B tests to verify your behavioral model. We will cover cognitive ease, motivation & risk, attention & perception, and choices & memory.


Course content
Section 1: Introduction
Section 2: Building a behavioral model
Section 3: Dual processing theory
Section 4: Cognitive ease
Section 5: Motivation & risk
Section 6: Attention & perception
Section 7: Choices & memory
Section 8: Final words
The course is set up in a practical and engaging manner. Together, we will cover all the theories using fun exercises, real-life examples, surprising scientific research, and of course, examples of how to apply it on your website.
By the end of the course, you will know how to build and verify a behavioral model with online psychology. You will massively increase your conversion rates, as well as learn about the needs, motivations, and behaviors of your website visitors. And all this knowledge is not only beneficial for your website, but also for marketing, product innovation, product owners, and the overall strategy of your whole organization.
Master online psychology and persuasion for conversion rate optimization and start increasing your conversion rates today
If you sign up today you will have lifetime access to the course, including all future updates. You´ll also get a 30 day no question asked, money-back guarantee.
If you have any questions, during this course or after that, you are always very welcome to contact me. I will be happy to help you out, and I want you to be successful.
Ready to learn online psychology? Get started today! :-)
target_audience: Conversion Specialists who want to excel in this field.
Online marketers and growth hackers who want to learn online psychology.
Entrepreneurs and e-commerce managers who want to keep increasing the conversion rate of their websites and beat the competition.
UX designers and developers who want to increase their knowledge of online psychology.
Data analysts who want to the why behind the data.
Psychologist who want to learn how to apply their knowledge online.

courses.title: Sustainable and circular consumption
courses.bio: Sustainable consumption

Introduction: Social norms, personal values and sustainable fashion.
Social representation, sustainable consumption and perceived green value
The Paradox of Progress – Fast Fashion and Low-Income Consumers

requirements: To fully benefit from this course, you need to posses a genuine desire to make a positive impact on the environment and a willingness to adopt more sustainable practices in your daily life.
Basic understanding of the fashion industry, including its environmental impact.
Interest in sustainability and environmental issues.
Open-mindedness and curiosity about sustainable alternatives and innovative solutions in the fashion industry.
courses.description:
Welcome to a captivating journey into the fascinating world of consumer behaviour and its impact on our planet. This lecture series looks at our buying decisions, explores how social norms, personal values and emotional intelligence influence what we consume. In the face of a pressing environmental crisis, understanding these external and internal psychological factors is more crucial than even before.
The power of social norms: the first leg of our exploration will uncover the profound influence of social norms on sustainable consumption in the context of second-hand goods. From the latest trends plastered across social media feeds to the unspoken expectations within our communities, these norms dictate what we perceive as ‘fashionable’, ‘trendy’, or even ‘successful’. We will analyse how these norms can lead to a desire to purchase the newest clothing lines. However, we will also look at the power of challenging social norms and redefine the concept of ‘cool’ to include sustainable practices and mindful consumption.
In terms of personal values and ethics, we will explore the role of personal values in shaping our consumption habits. As consumers become more environmentally conscious, and increasing number prioritise ethical production practices and the environmental impact of their choices. The lecture series will help you identify your own values and how they align with your buying habits. Understanding an internal conflict between wanting a new piece of clothing and a concern for the environment can empower you to make informed and values-driven purchasing decisions.
The emotional intelligence and consumption will also be investigated and the role of emotional intelligence in informing our choices will be explored. We will look into the emotional connection we form with our clothing and how it influences our buying habits. Understanding your emotional trigger can help you avoid impulsive purchases and foster a more mindful approach to consumption that aligns with your values and environmental responsibility.
Throughout this series, you will gain the knowledge and tools to make a positive impact on the world through your sustainable consumption habits. On a personal level, you will gain the confidence to challenge societal pressures to make choices that reflect your values and environmental consciousness. Professionally, this knowledge can be invaluable. Whether you aspire to a career in marketing, business, or even social work, understanding consumer psychology is a valuable asset. This series will place you at the forefront of a shift towards sustainable business practices and empower you to contribute to a more responsible future.
target_audience: Small-and-medium enterprise business leaders looking to integrate responsible decision-making into their fashion business operations.
Individuals willing to learn more about sustainable consumption when making clothing purchasing decisions.

courses.description:
Mentre l’innovazione tecnologica corre e stravolge il mercato, ci chiediamo: è ancora possibile in futuro per il commercio tradizionale, fisico, locale nell’era del digitale?
Le dinamiche di acquisto sono cambiate, le possibilità di scelta aumentate e oggi il cliente può acquistare beni e prodotti online comodamente da casa.
È quindi fondamentale che le piccole imprese commerciali stiano al passo aumentando il loro valore e la qualità dell’esperienza di acquisto che offrono ai loro clienti.
Il commercio al dettaglio si basa sulla capacità di stabilire relazioni, di accogliere e soddisfare i bisogni della clientela mantenendo il fattore umano.
In questo senso, il negozio fisico deve offrire una nuova esperienza di acquisto che diventi un’esperienza emotiva, dove si pone al centro la persona e i meccanismi psicologici che la portano a comprare.
Così l’atto di acquisto non riguarda più solo il momento in cui alla fine della visita in un negozio si compra un prodotto, ma si considera l’intera esperienza che si vive da prima dell’ingresso in negozio, quando guardiamo la vetrina, a come ci si muove all’interno, le luci, i colori, la disposizione della merce e, ovviamente, il contatto con il commerciante.
È fondamentale comprendere a fondo come il cliente vive l’esperienza d’acquisto, cosa prova e cosa lo spinge a comprare.
Per farlo, abbiamo indossato le lenti del neuromarketing, la nuova disciplina che unisce i principi del marketing tradizionale con quelli delle neuroscienze, della psicologia comportamentale e del design.
PROGRAMMA

Esplorazione: come si muove e dove guarda il cliente (organizzare lo spazio, regole base di visual merchandising per la merce)

courses.description:
Have you ever wondered how stores influence your shopping behavior?
In an age of self-service stores, saturated markets, and ever more demanding customers, the creative and science-driven design of the point of sale has become a crucial success factor for both retailers and service businesses. In this course, you will be introduced to shopper marketing. I will reveal the marketing secrets of how our purchase decisions are influenced by colors, scents, store layouts, and merchandise presentations. You will learn to understand shopping behavior and how to optimize the design of retail stores and service environments to increase customer satisfaction and sales.
Some of the questions addressed in the course are:
How can store design trigger impulse purchases?
How are visual merchandising and theming used to create irresistible shopping experiences?
How can stores be designed to make shopping more convenient for senior citizens?
What are the best (and the worst) selling zones in a store?
Why are men (but not women) seduced by red sales signs?
The intended audience of the course are entrepreneurs, marketers, and retailers, but also interested consumers who want to learn how shopping behavior can be influenced.
After participating in this course, you won’t ever look at stores the same way again. You will automatically analyze every store you enter to discover the psychological techniques used to make shoppers buy.
target_audience: Marketers, retailers and everyone who wants to learn about shopper marketing and store design.

courses.description:
This Course is in 10 Easy to Follow but Comprehensive Sessions


Session 1: Preparation
Preparation is the cornerstone of achieving success. whether it's in a personal or professional capacity. this involves taking steps, gathering resources, and planning to ensure that you are adequately equipped and organized to achieve your objectives. I will guide you on optimizing your office setup for a prosperous business.
Session 2: Your Telephone Script
Your Telephone script serves as the essential framework for building effective business communication. It serves as the roadmap guiding your interactions to your sales calls. I will explain how to write a script that will ensure your message is consistent across all interactions.
Session 3: Initiating your first telephone call
Initiating your first telephone call effectively is crucial for establishing a positive first impression and achieving your communication goals. I'll show you how to communicate with professionalism fostering rapport to lay the foundation for a lasting relationship.
Session 4: Following up with an email
Following up with an email after a telephone conversation contributes to the overall effectiveness of your communication skills. I will elaborate on this and provide you with recommended email templates
Session 5: Mastering active listening
Mastering active listening is equally a crucial communication skill that goes beyond simply hearing what someone is saying. It involves fully engaging with your prospect, processing their message, and responding thoughtfully. Regular practice is essential to attain optimal results, and I will guide you through.
Session 6: The Phone Call Follow Up
The Phone Call Follow Up plays a vital role of effective communication and relationship management. It is a practice that brings numerous benefits and contributes to the success of business interactions. I will provide you with examples of conversations that will make you memorable to your prospect right from the beginning of the call.
Session 7: Effective Voicemails
This is designed to maximize the benefits of your messages while ensuring that your messages are clear, professional, and yield desired outcomes. I'll provide you with tips on how to prompt your prospect to return your call, even during your first initial contact.
Session 8: Navigating the Gatekeeper
In a business context, a "gatekeeper" refers to an individual responsible for controlling access to a person within their company. I will help you overcome these challenges by offering recommended responses to their initial reactions when you make a call.
Session 9: Handling Objections
An objection means 'I do not have enough information to make a decision'. I will demonstrate effective ways to address various objections through examples and guide you on acknowledging your prospect's feelings and concerns.
Session 10: The Art of Closing
The Art of Closing is your final segment of this course. Once you've successfully grasped the content of the previous nine sessions, you will be well-equipped to secure a mutual agreement and close the deal. I'll provide you with various suggestions on what to say and what not to say during this crucial phase.
target_audience: Working from home or in a shared office
Beginners new to telephone sales

Business owners and entrepreneurs wanting to sharpen their sales strategies
Anyone seeking enhanced telephone communication skills

courses.title: Marketing y ventas para principiantes
courses.bio: Curso introductorio y básico sobre marketing y ventas, con conceptos sencillos, claros y muchos ejemplos.
objectives: Definición de Marketing, segmentos de mercado, paso a paso como elaborar una campaña de marketing.
Tipos de marketing: brand marketing, performance marketing, marketing directo.
Marketing Digital: Google, Web (informativa - Wordpress, Ecommerce - Shopify), email marketing, Redes Sociales
Funnel o embudo de ventas
Ventas B2B y B2C, Estretegias de ventas

Definición de Marketing: Definicion de Marketing - El plan de marketing de 1 pagina - Allan Dib
Definición de Marketing del libro "El AVC del Marketing Digital" de R Oberlander
Segmentación de mercados - Mercado Objet: El mercado objetivo de Harley Davison
Buyer persona y customer journey map - d: Buyer persona - Caso viajes eventos deportivos Mallorca
Customer Journey - Caso viajes eventos deportivos Mallorca
Campañas de Marketing: 5 - Establece el mensaje que quieres transmitir
6 - Selecciona los canales de comunicación adecuados
Marketing Digital: Google - Presentación de búsqueda y resultados
¿Porque aparecer en los primeros resultados en las búsquedas en google?
La long tail o la cola larga en las búsquedas de google
Marketing de referidos: Presentación del Marketing de Referidos y el ejemplo de N26
Marketing de Afiliados: Presentación del marketing de afiliados y el ejemplo de Civitatis
Marketing de influencers: Presentación del Marketing de influencers y tipos de influencers.

requirements: No hay requisitos anteriores. Simplemente ganas de aprender.
courses.description:
Este es un curso básico e introductorio al marketing y ventas. Los videos son todos cortos (menos de 5 minutos) para hacer sencillo su avance, tomar apuntes y fijar conceptos.
En el mismo hablaremos con conceptos claros y sencillos, para que cualquier persona, independientemente de su formación, actividad o experiencia profesional o laboral, pueda entenderlos.
Además, veremos muchos ejemplos reales de campañas de marketing o estrategias de ventas para ayudar al alumno a entender los conceptos y que sirvan y ayuden a los alumnos a inspirarse y tener ideas relacionadas a los temas vistos.
En este curso hablaremos sobre marketing, partiendo de su definición, veremos luego los segmentos de mercado o mercado objetivo, el proceso para elaborar una campaña de marketing, los distintos tipos de marketing, siguiendo con marketing digital (una breve presentación de las páginas web, google - SEO, SEM, Google Maps, Google Shopping, etc - , email marketing y redes sociales), marketing tradicional y luego ventas.
En ventas hablaremos sobre el funnel de ventas, los tipos de ventas, que compran los clientes, estrategias de ventas y más.
Al final del curso el alumno podrá descargar el certificado para compartir y demostrar lo aprendido, lo cual ayudará a ampliar sus posibilidades laborales.
Animate a comprar y disfrutar de este curso!
target_audience: Personas con roles comerciales o de ventas, que quieran aprender más sobre marketing y vengas.
Emprendedores, que quieran desarrollar y profesionalizar su gestión de ventas.
Personas que quieran simplemente aprender sobre marketing y/o ventas.

courses.title: Diplomado en Marketing y Publicidad
courses.bio: ¡Certifica conocimientos en Publicidad y Marketing!
objectives: Diferenciar distintos términos del área comunicacional
Realizar estrategias y campañas publicitarias
Identificar que errores no cometer al realizar una campaña publicitaria

Fundamentos y teoría relevante: Diferencia entre marketing, publicidad y propaganda
Partes que intervienen en la publicidad.

requirements: No necesita requisitos previos
courses.description:
¿Crees que necesitas Marketing? ¿Quizá lo que realmente necesitas es Publicidad? El Marketing son metodologías de análisis y conocimiento del mercado, una rama más específica es la Publicidad, que se enfoca en captar la atención de los consumidores.
En este curso el estudiante aprenderá fundamentos de la publicidad, que le permitirán desarrollar estrategias y campañas para marcas de distinta índole, ya sean empresas privadas, públicas o fundaciones, que tengan la intención de comunicar sus productos, servicios o acciones.
La Publicidad es una área dinámica y desafiante para gente proactiva. Con el Diplomado entenderás como combinar estrategia, conocimientos y creatividad para crear una comunicación que sorprenda, persuada y entretenga.
Para lograr realizar campañas publicitarias eficientes, es de gran relevancia identificar qué tipo de acciones publicitarias son necesarias realizar, evaluando desde las acciones en medios tradicionales hasta los digitales, con la finalidad de generar cumplir los objetivos deseados por las marcas y a su vez que las campañas que realice impliquen credibilidad, tanto para la empresa contratante, como para el desarrollador de la campaña.
En el Diplomado aprenderá las definiciones adecuadas, la diferencia entre la publicidad y el marketing, los distintos objetivos publicitarios, los elementos que la componen, los tipos de agencias de publicidad, campañas ATL y BTL, comunicación en masas, medios digitales, diseño estratégico de campañas, posicionamiento de marca, readacción de copys, creación de storytellings, e incluso tips de acción en situaciones profesionales y como manejar una crisis de reputación.
target_audience: Personas con interés en áreas como marketing, comunicación, ventas y publicidad.

courses.description:
Welcome to Mastering the Art of Persuasion: Influence Techniques for Work and Sales Success—a comprehensive course designed to elevate your skills in the office, business, and sales environments. Whether you’re aiming to enhance your ability to influence colleagues, build stronger client relationships, or close more sales, this course will provide you with the tools and techniques necessary to succeed.


Throughout this course, you’ll explore key topics that will empower you to succeed, including:
The Psychology of Persuasion: Understand how people think and make decisions.
Building Credibility: Learn to establish trust and authority in your professional interactions.
The Power of Emotional Intelligence: Use emotional intelligence to connect and persuade effectively.
Crafting Persuasive Messages: Master the art of clear, compelling communication.
Win-Win Negotiation: Discover strategies for achieving mutually beneficial outcomes.
Leveraging Social Proof and Reciprocity in Sales: Increase trust and drive sales using proven techniques.
Developing Your Social Proof and Reciprocity Skills: Engage in exercises to enhance your persuasive abilities.
Persuasive Storytelling: Learn to use narratives that inspire and influence.
Creating Successful Storytelling: Understand the elements of compelling stories.
Successful Storytelling in Business and Marketing: Explore real-world examples that work.
Non-Verbal Communication: Harness the power of body language and non-verbal cues.
Common Mistakes to Avoid: Identify and steer clear of common pitfalls in persuasion.
By the end of this course, you’ll have a deep understanding of how to influence decisions, build trust, and communicate effectively in any professional setting. Whether you’re in the boardroom or the sales floor, these skills will empower you to achieve your goals and drive success in your career.
target_audience: Mastering the Art of Persuasion for Work and Sales Success, is designed for professionals who want to enhance their ability to influence others effectively. This includes salespeople, marketers, business leaders, entrepreneurs, and anyone in a client-facing role. It's also ideal for those looking to improve their communication skills in the workplace, negotiate better deals, or build stronger relationships with clients and colleagues.

También identificarás tus prospectos potenciales y características de acuerdo a la información que aportan los clientes, para formar un seguimiento personalizado y aprendiendo de cada una de sus interacciones e intereses.

Aprende a utilizar el CRM de HubSpot acompañado de un proceso medible, realista y alcanzable.

Trabaja en equipo con el departamento para aumentar la productividad de la institución.

Utiliza herramientas digitales para la medición de resultados y el seguimiento en tiempo real de los prospectos.

- Conocerás el proceso de SMARKETING (Sales + Marketing) el cual consiste en integrar al equipo de ventas y marketing en la estrategia de generación de prospectos.
- Establecerás el proceso comercial de tu institución para la inscripción del aspirante de acuerdo a los pasos que debe tomar con un seguimiento constante y personalizado.

Adicional al contenido audiovisual este curso incluye:

2 Plantillas para tus correos de seguimiento
1 Plantilla para el desarrollo de tu proceso comercial
Plantilla para la identificación de tu buyer persona

¿Cómo saber si este curso es para mi?
Si respondes que si a una de las siguientes preguntas este curso podrá ayudarte.
¿Te encantaría llegar a la meta de inscritos este ciclo escolar?
¿Te interesaría superar a tu competencia y convertirte en la primera opción?
¿Quieres aumentar la demanda de tu institución?
¿Quieres que tú y tu equipo de admisiones tengan claridad y prioridades en sus actividades?
¿Quieres mejorar la comunicación con tu equipo de admisiones?
¿Quieres identificar a tus aspirantes potenciales?

¿Te gustaría contar con un equipo de admisiones enfocado en acciones claras y específicas para llegar a la meta?

courses.description:
Öncelikle bu eğitimi içeriğini okumaya ayırdığınız zaman için teşekkür ederim.
Hayatta en değerli hazinenin zaman olduğunu en iyi bilenlerdenim ve bu eğitimi hazırlamamdaki en büyük etkenlerden biri de maalesef ülkemizde network marketing işine giren kişilerin yapılan yanlış yönlendirmeler, verilen yanlış eğitimler nedeni ile en büyük hazineleri olan zamanlarını gereksiz bir şekilde harcamaları, para kazanmak yerine para kaybettiklerini en iyi bilen kişilerden biri olmamdır.
Toplamda 20 yılı aşkın bir network tecrübesine sahibim ve bu eğitimi bitirdiğinizde tüm bakış açınızı kökünden değiştireceğinizi iddia ediyorum.
Bugüne kadar hep size gaz verici, cesaretlendirici, sabredin başarırsınız, etkili konuşmayı öğrenin, sürekli listeler yapın, ürünleri ezberleyin, akrabalarınızı ikna edin vs vs.  bir dünya benzeri tavsiye verildi değil mi?
Bunları yapanların da gerçekten pasif gelire ulaştığı, ekonomik özgürlüğü kazandığı gibi şeyler söylenerek kocaman kocaman çekler ve dekontlarda gösterildi sanırım :)
Peki bunların gerçekliğini sorgulamak hiç aklınıza geldi mi?
Ya da Türkiye için uygulanılabilirliğini?
Peki ya size bugüne kadar klasik şekilde birbirine benzer dinlediğiniz, anlatılan hiçbir şey Türkiye  için geçerli değil desem ve bunu bu eğitimde ispat edeceğimi söyleyip sonunda da nasıl gerçekten başarılı olabileceğinizi bir plan ile uygulamalı örneklerle açıklasam ilginizi çeker miydi?
Evet doğru duydunuz!  Türkiye de ilk defa dinleyeceğiniz öğreneceğiniz bu plan ile bütün ezberlerinizi bozacaksınız.
Bir çok firma da deneyip başarısını kanıtladığım bu planı sizde bu eğitimin sonunda belki de kendi çalıştığınız firmaya uygulayabileceksiniz. Belki diyorum çünkü 3 aşamadan oluşan bu eğitimde ilk aşamada doğru bilinen yanlışları madalyonun öteki yüzünü görecek, neden başarısız olduğunuzu anlayacak ,ikinci aşamada ise şu an çalıştığınız firma Türkiye şartlarında ve size öğreteceğim plan dahilinde size başarı getirebilecek bir firma mı bunu anlayacaksınız.
İkinci aşama sonunda cevabınız EVET ise üçüncü bölümde öğreneceğiniz planı rahatlıkla kendi firmanızda uygulayabilecek ve başarının aslında ne kadar kolay olduğunu göreceksiniz.
Peki ya cevabınız HAYIR ise ?  Endişe etmenize gerek yok o zamanda öğreneceğiniz plana uygun bir firma araştırmasına girerek en azından en değerli hazineniz olan zamanınızı boşuna harcamadan, liderlerin gazına gelmeden, sizi sömürmelerine izin vermeden, para kaybetmeden yol yakınken çizginizi belirlemiş olacaksınız.
Buraya kadar anlattıklarım ilginizi çekti ise o zaman şimdi de gerçekten bu işi anlatabiliyor muyum, anlatım şeklim size hitap ediyor mu birde onu test etmeniz için Ücretsiz giriş videolarını izlemenizi öneriyorum.
Eğer kursa kaydolmaya karar verirseniz her aşamada yardımcı olacağımdan şüpheniz olmasın.
Herşeyin gönlünüzce olması dileğiyle şimdiden başarılar dilerim.


Dip Not:  Bu eğitimi ve beni size sürekli klasik yöntemleri anlatarak sabretmenizi telkin eden bazı sözde network liderleri beğenmeyebilir :)
target_audience: Klasik Network Marketing eğitimlerini izlemekten, duymaktan sıkılmış olanlar

requirements: Pas de prérequis particulier à part celui de savoir écrire correctement et d'être motivé à apprendre et progresser !
courses.description:
Internet est extraordinaire.
Il a permis à n'importe qui dans le monde de s'exprimer librement quand il le veut.
Ainsi, le nombre de sites web a explosé (1,84 milliards en 2021).
Pareil pour les comptes Instagram (1,386 milliards d'utilisateurs actifs en 2021).
Ou encore Facebook (1,88 milliards d'utilisateurs actifs en 2021).
Bref, vous l'avez compris : l'accès a internet s'est démocratisé, libérant ainsi la parole de milliards de personnes.


Pour la liberté d'expression c'est cool, pour votre business moins...
Parmi cette masse d'information, votre message a de moins en moins de chance d'être lu.
Certes, un nombre d'utilisateurs plus importants signifie plus de lecteurs potentiels.
Ce serait oublier qu'un contenu a une durée de vie.
Chaque créateur de contenu créé chaque jour de nouveaux contenus qui viennent se stocker à une bibliothèque de contenus toujours plus immense.
Votre seule chance de vous en sortir : le copywriting.


Vous avez dû plus ou moins déjà entendre ce terme (si vous le connaissez déjà, passez ce paragraphe).
Il vient du français conception-rédaction.
Je définis le copywriting par 3 principes :
- Attirer l'attention
- Maintenir l'attention
- Faire passer à l'action.
Certains définissent le copywriting comme "l'art de vendre avec les mots".
Cette définition est trop restreinte pour moi.
Le copywriting vise à convaincre avec les mots : convaincre de commencer à lire votre message, convaincre de lire ce message en entier, convaincre de passer à l'action (et pas forcément acheter).
Ainsi, l'époque où le copywriting ne se résumait qu'à la rédaction de textes publicitaires est révolue.
Aujourd'hui, le copywriting est partout : rédiger une lettre de motivation pour un emploi nécessite de convaincre l'employeur d'ouvrir, de lire et de répondre.


Le copywriting est l'unique solution face à cette masse d'informations qui nous envahit.


Si vous vous êtes intéressé au copywriting, vous avez sans doute été confronté à ces problèmes :


Problème 1 : Il existe énormément de ressources sur le copywriting vous ne savez pas comment vous y prendre.
En effet, Internet regorge de ressources sur le copywriting.
Mais celles-ci sont d'une qualité discutable et vous n'avez pas le recul pour en juger.
Par ailleurs, il vous manque une structure claire qui vous dit concrètement comment vous y prendre.


Problème 2 : Vous ne pratiquez pas assez le copywriting.
Vous ne vous rendez pas forcément compte de ce problème.
Autrement dit, ne pas pratiquer n'est pas forcément un problème pour vous.
En réalité, si.
Pour être bon en copywriting, il ne faut pas ingurgiter le plus de ressources possibles sur le copywriting.
Il faut aussi pratiquer.
Je dirais 50/50.
Or, les ressources en copywriting sur internet ne vous poussent clairement pas à assez pratiquer.
L'autre solution pour pratiquer est de le faire avec des clients.
Mais pour avoir des clients, il faut être bon.
Et pour être bon, il faut pratiquer.
Vous l'avez compris, c'est le serpent qui se mort la queue.


Problème 3 : On ne vous encourage pas à faire du copywriting.
Je m'explique.
Les personnes qui se forment en copywriting et qui sont au final plus ou moins bonnes...
... vous expliquent qu'elles ont lues 100 livres d'auteurs américains sur le copywriting.
Qu'elles ont fait du copywriting 16h par jour pendant 3 mois non-stop.
Ca ne donne pas envie.
Ces mêmes personnes vous proposent leur services de copywriting pour des prix déraisonnables.
Vous avez compris où je veux en venir ?




C'est pourquoi le cours Udemy "Le Cours Complet de Copywriting (2021) : Vendez plus !" a été conçu.


Solution au problème 1 :
Ce cours ne se concentre que sur le meilleur du copywriting (les 20% qui vous donneront 80% des résultats).
Il vous donne également un plan d'action concret pour progresser.
Fini les centaines de cours théoriques après lesquels vous vous dites : "Oui et donc ?"


Solution au problème 2 :
Ce cours se veut le plus pratique possible.
Vous devez pratiquer le copywriting pour progresser.
C'est pourquoi, une section complète vous explique comment vous pouvez pratiquer le copywriting au quotidien pour progresser : sans client, sans niveau préalable.
De nombreux cas pratiques sont donnés pour rendre plus concrets les principes théoriques.


Solution au problème 3 :
Ce cours se veut complet mais ne demande pas de vous de vous dégouter du copywriting.
Je ne blâme pas le travail difficile.
Je pense que pour être excellent dans quelque chose, travailler 16 heures par jour est une bonne idée.
Néanmoins, on a le droit de vouloir progresser dans un domaine sans forcément en faire son métier principal.
Rappelez-vous d'ailleurs la loi de Pareto : 80% des résultats sont amenés par 20% de vos actions.
Ainsi, si vous avez l'impression de ne pas pouvoir faire de copywriting car ceux qui en font ont l'air d'avoir tout arrêté pour s'y consacrer : vous vous trompez.
Vous pouvez tout à fait vouloir augmenter...
- le taux d'ouverture de vos mails
- le taux de conversion de vos mails
- le taux de clic de vos vidéos Youtube
- la durée de visionnage de vos vidéos Youtube
- le taux de conversion de vos pages de vente.
...
Sans devenir copywriter professionnel.
C'est possible : avec ce cours.
PS : ce cours conviendra également à quelqu'un souhaitant devenir copywriter professionnel.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs qui veulent améliorer leurs taux de conversion en améliorant leurs textes de vente
Entrepreneurs souhaitant mieux comprendre le copywriting pour ensuite mieux déléguer cette activité
Indépendant souhaitant devenir freelance copywriter pour arrondir leur fin de mois ou exercer cette activité à plein temps

courses.description:
Being an event planner and organizing events is not an easy job; it takes a lot of patience, focus, courage, determination, and other characteristics to successfully provide attendee satisfaction and fantastic experience to the business participants. In customer service, people will forget what you did, but people will never forget how you made them feel. This quote truly captures the importance of making guests feel valued. There is no shortage of research out there discussing how essential customer experience is right now, and at the heart of those experiences is superior customer service, knowledgeable, friendly staff trumps all other aspects of your business. In fact 72% of guests who have a positive experience will share that information with friends, often naming the business responsible. It is very important to note that, customer experience will be very important than other factors when individuals choose between two brands.
Every event manager or company must ensure that their staff are well trained to serve customers effectively, customers are always right. From preparation to the finishing of any event need careful planning. When you start planning an event, one of the first thing you should do is figure out your planning timeline. It is very important to outline the months and weeks leading up to the big day. This way, you will meet a very important deadlines and also stay within your budget.
target_audience: Event managers, event companies, Event agencies, customers, governments, event associations, business people, organizers, students, churches, etc.

Upwork, dünya çapında binlerce freelance profesyonel ile müşteriyi bir araya getiren lider platformlardan biridir. Ancak bu platformda öne çıkmak sadece bir hesap oluşturmakla sınırlı değildir. Gerçek başarı, stratejik adımlarla mümkündür. Kursumuz, Upwork’te fark yaratacak bir profil oluşturmayı, müşterilerin dikkatini çekmeyi ve kazançlı projeler almayı adım adım öğretiyor.
Eğitim süresince etkili bir başvuru yazmanın püf noktalarını, dikkat çekici bir portföy hazırlamanın en iyi yöntemlerini ve müşteri ilişkilerini nasıl doğru bir şekilde yönetmeniz gerektiğini öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, yoğun rekabet ortamında öne çıkmak için uygulayabileceğiniz pratik ipuçları ve stratejiler de bu kursun önemli bir parçasıdır.
Yeni başlayanlar kadar tecrübeli freelanceların da faydalanabileceği bu kurs, teori ve pratik örnekleri bir araya getirerek kapsamlı bir öğrenme deneyimi sunar. Kendi işini yaparak özgür çalışmak isteyenler için rehber niteliğindedir. Gelirlerinizi artırmak, bağımsız bir kariyer inşa etmek ve istediğiniz yaşam tarzını elde etmek için bu kurs size ihtiyaç duyduğunuz tüm bilgileri sağlayacak.
Eğer daha fazla kazanmak, kendi işinizi yönetmek ve kariyerinizde tam kontrol sahibi olmak istiyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre! Freelance dünyasının kapılarını aralamak ve Upwork’te başarıya ulaşmak için hemen şimdi harekete geçin!


Daha fazla bilgi için mesaj atabilirsiniz, teşekkürler!
target_audience: Freelance dünyasına adım atmak isteyenler: İlk kez freelance çalışmayı deneyimlemek isteyenler için kapsamlı bir başlangıç rehberi sunar.
Upwork’te başarıya ulaşmak isteyenler: Profilini geliştirmek, daha fazla müşteri çekmek ve projelerde başarılı olmak isteyen kişiler.
Yan gelir elde etmek isteyenler: Mevcut işlerinin yanı sıra freelance projeler alarak ek gelir arayışında olan bireyler.
