courses.description:
La Podcast Academy par LiLiCAST est une série tutorielle conçue pour vous aider à lancez votre premier podcast facilement et rapidement.
Vous vous demandez comment vous devez vous y prendre ? Par quoi commencer ? Et à quoi penser ? Grâce à la Podcast Academy, vous découvrirez, étape par étape, tout le processus pour réussir le lancement de votre podcast.

Si vous ne vous êtes pas encore décidé à faire le pas, sachez que l’audio est la manière la plus rapide et efficace pour capturer du contenu. Par ailleurs, en créant des podcasts avec LiLiCAST vous avez la possibilité de créer et de diffuser un contenu professionnel et de qualité adapté à chacun de vos besoins de communication.
Une fois que vous aurez suivi nos tutoriels, retrouvez-nous vite sur le site de LiLiCAST pour mettre en pratique votre nouveau savoir sur le podcast et poursuivre cette formidable aventure sonore !


Pour cette série créée par nos soins, Deborah Laurent, journaliste et créatrice de contenu, nous a prêté sa voix pour illustrer nos tutoriels. La Podcast Academy est composée de 14 tutoriels courts, organisés selon les trois étapes indispensables à la création d'un podcast.

1/ La préparation :

-Ep3 Structurer sa pensée
-Ep4 Comment mener une interview
-Ep5 A quoi ressemble un podcast idéal

2/ L’enregistrement :

-Ep8 La prise de son en pratique
-Ep9 Faire un podcast sans invité

-Ep11 Quel matériel pour réussir un podcast ?

3/ La post production et la diffusion :
-Ep12 L'habillage sonore

courses.title: Marketing Verde: Estratégias Sustentáveis que Vendem
courses.bio: Aprenda a construir uma marca eco-friendly autêntica que atrai consumidores conscientes e gera resultados reais
objectives: Definir Marketing Verde e identificar certificações que fortalecem credibilidade empresarial sustentável.
Aplicar os 4 pilares fundamentais para criar campanhas ecológica, econômica, social e culturalmente responsáveis.
Implementar estratégias dos 3Rs em programas de marketing que demonstrem consciência ecológica autêntica.
Analisar públicos-alvo emergentes e oportunidades competitivas no mercado verde em expansão atual.
Examinar cases de sucesso (Natura, Ben & Jerry's, Starbucks) para adaptar melhores práticas ao seu negócio.
Identificar e evitar greenwashing criando comunicação transparente que gere confiança real do consumidor.
Desenvolver campanhas educativas sobre economia de água e energia que engajem stakeholders efetivamente.
Criar programas de redução de plástico que posicionem sua marca como líder em sustentabilidade prática.
Avaliar impacto de ações de marketing verde usando métricas específicas que provem retorno investido.
Planejar estratégia completa de marketing sustentável alinhada aos valores organizacionais e expectativas sociais.

Módulo 1: m1A1 – O que é Marketing Verde
m1A2 – Quando surgiu o Marketing Verde
m1A3 – Porque empresas se destacam com o Marketing Verde
Módulo 3: m3A4 – Economia de água na produção
m3A5 – Diversifique as fontes de energia
m3A7 – Reduza o uso do plástico
Módulo 6: m6A3 – Não analisar o impacto do seu Marketing

requirements: Você tem interesse básico em marketing ou sustentabilidade empresarial.
Você busca aplicar práticas ecológicas em negócios (iniciante ou experiente).
courses.description:
Transforme a consciência ambiental em uma vantagem competitiva poderosa e conquiste os 67% dos consumidores que pesquisam práticas sustentáveis antes de comprar. Este curso ensina como implementar marketing verde autêntico que não apenas protege o planeta, mas também impulsiona suas vendas de forma ética e lucrativa.
Domine a Revolução Verde que Está Transformando o Mercado Brasileiro
Construa uma marca eco-friendly genuína que conquista consumidores conscientes e gera fidelidade duradoura
Evite armadilhas de greenwashing que podem destruir sua reputação e gerar multas milionárias
Implemente os 4 pilares fundamentais: estratégias ecológicas, econômicas, sociais e culturalmente aceitas
Aplique técnicas comprovadas da Natura, Microsoft e outras líderes mundiais em sustentabilidade
Crie campanhas autênticas baseadas nos 3 Rs e 4 Ss que geram engajamento real
Posicione sua empresa no mercado ESG que movimenta trilhões globalmente
Desenvolva comunicação sustentável que converte prospects em clientes fiéis à sua causa
A Sustentabilidade Deixou de Ser Opcional - Agora é Estratégia de Sobrevivência
Vivemos um momento histórico onde 96% dos brasileiros consideram fundamental que empresas adotem práticas sustentáveis. Não se trata mais de uma tendência passageira, mas de uma transformação irreversível no comportamento do consumidor que está redefinindo quem vence e quem desaparece do mercado.
Por Que o Marketing Verde é Crucial Agora?
A União Europeia está implementando leis que proíbem greenwashing, criando multas pesadas para empresas que enganam consumidores sobre suas práticas ambientais. No Brasil, 75% dos consumidores afirmam que empresas sustentáveis têm mais chances de conquistá-los como clientes, representando um mercado de mais de 150 milhões de pessoas.
O movimento sustentável não é mais liderado apenas por ambientalistas. Investidores institucionais gerenciam mais de R$ 2,3 trilhões em fundos ESG globalmente, direcionando capital apenas para empresas com práticas comprovadamente sustentáveis. Empresas que ignoram essa realidade enfrentam não apenas perda de clientes, mas também dificuldades crescentes para obter financiamento.
A pressão regulatória está aumentando exponentially. Novas normas exigem relatórios de sustentabilidade, certificações ambientais e transparência total na cadeia produtiva. Quem não se adaptar enfrentará custos regulatórios crescentes e perda sistemática de market share.
A nova geração de consumidores, especialmente os Millennials e Gen Z, não apenas preferem marcas sustentáveis - eles pagam mais por produtos que demonstram responsabilidade ambiental autêntica. Isso representa a maior oportunidade de diferenciação e premium pricing dos últimos 50 anos.
O Que Você Vai Aprender Neste Treinamento
Você descobrirá como a Natura se tornou pioneira mundial em marketing verde, construindo um império de beleza baseado em sustentabilidade autêntica que conquistou mercados globais. Aprenderá as estratégias exatas que transformaram uma empresa brasileira em referência mundial de responsabilidade socioambiental.
Dominará a metodologia dos 4 pilares fundamentais que garantem sustentabilidade real: práticas ecologicamente corretas, viabilidade econômica, justiça social e aceitação cultural. Cada pilar será detalhado com exemplos práticos e templates prontos para implementação imediata em seu negócio.
Você entenderá como aplicar os 3 Rs (Reduzir, Reutilizar, Reciclar) e os 4 Ss (Segurança, Sustentabilidade, Satisfação do Consumidor, Aceitação Social) de forma estratégica, transformando práticas operacionais em vantagens competitivas comunicáveis e mensuráveis.
Para Quem é Este Curso?
Este treinamento foi desenvolvido para empreendedores visionários que reconhecem a sustentabilidade como o futuro dos negócios e querem posicionar suas empresas na vanguarda dessa revolução verde. É essencial para gestores de marketing que precisam comunicar iniciativas sustentáveis de forma autêntica e impactante.
Consultores empresariais encontrarão aqui metodologias comprovadas para implementar em clientes, agregando valor significativo aos seus serviços e fortalecendo relacionamentos através de resultados tangíveis em sustentabilidade e vendas.
Não importa o tamanho da sua empresa ou setor de atuação. Os princípios do marketing verde são universais e podem ser adaptados desde startups até multinacionais. Muitos acreditam erroneamente que marketing verde é caro e complicado. Na realidade, as estratégias mais eficazes frequentemente reduzem custos operacionais enquanto melhoram a imagem da marca.
Alguns assumem que marketing verde só funciona para produtos "naturalmente" sustentáveis como cosméticos ou alimentos orgânicos. A verdade é que qualquer empresa pode encontrar ângulos autênticos de sustentabilidade em suas operações, desde eficiência energética até responsabilidade social.
Existe também o medo de ser acusado de greenwashing. Este curso ensina exatamente como evitar essa armadilha fatal, construindo comunicação baseada em ações reais e mensuráveis, protegendo sua reputação enquanto conquista consumidores conscientes.
Muitos gestores pensam que precisam revolucionar toda a empresa antes de começar a comunicar sustentabilidade. O approach correto é começar com pequenas ações autênticas e expandir gradualmente, construindo credibilidade passo a passo.
Resultados Que Você Pode Esperar
Estudos de neurociência do consumidor revelam que marcas percebidas como sustentáveis ativam áreas cerebrais associadas a recompensa e bem-estar, gerando conexão emocional 3x mais forte que marcas convencionais. Isso se traduz em maior fidelidade, menor sensibilidade ao preço e advocacy espontâneo.
A Harvard Business Review documenta que empresas com estratégias ESG sólidas apresentam 18% maior lucratividade e 16% melhor performance nas ações comparadas a competidores tradicionais. Marketing verde autêntico não é custo - é investimento em diferenciação sustentável.
Quando sua comunicação sustentável é percebida como genuína pelos consumidores, ela gera o que pesquisadores chamam de "halo effect verde" - clientes assumem que seus produtos são superiores em qualidade, segurança e inovação, justificando preços premium e reduzindo necessidade de promoções.
Detalhes do Treinamento
O curso está estruturado em 7 módulos estratégicos com 2 horas e 7 minutos de conteúdo prático e aplicável:
Módulo 1: Fundamentos do Marketing Verde - Compreenda a origem, certificações e vantagens competitivas do marketing sustentável no cenário empresarial atual
Módulo 2: Os 4 Pilares da Sustentabilidade - Domine práticas ecologicamente corretas, economicamente viáveis, socialmente justas e culturalmente aceitas
Módulo 3: Implementação Prática - Aplique os 3 Rs, desenvolva consciência ecológica e programe palestras sustentáveis que engajam stakeholders
Módulo 4: Vantagens Competitivas - Identifique seu público, desenvolva inovação sustentável e explore mercados em expansão exponencial
Módulo 5: Cases de Sucesso Globais - Analise estratégias detalhadas da Natura, Ben & Jerry's, Starbucks e Microsoft com insights acionáveis
Módulo 6: Evitando Armadilhas Fatais - Previna greenwashing, desenvolva planejamento sólido e mensure impacto real do seu marketing verde
Módulo 7: Conclusão e Implementação - Integre todos os conceitos em um plano de ação pronto para execução imediata
Cada módulo inclui templates, checklists e frameworks testados por empresas líderes. Você terminará o curso com ferramentas práticas para implementar marketing verde autêntico já na primeira semana após a conclusão.
Cases Reais de Transformação
A Natura não começou sustentável - ela se tornou líder através de implementação gradual e comunicação autêntica das mudanças. Hoje é referência mundial e conquistou mercados internacionais baseada em seu posicionamento verde genuíno.
A Microsoft transformou sua reputação de gigante tecnológica "fria" em líder de responsabilidade climática, investindo bilhões em projetos de IA para sustentabilidade e comunicando esses esforços de forma que resonam com consumidores e investidores.
Transforme Sua Empresa Hoje Mesmo
Enquanto seus concorrentes ainda veem sustentabilidade como custo adicional, você terá o conhecimento para transformá-la em vantagem competitiva duradoura. Cada dia que passa sem implementar marketing verde autêntico é uma oportunidade perdida de conquistar os consumidores mais valiosos do mercado atual.
O movimento verde não vai desacelerar - vai acelerar. Regulamentações mais rígidas, pressão de investidores e demanda crescente de consumidores conscientes farão da sustentabilidade um fator crítico de sobrevivência empresarial.
Inscreva-se agora e transforme sustentabilidade na estratégia mais poderosa da sua empresa para conquistar corações, mentes e carteiras dos consumidores do futuro.
target_audience: Empresários que desejam posicionar sua marca como sustentável e responsável.
Profissionais de marketing buscando especialização em estratégias verdes lucrativas.
Empreendedores interessados em criar negócios alinhados com tendências ecológicas.
Gestores que querem evitar greenwashing e comunicar sustentabilidade com autenticidade.

courses.title: 「店長ばかりが忙しいサロンを卒業する方法」サロンの持続的な成長戦略プログラム
courses.bio: 仕組み化 × リテンションで叶えるサロンづくりの決定版！ ― 誰でもが売れる理美容師に育つ仕組み・LTV経営でファン客を育成し、高生産性サロンを実現する実践講座。
objectives: 【再現性のある「売れる仕組み」構築】個人の能力や経験に依存せず、誰でも成果を出せる「売れる型」をつくり、スタッフ全員が安定して売上を上げられる体制を学びます。
【リテンション・マーケティングの実践】「次回予約を増やす」や「リピート率」だけでなく、LTVを最大化し、顧客と長期的な関係を築くマーケティング戦略を習得します。
【新規集客からファン化までの流れ、優良顧客戦略】顧客層を分析し、上位20％のファン顧客を育成・強化して売上を安定化させる「顧客育成ロードマップ」を作成します｡
【スタッフ育成と組織づくり】「店長やベテラン依存」から脱却し、若手や時短社員も成果を上げられる教育・仕組みを導入し、離職を防ぎ、人が育つ環境を整えます。
【これからの美容サロン業界で生き残る勝ち組戦略】技術やメニュー中心の発想から脱却し、お客様の「真の問題解決」に焦点を当てる視点を身につけ、価格競争に巻き込まれない強い経営が可能になります｡
【持続可能な経営基盤づくり】人口減少や競争激化、最低賃金上昇といった外部環境の変化に対応し、生産性を高めて安定的に利益を確保するための実践的な仕組みを学べます。

はじめに：店長依存から抜け出す第一歩: 「サロンの売上の中心は誰？」サロン課題とリスク
誰でも成果を出せる仕組みづくり: 理想的なサロンの状態と導入サロンの変化

LTVがもたらす本当の価値
美容室業界のリアルな現状: 美容室業界のリアルな現状
優良顧客を育てる分析と仕組み: カスタマーピラミッドとパレートの法則
売上を上げる仕組みの構造
ファンを育てる顧客育成ロードマップ: 5つのフェーズによる顧客育成ロードマップ
第1フェーズ：見込み客としてサロンを知り、新規のお客様として初来店してもらう
第2フェーズ：新規のお客様に、再度来店（再購入）してもらう
具体例：ご新規のお客様にやるべき仕掛け
具体例：2回目来店のお客様にやるべき仕掛け
第3フェーズ：お客様との信頼関係を深め、来店回数を2回から4回、4回から6回に増やしていく
信頼関係を築くのに役立つ心理的法則①：『類似性の法則』
信頼関係を築くのに役立つ心理的法則②：『両面提示の法則』

第4フェーズ：お客様の満足度を高め、年間トータルの購買金額を増やしていく
第5フェーズ：お客様がサロンのファンになり、繰り返し通い続けてもらう
仕組みで未来をつくる持続経営: 成果に影響を与えるリーダーの役割
リテンション・マーケティング仕組み化の手順

requirements: 経験不問：サロンオーナーや店長だけでなく、これから店長を任される方や、サロン運営を始めたばかりの方でも学んでいただけます。
推奨スキル：基本的なサロン運営知識、売上管理やマーケティングに関心があること。
推奨ツール：POSシステムやExcelなど、顧客データや売上分析を行える環境があれば、より深い学びがあります。
学習姿勢：ただ儲かれば良いと言うのではなく、素晴らしいサロンに成長して、スタッフやお客様、そしてその家族みんなを絶対に幸せにするぞ！と本気で考える意欲。
courses.description: このプログラムは、「店長や特定のベテランだけが忙しい状態」から脱却し、誰でも売れる仕組み化を実現するための実践型講座です。内容は、顧客の長期的価値を高めるリテンション・マーケティング、上位顧客を育成して売上の安定をもたらすロイヤルカスタマーロードマップ戦略、スタッフ全員が成果を出せる再現性のある売れる型づくりに重点を置いています。人件費の高騰や競争激化など美容サロン業界を取り巻く厳しい環境に対応しながら、人が育ち、平日も満席になる高生産性サロンを築くための具体的なノウハウを学べます。

There are many ice breaker moments in our life, most of them has to do something with visually showing your idea, proposal, insight.
In our digital age, it´s just second nature to be able to visualize it professionally, out of your pocket, from your smartphone if you like.
In this class, I will teach you a modern type of zooming presentation template, that you can easily learn and apply right away, without necessary background knowledge. You only need the latest PowerPoint version for this, and nothing more.
Learn this easy but powerful template within minutes, and make that next big move in your career with your new visual skills.
At the end of this course, I will surprise you with an extra lesson, where you can learn how to do those impressive animations within your slides, once you zoomed in to your chapters. This creates a smooth and dynamic movement on your screen, it helps to captivate your viewers´ attention naturally, while you simply just present your content.

courses.bio: Découvrez comment améliorer votre prospection par téléphone
objectives: Améliorer votre technique de vente par téléphone
Booster votre performance en télévente et dépasser vos freins
Éviter les erreurs courantes de la téléprospection
Augmenter vos prises de rendez-vous avec des scripts efficaces
requirements: Cette formation ne nécessite pas de prérequis.
courses.description:
Bienvenue à cette formation sur les techniques et astuces pour booster vos ventes par téléphone !
Si vous souhaitez améliorer vos performances commerciales par téléphone, cette formation est faite pour vous. La télévente et la téléprospection sont des méthodes de vente très utilisées dans le monde des affaires, cependant, pour réussir dans ces domaines, il est indispensable de maîtriser certaines techniques et astuces.
Cette formation vous propose de découvrir 7 astuces pour améliorer vos ventes par téléphone. Pour cela, vous apprendrez à booster votre performance en télévente, à vous libérer de vos propres freins et à mener votre téléprospection avec succès. Vous découvrirez des astuces pour mieux approcher votre client et lui vendre par téléphone, ainsi que les erreurs à éviter absolument en téléprospection.
En outre, vous apprendrez comment augmenter vos prises de rendez-vous en téléprospection grâce à des techniques efficaces. Vous découvrirez également l’importance du script d’entretien téléphonique et comment le préparer pour déjouer les barrières lors de vos campagnes de télémarketing.
Enfin, vous pourrez en apprendre davantage sur la méthode parfaite pour les scripts de prospection téléphoniques, grâce à nos conseils pour créer des scripts d’appels efficaces qui vous permettront d’atteindre vos objectifs.
Nous partagerons avec vous notre expérience et notre savoir-faire pour vous permettre d’acquérir les compétences nécessaires pour réussir dans ces domaines. Vous pourrez ainsi mettre en pratique les techniques apprises et améliorer significativement vos résultats commerciaux par téléphone.
target_audience: Cette formation s’adresse à tous ceux qui désirent améliorer leur technique de vente par téléphone.

courses.title: Psicologia do Consumo | Comportamento do Consumidor
courses.bio: Como Nosso Cérebro Decide por Marcas e Produtos | Novos Cenários de Consumo na Era Digital e a Evolução do Marketing
objectives: A Psicologia do Consumidor e Como seu Cérebro Decide por Marcas e Produtos.
Os estados e processos mentais na tomada de decisão de compra do consumidor e os novos cenários de consumo na era digital.
Os principais fundamentos contemporâneos que permeiam o Comportamento do Consumidor.
O comportamento do consumidor vai muito além do ato de comprar - o ser humano quer possuir, constituir sua identidade social e pertencer.
"Para os consumidores contemporâneos, a satisfação com produto está ligada à satisfação com a vida. As empresas devem atender a ambos para vencer”

Fundamentos do Comportamento do Consumid: 2.3 Influências Situacionais na Decisão de Compra
2.6 Categorias de Tomada de Decisão de Compra
Era Digital - Nova Jornada de Consumo e: 3.3 Cenários de Compra na Era Digital
3.4 Fontes de Influência na Tomada de Decisão
3.5 Segmentos Mais Influentes na Era Digital

requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência prévia no assunto.
courses.description:
O curso de 3 horas em um estilo conciso e direto, sintetiza os principais fundamentos que permeiam o Comportamento do Consumidor, mostrando como se dão os estados e processos mentais na tomada de decisão de compra e os novos cenários de consumo na era digital.
O comportamento do consumidor vai muito além do ato de comprar - o ser humano quer possuir, constituir sua identidade social, ser e pertencer.
"Para os consumidores contemporâneos, a satisfação com produto está ligada à satisfação com a vida. As empresas devem atender a ambos para vencer” (Harvard Business Review).
Juan Fontenla é Mestre em Comportamento do Consumidor pela ESPM. Possui extensões em Strategic Business Management pela Universidade de Harvard (Boston), Digital Marketing e Social Media Analytics pelo MIT (Boston), Neurociências Aplicadas ao Consumo pela ESPM. Especializações em Branding pela FGV e Marketing pela ESPM. Docente de pós-graduação nas disciplinas de marketing e negócios na Saint Paul Escola de Negócios, Unicamp, PUC e Mackenzie.
Consumer Behavior Session Chair e palestrante convidado para o European Marketing Academy. Pesquisador e autor de artigo científico da área de Marketing | Comportamento do Consumidor publicado na Review of Business Management.
Traz na bagagem a experiência de mais de vinte anos na gestão das áreas de marketing em empresas como Nokia, Navteq, Terra, DirectNet e Interchange (Citibank). Foi responsável pela área de Marketing para a América Latina, onde atuou no lançamento e desenvolvimento de novas categorias de serviços e produtos para a região. Coordenou grupos multidisciplinares na América Latina e EUA no planejamento e estratégias de marketing B2B|B2C.
target_audience: Empreendedores e Empresários | Gestores e Profissionais | Estudantes de Administração, Marketing e Publicidade

courses.title: Learn Customer Journey Mapping with Personas for Beginners
courses.bio: Step by Step Instructions to a Better Customer Experience
objectives: Empathize with your customers by walking in their shoes
Interview for key information and uncover customer problems
Create personas to provide more individualized experiences to customers/employees
Use research to build a map that shows where your customer struggles when interacting with your business

Introduction: Understand your Business Question - the Foundation of your Research
Time to go on a Safari
Talk to your coworkers - Employee Interviews
Let Customers Speak for Themselves - Customer Interviews
Putting it all Together - Research Analysis
Double check your work with a Customer Journey Map Workshop

requirements: There are no prerequisites
courses.description:
This course covers everything that I wished I knew when I first started journey mapping - I'm hoping to spare you some of the confusion that I went through by showing you the end-to-end process of researching and mapping your customers' journeys.
Have you, or the business you work for, ever let down your customers when they've purchased one of your products or used your service? Do you want to know in what ways you let them down? Do you also want to increase your company's customer loyalty by showing them that you care and actually listen to them? If yes, customer experience is for you! I will walk you through the fundamentals of something called the Customer Experience process so that you can uncover where customers like yours struggle (as well as the parts of your business they like). Then I'll show you how to convey this information in a way that everyone can understand and relate to - something that puts customers' lives front and center instead of in business silos. This is by using what is called a Customer Journey Map to tell the story of an individual Persona. You'll also have a better chance of convincing your business that solving these problems is important because both the Map and Persona will be based on rock-solid research and data.
Please note that this course focuses on business-to-consumer (B to C) mapping as opposed to business-to-business (B to B) mapping.
target_audience: Individuals that are just getting started with customer experience
Managers who need help training employees in customer experience

Business owners who want to stand out from their competitors (Example from my life: I own a small real estate company. When I run my tenants through this process and make alterations based on their suggestions, they feel valued and tend to renew their leases)

courses.title: 营销案例：茅台的六法十二式
courses.bio: 探索茅台：从传统酿造到现代品牌传奇
objectives: 深入了解茅台品牌的历史、文化和独特工艺。
学习茅台如何通过创新和品质控制来保持其行业领导地位。
掌握企业如何在竞争激烈的市场中制定有效的品牌策略和市场定位。
探索在经济周期中如何实施“慢功夫”战略，以及如何应对市场和政策变化带来的挑战。
理解构建企业生态共同体的重要性及其对企业长期发展的影响。

课程导读: 引入讲解（一） 茅台值不值得写?茅台能不能学?
引入讲解（二） 关于茅台你想不到的五件事
第一法：今人未必输古人: 第一节 茅台酒的诞生
第二节 和其他白酒的区别与创新
第三节 传承和创新的选择及制度保证
第二法：定规则者得天下: 第一节 品牌创新的典型案例
第三法：品质至上为信仰: 第一节 坚持品质至上的外交及外部因素
第二节 坚持品质至上的内部及市场因素
第四法：笨人战略慢功夫: 第一节 从经济周期来看快公司和慢公司
第二节 茅台酒的笨人战略的方法论
第五法：超级单品聚焦打: 第一节 全球罕见的超级单品
第六法：构建生态共同体: 第一节 茅台是如何构建自己的生态共同体的

requirements: 无经验
courses.description:
财经作家吴晓波历时3年，深入茅台镇调研20余次，访谈上百人，撰写28万余字《茅台传》独家揭秘茅台酒的中国式秘籍。
从茅台的起源到其成为全球知名品牌的发展历程，我们将探讨茅台如何通过不断的创新和对品质的不懈追求，实现了品牌的持续增长和市场领导地位。
吴晓波
财经作家 《大败局》《激荡三十年》作者
哈佛大学访问学者，“蓝狮子”财经图书出版人。
毕业于复旦大学新闻系，财经作家，哈佛大学访问学者，"蓝狮子"财经图书出版人。2009年被《南方人物周刊》评为年度“中国青年领袖” 曾任上海交通大学、暨南大学EMBA课程教授，常年从事公司研究
target_audience: 企业家

courses.title: Master Course : Business Cold Calling & Lead Generation 2.0
courses.bio: Business Cold Calling, Lead Generation, Marketing and Sales management, Sales Funnel, Sales Ideas, Marketing development
objectives: Master the fundamentals of cold calling, including its role in lead generation and effective scriptwriting techniques.
Develop strategies for identifying and targeting ideal customer profiles to maximize cold calling success.
Overcome cold call anxiety and confidently engage with prospects through effective pre-call preparation and goal-setting.
Build rapport, handle objections, and demonstrate credibility to effectively navigate cold calling conversations.
Utilize CRM systems, sales enablement tools, and automation techniques to streamline cold calling processes.
Analyze cold calling data and metrics to optimize strategies and improve performance.
Implement advanced cold calling strategies, including networking, referral-based approaches, and leveraging digital channels.
Foster a culture of continuous improvement and adaptation to stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of cold calling and lead generation.

Master Course : Business Cold Calling &: Master Course : Business Cold Calling & Lead Generation 2.0 - Quiz

requirements: Basic skills and Ideas of Business Cold Calling & Lead Generation !
courses.description:
Business Cold Calling & Lead Generation 2.0
Are you ready to revolutionize your approach to lead generation and business development? Welcome to the Master Course: Business Cold Calling & Lead Generation 2.0, where you'll unlock the secrets to mastering the art of cold calling in today's competitive business landscape.
In this comprehensive course, you will embark on a transformative journey that covers everything from understanding the fundamentals of cold calling to leveraging advanced strategies for success. Through a combination of in-depth modules, practical exercises, and real-world case studies, you'll gain the skills and confidence needed to excel in cold calling and generate high-quality leads for your business.
Module 1 lays the foundation by exploring the fundamentals of cold calling, including its role in lead generation, target audience identification, and crafting compelling scripts and messaging. You'll learn to debunk common misconceptions and myths while honing your scriptwriting skills to perfection.
Module 2 focuses on preparing for successful cold calls, equipping you with pre-call preparation strategies, techniques to overcome cold call anxiety, and the art of setting SMART cold calling goals. By mastering these essential elements, you'll approach each call with confidence and purpose.
In Module 3, you'll dive into executing effective cold calls, where you'll discover strategies for building rapport, handling objections, and mastering call etiquette. Through practical exercises and role-playing simulations, you'll sharpen your communication skills and learn to navigate challenging conversations with ease.
Module 4 explores the role of technology in cold calling, including leveraging CRM and sales enablement tools, implementing cold calling automation techniques, and analyzing cold calling data and metrics. You'll harness the power of technology to streamline your processes and drive greater efficiency and effectiveness in your cold calling efforts.
Finally, in Module 5, you'll delve into advanced cold calling strategies, including networking and referral-based cold calling, cold calling in a digital era, and continuous improvement and adaptation. By incorporating these cutting-edge strategies into your approach, you'll stay ahead of the curve and achieve unparalleled success in your cold calling endeavors.
Whether you're a seasoned sales professional looking to elevate your cold calling game or an entrepreneur seeking to drive growth for your business, this course is your ultimate guide to mastering the art of cold calling and lead generation in the modern business world. Join us and unlock the keys to unlocking a world of endless possibilities in business development and growth.
In this master course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics:
Module 1: Understanding Cold Calling Fundamentals
Module 2: Preparing for Successful Cold Calls
Module 3: Executing Effective Cold Calls
Module 4: Leveraging Technology in Cold Calling
Module 5: Advanced Cold Calling Strategies
Enroll now and learn today !
target_audience: All UG and PG Business, General Management, Marketing & Entrepreneurship Students
Interested students to learn about the concepts of Business Cold Calling & Lead Generation

courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás como diseñar un sitio web en Wordpress utilizando Elementor como constructor visual.
No basta con instalar una plantilla en wordpress...
Es necesario trabajar con una estructura apropiada y configurar Wordpress de forma optimizada para obtener mejores resultados.
¿Por qué vale la pena este curso?
En este curso te compartiré la configuración paso a paso para tener un sitio bien estructurado, utilizando Wordpress y Elementor.


El objetivo es que adquieras todos los conocimientos necesarios para poder diseñar un sitio a la medida, aprovechando la infraestructura Wordpress, de tal manera que podrás escalarlo y actualizarlo tanto como sea necesario, sin un esfuerzo mayor.


¿Qué es diferente a otros cursos sobre Wordpress?
En mi agencia de marketing digital trabajamos sobre Wordpress, el contenido que te compartiré es el mismo que utilizamos para capacitar a nuestros colaboradores.


En este curso nos enfocamos en:
Utilizar Wordpress apropiadamente
Configurar aspectos generales de Wordpress
Utilizar Elementor como constructor visual
Utilizar Gutemberg (constructor visual nantivo wordpress)


El objetivo es que puedas crear un sitio web con toda la estructura profesional.


¿Qué necesitas para estudiar este curso?
Para estudiar este curso no requieres ninguna experiencia, sin embargo, es necesario contar con:
PC/MAC
Elementor (gratis)
Elementor Pro (De Pago) ** Es opcional, pero recomendable para poder ejecutar todo**

courses.description:
Fundamental Course : Microsoft MB-220 (Marketing Consultant)  Microsoft Dynamics 365 Marketing Functional Consultant (101 level course)
This course helps candidates learn the concepts for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Marketing functional consultants. In this role, candidates implement solutions for converting leads, building brand awareness, standardizing omnichannel messaging, and delivering insights.
You're going to set up email marketing, set up real-time customer journeys, nurture leads with personalized experiences, integrate LinkedIn, organize events, conduct Customer Voice surveys, segment, score, and stay on top of data privacy and security regulations as you configure the core marketing application.
Business owners and managers get advice and support from functional consultants about technology. Technology-based solutions are recommended and configured to meet clients' needs.
Using Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Customer Engagement and Marketing, this generalist will help clients and prospects get started and succeed. It's about no-code/low-code marketing functionality. Whether you're a small business just starting out, or a huge enterprise looking to expand into the marketing area, a marketing consultant works with a wide range of customers. It's not just about being good at configuring Marketing, but also about translating the client's business needs into functional requirements so you can decide between using an out-of-the-box or a configured arrangement to fit the client's needs.
Here are the five major topics I'd like to cover in this fundamental course:
1. Implementing Microsoft Power Pages, Microsoft Dynamics 365 Marketing, integrating CMS system, managing marketing environments
2. Create reusable content blocks, upload images, manage keywords, and configure content settings
3. Manage marketing emails and assets, outbound messages, push notifications, and Microsoft Teams chats
4. Set up event passes, manage sessions, speakers, and sponsorships, and create the event record
5. Data on leads, lead scoring, accounts, segments, customer journeys, social, emails, and websites
Additional lecture 2025:
1. Analyzing and Optimizing Marketing Performance
Enroll now and learn today !
target_audience: All UG,PG business, marketing students, learners for certifications, learners for Job seekers

Utiliser Systeme,io pour créer et envoyer des emails à vos contacts
Optimiser la délivrabilité pour que vos mails passent les filtres anti-spam

Mesurer l'efficacité de vos campagnes et optimiser votre retour sur investissement
requirements: Savoir utiliser un ordinateur
Parler/comprendre le Français
courses.description:
Bienvenue dans cette nouvelle formation consacrée à la pratique de l’email marketing avec Systeme,io


L’emailing est une pratique marketing qui permet à beaucoup de petites et grande entreprise de réaliser jusqu’à 80% de leur Chiffre d’affaires.


Aujourd’hui encore cela reste une excellente façon de générer plus de ventes (et cela va encore continuer durant les années à venir).


Pourquoi pensez-vous que les plus grands sites du monde ne vous communique jamais les adresses email de vos clients ?


Parce qu’ils ont compris qu’en faisant ainsi, ils conservent le contrôle sur leur trafic de leur site web.


De la visibilité à la demande vers les offres proposées.


Si vous êtes concerné par l’un des points ci-dessous ..lisez bien ce qui suit..


Vous dépensez en publicité et cela vous coûte bien trop cher et n’êtes pas suffisamment rentable.
Votre retour sur investissement est faible.
Peu de personnes s’inscrivent par mails.
Peu de personnes ouvrent vos emails.
Vous vous sentez perdu avec toute la technique et la mise en place.
Vos mails sont ouverts, mais peu de personnes cliquent dedans.
Vos mails arrivent en boîte spam.
Vous avez trop de désinscription.
Vous envoyez les mêmes messages à tous vos inscrits.
Vous passez de longues heures à préparer, à rédiger vos mails pour des résultats vraiment décevants.


Souvent le vrai problème rencontré :


Vous avez un mauvais paramétrage dès le départ.
Vous faites trop d’erreurs dans l’envoi de vos mailing.
Vous utilisez une mauvaise façon de rédiger vos mails, voir dépassé, et cela vous pénalise vraiment.


Le pire dans tout ça, si vous continuez ainsi ?


Vous pouvez vous faire mettre en zone grise (ou rouge), avoir votre nom de domaine grillé, voir blacklisté par les boîtes de messagerie type Google, Yahoo, Bing, etc…
Vos emails n'intéressent plus personnes et vos taux d’ouverture chute (ce qui n’est pas bon du tout).
Vous pouvez être banni par votre autorépondeur (votre serveur d’envoi mails), et ainsi ne plus avoir la possibilité d’envoyer des emails.
En bref ..beaucoup de temps et d’énergie perdu pour rien.


Ce cours contient les bases nécessaires pour vous lancer (ou vous améliorer) dans l'emailing pour mieux vendre et communiquer par email.
Je vous prend par la main, en filmant mon écran comme si vous étiez à côté de moi, et je vous guide étape par étape.


Vous apprendrez à :


Utiliser des méthodes simples de rédaction pour écrire des emails qui ont envie d'être lu.
Trouver des idées d'mails originales et qui font leur effet.
Créer des campagnes de mailing efficaces.
Concevoir une stratégie d’emailing et de newsletter basée sur le comportement de vos contacts.
Tester, analyser, optimiser vos mails afin de pouvoir automatiser vos meilleures séquences mails.


Vous serez capable de rédiger et programmer plusieurs séquences emails qui se déclencheront en automatique,
et vous n'aurez plus cas encaisser vos ventes (même de façon prévisible).
Sans oublier de faire un suivi professionnel de vos résultats pour être encore meilleur avec vos mailing.
target_audience: Business en ligne débutant intéressé par l'email marketing
Formateur, Coach, Infopreneur souhaitant augmenter ses ventes
Email Marketing pour utilisateur intermédiaire

Andrés González
Pública
5 vídeos 6 visualizaciones Actualizada hoy

¡Bienvenidos a esta apasionante serie de microcursos donde la psicología y el marketing se unen para crear estrategias poderosas y efectivas! En estos cursos cubriremos temas fundamentales como: Precios Psicológicos: Aprende a establecer precios que no solo atraigan a tus clientes, sino que también potencien las ventas. Persuasión: Descubre las técnicas más efectivas para persuadir y convencer a tu audiencia.
Copywriting Efectivo: Domina el arte de escribir textos que cautiven y motiven a la acción.

Toma de Decisiones: Explora cómo los consumidores toman decisiones y cómo puedes influir en este proceso.
Motivación y Marketing: Descubre cómo utilizar la motivación para potenciar tus estrategias y campañas.


Cada microcurso está lleno de insights, estrategias prácticas y ejemplos reales que te ayudarán a aplicar la psicología en tu marketing de manera efectiva.
Esta lista es perfecta para: Marketeros y empresarios que desean conectar de manera más profunda con su audiencia. Estudiantes de marketing y publicidad que buscan una ventaja competitiva en su formación. Cualquiera interesado en entender cómo la psicología impacta en el marketing y la publicidad.
Prepárate para llevar tus conocimientos y habilidades a un nuevo nivel, aplicando principios psicológicos que harán que tus estrategias resuenen poderosamente con tu audiencia.

Are you dreaming of owning your own online store but feel overwhelmed by the technical side? Are you frustrated by the complexity of setting up an eCommerce business and managing orders, shipping, and marketing?
We understand your pain – that’s why we’ve created a free course designed for people like you. Whether you’re a total beginner or someone who’s struggled to get your store off the ground, our course gives you all the tools you need to succeed, with no coding or design experience required.


What You’ll Learn:
Lesson 1: Create a Digital Store in 5 Minutes Using AI
Say goodbye to hours of confusing setup. In this lesson, we’ll show you how to use AI to build a professional website in just 5 minutes. You’ll have a fully functional online store, ready for customers, with minimal effort. No technical background? No problem.


Lesson 2: Automate Your Supply Chain with Global Suppliers
You don’t need to worry about inventory or shipping! Learn how to connect with reliable suppliers from overseas who will handle your orders and ship products directly to your customers – so you can focus on growing your business.


Lesson 3: Master Advertising and Automation
You’ve built your store, now it’s time to scale it! We’ll teach you how to use automation tools to manage your marketing and promotions. From Google Ads to social media, learn how to drive traffic to your store and convert visitors into loyal customers.


Why This Course?

No prior experience needed – We simplify everything.
AI-powered tools – Save time and effort by letting AI do the heavy lifting.
Proven success – Hundreds of students have already launched their stores using our methods and are now making passive income from home.

courses.title: Emotional Intelligence in Marketing
courses.bio: Emotional Intelligence in Marketing: connect, trust, inspire.
objectives: Master the core principles of Emotional Intelligence and their application in marketing and sales.
Craft emotionally resonant messages that drive customer engagement.
Understand how emotional triggers influence consumer behavior and decision-making.
Use empathy to build authentic customer relationships and improve customer loyalty.
Apply emotional intelligence techniques to manage customer feedback and crisis communication.

Introduction: Introduction to Emotional Intelligence in Marketing
Definition and importance of Emotional I: Definition and importance of Emotional Intelligence

requirements: The course is designed to be accessible and impactful for a wide range of professionals. However, to maximize learning and application, participants should ideally have the following:  Basic Understanding of Marketing Concepts – While no advanced marketing knowledge is required, familiarity with branding, customer engagement, or campaign creation will be beneficial.  Interest in Consumer Psychology & Emotional Intelligence – A curiosity about how emotions drive consumer behavior and a willingness to explore emotional intelligence in a business context.  Experience in Branding, Sales, or Communication (Preferred, Not Mandatory) – Professionals in marketing, brand management, PR, sales, or customer experience will find the course particularly relevant. No strict prerequisites are required—just a curious mindset and a passion for creating meaningful brand connections.
courses.description:
Have you ever crafted the perfect marketing strategy, yet it didn’t connect the way you expected? That’s because marketing today isn’t just about data, creativity, or algorithms—it’s about emotions.
This course will teach you how to integrate emotional intelligence into marketing to create authentic connections, build trust, and inspire brand advocacy. Customers no longer buy just products; they buy experiences and values. Understanding their emotions is the key to crafting impactful campaigns that don’t just sell but also resonate on a deeper level.
You’ll learn how to:
1. Develop marketing messages that feel authentic and human
2.  Enhance personal influence and leadership in marketing
3. Build unbreakable customer loyalty through emotional engagement
4. Gain a competitive edge by merging strategy with empathy
5. Craft brand narratives that inspire trust and long-term engagement
6. Understand the emotions that drive purchasing decisions and how to respond effectively
Through real-world case studies, interactive exercises, and practical tools, you’ll discover how to create marketing that connects, persuades, and lasts. You’ll also explore the impact of emotional intelligence on branding, digital marketing, and customer service. Whether you’re a marketer, entrepreneur, or business leader, this course will transform the way you engage with your audience.
Marketing is no longer just about products—it’s about people. Are you ready to elevate your marketing with emotional intelligence?
target_audience: Marketing professionals who want to enhance their emotional connection with audiences.
Entrepreneurs and business owners seeking to improve customer engagement.
Sales teams looking to apply emotional intelligence to increase conversions.
Communication specialists aiming to create more impactful messaging.

STAGE 2. Cultivation: Your On-Line Presence: LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, etc.
BONUS: Cheeky Tips & Tricks!: How Do You Manage Your Time?

requirements: You are responsible for raising money for a cause, event or organization.
You should be able to use a PC at a beginner level.
courses.description:
When done well, corporate fundraising has the potential to be one of the most lucrative and cost-effective sources of income for your organization.
If you're a full-time corporate fundraiser or if it's just a part of your fundraising role in a non-profit, this best-selling course will cover step-by-step what you need to do to improve your corporate fundraising and increase your donations from companies and businesses in the private sector. Even if you're an individual who is running a crowdfunder or Kickstarter or GoFundMe or any kind of personal fundraising, this course will guide you through the process of finding corporate donors and getting them to give.
Learn to love Corporate Fundraising...and do it well.

In this course you’ll be learning about the cycle of corporate fundraising, from identifying potential partners and building relationships to asking for support. We’ll also look at how to maintain and maximise relationships with company partners through good stewardship and donor care.
You'll gain a better understanding of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) and understand a company's objectives and goals, and how you can convert them to money for your organization.
Beginner or experienced - this corporate fundraising course will help you. Think of it as a Corporate Fundraising 101, while developing advanced skills that bring your fundraising from companies to the next level.

Buy now (with a 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee) and see why this course is a Best Seller...Follow the steps in this course and you will raise more money!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to raise more money from companies in the private sector
Any non-profit, charity, event or start-up that wants to increase their corporate fundraising.
Those who feel their fundraising from businesses could be increased.

Creative Ideas for Guerrilla Marketing: Introduction : Creative Ideas for Guerrilla Marketing

Making adjustments and optimizations based on data

requirements: There are no specific requirements or prerequisites for taking this course.
courses.description:
यदि आप एक उद्यमी हैं और अपना व्यवसाय शुरू करना चाहते हैं या अपने मौजूदा व्यवसाय को बढ़ाना चाहते हैं, तो आपको अपने उद्यम के लिए बजट और संसाधनों की कमी के कारण आम विज्ञापन के बजाय गेरिला मार्केटिंग का उपयोग करना चाहिए। यह कोर्स गेरिला मार्केटिंग के बेहतर और सफल तकनीकों पर ध्यान केंद्रित करता है जो आपको अपने व्यवसाय को बढ़ाने में मदद करेंगे।
इस कोर्स में आप बेहतर बिक्री टेक्नीक सीखेंगे, जो आपके बिजनेस को फायदा पहुंचाने में मदद करेगी। यह कोर्स उन सभी बिजनेसमेन के लिए है जो ऑनलाइन या ऑफलाइन किसी भी उत्पाद या सेवा का बिक्री करते हैं और अपने बिजनेस को बढ़ाना चाहते हैं।
कोर्स में आप निम्नलिखित विषयों के बारे में सीखेंगे:
बेहतर ग्राहक संपर्क बनाने के तरीके
अपने उत्पादों या सेवाओं को बेहतर ढंग से प्रदर्शित करना
ग्राहकों के आकर्षण के लिए मार्केटिंग कैम्पेन बनाना
सोशल मीडिया के उपयोग से ग्राहकों तक पहुंचना
ग्राहकों की आवश्यकताओं को समझना और उनके दर्शकों को बनाए रखना
यदि आप अपने बिजनेस की बिक्री को बढ़ाना चाहते हैं और नई ग्राहकों को प्राप्त करना चाहते हैं, तो यह कोर्स आपके लिए है। इस कोर्स से आप अपने बिजनेस को अगले स्तर तक ले जाने में सक्षम होंगे।


Guerrilla marketing is a powerful tool for entrepreneurs looking to make a big impact with limited resources. In this course, you'll learn the fundamentals of guerrilla marketing and how to apply them to your business.
We'll cover the key elements of successful guerrilla marketing campaigns, including how to identify your ideal customer, create customer personas, and understand their needs and pain points. You'll learn creative ideas for guerrilla marketing, such as utilizing social media platforms effectively, partnering with other businesses or influencers, hosting events or stunts to generate buzz, creating viral content, and utilizing street art and graffiti.
We'll also dive into measurement and optimization, including tracking and analyzing the effectiveness of your campaigns, making adjustments and optimizations based on data, and scaling successful campaigns.
By the end of this course, you'll have a solid understanding of how to develop and execute effective guerrilla marketing campaigns that will help you stand out in a crowded market and grow your business.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs or small business owners who want to learn how to create and execute effective guerrilla marketing campaigns on a limited budget.
Marketing professionals who want to expand their skill set and learn creative strategies for promoting products or services.
Freelancers or consultants who provide marketing services to clients and want to add guerrilla marketing to their offerings.
Anyone who wants to learn how to think outside the box and come up with unique and impactful marketing ideas that don't require a big advertising budget.
Individuals who want to learn how to track and analyze the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns and make data-driven decisions to optimize their strategies.

courses.title: ココナラ攻略ガイド ～６つのステップで長期的に稼ぐ戦略
courses.bio: ３年で収益４０００万＆３６か月連続プラチナランク＆プロ認定の出品者が教えるココナラ攻略のコツ
objectives: ココナラだけで３年で収益４０００万達成したリアルな行動とノウハウ
自分自身の強み・特徴・得意を言語化し、ココナラ内で「稼げるマーケット」を見極める分析スキル

効果的に学ぶためのUdemy基本操作（活用編）
Udemyのレビュー制度と返金保証について
はじめに: 講師プロフィール
僕にとってのココナラ、あなたにとってのココナラ
ココナラで長期的に稼ぐ６つのステップの概要: ココナラが秘めている可能性
あなたがココナラに参入すべき理由

a. 頑張ったことリスト
頑張ったことリストをピックアップしよう
b. 褒められたことリスト
褒められたことリストをピックアップしよう
c. 身につけたスキル
身につけたスキルをピックアップしよう
秘めた才能を発見しよう

あなたの●●力を発掘しよう

③「勝てる領域」を見極める: 勝てる領域の見つけ方

付録：ココナラの実力者７名へのインタビュー: 代表　みりお　様
あんず（現役診断士・スタイリスト）　様
【ＳＮＳプロデザイナー】あーちゃん　様
HaruKato 加藤はるか　様

requirements: ココナラ未経験者でもOK
専門スキルや資格は不要。あなたの「得意」や「経験」が活かせます
パソコンまたはスマートフォンと、ネット環境があれば受講可能
courses.description:
ココナラであなたの“得意”をお金に変えて、自分らしいストーリーを描こう！


「副業に挑戦したいけど、何を売ればいいかわからない…」
「ココナラに登録したけど、全然売れない…」
「どんなサービスを出しても、誰にも見てもらえない…」
そんな悩みを抱えたまま、時間と労力だけが過ぎていませんか？


僕自身も、今でこそ、カテゴリランキング１位を100回以上獲得し、累計7千万以上の収益を得ていますが、最初はあなたと同じ悩みを抱えていました。
最初の半年くらいは、まったく売れなかったんです。それから試行錯誤して、ようやくポツポツ売れるようになっても、時給換算すると97.5円――。
それでも毎日、考え続けました。どんな人に、何を、どんな言葉で届ければ売れるのか？どんなサービスにすれば、自分らしく、長く稼げるのか？


この講座では、僕が試行錯誤の末にたどり着いた「ココナラで長期的に稼ぐための6つのステップ」を体系化してお伝えします。
といっても、安直な、すぐに使えるテンプレートの話は多くありません。


稼げる市場と稼げない市場の見分け方
自分の強みを言語化し、“勝てる領域”を見つける方法
競合分析、差別化、プロフィール設計、SEO、価格戦略
そして、時給97.5円から抜け出すための“段階的な値上げ”の方法
長期的に稼ぐためには枝葉のテクニックを覚えるより、本質的な戦略を学んだ方が100倍成果は出せます。そう、ココナラを攻略するには、「稼ぐ順番」を知ることが大事なんです。


■この講座を通して得られるノウハウ


この講座を受けることで、あなたは、
✓ 自分のスキルや経験を、価値あるサービスに変換できる
✓ 数ある競合の中でも「選ばれる理由」を言語化できる
✓ 高単価でも感謝されるサービスの作り方がわかる
✓ 「自分の人生を変える武器」を手に入れられる
こうした未来を描けるきっかけになるでしょう。そのために必要なことを、まとめたつもりです。
しかしながら、この講座は、以下のような方には向きません。
・とにかく手っ取り早く稼ぎたい人
・裏技やAI丸投げのラクな方法を探している人
・面倒くさいワークをすっとばしてしまう人
自分のスキルを誰かの役に立てることに喜びを感じ、個人で稼ぐスキルを身に着けることで、自分のストーリーを生きる覚悟のある人だけに、この講座は届いてほしいと願っています。


■面倒くさいことを選べる人がひとり勝ち出来る


北の達人コーポレーションの木下社長が著書の中で書いていました。絶対に成功できる唯一の方法は、他人がいやがってやらない「めんどうくさいこと」を愚直にやることだと。
実はこの講座でお伝えしている６つのステップの中には、少し面倒くさいワークが含まれています。
僕がココナラ内で、多少なりとも成果を出すことができたのは、他の人がそこまでやらない自己分析や競合リサーチ、クライアント様との丁寧な対話を愚直に重ねてきたからだと仮説を立てています。
体系化するまでにおよそ5年半かかりましたが、成果を上げるまでにやってきたこと、未だに、取り組み続けていることをまとめたので、ぜひあなたの“得意”をお金に変えて、自分らしいストーリーを描く手立てにしていただければと思います。


※ご注意※
なお、本講座では、ココナラ登録方法など、初歩的な手順については、たくさんの方がガイドしているので、省略しています。ココナラで結果を出すためのノウハウに特化していますので、何卒、ご了承ください。
target_audience: 自分のスキルや経験を活かして副業や独立を考えている方
ココナラに登録したものの、どう活用していいかわからないココナラ初心者

ココナラで一定数売れてはいるが、より高単価で案件獲得を目指したい方

Have you ever seen people handing out samples of a product at a festival or street fair? How about that person sampling food at a grocery store? What about a car show model or a person dressed as a mascot posing for pictures?
Did you know NONE of these people actually work for the companies they are representing?
THEY ARE BRAND AMBASSADORS PAID TO REPRESENT COMPANIES AT PUBLIC EVENTS!
With an average income of $20/hr for 4-12 hour events, brand ambassadors can expect to have the freedom to choose their own schedule as well as a large increase in monthly side income!
Side jobs like Uber or food delivery have the potential to make you money, but so many people are applying to them that it's getting harder every day to actually achieve success.
BENEFITS:
Brand ambassadorship has been the marketing industry's best kept secret for over 20 years. Today, people have just begun to see the amazing potential to:
Create recurring work opportunities with top agencies.
Make valuable networking connections.
Generate more side income than Uber or Food Delivery.
There has never been a course teaching people about this unique and rewarding job... until now! I’ve compiled all that I’ve learned as a Brand Ambassador and marketer who has represented companies from startups to international brands to give you the valuable skills and knowledge to become a successful brand ambassador yourself.

What is the key to effective communication?
How do you want to be professionally perceived by others?
In today's world, communication skills play an essential role in exchanging information and spreading knowledge. It is also the foundation to initiate relationships with others. In other words, well-developed communication skills are key to building your professional image. Hence, mastering your ability to communicate effectively is necessary for your future academic and career success.
In the "Mastering Communication: Life, War, and Game" course, there are five modules, covering the five most interesting topics related to communication in different settings. You will learn: how to build your communication strategy, how to identify the communication elements used by others, how to persuade others as well as deliver your message, and how to shape your professional image.
The course is designed and crafted by a communication expert to help you understand your true self to develop a better overall understanding of your communication style, personal archetype, and also the human interaction in the environment surrounding you.
Last but not least, our goal is to help you complete this course with a well-refined approach to your daily communication and effectively employ some of communication strategies in your professional life.

courses.description:
ダイレクトメールを送ってお客さんから初めて反応があったとき思わずガッツポーズをしてしまいました・・・


私はかつてダイレクトメール（DM）をいくら送っても全く反応をもらえず苦しんでいました。


「売れるコピーを書く」という概念すらありませんでした。


それが、たった1つのダイレクトメールと出会えたことで、人生が大きく変わったのです。


ダイレクトメール（DM）や広告をつくるときの決まった構成、またそれらを出すに当たって、あらかじめ考えておくべきマーケティングを学びました。


それまでは、「いかにデザインがカッコよくなるかに集中」していました。


しかし、、、それでは全くお客さんに響かないことがわかり、学んだ方法を実行してみたのです。




すると、驚くべきことにあっという間にお客さんから反応がでるようになってしまいました。


初めて反応があったときは手が震え、車の中で叫びながらガッツポーズをしました。


「本当にダイレクトメール（DM）は、効果があるんだ」と。


そのときの成功体験が、あったからこそ今の私がいると言っても過言ではありません。それからダイレクトメール（DM）の魅力にとりつかれ、何年か経ち、さらに様々な経験を積みました。




今回あなたにお届けするのは、実際に私の成功や失敗の経験から抽出した非常に中身の濃いノウハウです。


今回のコースを学べば、


・もうダイレクトメール（DM）で困ることはなくなります


・コピーの書き方で迷わなくなります


・反応率や売上をもっと上げることができます




そして、自身で経験を積んでいくことでより精度の高いダイレクトメール（DM）や広告をつくることができるようになるでしょう。




そうすれば、あなたは「ダイレクトメール（DM）を出せば売上をつくれる」このような安心感を得ることができるでしょう。




そんなうまい話本当にあるのか？


でも現にあなたは、私のコピーにひきつけられてここまで読んで来られました。これがコピーライティングの力です。


素晴らしいと思いませんか。もしあなたが営業マンであったとしても「書く」というアプローチで売上をさらに伸ばせるでしょう。人と会うことが苦手なら書くことで、売上をつくることができます。


このような素晴らしいスキルを手に入れたいと少しでも思われたなら新しい一歩を踏み出してください。




何も成長しようとしていない人が多い中であなたはここまで読んでくださり、それだけでも、世間の人たちよりも意識が高いごく一部の方なのだと思います。


このコースでは、ダイレクトメール（DM）を使ったマーケティングスキルを身につけながら、実際にあなたのビジネスにキャッシュをスピーディーにもたらしてくれる秘訣について、包み隠さずお伝えします。


このノウハウを自分のビジネスに使うのもよし、セールスライターやコンサルタントとして、このノウハウを武器にクライアントを獲得するのもよし、副業で店舗の集客代行として活躍するのもよし、あなたのスタイルに合わせて活用してください。


さああなたの新し未来のために、目の前にあるチャンスの扉を開いてみてください。
target_audience: 店舗オーナー

Welcome to Content Writing Course!
Ever thought about leveling up your writing with some AI magic? Our course, “Content Writing Excellence: Leveraging AI & ChatGPT for Writing,” shows you just that!
In this course, you’ll see how AI, especially tools like ChatGPT, can be your writing buddy. Don’t worry; we’ll start simple! First, you’ll learn what AI writing tools are and why they’re creating a buzz.
Next, we dive into how these tools work. Imagine having a helper to brainstorm ideas, polish your words, or even help when you’re stuck. Cool, right?
But it’s not just about using AI; it’s about blending your unique voice with tech. We’ll teach you how to keep your content sounding genuine and personal, even with AI’s touch.
By the end, you won’t just be a better writer. You’ll be a modern writer ready for the future of content creation. So, if you’re curious about mixing your writing skills with some high-tech flair, this is your perfect course!
In this course, you’ll learn:
Introduction to Content Writing
Discovering Your Niche
Crafting Compelling Blog Content
Effective Content for Company Websites
Creating General Website Pages
Harnessing AI Tools for Article Writing
Writing Pages for Websites
Content Writing Essentials
Exploring Different Tones for Articles
Writing Strategies for Success
Bulk Writing Techniques
Monetizing Your Content Writing Skills
WHO IS THE COURSE FOR?
This course is crafted for writers, bloggers, content creators, and anyone curious about enhancing their writing skills using the latest AI tools. If you’re looking to blend traditional writing techniques with modern tech solutions like ChatGPT, then “Content Writing Excellence: Leveraging AI & ChatGPT for Writing” is your go-to guide. Whether you’re just starting out in content writing or are a seasoned pro looking for innovative methods, this course offers fresh perspectives for all.
YOUR INSTRUCTOR
Meet Arsalan, a pro in digital blogging and online business. He’s been into WordPress since 2006 and loved blogging, online marketing, and SEO from the start. By age 21, he had started his first business because he was really excited about it.
He’s not just a regular blogger. Arsalan is a top seller on Flippa and knows a lot about buying and selling blogs. He’s made a lot of money for online platforms and even gives advice to brands and startups on how to grow.
A bit about his mindset: Arsalan didn’t like the usual 9-to-5 job routine. He wanted more excitement and to follow his dreams, even if others didn’t get it. He once said, “I wanted to go after my dreams, no matter what others thought.” Now, he’s proof that chasing your passion works and he encourages you to take control of your own future, like he did.
target_audience: This course is crafted for writers, bloggers, content creators, and anyone curious about enhancing their writing skills using the latest AI tools. If you’re looking to blend traditional writing techniques with modern tech solutions like ChatGPT, then “Content Writing Excellence: Leveraging AI & ChatGPT for Writing” is your go-to guide. Whether you’re just starting out in content writing or are a seasoned pro looking for innovative methods, this course offers fresh perspectives for all.

courses.title: 【出店の教科書基本編】店舗開発の始め方と成功の法則を知る【一連の流れを完全収録】
courses.bio: 立地調査から工事、物件探索、契約まで網羅。ありそうでなかった、実務者必須の現場主義教材で、出店の流れを確認しましょう。
objectives: 店舗開発やリーシングなどの基本編として、出店に関わる業務の育成システムとして利用できます。
店舗開発の全体像を把握できる 出店の企画からオープン、そしてその先の運営まで、店舗開発の全体フローを体系的に理解できます。
成功する立地を見極める力が身につくきます。勘や経験に頼るのではなく、「需要」と「供給」という経営視点から立地を評価する方法を習得できます。
工事費用と予算を正確に管理できる A・B・C工事といった専門用語や、業種別の坪単価の正しい計算方法を理解できます。

はじめに: この講座を作った理由と自己紹介
店舗開発の仕事: 店舗開発の業務フロー
店舗開発部員に必要な能力とマインドセット
物件とテナントの探し方
出店に関わる「マーケティング」について: 無料で商圏調査の方法
立地解説　中心部編
出店に関わる「工事」について: A工事、B工事、C工事について
物件の引き渡しの状態について
内装工事費の坪単価の目安
出店に関わる「財務・法務」について: 出店スキームについて

requirements: 必要なことは全て学習できます。初心者の人ほど学習できます。
courses.description:
私がこの講座を作った理由は、店舗開発や、リーシング担当者向けの教材が必要だと思ったからです。


ほとんどの企業で店舗開発やリーシング業務の育成システムが整備されておらず、OJTにより行われています。
まさに習うより慣れろの業界です。


不動産、建築工事、内装工事、マーケティング、契約、財務、など多数の知識が必要な仕事であるにも関わらず、です。


従って、何度も何度も私が見てきた、「出店に関わる全ての企業の課題」である、


・店舗開発のノウハウ、フローを確認できない
・赴任者がいきなりの実務でストレスを感じ直ぐに辞めてしまう
・経験豊富な担当者の退職や異動により、 知識やノウハウが失われてしまう


という課題を解決できないかと考えました。.


私もいきなりの実務を命じられ、毎日が眠れない夜を過ごしたこともあり、
事前にこういった教材があれば幾分の心の安心感を得られたと考えております。


また、より深い部分の学習を遠方に赴くセミナーではなく
動画教材で学ぶことができれば、もっと急な成長曲線を描くことができたと確信しています。


ですので、私が１０年に渡って悩んだ、ただ、成長することができた内容を、
気軽に学んで生かして頂ける、そんな講座となっております。
target_audience: お店の出店に関わる全ての方の初級〜中級編。店舗開発に携わっている方、また、これからはじめる方。その他にもFCや個人で出店しようとしている方。

courses.title: دبلومة التسويق الشامل
courses.bio: ٢٠ كورس متكامل في مختلف تخصصات التسويق ومدعوم بالخبرة العملية وأمثلة من تجارب نجاح وفشل الشركات العالمية والمحلية
objectives: التعرف على المفاهيم والمصطلحات الأساسية لعمل ادارة التسويق
تعلم اعداد الخطط والاستراتيجيات
تعلم مهارات جمع وتحليل البيانات وابحاث السوق
تعلم ادارة المنتج والعلامة التجارية
تعلم اعداد الحملات الإعلانية
تعلم استراتيجيات التسعير
requirements: لمستوى المبتدئين والمستوى المتوسط وطلبة التسويق
courses.description:
الدبلومة مكونة من عشرين كورس بتبدأ بشرح المصطلحات والمفاهيم التسويقية للمبتدئين وبتنتهي بالتوسع في الأسواق العالمية أو التسويق الدولي .. وبتشمل كل القنوات والتخصصات المتعلقة بالأسواق والمنتجات والتنافسية والعلامات التجارية، موجهه إلى كل طلبة التسويق الذين يبحثون عن منهج شامل ومفصل مدعوم بالخبرة العملية ، وكل العاملين في مجال التسويق،  كل أصحاب الشركات ورواد الأعمال وأصحاب المشاريع،  كل المهتمين  بالمبيعات ... وكل المهتمين بتغيير مسارهم الوظيفي:


1. مباديء وأساسيات ومفاهيم التسويق
2. اعداد الاستراتيجيات والخطط التسويقية
3. جمع المعلومات وتوقع الطلب
4. الأبحاث التسويقية
5. انشاء علاقات انتماء طويلة الأمد مع العملاء
6. تحليل أسواق المستهلكين
7. تحليل أسواق قطاع الأعمال
8. تحديد شرائح ومستهدفات السوق
9. إنشاء قيمة العلامة التجارية
10. إعداد تمركز العلامة التجارية
11. ديناميكيات المنافسة في السوق
12. اعداد استراتيجية المنتج
13. التسويق لقطاع الخدمات
14. اعداد استراتيجيات وبرامج التسعير
15. تصميم وإدارة قنوات التسويق والتوزيع
16. إدارة قنوات التجزئة
17. إدارة الوسائل التسويقية والإعلانية
18. إدارة الاتصالات التسويقية المتكاملة
19. تحقيق النمو في الأسواق التنافسية
20. التوسع في الأسواق العالمية (التسويق الدولي)


هذه هي فرصتك لدراسة دبلومة التسويق الشامل :
أولاً: أفضل المواد والمصادر العلمية المعترف بها على مستوى جامعات العالم.
ثانياً: أول منهج احترافي متكامل من ٢٠ كورس في جميع نواحي التسويق باللغة العربية ومتاحة للمشاهدة أونلاين مدى الحياة


القيمة لن تقتصر فقط على محتوى الدبلومة سواء محاضرات ڤيديو أو مواد العرض والمراجع، ولكن القيمة تشمل التواصل المستمر مع المتدرب وتعزيز استيعابه لكافة المواضيع ومساعدته على بناء شبكة علاقات والإستفادة من الفرص.


ما هو المستوى الذي ستصل له  بعد حضور كورسات الدبلومة
أولاً: لو إنت مبتدأ ولم تعمل أو لم تدرس مجال التسويق .. فهذة الدبلومة ستعطيك الفرصة لعمل  إنترڤيو وأن تبدأ  عملك في مجال التسويق بكل كفاءة .. ولو إنت بالفعل في وظيفة تسويق فـ سوف تساعدك على الترقي الوظيفي ونمو مسارك المهني.
ثانياً: سيكون لديك القدرة لتقييم الأداء التسويقي والحملات التسويقية  إن كان له أسس صحيحه من عدمه .. بإختصار لن تكون  مبتدأ في مجالك بالعكس ستكون في مستوى متوسط أو فوق المتوسط،  وستحتاج إلى بعض الخبرة في المجال أو القطاع الذي تعمل به لفترة من الوقت وبعدها ستصبح مدير تسويق كفء.
هذه الدبلومة  عبارة عن فرصة لم تتوفر من قبل  بهذا التميز والسهولة ... فرصتك الآن تبدأ وتغير من مسارك الوظيفي أو تطور البيزنس الخاص بك وتحسن دخلك ومستقبلك ... هيا  إبدأ الآن وإن شاء الله ستكون أهم نقطة تحول في حياتك المهنية
target_audience: كل طلبة التسويق اللي محتاجين منهج شامل ومفصل مدعوم بالخبرة العملية ... كل العاملين في مجال التسويق .. كل أصحاب الشركات ورواد الأعمال وأصحاب المشاريع ... كل اللي مهتم بالمبيعات ... وكل اللي مهتم إنه يغير مساره الوظيفي.

requirements: There are no requirements for this course, just a love for learning, and an open mind
courses.description:
If you have a business idea or an existing business that is researching new directions or strategies, you will learn to conduct market research using the following methods:


Interviews
Surveys
Focus groups
Measuring data and KPIs
Using industry reports


MARKETING PSYCHOLOGY


After going over standard industry research, you will also learn marketing psychology. These are common principles that marketers use to position their products and marketing messaging that align with how buyers make purchasing decisions.
You will learn about the role of emotions in purchasing decisions compared to the role of logic and reasoning, when each is used, to what extent, and in which way.


PARADOX OF DOING CONSUMER RESEARCH DURING THE BUSINESS IDEA STAGE


More often than entrepreneurs think it will happen, they get the demographics and psychographics of their target users quite wrong. But it makes a lot of sense because when your business is in the business idea stage, you are blinded by excitement and operating on assumptions that fuel that excitement.
This is why you have to do your market research before you start your business. Market research is the data-driven approach to replacing assumptions with facts so you can start your business the right way.


CONSUMER RESEARCH IS ALSO IMPORTANT FOR MARKETING RESEARCH


To create any kind of a marketing strategy, you need to know who you are marketing to. So the deeper you understand and research your consumers, the more accurate your marketing research and subsequent marketing plan and strategy will be.


Invest in your future! Enroll today!
target_audience: Business owners, entrepreneurs, and marketers

courses.description:
Whether you're looking to start a career, promote an existing company/brand, or just have lots of fun, YouTube is the place for you! However only 0.0038% of all channels created ever gain traction and become successful on the platform. So how do we increase that percentage? Well that's what I'm here for!


Who am I?
My name is Shawn and if there is anything I know in this world, it's YouTube. I'm a YouTube content creator with over 330,000 subscribers and have been on the platform managing and working with numerous channels since 2009. Luckily for me, YouTube can be a long term career option that pays extremely well if executed properly. I'm here to give you the boost needed to succeed!
Why my course?
First thing you need to know is that I'm a practitioner. I didn't gather my knowledge from someone or somewhere else. I learned it all through years and years of trial and error.
Albert Einstein said it best, "The only source of knowledge is experience."

You can only learn so much from outside sources. I'll be teaching you the insider secrets to YouTube. The information that is scarce to find online. The tips and tricks to the trade that only the dedicated practitioners know of.
Not only will I be sharing this exclusive information with you, but I'll be showing you current and lifetime analytics to prove to you that I'm not just talking the talk. This course is designed for me to be as transparent as possible with you.
Lastly, YouTube is not static as it changes all the time. Massive updates roll out every single month whether it looks like it or not. As mentioned before, I'm a practitioner, it's my job to stay up to date on every little change YouTube goes through. I will be actively updating and adding more content to this course as YouTube changes! It's important to stay with the times and take full advantage of what YouTube has to offer.


Again, if you're looking to grow your brand, GAIN MORE VIEWS AND SUBSCRIBERS, or start a channel from square 1, you've come to the right course. From beginner to advanced, I can guarantee you'll learn tons of new knowledge! The sheer size and comprehensiveness of the course speaks for itself. You'll learn everything I've learned since 2009 with this jam-packed course. If you're someone who values your time heavily, don't worry! I explain in my course which specific lectures apply to you and your situation.
General Skills You'll be Capable of After the Course
Start a channel from ground zero
Create high quality videos
Gain starting views
Generate subscribers exponentially
Maximize use of time
Become familiarized with the YouTube platform
Titles, Tags, Descriptions, and Thumbnails Optimization
Successfully grow your brand
Effectively improve through use of analytics
Generate serious money from your YouTube Channel
Ultimately know the BEST practices for creating and growing a SUCCESSFUL YouTube channel




So what are you waiting for? Enroll in my course so we can get you started!
See you soon in lesson 1 :)
-Shawn

Landing page là một trang web đơn, được thiết kế đặc biệt để tạo ra tỷ lệ chuyển đổi. Và những trang landing page đẹp sẽ thu hút khách hàng, tăng chuyển đổi đơn hàng. courses.title: Learn Film Crowdfunding
courses.bio: How to crowdfund 10-50k for your film project.
objectives: Film Crowdfunding
Crowdfunding Marketing
Film Marketing

Essential Steps to a Successful Campaign: Find a project your truly believe in
Back up your project belief with evidence
Building Your Team: Why is a team so important?
How to find your team members
How to bring team members on board
How I found 20 team members to help me promote my campaign
How to expand your team through Ambassadors
Preparation for you Launch Day: When to launch, length of campaign and setting your target
Outreach prep for you launch day

requirements: Basic knowledge of filmmaking
courses.description:
Are you looking for funding for your next film project?
When we first started out as film producers we were completely lost as to where we can find funding for short films and micro budget features. We'd apply for every grant, investor scheme and screenplay competition we could find and we would never hear back. So we decided to take matters into our own hands and green light our own projects through crowdfunding.
But it's not that easy... if you've ever tried crowdfunding you know. Where do you find hundreds of backers and thousands of pounds? Who would give money to your campaign except for maybe immediate friends and family? What steps do you need to take to make the campaign A SUCCESS?
We want to show you exactly how we funded multiple films through crowdfunding, one of which was a short that raised over £30,000. We've advised and coached on countless campaigns and held many workshops, online courses and webinars but here we want to give you absolutely everything we know and have in one ultimate package.


CAMPAIGN PREP & HOW TO GROW YOUR AUDIENCE
Did you know that picking the right crowdfunding platform or campaign launch date can have a massive impact on your outcome? We'll start off with the basics of exactly where and when to crowdfund.
I will then introduce you to one of the main strategies that will allow you to raise over £10-50k for your film without any marketing experience and without spending a penny in advertising.
Next I will walk you through EXACTLY how to gather an audience of people interested in your campaign before you even launch. If you do not have thousands of people who know about your film project and tens or hundreds of people who are ready to put money into it you should not be launching your campaign - I will show you the practical steps you need to take to achieve that. This will include gathering email address, growing and engaging with your social media following as well as tapping into pre-existing communities and fanbases.
After this day alone you will feel confident that with enough work you can not only reach your target but also grow an audience and fan base for your film.
OUTREACH & CAMPAIGN
No matter how good your marketing is, your effort will be wasted, if you do not have an incredible page with some very specific elements that encourage people to donate. The first element of this lesson will be to create a gripping and highly converting crowdfunding page no matter which platform you choose.
When you're ready to press launch... I will teach you how to use your following and contacts and turn them into backers. I'll show you how to ensure you reach 30% of your goal in the first 48-72 hours - statistically this will give you a 90% chance of success. I will then teach you exactly what to do each day of your campaign to keep the backers coming in and multiple emergency strategies if things aren't going as planned.
target_audience: Independent Filmmakers

الدورة الوحيدة في العالم العربي بهذا الثمن الرمزي وبهذا المحتوى الضخم


هل تريد أن تصبح شخص يحترف مجال س ب ا ؟ أدعوك الى الانضمام الى هذه الدورة المتكاملة التي تضم جميع المعلومات الأساسية التي يجب عليك معرفتها لبدء العمل واضمن لك تحقيق اول دولار من مجال س ب ا !
ستأخدك هذه الدورة من مبتدئ  الى مسوق متقدم محترف اذا اتبعت جميع المعلومات.
هذه أول دورة عربية متكاملة على منصة يودمي التي تتحدث عن س ب ا بامتياز وبهذا الثمن !!!!
ما يميز العمل في مجال س ب ا انه يمكنك ربح بطرق مجانية وايضا ربح اكثر باستعمال طرق مدفوعة، كل ما تحتاجه هو التركيز والقليل من الصبر والمثابرة لتحقيق مبالغ مالية جيدة.
إذا لم يسبق لك أن ربحت المال من الأنترنيت، فهذه دورة ستساعدك لتحقيق دولارك الأول من الأنترنيت.
مجال س ب ا من مجالات التي ممكن ان تحقق الاف دولارت وتجمع ثروة منه...
سأريك خطوة خطوة كيف يمكنك أنت أيضا العمل في س ب ا ، وسأريك أيضا بعض التقنيات وأداة مدفوعة يستخدمها المسوقين ويعتمدون عليها بشكل كلي، سلاحهم السري وسر نجاهم في س ب ا.
اذا كنت مهتم بالبدئ الآن، وتريد العمل على الأنترنيت بعيدا عن الطرق الملتوية والإدعاءات الكاذبة. إنضم إلينا الآن في هذه الدورة.

requirements: Vontade de aprender e dedicação para se aprofundar nos fundamentos, desafios e estratégias de Trade Marketing.
courses.description:
O trade marketing é uma área em ampla expansão no Brasil e em todo o mundo.


Os consumidores estão cada vez mais exigentes e com a modernização dos canais de venda, é cada vez mais necessário se preparar para enfrentar os desafios do mercado.


E esta é a sua oportunidade para elevar os resultados da sua empresa ou transformar a sua profissão.


O profissional de trade marketing é o especialista que identifica as áreas de oportunidade para construir a imagem da empresa junto aos canais, clientes e shoppers.


Dê início à sua jornada pelo mundo do Trade Marketing com conteúdo direcionado e elaborado por Adriano Amui, profissional com mais de 27 anos de experiência acadêmica e mercadológica em marketing, vendas e administração.


Neste programa de curta duração, você vai adquirir, de forma simples e didática, o conhecimento básico para construir um plano de ação individual que lhe permitirá construir uma carreira nesta área.


O curso Trade Marketing: Fundamentos e Estratégias irá guiá-lo pelos fundamentos, competências e desafios desta área para que ao final, você esteja preparado para definir, implementar e gerir estratégias vencedoras nos canais de marketing, vendas, administração e comunicação das organizações de sucesso.


Comece agora mesmo a sua jornada!
target_audience: Interessados em aprender e desenvolver uma carreira na área de Trade Marketing;
Profissionais de Trade Marketing que querem se aprofundar nos conceitos e fundamentos da área como forma de se especializar e desenvolver o potencial da sua carreira.

courses.description:
Master Course in Service Marketing and Product Marketing 2.0: Elevate Your Skills and Strategies
In an ever-evolving business landscape, service marketing has become an indispensable tool for companies striving to gain a competitive edge. With the advent of the digital age, traditional marketing methods have undergone a radical transformation, and this necessitates a fresh perspective on how we market services. Introducing the Master Course in Service Marketing 2.0 - a comprehensive program designed to equip you with the latest skills and strategies needed to excel in the dynamic world of service marketing.
Why Service Marketing Matters in 2.0
Before delving into the details of the Master Course, let's take a moment to understand why service marketing has never been more critical than it is today. In the age of technology and information, services have become the lifeblood of the global economy. From healthcare and finance to hospitality and technology, almost every industry is service-oriented. Consequently, the ability to effectively market services is paramount for business success.
Here are some key reasons why Service Marketing 2.0 is a game-changer:
1. Digital Transformation: The digital revolution has reshaped consumer behavior and expectations. Service providers must adapt to the digital landscape to reach and engage with their customers effectively.
2. Customer Experience: In a service-driven world, customer experience is everything. Providing exceptional experiences is not just a competitive advantage but a prerequisite for business survival.
3. Data-Driven Insights: Big data and analytics have empowered marketers to gain deep insights into customer preferences and behavior. Service Marketing 2.0 leverages data-driven strategies to create personalized and effective marketing campaigns.
4. Globalization: In an interconnected world, services are often offered on a global scale. Marketers must understand how to tailor their services to diverse cultures and markets.
5. Sustainability: Ethical and sustainable practices have gained prominence. Service Marketing 2.0 explores how sustainability can be integrated into marketing strategies to resonate with eco-conscious consumers.
In a world where services have taken center stage, mastering the art of service marketing is not just a choice; it's a necessity. The Master Course in Service Marketing 2.0 offers an unparalleled opportunity to gain the knowledge, skills, and strategies needed to excel in this ever-evolving field. Embrace the digital era, harness data-driven insights, and create exceptional customer experiences - all through our comprehensive and dynamic course.
Don't miss your chance to be at the forefront of Service Marketing 2.0. Enroll today and transform your career!

courses.title: Marketing Politico Campanha Politica para Iniciantes 2021
courses.bio: Aprenda como gerir uma campanha Politica Eleitoral
objectives: Aprender como se inicia uma campanha politica, seus desafios e etapas.
Conhecer algumas ações necessárias para uma boa campanha eleitoral.
Identificar e gerenciar os recursos para uma boa campanha politica.
Definir um melhor orçamento para uma campanha politica.

Itens importantes: A Prestação de Contas de Campanha

requirements: Computador, tempo e muita atenção
courses.description:
Organizar uma campanha politica pode, a princípio parecer algo simples, mas como vamos mostrar ao longo do curso é alto extremamente complicado. Envolve muitas pessoas, alguns momentos e, muitos recursos, sendo o principal recurso desse processo ter um candidato forte, preparado para assumir uma responsabilidade tão grande e ciente que isso tudo não se faz sozinho.


Uma campanha politica é um processo de construção, que começa bem antes do período eleitoral. Para muitos começa já no dia seguinte ao anterior. E envolve muito planejamento, muita paciência, sola de sapato, algumas xícaras de café, um pouco de "cara de pau" e muitos apoios.


Uma qualidade de um bom coordenador de campanha é saber observar e distribuir seu pessoal. Otimizar as tarefas e monitorar bem de perto o trabalho que é realizado com e sem a presença do candidato, sempre fidelizando os eleitores, porque todos... absolutamente todos são eleitores em potencial.


Vamos abordar uma visão geral sobre as Campanhas e fazer um recorte para as campanhas em separado de Vereador, Deputado e Prefeito, que hoje representam as maiores demandas de cargos políticos.


Claro que tudo que se fala desses cargos se pode aproveitar em uma Eleição de Senador, Governador e até mesmo Presidente, mas resguardadas as devidas proporções, ai já é assunto pra um curso avançado, com uma análise muito mais apurada.
target_audience: profissionais de comunicação, pessoas que pretendem ingressar na carreira politica, pessoas que já fazem parte do universo politico mas que buscam se aprimorar

objectives: تأسيس وبناء البراند
بناء صورة للبراند في ذهن العميل
أنواع البراند والعناصر الرئيسية له
أساسيات التسويق
تقسيم السوق وتحديد شريحة العملاء
وسائل التسويق التقليدي والإلكتروني
أساسيات الترويج
requirements: لا يوجد
courses.description:
التسويق من القلب للقلب ، التسويق مفتاح نجاح الشركات ،فعلم التسويق ليس مبني فقط على الترويج في وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي ، كما يظن البعض ، التسويق هو علم متكامل. كرائد اعمال يمكنك البدء بدراسة المهارات التسويقية ومهرات البيع وتطويرها وتوظيفها في شركتك او مؤسستك الخاصة.


هذه الدورة تحتوي على عناصر التسويق الشاملة وتضم ٢٢  محاضرة متنوعة في المواضيع الأتية:


- مقدمة في تأسيس البراند.
- عناصر البراند وأنواعه.
- قوة البراند وصورته الخارجية.
- مدى قوة تأثير البراند وارتباطه في أذهان العملاء.
- الهيكل التنظيمي للإدارة التسويقية.
- الميزة التنافسية ودراسة السوق.
- تقسيم السوق.
- عناصر التسويق الأربعة ( المنتج ، التسعير، المكان ، الترويج)
- مقدمة في علم البيع.
- العميل المحتمل.
- استراتيجيات البيع الفعال.
- خدمة ورضا العملاء. .


هذه الدورة مقدمة باللغة العربية ، التقديم والمحتوى ، كما تحتوي على ملف للدراسة.


تناسب هذه الدورة الشركات الناشئة ، والشركات المتوسطة ، كما تناسب أيضا رواد الأعمال والمقبلين على الإستثمار وأيضا موظفين التسويق والمبيعات ، حيث تساعدهم على تأسيس قسم الادارة التسويقية واستقطاب العملاء الجدد.


.أتمنى لكم دراسة ممتعة وجيدة ، وفي حال رغبتكم في التواصل معي ، يمكنكم في أي وقت عبر موقع يودمي.


أ.م. خبيب الأسود ، استشاري الادارة والتسويق حاصل على البكالوريس في الهندسة المدنية و الماجستير في ادارة الاعمال من المانيا ، ومحاضر ادارة وتسويق في عدة دول بثلاث لغات وبخبرة نظرية وعملية.


أ.م. خبيب الأسود
استشاري الادارة والتسويق
