続けられる副業（複業）を探している方
これから直販に取り組みたい中小メーカー

courses.title: L'essentiel de l'expérience client
courses.bio: L’Expérience Client Décryptée : 90 Minutes pour Tout Comprendre
objectives: Comprendre les fondamentaux et appréhender les concepts clés, le vocabulaire et l'évolution historique de l'expérience client pour en saisir les enjeux actuels.
Analyser l'impact stratégique de l'expérience client et comprendre comment une gestion optimale de celle-ci peut améliorer significativement la rentabilité.
Connaître et segmenter sa clientèle afin de concevoir des parcours clients efficaces, en identifiant les points de contact clés et en éliminant les frictions.
Développer une culture centrée sur le client en mobilisant les équipes autour d'une vision commune orientée client.
Acquérir les connaissances de base nécessaires pour envisager des certifications reconnues, telles que le CCXP (Certified Customer Experience Professional).

Les fondations de l’expérience client :: Décrypter son client grâce aux personas
Enquêtes et feedback : capter l’expérience vécue
La voix des employés : une ressource client souvent sous-estimée
Piloter l’expérience client au quotidien grâce aux KPI
Structurer la connaissance client avec une Journey Map
Design des Parcours : Client & Employé: Les techniques RCA : Remonter à la Source des irritants
L’expérience employé, levier de l’expérience client
Bâtir une stratégie d’expérience client: Communiquer sur la stratégie Expérience Client
Instaurer une culture centrée client: Comment faire vivre la culture customer centric

requirements: Aucun
courses.description:
Titre : L’Expérience Client Décryptée : 90 Minutes pour Tout Comprendre
Durée : 90 minutes
Format : Formation en ligne, accessible à votre rythme
Public cible : Professionnels en contact avec la clientèle, UX designers, responsables marketing, commerciaux, chefs d'entreprise, entrepreneurs, chefs de projet, étudiants et toute personne souhaitant approfondir sa compréhension de l'expérience client.


Objectifs :
Comprendre les concepts clés et l'importance stratégique de l'expérience client.
Identifier les leviers pour améliorer la satisfaction et la fidélisation des clients.
Apprendre à concevoir des parcours clients efficaces et mémorables.
Développer une culture d'entreprise centrée sur le client.
Se préparer aux certifications reconnues en expérience client, telles que le CCXP.
Contenu de la formation
Introduction à l'expérience client : Explorez l'histoire, les définitions clés, les enjeux actuels et l'impact de l'expérience client sur la rentabilité des entreprises.
Connaissance client : Apprenez les méthodes de segmentation, la création de personas, ainsi que les principales techniques de collecte de la voix du client et d'analyse de la santé de l'expérience délivrée.
Conception de parcours clients : Découvrez le design thinking et les techniques d'analyse des causes racines des irritants et problèmes pour optimiser les parcours clients.
Stratégie et culture client : Comprenez l'importance de l'alignement organisationnel et de l'engagement des équipes pour instaurer une culture centrée sur le client.
Supports pédagogiques inclus
90 minutes de vidéos : Des modules vidéo dynamiques pour illustrer les concepts clés et partager des études de cas concrets.
Quiz interactif : Un questionnaire pour tester vos connaissances et renforcer votre compréhension des sujets traités.
Méthodologie :
La formation combine des apports théoriques, des exemples concrets et des outils pratiques pour une mise en application immédiate. Un quiz final permet d'évaluer les acquis et de consolider les connaissances.
Cette formation est une opportunité d'acquérir rapidement les compétences essentielles pour transformer chaque interaction en une expérience client exceptionnelle. Que vous soyez en début de carrière ou un professionnel expérimenté, elle vous fournira les outils nécessaires pour exceller dans le domaine de l'expérience client.
target_audience: Professionnels de la relation client
Spécialistes du marketing et de la communication
Commerciaux et forces de vente
Concepteurs d'expérience utilisateur
Chefs d'entreprise et entrepreneurs
Professionnels du développement produit et de la gestion de projets
Étudiants en marketing, commerce, gestion, design ou toute discipline liée à l'expérience client.

courses.title: Omnichannel Customer Experience Management (CX)
courses.bio: How To Create A Seamless Customer Experience In An Omnichannel Ecosystem
objectives: Develop a comprehensive Omnichannel Customer Experience Management Strategy
Provide customers with a seamless and positive experience throughout their entire journeys
Create detailed Customer Journey Maps
Develop robust Buyer Personas
Identify your business's most important customer group(s)
Address your organization's structure in order to be better equipped to provide a seamless omnichannel experience
Evaluate and maximize the performance of each of your business's channels
Achieve consistency among your business's different channels
Utilize technology to enhance your customer's experience and your channels' performance
Move away from silo operating systems and closer to collaborative systems for more streamlined efforts and results across your organization
Obtain key customer insights

The Rise Of The Multichannel Customer: The Rise Of The Multichannel Customer
How Omnichannel Is Changing Retail: A Lo: A Look At Recent Shopping Trends
Know Your Customer (KYC): KYC 2 Customer Analytics & User Behavior Tracking Tools
KYC 5 Example Of A Customer Journey Map For A Medical Insurance Company
KYC 5 How To Create A Customer Journey Map [Part 1]
KYC 5 How To Create A Customer Journey Map [Part 2]
KYC 5 How To Create A Customer Journey Map [Part 3]
Technology Utilization & Integration: Important Things To Consider When Choosing A Technology For Your Business
Address Your Organization's Structure: Introduction to Address Your Organization's Structure
8 Steps to Shift Your Organization's Structure
Build Strong Relationships With Your Cus: Build Strong Relationships With Your Customer

requirements: Have a basic understanding of marketing and customer experience.
courses.description:
"In a world where users expect personalized experiences across multiple devices, mastering omnichannel CX is crucial. This 3-hour course offers insights into developing a seamless Customer Experience Strategy." SMOKE Customer Intelligence

Welcome to this course on Customer Experience Management (CXM), with a specific focus on Omnichannel customers.
The customer journey map is changing, it's no longer a straight line that goes from point A to point B.
Customers now use multiple channels when interacting with businesses and most importantly, they use them interchangeably and simultaneously, which means that there is a need for these different channels to work cohesively together in order to deliver positive and seamless customer experiences, thus the need for Omnichannel CXM.
Businesses following dated and traditional CX frameworks are failing to cater to the needs of customers today, resulting in disjointed and negative customer experiences that are costing huge losses of revenue.
In this course, you will learn how to develop a comprehensive Omnichannel Customer Experience Management Strategy that will allow your business to provide a smooth and seamless customer experience across all channels.
The strategy is broken down to the following sections:
1. Know Your Customer (KYC):
We will cover the various methods and tools that can be used to gain a meticulous understanding of your business's most important customer group(s)
You will learn how to uncover key customer insights such as demographics, behaviors, habits, attitudes, preferences and more.
These insights will serve as the foundation of your CXM strategy
The methods in this section include: Quantitative & Qualitative Research, Customer Analytics & User Behavior Tracking Tools, additionally you will learn how to develop robust Buyer Personas & Customer Journey Maps
2. Implement Consistency Across Channels:
The process of making your business's channels work cohesively together through implementing consistency among them, resulting in a smoother customer experience when changing between channels
In this section, we will cover the 4 pillars of consistency: 1) Design & Aesthetics 2) Categorization 3) Terminology 4) Functionality
3. Technology Utilization & Integration:
We will discuss the importance of Technology in Omnichannel CXM and the 2 key roles it plays in your strategy
You will learn how to use technology to best serve your business and customers
The key points you need to consider when choosing which technologies to invest in for your organization
4. Address your Organization's Structure:
We will observe the negative effects of legacy operating systems on a business's efforts in achieving seamless omnichannel experiences
You will learn the 8 best practices when taking on the challenging but necessary task of shifting an organization's structure to be better equipped in providing a seamless omnichannel customer experience
5. Build Strong Relationships With Your Customer:
We will observe how building strong customer relationships looks like in an omnichannel ecosystem
How to achieve personalization when so many channels exist
Finally, we will cover the notion of the Single Customer View, the obstacles you'll face when aiming to achieve it and the steps you can take to overcome these obstacles
Enroll in this course to start delivering a seamless omnichannel experience that is crucial for customers today!
I look forward to seeing you in the first lecture.
target_audience: Marketers, Strategists, C-level Managers, Executives, Entrepreneurs or Small Business Owners. Anyone interested in enhancing or creating an excellent customer experience.

courses.description:
Efektif Mengelola Key Account
Deskripsi Pelatihan:
Pelatihan Efektif Mengelola Key Account ditujukan untuk membekali peserta dengan pengetahuan dan keterampilan yang diperlukan untuk mengelola dan mempertahankan akun kunci (Key Account) dengan efektif. Melalui pendekatan interaktif, peserta akan memahami strategi manajemen hubungan pelanggan, teknik negosiasi yang kuat, dan cara membangun kemitraan yang berkelanjutan dengan akun kunci untuk meningkatkan kepuasan pelanggan dan hasil bisnis.

Memahami Pentingnya Key Account Management dalam Strategi Bisnis.

courses.bio: The Benefits, ROI, Risks And Ethics Of Working With Influencers For Increased Brand Awareness
objectives: Understand what influencer marketing entails.
Learn the benefits of this style of marketing.
Consider the ethical factors surrounding influencers.
Understand the rapid expansion of influencer marketing.
Utilise relevant frameworks you can implement in your own business.
Consider the risks of working with an influencer.
Boost your brand awareness.
Increase your client base.
Learn about the ROI from influencer marketing.

Influencer Marketing And Ethics: Ethics And Rules Affecting Influencer Marketing
Managing Your Influencer Campaigns And Tracking Success
Influencer Marketing From A Customer Perspective And ROI

requirements: No specific requirements.
courses.description:
Are you a business owner interested in expanding your customer base? Are you a manager looking to use a social media influencer as part of your marketing strategy? Or do you want to learn how to grow your business using influencer marketing? If this fits your profile, this course was made for you.
Marketing is crucial to the growth of any business. With the rise of social media, influencer marketing has become an even more effective way to reach new and potential customers than other traditional methods. In 2023, 75% of companies will set aside funds for influencer marketing to remain competitive. In this course, you will learn how to harness this emerging force in marketing to your advantage. We will start off by looking at how the power of an influencer has grown over the years, as well as discussing how you can choose the right influencer to meet your business needs. This could be to increase brand awareness, kick start market growth or adapt to a new audience.
We will also discuss how you can assess if an influencer is the right fit for you based on factors such as content, number of followers and cost. Following this, we will delve into the different types of influencers, including micro, nano and macro, looking at deeper factors such as niche and influencer reputation. Considering key statistics and case studies we will explore well-known brands and assess the strategies they have deployed in order to create successful campaigns. From here, we will take a deep dive into the ethics of using an influencer and the damage that can be done if an influencer does not authentically represent the brand. This will include information from leading bodies such as The Advertising Standards Authority.
Finally, we will cover the potential ROI from using an influencer and how you can improve your campaigns by looking at your strategies from the perspective of a customer. By the end of this course, you will have comprehensive knowledge of the different types of influencers and how to use them as part of your marketing strategy.
So, are you ready to learn more about influencer marketing and the proven methods you can use to improve your company’s reach and brand awareness? Enrol now to learn more!
target_audience: Marketing consultants who develop influencer marketing strategies for clients.
Business Owners aiming to increase their brand awareness.
Social media managers wishing to learn how to negotiate with influencers.
Marketing specialists who want to improve brand engagement.
Entrepreneurs looking to launch their company successfully.
Marketing managers who are focused on achieving social media goals.

courses.title: How neuromarketing can influence buying behavior
courses.bio: The nitty gritty of technical marketing and influencing the mind to make a purchase for your benefit
objectives: Learn how brands can influence buying behavior
Understand the mind of the consumer
Increase your sales by understanding the brain

Neuromarketing principles: How fMRI unveils the secrets of consumer behavior
Emotional and cognitive processes in neuromarketing
Why choice overload can cripple your business
The power of the first impression

requirements: A willingness to learn
courses.description:
Welcome to our course on Neuromarketing!
Did you know that images can provoke a sensation of sound?
Or that they can boost your appetite?
Are you interested in learning how the latest neuroscience research can be applied to marketing and advertising? Neuromarketing is a field that uses brain imaging and other neuroscience techniques to better understand consumer behavior and create more effective marketing strategies.
In this course, we'll cover everything from the basics of neuroscience and the history of neuromarketing to advanced techniques for measuring perception, attention, memory, and emotions. We'll explore how neuromarketing can be used in branding, advertising, product design, pricing, sales, e-commerce, social media, and more.
We'll also examine the ethical considerations and potential controversies surrounding neuromarketing, as well as future trends and innovations in the field.
It goes without saying that the brain is an immensely complex organ.
As professor Jeff Lichtman from Harvard once said: “If everything you need to know about the brain is a mile, we’ve walked about three inches.”
Whether you're a marketer, business owner, or just curious about the science behind consumer behavior, this course will provide you with a comprehensive introduction to neuromarketing. So let's get started and dive into the fascinating world of brain science and marketing!
target_audience: This is a course for marketers, sales people and business owners who want to increase the performance of their marketing efforts.

courses.description:
If you're a Startup leader or Product Manager looking to learn how to price your product effectively, you're in the right place. Sometimes it is hard to understand how to price our products, what factors should we consider to base the price on, how to choose the right monetization model. Should we price low to get the maximum market share or price high to establish a premium brand  image?  How can we make sure that our pricing model suits our target customers? What if your product doesn't meet your sales expectation after the launch, should you cut the price?. This course is designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills to effectively monetize your products and make strategic pricing decisions that drive long-term business success. During this course, we will examine crucial pitfalls to evade, along with tactics that will maximize the revenue of your product. Alongside mastering pricing strategies, you'll gain insights into valuable practices, tactical approaches and pricing maneuvers employed by leading companies.
The topics covered in this course:
Customer's Willingness to Pay (WTP)
Monetization models
Main principles of Product configurations for different customer segments
Bundling
Go-to-Market strategies
Long-term and short-term Product monetization strategies and tactics
Price reductions and price wars

courses.description:
Есть идея социального, творческого проекта или инициатива в области социального предпринимательства? Этот курс поможет создать яркий проект и продвигать его, чтобы привлечь средства и сторонников для его реализации.
Из этого курса вы узнаете:
- Что такое краудфандинг и для каких проектов подходит такой способ привлечения средств.
- Как создать яркий и привлекательный для доноров проект, как выглядит структура проекта.
- Как использовать искусственный интеллект для генерации идей, текстов и изображений.
- Почему доноры поддерживают проекты.
- Какие вознаграждения предложить донорам.
- Как продвигать проект, в том числе без бюджета.
- Как создавать и развивать сообщество сторонников вокруг проекта.
- Что учесть при реализации проекта и подготовке отчета для доноров.
Курс создан для авторов проектов платформы Israel Inspires Me, но будет полезен всем начинающим краудфандерам. Платформа Israel Inspires Me разработана в помощь русскоязычным репатриантам в Израиле, которые хотели бы менять к лучшему жизнь вокруг себя и знают, как это сделать. С помощью краудфандинга они могут привлекать средства и сторонников для своих проектов.
Для начала обучения вам не нужны специальные знания и навыки, он написан простым языком и будет доступен для всех желающих. В курсе есть тесты для самопроверки, которые помогут закрепить полученные знания.
Желаем вам приятного и полезного обучения. Поделитесь комментарием и вашим мнением - мы будем рады обратной связи.
target_audience: Этот курс разработан для тех, которые совершает свои первые шаги в краудфандинге. Он для всех, кто мечтает изменить мир к лучшему.

courses.bio: 北京大学数字化咨询师训练营系列课
objectives: 深化数字化转型认知。 理解战略意义：学员将深入理解数字化转型对企业战略的重要意义，认识到数字化转型不仅是技术升级，更是业务模式、组织结构、文化理念等多方面的全面变革。 洞察行业趋势：洞察数字化转型的最新趋势和发展方向，把握行业变革的脉搏。顶层思维培养：学习从建立数字平台到孵化生态系统这一数字企业的高阶发展框架，掌握传统
掌握核心知识与技能。理论体系：学员将系统学习数字化转型的理论体系，包括相关概念、框架、模型等，为后续实践打下坚实的理论基础。 实战技巧：课程注重实战经验的分享，学员将学习到数字化转型的具体实施方法、技巧和案例分析，提升解决实际问题的能力。 技术工具：针对数字化转型中常用的技术工具，如大数据分析、云计算、人工智能等，学员
推动个人与企业发展。个人成长：课程学习将促进学员的个人成长，提升自我认知、自我管理和自我驱动的能力，为职业生涯的持续发展奠定坚实基础。 企业转型：学员将所学知识和技能应用于企业实际工作中，推动企业数字化转型进程，提升企业的竞争力和市场地位。
认识数字化与信息化的区别：学员将理解数字化与信息化的区别，以及什么是数字化思维 。

第一章 数字化转型的基本逻辑: 第一节 理解数字化转型
第二节 数字化转型的业务创新场景
第三节 传统企业的数字化演进:从平台到生态
第二章 数字生态思维: 第一节 理解数字生态
第二节 数字生态的业务构建原则
第三节 数字生态企业的创新法则
第四节 中台与平台型组织
第五节 数字生态战略

requirements: 无经验
courses.description:
数字化转型已经进入到深入阶段，先进企业的首要目标——降本增效已经被普遍认知并落地实践，但是对于数字化转型的更高级目标——如何实现企业的平台化与生态化，并实现企业的高速增长与高估值，还没有被普遍认知，也没有太多实践经验可供参考。


本课程提供三个方面的认知提升：
一是如何从战略层面进行数字化转型，让企业从普通的数字企业成为数字生态构建者。
二是如何从业务层面进行数字化转型，重点是理解数字化转型的创新方式和生态级业务规则；
三是如何从组织层面进行数字化转型，重点是理解中台与平台型组织的相关概念。


除了以上重点内容外，还会涉及大多数传统企业所关心的一些问题，例如：该如何构建平台型业务，如何激活网络效应、设计补贴规则和进行用户锁定等等。此课程的内容主要来自白涛老师著作《数字化转型模式与创新》及即将出版的新书《数字生态》中的主要内容。


本课程来自北京大学经济学院【数字化咨询师培训班】的系列课程，该课程主要为线下课，学员通过此线上课程可以提前了解该系列课程的主要内容。该课程旨在培养能够独立解决企业数字化转型问题的咨询专家。课程将围绕数字化转型思维、创新方案规划和问题解决与咨询技巧三方面，提供思维和方法框架，帮助传统IT从业人员以咨询顾问的身份参与企业的数字化转型，提升岗位能力，满足社会对此类人才的需求。可戳此链接了解详细情况。


选择和白涛老师学习本课程，有以下几个重要的原因：
权威专家：白涛讲师是数字化转型领域的资深专家，拥有丰富行业经验，能够传授前沿知识和实战经验。
广泛背景：曾在京东、微软等知名企业任职，服务过多个行业的领军企业，具备跨行业视角和成功案例。
教育贡献：在知名商学院授课，教学经验和学术水平高，为学员提供系统学习路径。
创新思维：总结数字化转型中的思维框架和工具，帮助学员快速掌握核心要点，紧跟时代步伐。
target_audience: 企业决策者。 角色定位：企业高层管理者，如董事长、总经理等，拥有企业战略的决策权。 学习需求：需要深入理解数字化转型的战略意义，掌握数字化转型的分析与设计方法，以便为企业制定长远的发展规划。 课程价值：通过课程学习，企业决策者能够提升对行业趋势的洞察力，把握数字化转型的关键路径，引领企业实现转型升级。
中层管理人员。 角色定位：负责企业战略执行的中层管理者，如部门经理、项目负责人等。 学习需求：需要准确理解高层战略意图，同时掌握数字化转型的具体实施方法和技巧，推动部门或项目的数字化转型。 课程价值：课程提供数字化转型的实战经验和案例分享，帮助中层管理人员提升数字化转型的执行力和管理能力。
创业者与投资人。 角色定位：关注行业发展趋势、寻求创新商业模式的创业者和投资人。 学习需求：需要了解数字化转型的最新趋势和前沿技术，把握商业机会，制定创新的商业模式和投资策略。 课程价值：课程提供丰富的数字化转型案例和实战经验，帮助创业者和投资人洞察市场趋势，把握投资机会。
IT主管及产品经理。 角色定位：中高级企业信息化技术专家、IT项目主管、产品研发专家。学习需求：需要了解数字化项目案例经验，为IT项目的产品规划、项目管理或交付等进行准备。 课程价值：从实战出发，进行企业内部或客户项目的产品价值挖掘、业务模式与运营规划设计，帮助学员快速完成项目交付。

courses.title: Visual Merchandising: più vendite grazie all'immagine!
courses.bio: Come creare un'esperienza che faccia sognare il consumatore e lo convinca a compiere un acquisto di impulso
objectives: Il corso di Visual Merchandising insegna ad implementare l'attività massimizzando il fatturato grazie...all'immagine. Ma cosa significa? Nel nostro corso di Visual Merchandising, a partire dai principi del Marketing Sensoriale, si andranno a studiare le principali tecniche di allestimento emozionale per rendere più accattivante ed efficace la presentazione dei prodotti e la relativa promozione; si andranno a studiare le soluzioni strategiche più impattanti sull’inconscio dell’utente (serve - appunto - degli obiettivi di impresa e finalizzate ad influenzare e guidare il processo d’acquisto).L'obiettivo del corso è quello di imparare a realizzare un'esperienza olistica che avvolga tutti e 5 i sensi del cliente, stimolandone il sesto. In questo modo, riusciremo avvolgere il cliente in un turbine emozionale, riusciremo a penetrare il suo inconscio e riusciremo, dunque, incoraggiarlo a compiere l'acquisto. In tal senso, si andranno, a comprendere le astuzie pratiche da applicare al punto vendita per impattare sul sesto senso dell’utente: gruppi di composizioni studiate secondo specifici schemi di progettazione, illuminazione strategica, vetrine tematiche (ad esempio, vetrine natalizie, vetrine per occasioni speciali…) e molto altro ancora.

Professione Visual Merchandiser: increme: L'impiego strategico del colore: colori e pattern cromatici nel visual marketing
Il personale all'interno del punto vendita
La Vetrina: allestimenti creativi, tematici e non per vetrine vincenti
Interior Desgin e Stili di Arredamento

requirements: Il corso parte dalle basi per, poi, trattare le tematiche più approfondite e complesse. Guidiamo i passi dello studente dall'inizio alla fine e siamo sempre a disposizione per eventuali dubbi o domande. Motivo per cui il corso è frequentabile tanto da chi possiede già una previa formazione in materia (e desidera semplicemente aggiornarsi) quanto da chi non ha mai avuto contatti con la materia ma desidera cominciare insieme a noi.
courses.description:
Il Visual Merchandising per punti vendita di successo consiste in un’insieme di tecniche di presentazione dei prodotti da applicare tanto all’interno del negozio quanto alle esposizioni in vetrina al fine di impattare sull’inconscio del potenziale cliente, influenzare il processo d’acquisto ed incrementare le vendite ed il fatturato d’azienda.


Il Visual Merchandiser è il libero professionista (freelance) che si occupa di progettare idee vetrina mediante una presentazione dei prodotti efficace e stimolante. Egli, riveste il ruolo tanto del vetrinista quanto dell’allestitore d’interni nel momento in cui si tratta di progettare l’allestimento interno di un punto vendita.

L’obiettivo che si pone il nostro corso di vetrinistica online è quello di formare figure professionali specializzate, in grado di valorizzare al meglio prodotti e brand all’interno dei diversi format distributivi, influenzando il processo d’acquisto grazie all’immagine e massimizzando, di rimando, le vendite ed il fatturato.
Applicabile ai più svariati contesti di riferimento ed alle diverse merceologie di prodotto, il nostro corso di vetrinistica online insegna le principali tecniche di visual merchandising e di visual marketing per punti vendita di successo.
Nel nostro corso di vetrinistica online, infatti, a partire dai principi del Marketing Sensoriale, si andranno a studiare le principali tecniche di allestimento emozionale per rendere più accattivante ed efficace la presentazione dei prodotti e la relativa promozione; si andranno a studiare le soluzioni strategiche più impattanti sull’inconscio dell’utente, serve degli obiettivi di impresa, finalizzate ad influenzare e guidare il processo d’acquisto; in questo senso, si andranno, a comprendere le astuzie pratiche da applicare al punto vendita per impattare sul sesto senso dell’utente: gruppi di composizioni studiate secondo specifici schemi di progettazione, illuminazione strategica, vetrine tematiche (ad esempio, vetrine natalizie, vetrine per occasioni speciali…) e molto altro ancora.
target_audience: I nostri studenti sono un gruppo estremamente variegato: partiamo da chi si vuole formare in questo senso per diventare un vetrinista e visual merchandiser professionista per rivolgersi, poi, alle aziende come figura professionale fatta e finita, quanto a chi possiede già una realtà commerciale (o ne è a capo) e desidera approfondire l'argomento e mettersi in gioco al fine di riuscire, grazie all'immagine, ad incrementare il fatturato del proprio negozio.

courses.title: NPS_Net Promoter Score
courses.bio: Net Promoter Score, Net Tavsiye Puanı
objectives: Müşteri memnuniyeti
Ürün Geliştirme
Müşteri Sadakati
Prototipleme

NPS_Net Promoter Score: NPS: Katılımcıların Sınıflandırılması ve Genel Mantık
NPS Puanı Nasıl Hesaplanır? İyi Bir NPS Puanı Kaç Olmalıdır?

requirements: Kursun içeriği sıfırdan başlayanlar için hazırlanmış olup 101 niteliğindedir.
courses.description:
Şöyle bir senaryo çizelim; önünüzde iki ürün seçeneği var ve arkadaşlarınızdan 3 tanesi bir ürünü savunuyor, kimse diğerini savunmuyor. Hangi ürünü seçerdiniz?
Pazarlama ve satış tekniklerinin hız kesmeden arttığı çağımızda, ağızdan ağıza yayılma(word of mouth) hala müşteri çekmek için en güçlü kaynaklar arasında yer alıyor.
Yapılan araştırmalara göre müşterilerin yüzde 83'ü bir arkadaşından veya aile üyesinden bir tavsiyeye geleneksel reklamlardan daha fazla güvendiklerini söylüyorlar.
Peki, müşteri memnuniyetini tek bir soruyu barından bir anketten ölçümleyebilseydik ne olurdu? Mevcut kullanıcılarınızın kaç tanesinin markamızın ürün veya hizmetinin gelecekteki savunucuları olabileceğini ve şu an bulunan sorunları/gelişim alanlarını tespit edebiliyor olsaydınız ne olurdu? Net promoter score yani NPS'in hayat kurtarıcı olarak karşımıza çıktığı kısım tam olarak burasıdır.
Net Promoter Score yani Net Tavsiye Skoru, müşterilerinizin sizi tavsiye etme olasılığını tek bir soruya verilen yanıt üzerinden hesaplayan ve bunu size -100 ila +100 arasında bir skorla gösteren bir müşteri sadakati metriğidir.
Dünyanın en değerli şirketi konumundaki Apple’ın en son bilinen NPS skoru 47. Arama motoru pazarında lider konumdaki Google’ın NPS skoru ise 11. Google’ın mobil uygulama mağazası Google Play’ın NPS skoru ise 30.Son dönemde skandallar ile gündemde olan ve kan kaybeden Facebook ise -21 gibi düşük bir NPS skoruna sahip.
Tüm bunlar ne ifade ediyor? Konunun detaylarına video serimizden ulaşabilirsiniz. Herhangi bir teknik aksaklık olması durumunda taskincengiz@outlook.com adresinden bildirimde bulunabilirsiniz.
target_audience: Pazarlama konularına meraklı kişiler
Müşteri deneyimi ve ilişkilerine meraklı kişiler
Ürün Geliştiriciler ve tasarımcılar

courses.title: How to fundraise during the end of the year like a pro
courses.bio: A step-by-step guide to take your non-profit fundraising efforts to the next level during the year-end season.
objectives: Explain why year-end giving is so important
Plan a tailored year-end giving campaign
Budget and execute a year-end giving campaign
Raise more money through year-end giving

Your introduction to raising more money: What you can expect from this course
Step 1: Set a goal: Make your goal and hang it up!
Step 2: Define your audience: Why you should define your audience
Assignment: Get to know your donor.
Who are you already talking to?
Information is the Secret to Fundraising
Step 3: Find your story: Your story is meant to be heard
Step 4: Choose your tools: How can you reach your audience?
Must have tools for year-end campaign
Step 5: Budget, measure and execute: Set the budget and execute your plan

requirements: Have someone who can champion their cause (the ED, Comms. Director or a fundraiser)
courses.description:
My first year fundraising I was petrified. The pressure was on to deliver and I had never done anything like fundraising before. One night I saw an email had a statistic that changed everything for me. The statistic was simple - 24% of all donations for the year happen in December, and most of those occur in the last week of the year.
I read this two weeks before the end of the year - I had to act fast. That week I put together a communications campaign that raised over $10,000 during that last week. I tried the campaign again, and raised $30,000 in one day!
This year, consumers will donate an estimated $48 billion dollars between November and December this year. You have the same opportunity right now to raise some serious cash.
This class will teach you, step-by-step, how to develop a strategic plan to reaching and motivating donors so that they donate. I will also include the exact campaign I used to raise that $30,000.
Did you know that non-profits who develop a strategic plan and refine it every year can experience up to 70 percent growth in year-end giving? Let's make sure your cause gets the funding you need.
Now, here are some things to consider:
If all this course did was teach you how to organize your communications tools so that they work together, would it be worth the investment? YES!
If all this course did was teach you how to talk to your donors so that they respond and want to donate, would it be worth the investment? YES!
If all this course did was double your investment, would it be worth it? YES!
This is the time of year to get your donors motivated, so what are you waiting for?! Let's get started.
target_audience: Non-profit Executive Directors, Non-profit Marketers and Non-profit fundraisers

Sales And Operation (S&OP) Part 2 Video I

requirements: No prior requirements
courses.description:
The **Advanced Sales & Operations Planning (S&OP)** course is designed for professionals seeking to master the art of aligning sales, operations, and supply chain strategies for optimal business performance. This course dives deep into advanced S&OP processes, equipping participants with the skills to balance demand and supply, integrate financial planning, and enhance cross-functional collaboration within organizations.


Key topics include demand forecasting, capacity planning, inventory management, and scenario analysis, all within the context of S&OP. Participants will learn how to design and implement data-driven, agile S&OP processes that respond to changing market conditions and customer needs. The course also covers advanced techniques for aligning sales, operations, and finance teams, fostering a unified approach to achieving organizational goals.


Through practical exercises, case studies, and real-world examples, learners will gain the tools needed to drive S&OP success, including the use of advanced analytics, performance metrics, and digital tools to support decision-making. The course emphasizes strategies to improve communication, enhance collaboration, and drive alignment across departments to ensure smooth and efficient operations.


By the end of this course, participants will have the expertise to lead S&OP initiatives that improve forecasting accuracy, reduce costs, optimize inventory, and ultimately drive business growth. Ideal for supply chain managers, S&OP professionals, and executives aiming to refine their skills in advanced S&OP practices.

courses.description:
Se você já tentou fazer anúncios no Facebook e Instagram, mas nunca conseguiu resultados significativos, é provável que esteja cometendo alguns erros comuns. Nosso curso de anúncios no Facebook e Instagram foi desenvolvido para corrigir isso, oferecendo uma formação completa e prática que vai do básico ao avançado, baseada em mais de 7 anos de experiência atendendo dezenas de empresas de diferentes nichos.
Neste curso, você encontrará tudo o que é essencial para criar campanhas publicitárias eficazes, sem enrolação. As aulas são objetivas e diretas, permitindo que você comece a aplicar o conhecimento adquirido imediatamente. Além disso, fornecemos materiais em PDF com passo a passo detalhado para que você possa consultar sempre que precisar, sem ter que voltar às aulas constantemente.
Você aprenderá a criar anúncios que alcançam o máximo de pessoas, dominará as técnicas de anúncios nos stories, remarketing, e campanhas focadas em cadastros e vendas. Nosso conteúdo está organizado em 7 seções cuidadosamente estruturadas. Cada seção aborda um aspecto crucial da publicidade nas redes sociais e termina com um exercício prático para reforçar o aprendizado.
Este curso é ideal tanto para iniciantes quanto para quem já tem alguma experiência, mas deseja aprimorar suas estratégias e obter melhores resultados. Com nossa metodologia, você estará preparado para criar anúncios eficientes que geram resultados concretos para o seu negócio. Aproveite a oportunidade de transformar suas campanhas publicitárias e alcançar novos patamares de sucesso nas redes sociais!

courses.description:
Bạn từng nghĩ lập kế hoạch Marketing là thứ “cao siêu”, chỉ dành cho người nhiều kinh nghiệm hoặc công ty lớn?
Bạn đang triển khai Marketing mỗi ngày, nhưng không thể nhìn thấy “toàn cảnh”?
Khóa học này sẽ giúp bạn tự tin lập một bản kế hoạch Marketing đúng – đủ – tinh gọn chỉ trong vài bước rõ ràng. Không lý thuyết hàn lâm. Không bảng biểu dàn trải. Không lan man mất thời gian.
Bạn sẽ nhận được gì từ khoá học này?


Tư duy nền tảng để hiểu đúng bản chất của lập kế hoạch Marketing trong SMEs & Startups.
Biết cách làm Market Research khi thiếu dữ liệu, thiếu thời gian, thiếu người – nhưng vẫn ra được kết luận đúng.
Khả năng xây dựng một bản kế hoạch Marketing thực tế chỉn chu theo 6 bước chuẩn hoá dành riêng cho SMEs.
Tư duy nghiệm thu và ứng biến linh hoạt khi kế hoạch không đi đúng hướng – điều rất nhiều marketer thiếu.
Tại sao khóa học này khác biệt?


Được thiết kế dựa trên thực tế triển khai hàng trăm dự án SMEs tại Việt Nam.
Không dạy cho bạn “làm đẹp slide”, mà chỉ dạy những gì tạo ra kết quả.
Có template, ví dụ, hướng dẫn chi tiết cho từng bước – học tới đâu làm được tới đó.
Phù hợp cả với người chưa từng lập kế hoạch trước đây.
target_audience: Sinh viên, nhân viên marketing, leader/manager, chủ doanh nghiệp có nhu cầu học marketing, lập kế hoạch, kinh doanh, khởi nghiệp

courses.description:
This course is designed to teach you how to build a targeted email list using social media platforms, a key strategy for growing your business. Whether you're a beginner or someone with little technical experience, this easy-to-follow course makes it simple to harness the power of email marketing. The course is just 20 minutes long but packed with actionable insights and tips.
You'll learn how to effectively use both free and paid tools to capture leads from various social media platforms, with step-by-step instructions for each platform. Each social media channel is covered in its own dedicated video, ensuring you can easily follow along and implement the strategies at your own pace.
Email marketing is one of the most cost-effective and powerful ways to reach potential customers. By building a custom audience through targeted emails, you can increase your chances of making sales and growing your business. The tool introduced in the course is affordable, with a free version available for limited use, so you can get started without any upfront investment.
Whether you're just getting started or looking to refine your strategy, this course will provide the knowledge you need to build a highly effective email list from social media platforms.


Thanks Keith Rainville
Instructor

courses.title: Neuromarketing : Estrategias para enamorar a tus clientes
courses.bio: Aumenta tus ventas y la efectividad de tu publicidad con las técnicas de Neuromarketing. Conoce al cerebro del cliente.
objectives: Cómo funciona el cerebro del consumidor, cuál es el proceso de toma de decisiones y cómo podemos influir en el.
Cuáles son los procesos mentales que afectan al consumo. Cuales son las vías de comunicación para llegar al subconsciente del cliente.
Conocer el proceso Pain-Claim-Gain, y crear una propuesta de valor efectiva.
Trabajar el Marketing emocional y sensitivo. Conocer cómo podemos incidir en los sentidos de los clientes y consumidores.
Saber cómo incidir en el cliente con las formas, los colores, las tipografías, el packaging y nuestras presentaciones.
Conocer el Storytelling, y crear historias que vendan de manera efectiva.
Crear una estrategia de Neuromarketing que podamos aplicar en nuestro producto o servicio.
Trabajar el Neuromarketing en Redes Sociales y Internet

1 - Conocer el cerebro del consumidor: 5 - Procesos mentales que afectan al consumo
7 - Grabar la marca en el cerebro de nuestro cliente
8 - Las vías de toma de decisiones
2 - Estrategias de Neuromarketing: 13 - El proceso de toma de decisiones y cómo influir en el
16 - Estrategias de Neuromarketing : El plan de Marketing
18 - Las neuronas espejo y la exclusividad
20 - Apela a los sentidos del consumidor
25 - Crea tu experiencia de cliente o Costumer Experience
3 - Storytelling: 26 - El poder de las historias en el Neuromarketing
31 - Cómo mi producto o servicio soluciona tu problema
4 - Neuromarketing en Internet y Redes S: 37 - Crea mensajes que generen acción en Redes

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa.
courses.description:
¡Bienvenido al curso que revolucionará tu forma de entender y conquistar a tus clientes!


En un mundo donde la competencia es feroz, ¿cómo puedes destacarte y captar la atención de tus clientes de manera efectiva? La respuesta está en el neuromarketing, la ciencia detrás de las estrategias más impactantes y exitosas en el mundo del marketing.


¿Qué te ofrece nuestro curso? Sumérgete en el fascinante mundo del neuromarketing y descubre cómo puedes utilizar los principios fundamentales del cerebro humano para enamorar a tus clientes y aumentar tus ventas de manera significativa.


Desde entender cómo funciona el cerebro del consumidor hasta aprender a diseñar mensajes y experiencias que resuenen con ellos a un nivel emocional profundo, este curso te proporcionará las herramientas y conocimientos necesarios para convertirte en un experto en la materia.


¿Te gustaría saber cómo aprovechar el poder de la psicología del consumidor para influir en sus decisiones de compra? ¡Estás en el lugar correcto! Aprende a aplicar conceptos como el sesgo cognitivo, la persuasión y la motivación para crear campañas de marketing irresistibles que cautiven a tu audiencia.


Pero eso no es todo. También te enseñaremos cómo utilizar la neurociencia para optimizar tus estrategias de branding, comunicación y experiencia del cliente, garantizando así que cada interacción con tu marca sea memorable y efectiva.


¿Listo para llevar tus habilidades de marketing al siguiente nivel y dejar una impresión indeleble en tus clientes? Únete a nosotros y descubre el poder del neuromarketing para transformar tu negocio. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu viaje hacia el éxito!
target_audience: Personas del mundo de la venta y el marketing. Personas que tengan un negocio, o que lo dirijan. Personas a las que les gusta la neurociencia. Departamentos de ventas y Marketing de las empresas. Personas que dirigen equipos de ventas y marketing.

requirements: Никаких специальных знаний не нужно
courses.description:
На курсе "Реклама книги. Самиздат" мы обсуждаем:
- история самиздата
- минусы самиздата
- чем отличается полиграфия от издательства
- как создать красивую обложку книги
- элементы верстки книги и что интересного можно придумать за минимальные бюджеты
- препродажа через соц сети, чтоб отбить часть затрат на издание
- настройка дистрибуции: как попасть в книжные магазины, где ещё можно продавать книги
- реклама в точках продаж
- реклама в соц сетях: нужны ли отдельные страницы книги?
- презентации и книжные ярмарки, организация творческих вечеров
- использования контактов для рекламы своей книги
- рецензии на книгу
- платные услуги онлайн магазинов


И многое другое...


О спикере.
Лазуткина Елена - книжный продюсер, преподаватель для молодых авторов, писателей и поэтов, художник.
В прошлом (до 24.02.2022): издатель, маркетолог книжный розничных сетей, организатор мероприятий, продвигающих чтение ( Киев: Книжный Кураж 2017, проект "Взрослые чтения с книжным продюсером" - 9 вечеров, выставка в музее "Золотые ворота" под названием "Kъniga", и другие; Буча - Книжная Буча 2016; Одесса: презентации новых литературных имён, проект "Книжная весна в Одессе"; и другие). Более 12 лет Елена помогает людям писать и создавать книги, в ее портфеле 12 бестселлеров в Украине. С 2014 года преподаёт, за это время более 1700 людей прошли лекции и семинары о книгах от Лазуткиной. Так же Елена создаёт арт объекты, посвященные любви к книгам.

courses.title: Agile Marketing Mastery: Implementing Marketing Sprints
courses.bio: Master Agile Marketing Frameworks, Sprint Planning, Stakeholder Management & Real-World Case Studies
objectives: Understand Agile Marketing Fundamentals – Learn the core principles, benefits, and differences between Agile and traditional marketing approaches.
Build and Manage a Marketing Backlog – Identify and prioritize tasks effectively to align with business objectives and customer needs.
Plan and Execute Marketing Sprints – Develop structured sprint plans, set clear objectives, and execute tasks efficiently.
Conduct Daily Stand-Ups and Retrospectives – Improve communication, collaboration, and iteration within marketing teams.
Measure Marketing Sprint Performance – Track KPIs and analyze data to refine marketing strategies and improve results.

Introduction to Agile Marketing: Agile Marketing vs. Agile Software Development
Introduction to Agile Marketing Roles & Responsibilities
How to implement Agile Marketing in a Organization
Agile Planning & Sprint Execution: Building and Managing a Marketing Backlog
Sprint Planning: Defining Goals, Scope, and Success Criteria
Running Effective Daily Stand-Ups and Check-ins
Best Practices for Managing a Marketing Backlog
Agile Tools & Performance Measurement: Selecting and Using Agile Marketing Tools (Trello, Jira, Asana, etc.)
Defining Agile KPIs and Measuring Sprint Effectiveness
Using Real-Time Data and Dashboards for Decision-Making
Tracking Campaign Performance Across Agile Workflows

Incorporating Customer Feedback into Sprint Cycles
Scaling Agile Marketing Across Teams and Departments
Overcoming Resistance and Common Challenges in Agile Adoption

requirements: Basic Marketing Knowledge
Willingness to Learn Agile Methodologies
Access to a Computer & Internet
Interest in Improving Marketing Efficiency
courses.description:
In today’s rapidly evolving marketing landscape, traditional strategies often struggle to keep up with shifting consumer behaviors, market trends, and digital disruptions. Agile Marketing offers a flexible, iterative, and data-driven approach that enables teams to adapt quickly, improve collaboration, and drive continuous growth. By applying Agile principles, marketing teams can accelerate execution, refine strategies based on real-time insights, and deliver customer-centric campaigns with greater efficiency.
This course provides a comprehensive, step-by-step guide to Agile Marketing, equipping you with the knowledge and tools to implement Agile methodologies effectively. You will learn how to conduct customer research, develop a structured marketing backlog, execute sprint planning, run daily stand-ups, and conduct retrospectives to drive continuous improvements.
Beyond foundational concepts, this course explores key Agile Marketing tools, performance measurement techniques, stakeholder management strategies, and feedback incorporation for optimizing marketing sprints. You will also gain insights into scaling Agile Marketing across teams and addressing common challenges that arise in implementation.
With real-world case studies and industry best practices, this course provides a practical approach to integrating Agile principles into diverse marketing environments. Whether you're a marketer, team lead, business owner, or project manager, this course will help you streamline marketing operations, enhance collaboration, and achieve measurable marketing success.
What You’ll Learn:
The fundamentals of Agile Marketing, its core principles, and benefits
How to develop a Marketing Backlog and effectively prioritize tasks
The structure and execution of a Marketing Sprint, from planning to implementation
Best practices for Daily Stand-ups, Sprint Reviews, and Retrospectives to improve workflow and accountability
Agile tools for collaboration, tracking, and performance measurement
How to manage teams, stakeholders, and feedback loops for continuous improvement
Strategies to scale Agile Marketing across an organization
Solutions to overcome common challenges in Agile implementation
By the end of this course, you will have a solid understanding of Agile Marketing principles and the expertise to apply them in real-world marketing projects. You will be able to enhance team productivity, improve marketing efficiency, and drive greater business impact through an Agile approach.
Enroll now to master Agile Marketing and take your marketing strategies to the next level.
target_audience: Marketing Professionals
Marketing Managers & Team Leads
Entrepreneurs & Business Owners
Product Marketers & Growth Hackers
Scrum Masters & Agile Practitioners
Agile & Project Management Enthusiasts

requirements: You should be able to use a PC at a beginner level
No specific knowledge of fundraising is necessary
courses.description:
Is your organization new to fundraising? Have you been relying on one source of income but would like to diversify? Are you a brand new fundraiser learning the ropes? Or are you experienced and simply want to broaden your skills and make sure you're not missing a trick? Want to boost the income of your non-profit, organization, charity, cause or crowdfunder?
This course is for you.
You'll learn step-by-step and systematically how to get your fundraising going and how to start growing your income. This course will teach you the principles of fundraising and everything you need to do to develop your fundraising strategy. This isn't about a document that will just sit on your shelf..this course is a practical guide and shares methods that you can put in to practice TODAY!
This course goes through all the different mediums of fundraising available to you, the methods and motivators, and breaks down what you need to know to make them work for you. We'll talk about cash collections, corporate fundraising, individual giving, donor care, Kickstarter and crowdfunding, grant applications, direct mail, e-mail, telephone fundraising, and much, much more.
Simon shares resources and guides to make your job easier, and brings years of experience and tried and tested methods to this course. He'll also talk about 'the first 100 days': what should your priorities be and how should you spend your valuable time.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to expand their fundraising
Anyone who wants to begin fundraising and doesn't know where to start
Existing fundraisers who want to broaden their skills and identify additional opportunities
Any individual or oganization tasked with fundraising

移动互联网和新媒体知识高速迭代的今天，每一位市场人都会目不暇接，奔波于营销传播、推广、活动、创意、公关的漩涡中。当你没有做到职业高阶圈层时，很难想象年薪几百万的市场高层会接触什么样的圈子和社会资源。相信如果你有职业梦想和明确的目标，加以勤奋的职场训练和方法总结，你也可以成为营销领袖，满足你的职业梦想，更好的照顾你的家人。
为此，三节课邀请了具多年大厂职场经验、小酷科技创始人CEO杨大伟老师带来本门课程。
通过这门课程的学习，你将会了解如何做市场岗位的职业规划与行动目标，能够进一步明确如何做市场组织架构及团队管理，增强生活中辨识贵人的敏感度，为你的未来职场和创业之路开疆拓土。
target_audience: 有1-5年市场公关体系工作经验的执行层、中底层干部
有意从事市场营销工作且拥有远大梦想的各类毕业
有意实现成功市场领导者的创业新手

courses.title: Communiquer à l’écrit avec succès dans les secteurs du luxe
courses.bio: Maîtriser l'art de la communication écrite dans le luxe.
objectives: Maîtriser les bonnes pratiques de la communication écrite en respectant les codes du luxe
Comprendre les fondamentaux de l'écriture et la communication écrite dans le luxe
Savoir appliquer ces règles dans le monde professionnel pour correspondre avec élégance, conviction et cohérence
Découvrir l'ecriture et de la communication écrite dans le luxe

Les Incontournables de la Communication: Les Incontournables de la Communication Écrite dans le Luxe
Les Règles de l'Écriture dans le Luxe: Les Règles de l'Écriture dans le Luxe

requirements: Aucune expérience nécessaire
courses.description:
La communication écrite est l'art de transmettre un message que l’on ne peut ou que l’on ne souhaite partager a l’oral. Afin qu'il soit accueilli et compris dans les meilleures conditions possible, il y a des codes à respecter. Dans l'industrie du luxe, la communication se doit d’être raffinée, tant dans sa forme que dans son contenu. Intégrer et se faire une place dans le secteur nécessite de montrer que nous connaissons ces codes. Un bel écrit, quelqu’il soit, est aujourd’hui plus rare et donc plus apprécié et il permet de sortir du lot.


En outre, La communication écrite reste le fondement de toute relation client et la clé de l’image d’une marque. Les clients du luxe n'achètent pas seulement un produit, mais aussi son image et sa réputation. Ainsi, il est crucial pour une entreprise de transmettre clairement ses valeurs et ses intentions à travers tous les supports de communication.


Ce cours vous guidera dans la découverte de l'écriture et de la communication écrite dans le luxe. Les origines, les bonnes pratiques et les conseils dispensés dans ce cours sont des ingrédients clés à garder à l'esprit pour prendre contact et nouer de belles relations dans les mondes du luxe, de l’art, de la mode et de l’expérience.


Suivre l'intégralité du cours vous permettra d'obtenir la certification LMA. LMA est la Luxury Marketing Académie basée à Paris.


Les objectifs du cours sont les suivants :
- Maîtriser les bonnes pratiques de la communication écrite en respectant les codes du luxe
- Comprendre les fondamentaux de l'écriture et la communication écrite dans le luxe
- Savoir appliquer ces règles dans le monde professionnel pour correspondre avec élégance, conviction et cohérence
target_audience: Tous les niveaux

courses.title: Consumer behavior, Consumer Intention & Consumer Attitude
courses.bio: Consumer behavior, Consumer Intention, Consumer Attitude, CRM, Consumer Research, Sales and Marketing, TPB
objectives: Understand the fundamental concepts and theories that shape consumer behavior.
Analyze the impact of consumer behavior on businesses and marketing strategies.
Explore the psychological and sociological influences on consumer choices.
Apply insights into these factors to predict and influence consumer behavior effectively.
Identify the stages of the consumer decision-making process.
Evaluate how marketing strategies can target consumers at each stage for better outcomes.
Examine how attitudes shape consumer preferences and choices.
Develop strategies to manage and change consumer attitudes in marketing contexts.
Investigate the link between consumer intentions and actual purchase behavior.
Design marketing campaigns to align with and influence consumer intentions.
Analyze current trends and issues in consumer behavior, such as digitalization and sustainability.
Apply consumer behavior insights to address real-world marketing challenges and opportunities.

Consumer behavior, Consumer Intention &: Psychological & Sociological Factors in Consumer Behavior
Additonal Lecture - Customer experience: Customer experience management & Customer Success management
Consumer behavior, Consumer Intention &: Consumer behavior, Consumer Intention & Consumer Attitude - Quiz

requirements: Basic skills of sales, marketing and Customer relationship management (CRM) Ideas.
courses.description:
Master Course in Consumer Behavior, Consumer Intention, and Consumer Attitude
In today's fast-paced and ever-evolving business landscape, understanding consumer behavior, intention, and attitude is crucial for any organization striving to thrive in the market. The way consumers think, feel, and act directly influences their purchasing decisions, making it imperative for businesses to gain insights into these aspects. To equip professionals and students with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in this field, many educational institutions now offer a comprehensive Master Course in Consumer Behavior, Consumer Intention, and Consumer Attitude. In this master course, we will delve into the significance of this course and explore what it entails.
This course provides a comprehensive exploration of consumer behavior, consumer intention, and consumer attitude. Students will gain a deep understanding of how individuals make decisions as consumers, their intentions behind those decisions, and the attitudes that influence their choices. Through theoretical frameworks, real-world case studies, and practical applications, students will develop the knowledge and skills necessary to analyze and predict consumer behavior.
In today's highly competitive business world, understanding consumer behavior, intention, and attitude is essential for achieving success. A Master Course in Consumer Behavior, Consumer Intention, and Consumer Attitude equips individuals with the knowledge and skills needed to navigate the complexities of consumer psychology and market dynamics. Graduates of this program are well-prepared to make informed decisions, develop effective marketing strategies, and contribute to the growth and success of businesses in various industries. If you have a passion for understanding why consumers make the choices they do, this course might just be your ticket to a rewarding and impactful career in the world of marketing and business.
In this master course, I would like to teach the 6 major topics :
1. Introduction to Consumer Behavior
2. Psychological & Sociological Factors in Consumer Behavior
3. The Consumer Decision-Making Process
4. Consumer Attitudes
5. Consumer Intention
6. Contemporary Issues and Applications
Enroll now and learn today !
target_audience: All UG, PG Business, Marketing, IT and other students
Interested students to learn about the concepts of Consumer behavior, Consumer Intention & Consumer Attitude

requirements: لديه حب التعلم لإدارة التسويق كأداة حقيقية وليست مجرد أنشطة رقمية على السوشيل ميديا
courses.description:
تقدم هذه الدورة الشاملة نظرة شاملة على عالم التسويق، بدءًا من الأساسيات وحتى أحدث الاتجاهات. تغطي الدورة مجموعة واسعة من الموضوعات، بدءًا من فهم أسس التسويق وتحديد الجمهور المستهدف، وصولاً إلى بناء العلامات التجارية القوية وتطوير استراتيجيات تسويقية فعالة.
أهداف الدورة:
تزويد المتدربين بفهم عميق لمبادئ التسويق وأهميته في تحقيق النجاح التجاري.
تمكين المتدربين من تحليل السوق وتحديد الفرص والتحديات.
بناء القدرة على تطوير استراتيجيات تسويقية فعالة ومبتكرة.
تعليم المتدربين كيفية استخدام الأدوات والتقنيات التسويقية الحديثة.
تطوير مهارات اتخاذ القرار في مجال التسويق.
المواضيع الرئيسية التي تغطيها الدورة:
أساسيات التسويق: تعريف التسويق، أهميته، وأحدث الاتجاهات.
تحليل السوق: دراسة السوق، تحديد شرائح العملاء، وتحليل المنافسين.
بناء العلامة التجارية: تحديد الميزة التنافسية، بناء الهوية البصرية، وإدارة السمعة.
تطوير استراتيجيات التسويق: وضع الخطط التسويقية، اختيار القنوات المناسبة، وتقييم الأداء.
التسويق الرقمي: التسويق عبر محركات البحث، وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي، والبريد الإلكتروني.
التسويق المستدام: مفهوم التسويق المستدام وأهميته.
التسويق في ظل التغيرات التكنولوجية: تأثير الذكاء الاصطناعي على التسويق.
من سيفيد من هذه الدورة؟
رواد الأعمال
المسوقون
مديرو التسويق
طلاب الإدارة وملاك المشاريع التجارية
خلال هذه الدورة، ستكتسب المهارات والمعرفة اللازمة ل:
تطوير استراتيجيات تسويقية ناجحة.
زيادة الوعي بالعلامة التجارية.
جذب عملاء جدد والاحتفاظ بالعملاء الحاليين.
تحسين العائد على الاستثمار التسويقي.
انضم إلينا واكتشف عالم التسويق المثير!

requirements: No prior experience needed.
courses.description:
Welcome to WordPress Mastery Kit – The only WordPress you need to become a WordPress Expert
You’ve read in many places on the Internet that it’s important to build your website. Whether it is for personal or business use, people tell you to get your website. But you don’t know how it’s done. You don’t know anything about building websites, and you don’t want to invest thousands of dollars in a professional coder to help build your website.
What’s the next best solution?
Use WordPress. You’ve heard of it before. And you probably didn’t know what it meant. Well, from this day forward, you’re going to be learning everything there is to know about WordPress.
The learning curve will be a bit steep, especially if you know absolutely nothing about building websites. Don’t worry though; we will do our best to make the technical stuff sound easy.
So, sit back, relax, and try to absorb all the information we will be sharing in this 10-part WordPress course.
By the end of this series of Chapters, you’ll be able to build your very own WordPress website. You can even use your newfound skill to help other people build their WordPress sites, for a fee of course!
So let’s begin…
target_audience: For all digital Marketers who need to build beautiful WordPress websites.

courses.title: Design Thinking Masterclass
courses.bio: Lerne wie du Produkte, Dienstleistungen & Prozesse kundenzentriert entwickelst und komplexe Probleme lösen kannst.
objectives: Du lernst was genau Design Thinking ist
Du lernst wo Design Thinking zum Einsatz kommt
Du lernst was für Design Thinking benötigt wird
Du lernst wie Design Thinking praktisch umgesetzt wird
Du lernst Methoden die beim Design Thinking zum Einsatz kommen
Du lernst, wie die Methoden eingesetzt werden
Du lernst Design Thinking anhand eines praktischen Beispiels zum Mitmachen!
requirements: Motivation & Neugier
Offenes Mind-Set für kreative Ansätze
courses.description:
Design Thinking ist längst nicht mehr nur den Designern vorbehalten. Bereits in den 90er Jahren haben innovative Unternehmen die Methoden und Vorgehensweisen für sich entdeckt. Design Thinking kommt dann zum Einsatz, wenn neue Produkte, Dienstleistungen und Prozesse kundenorientiert und im Team entwickelt werden. Außerdem bietet es eine Vielzahl an Methoden, die beim Lösen komplexer Aufgabenstellungen und Herausforderungen helfen. Design Thinking hilft dir dabei effektiver in deinen Business-Herausforderungen zu werden, dabei ist es ganz egal, welche Position du in einem Unternehmen besetzt, oder welchen Tätigkeiten du nachgehst.
In diesem Kurs lernst du nicht nur die einzelnen Phasen des Design-Thinking Prozesses, sondern wirst sie auch praktisch umsetzen.
Nach diesem Kurs hast du gelernt,
zu Verstehen, was Design Thinking ist
wo Design Thinking zum Einsatz kommt
was für Design Thinking benötigt wird
wie Design Thinking umgesetzt wird
welche Methoden bei Design Thinking zum Einsatz kommen
wie die Methoden eingesetzt werden
Außerdem hast du den gesamten Prozess gemeinsam mit mir anhand einer realistischen Story durchgearbeitet und hältst am Ende deinen eigenen Prototypen in der Hand.
target_audience: Jeder, der sich mit Produkten, Dienstleistungen, Prozessen, oder Problemstellungen beschäftigt

courses.title: Marketing político. ¡Te digo cómo ganar!
courses.bio: Marketing y comunicación política
objectives: Ganar o hacer ganar elecciones
Ejemplos reales
requirements: No existen requisitos previos
courses.description:
EJEMPLOS REALES, comparto 25 años de experiencia, desde historia, definición y una guía sencilla para que ganes o aprendas a ganar elecciones, ANÍMATE A SER GANADOR. Anteriormente las guerras se ganaban militarmente, ahora se ganan convenciendo y persuadiendo las mentes. Este curso plantea 7 pasos sencillos pero firmes para que ganes una elección. Kennedy, Nixon, Trump, Obama, López Obrador, Enrique Peña Nieto y muchos más se abordan en este curso. Tiene un componente práctico teórico para que entiendas cómo llevar una campaña ganadora paso a paso, siempre respaldada con evidencia científica. Soy autor de un libro de Marketing Político, la nueva guerra, el marketing político, te digo cómo ganar, profesor de posgrado en Marketing y consultor durante más de 25 años, actualmente soy director general de Polymetrix. Los 7 pasos son los siguientes:
El primer paso consiste en definir el conquistador,
el segundo paso la población objetivo,
el tercero el objetivo,
el cuarto paso la investigación,
el quinto paso la estrategia,
el sexto la táctica y
el séptimo la evaluación.
Anteriormente, las guerras se ganaban militarmente, en la actualidad las conquistas se ganan convenciendo, persuadiendo y sometiendo voluntariamente las mentes de las personas. En este curso abordamos de manera muy sencilla la raíz de esta guerra, lo objetivo, lo subjetivo y lo intersubjetivo, conceptos que la mayoría de los cursos tradicionales omiten o ni siquiera saben que existen, después pasamos hacia la conducta humana, cómo actuamos y porqué actuamos; un paso por las principales teorías de conducta electoral. Para hacer campañas firmes y exitosas con estudios de caso REALES, ATRÉVETE A GANAR, te acompaño mediante este curso a tu ritmo.
target_audience: Candidatos políticos y Gobernantes

Mercadotecnia, comunicación, ciencias políticas

courses.title: Design Thinking Desde 0
courses.bio: Design Thinking

El Mundo del Design Thinking: Como se llega de empatizar a Definir ?

requirements: No es necesario tener estudios previos de ninguna clase
Tener internet
No necesita experiencia
courses.description:
Design Thinking es una metodología que revoluciona la forma en que enfrentamos problemas y generamos soluciones, destacando la importancia de comprender profundamente las necesidades del usuario. Consta de cinco fases interrelacionadas que guían el proceso creativo: Empatizar, Definir, Idear, Prototipar y Probar.
Esta metodología va más allá del diseño de productos y servicios, extendiéndose a la resolución de problemas complejos en diversas disciplinas. Su enfoque centrado en el usuario asegura que las soluciones sean auténticamente relevantes y efectivas. Se aplica en diversos contextos, desde el diseño de productos y servicios hasta la solución de problemas complejos en distintas disciplinas. Es una herramienta clave para fomentar la creatividad, la colaboración interdisciplinaria y la mejora continua, convirtiéndose en un marco valioso para la innovación efectiva. Además, fomenta la colaboración interdisciplinaria, ya que equipos diversos aportan perspectivas variadas.
En resumen, Design Thinking es una herramienta poderosa para la innovación. Su énfasis en la empatía, definición precisa de problemas, generación creativa de ideas, prototipado y retroalimentación continua lo convierte en un enfoque valioso para abordar los desafíos contemporáneos con creatividad, eficacia y humanidad.


Integrar Design Thinking en la vida cotidiana brinda a los participantes las herramientas y el enfoque necesario para abordar desafíos de manera creativa, fomentando la innovación y la resolución efectiva de problemas.
target_audience: Todo tipo de profesional

courses.title: Descubre cómo aplicar el Código Cultural o Código Simbólico
courses.bio: En este curso descubrirás la herramienta más Poderosa del Neuromarketing: El Código Cultural.

Curso Completo del Código Cultural: El Código Cultural ó Código Simbólico ❶ - Generalidades
El Código Cultural ó Código Simbólico ❷
El Código Cultural ó Código Simbólico ❸
El Código Cultural ó Código Simbólico ❹
El Código Cultural ó Código Simbólico ❺
El Código Cultural ó Código Simbólico ❻

requirements: Sólo, abre tu mente...
courses.description:
Llevo años creando estrategias de marketing y publicidad.
Pero, para mí hubo un cambio PODEROSO cuando implementé estrategias de neuromarketing y neuroventas a los planes de marketing y publicidad.
En este curso, te explico el proceso "simplificado" para descubrir el código cultural o código simbólico.
En Neuromarketing el código cultural, es una frase o palabra que describe un producto o servicio. Dicha expresión está conectada con lo más profundo del subconsciente de nuestro cliente ideal para activar ese disparador que nos ayudará a exponer nuestra oferta de manera altamente atractiva y convincente.
Esto siempre de manera lícita, ética y correcta.
Programa del curso:
· Lección 1: Generalidades sobre el neuromarketing. Qué es el código cultural, su creación por parte del Dr Cloutier Rapaille, el desarrollo del experto Gurú internacional Jurguen Klaric y como lo he sintetizado para ti.
· Lección 2: La impronta. Especialmente en nuestra niñez, pero también como adultos hay recuerdo que marcan nuestra existencia, tanto positivos como negativos. Seguro que recuerdas el aroma del café que tomaba tu padre los domingos por las mañanas o las comidas de tu abuela, esas son improntas que las marcas usan para vender.
· Lección 3: Los arquetipos. Analizamos los arquetipos desarrollados por Carl Gustav Jung, estos nos permiten identificar “personajes” que nos pueden ayudar a vender nuestros productos o servicios. Los arquetipos están presentes en Hollywood por ejemplo, basta ver Star Wars, los vengadores o el Chavo del 8.
· Lección 4: La metáfora. Analizamos como el método ZMET del Dr Geralt Zaltman nos ayuda en el proceso de descubrimiento del código. Cuando enmarcamos un producto o servicio en una metáfora las probabilidades de venta aumentan exponencialmente.
· Lección 5: Definición del código.
· Lección 6: Cómo aplicar el código de forma práctica en la publicidad y marketing de nuestro negocio.
Espero que te sea útil.
Gracias por participar.
@ottomarketer
target_audience: Emprendedores
Empresarios
Estudiantes y profesionales del marketing y la publicidad
Toda persona que desee entender como conectar en profundidad con su cliente objetivo

courses.title: ChatGPT × Systems Thinking for Marketers
courses.bio: From signal to leverage: use prompts and causal maps to find the broken spoke and flip markets.
objectives: Map marketing systems (actors → flows → constraints) and spot broken loops.
Translate CTR/CPC and other vanity metrics into real constraints and delays.

requirements: No experience needed.
courses.description:
“This course contains the use of artificial intelligence.”
This course helps marketers and growth leaders combine powerful Systems Thinking frameworks with practical ChatGPT techniques to systematically diagnose marketing funnels, pinpoint hidden constraints, and rapidly test solutions that drive sustainable growth—ending guesswork and wasteful experimentation forever.
Unlike traditional marketing courses that focus purely on tactics, this unique offering teaches marketers precisely where and how to apply tactics using proven systems approaches. Students will quickly learn how to turn ambiguous data into actionable insights, accurately identify leverage points, and confidently execute high-impact, low-cost experiments.
“Most marketers know the frustration of chasing vanity metrics like clicks or impressions without seeing real growth,” says course creator Zenson Tran. “Our approach helps marketers stop tweaking surface metrics and start changing the real system—using ChatGPT as a reliable, practical partner every step of the way.”
The course includes short, engaging lessons paired with hands-on exercises, ready-made templates, and a comprehensive Prompt Kit. Students will walk away with practical skills in causal mapping, ICE prioritization, 14-day experiments, and advanced ChatGPT prompting methods—including Role-Cast Prompting and Multi-lens questioning.
This course is ideal for growth marketers, product teams, entrepreneurs, and anyone tired of vague metrics who wants practical, AI-enhanced systems thinking skills.
“Students consistently discover their biggest marketing breakthroughs when they stop treating symptoms and start fixing systems,” says Tran. “This course makes that approach intuitive, practical, and repeatable for every marketer.”
Enroll now at Udemy to begin thinking systematically, acting quickly, and growing confidently.
Q: Who exactly is this course for?
A: Growth marketers, acquisition specialists, founders, product and performance teams—anyone who wants to systematically diagnose marketing issues and confidently apply ChatGPT to make faster, smarter decisions.
Q: Do I need technical skills or a programming background to use ChatGPT effectively?
A: No technical skills required. You’ll learn practical prompting techniques specifically designed for marketers.
Q: How quickly can I apply what I learn?
A: Immediately. Each lesson gives you instant templates and prompts that can be applied to your real marketing campaigns right away.
Q: Will I receive practical templates I can reuse?
A: Absolutely. You’ll get downloadable templates for causal maps, ICE tables, experiment plans, and reusable ChatGPT prompts.
Q: Is there a final project?
A: Yes, you'll complete a short, practical Capstone Project where you diagnose a real marketing funnel, design a 14-day experiment, and produce a stakeholder-ready recommendation.
FAQ (Reviewers)
Q: What differentiates this course from other marketing courses?
A: It uniquely combines Systems Thinking frameworks with practical ChatGPT workflows, focusing not on isolated tactics but on deep leverage points that systematically produce lasting marketing improvements.
Q: How does the course ensure learners actually apply what they learn?
A: Each lesson has clear prompts and short exercises that ensure immediate application. The capstone requires practical testing and validation.
Q: Are outcomes measurable?
A: Yes. Students explicitly learn how to define clear success criteria, measure results through timeboxed experiments, and validate hypotheses in a structured way.
FAQ (Instructors / Partners)
Q: Can this course be integrated into a larger marketing or growth training curriculum?
A: Absolutely. It’s modular, concise, and designed to complement traditional marketing or growth curricula, easily slotting into existing training programs.
Q: How does this course support learner engagement and completion?
A: It employs short, engaging videos, clear practical tasks (micro-katas), reusable templates, and a capstone project designed for high engagement and completion rates.
Q: Can this course scale for enterprise teams?
A: Yes. It's specifically built with frameworks and templates suitable for large teams, and can easily be rolled out across departments for systematic upskilling.
Why this course:
Most marketing courses teach tactics. This one teaches where to apply them — and why some changes matter orders of magnitude more. Pairing Meadows-style leverage thinking with ChatGPT gives you a fast, repeatable path from messy signals → clear hypotheses → high-confidence action.
Enroll if you want to stop guessing and start testing what actually drives sustained growth.
target_audience: Growth & acquisition marketers who want higher ROI from experiments.
Product and performance teams who need a reproducible diagnostic playbook.
Founders/PMs who want to make fewer costly bets and scale evidence-based decisions.
Anyone curious about making ChatGPT a practical systems co-thinker for marketing.

courses.title: 行销万有理论，M = Contents X Community X Commerce
courses.bio: 不论线上、线下、个人、企业、有资源、没资源、大品牌、小品牌都一体适用的行销理论！
objectives: 掌握内容、社群跟商务三者对于行销活动的重要性
了解在进行行销活动时，时间与金钱之前的关联性
将 M 理论应用在实际市场之中

行销的情境: 商品或服务后面代表的意义

requirements: 对于电子商务有基本概念
对于社群经营有初步的认知
courses.description:
如果你Google「行销」两字，一秒内就会出现高达21,200,000 项结果，从以前到现在各式各样说明行销的理论，自1960年提出了4P以来不断推陈出新、不断的自我增生，行销的范围如此广泛、行销的工具日新月异，是否可能有一个统一一切的万有理论？
我认为可以透过以下公式来诠释：

M = Contents内容 X Community社群 X Commerce商务

内容 不只是图、纹、设计、包装、影像等等，你产品本身也属于内容的一部分。
社群 不只是指线上的社群，它也包括线下的部分，例如你的实体店面会员、你购买一篇杂志广告，这本杂志的阅读群也是社群的概念。
商务 是指你交付商品或服务的方式或管道。
target_audience: 准备进行行销活动的行销专员
不清楚社群在行销活动当中扮演什么角色的行销人员
对于行销产品或是服务完全没有头绪的行销人员

courses.title: Marketing Sensorial e Merchandising no ponto de vendas
courses.bio: Marketing Sensorial e Merchandising no ponto de vendas + bônus Módulo de Comportamento do consumidor
objectives: Criar estratégias de marketing sensorial e organizar lojas e espaços de negócios usando técnicas de merchandising.

Marketing Sensorial: Iniciando os estudos do Marketing Sensorial

Planejamento de marketing sensorial para lojas - parte 2
Comportamento do consumidor: O consumidor inserido em um grupo social

O módulo de Marketing Sensorial contém: 19 aulas
O módulo de Merchandising contém: 10 aulas
E o bônus com o Módulo de Comportamento do Consumidor contém: 13 aulas
Marketing Sensorial
Marketing sensorial, neuromarketing, marketing de experiencia, brand marketing são nomes que levam ao mesmo fim, gerar uma experiência para o consumidor e fazer com que ele sinta-se a vontade em um ambiente de compras.
Estudaremos os cinco sentidos e como eles podem ser utilizados como estratégia de marketing, em um ambiente de vendas ou marca. Além disso, veremos também outros exemplos estratégicos para gerar experiência de marca e fazer com que o consumidor lembre-se de forma positiva de tua loja ou marca.
Conteúdo:
– O que é Marketing
– O que é Marketing Sensorial
– Branding sensorial
– Neuromarketing
– Introdução ao Marketing Sensorial
– Audição
– Visão
– Olfato
– Paladar
– Tato
– Sinestesia
– Planejamento de marketing sensorial para lojas
– Dicas
Materiais complementares:
Materiais de palestras utilizados em empresas e universidades:
– A mulher e o varejo
– A evolução do vitrinismo
– Como gerar experiências no pdv
– Marketing sensorial no supermercado
– Estratégias para supermercados
Merchandising no ponto de vendas
O merchandising envolve todas as técnicas de exposição de produtos em ambientes de vendas para que o cliente seja atraído pelos itens da loja. Com isso é necessário entender todos os itens que podem constituir uma loja desde o layout até as estratégias de exposição do mobiliário, expositores e produtos.
Estudaremos também a base para incluir estratégias de marketing sensorial e aumentar a percepção do cliente no ponto de vendas.
Conteúdo:
– Definições
– Merchandising
– Compreendendo o consumidor
– Layouts
– Exibitécnica
– O público
– Digital Signage
– Material de PDV
BÔNUS: Módulo de Comportamento do Consumidor
O curso de Comportamento do Consumidor contém: 11 aulas

Formato: videoaula com slides narrados
Slides em pdf para baixar.
Professora: Tatiana Benites
target_audience: Lojistas, pessoas que trabalham no varejo e alunos de marketing e comunicação.
