courses.description:
Learn how to use inbound marketing strategies to get the best leads and most engaged customers to your site or product.
Then monitor how those leads behave on your website using Google Analytics which is a data-driven approach where you identify and set the right KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) to monitor and work on improving. Once your KPIs are heading in the right direction, so will your business.
WHY IS INBOUND MARKETING GREAT?
The leads find you in a passive way. You don't have to actively promote your business so you have more time to create more content or focus on other parts of your business.
WHAT IS KPI
KPI stands for key performance indicators. These are metrics that you identify that are most important for your business. If you correctly identify your KPI and focus on growing them, that will cause your business to grow as well.
In this course, I'll introduce you to different KPI that you can track depending on what's important for your business. Once you identify your KPI, I'll show you how to monitor that with Google Analytics, which will give you a data-driven approach to marketing and growing your company.
DATA-DRIVEN APPROACH WITH GOOGLE ANALYTICS
You must monitor your KPIs after you set them. Most of the time, people and companies use analytics software to monitor their KPI. The most commonly used analytics software is Google Analytics. In this course, we'll go over how to correctly use Google Analytics to monitor your KPI and most important data points to make sure that you know exactly what's happening on your website.
Keep in mind, not all your KPI data will come from Google Analytics. KPI data can be user enjoyment signals like your product's star rating or any of a large variety of metrics. The key is to identify the most important KPI, and focus on growing that.
INBOUND MARKETING IS MUCH GREATER THAN MOST PEOPLE THINK
Most people think that inbound marketing is simply traffic coming from Google search. But the truth is that inbound marketing can be done anywhere you can do content marketing. Content marketing has a very big overlap with inbound marketing because wherever you post content, people can discover that content, and through that content they can come to your website, and become your clients.
To various degrees, I would consider marketing your products or business on big marketplaces like Amazon, eBay, Etsy, and even YouTube a part of your inbound marketing because potential customers might discover you there, and become clients of your greater business.
TRACKING KPI CAN EVEN BE FUN
Personally, I love checking my Google Analytics and other analytics software every day to see how my KPI are performing, especially if they are heading in the right direction. If your KPI are growing, it can be so enjoyable and energizing to check them. It gives hope that your business and work is heading in a much more positive direction where you need it to go.
RESPONSIVE AND CARING INSTRUCTOR: WORLD-CLASS STUDENT SUPPORT
If you have questions, know that I am here to help! I answer 99% of student questions within 24 hours. Many students tell me that other instructors don't respond. Well, I do because
1) I care about my students.
2) I feel a responsibility to make sure that students get their money's worth from the course.
Invest in your future. Enroll today.
target_audience: Beginner marketers, online entrepreneurs interested in inbound marketing

requirements: No previous knowledge or experience needed
All levels can take and benefit from this course
courses.description:
When you ask an expert marketer: "What is the number 1 lucrative skill that a fellow marketer or entrepreneur can learn?"
Their answer will without a doubt be: "Copywriting".
In short, if you want to effectively sell your online products and services, then you need to learn how to write great copy.
A common issue people often complain about with regards to copywriting is that "Copywriting feels inauthentic for them!"...
...This is a phrase I have often heard from coaches, marketers, content creators...etc
If you’ve been an avid student of the topic of copywriting, then you are probably familiar with all the tricks that are recommended by the experts, some of which include:
Use hype (exaggerate benefits to get prospects excited about your product/service)
False positioning (Position your product as the only one in the world that meets all of the prospect’s needs)
Agitate the pain (Get the prospect to feel the pain of their current situation and make the consequences of not buying your product/service unbearable)
These are just some examples of common copywriting practices that are being taught. The negative effects of following this kind of advice are many:
Make the prospect skeptical
Set the prospect up for disappointment (as a result of building unrealistic expectations)
Create and build up anxiety in the prospect
Most people write copy this way because it’s the only way they’ve ever known how to do it – and I admit, I’ve been guilty of writing copy this way too my first few years in business.
The good news is: There’s another way. And it’s both helpful to your clients, and enjoyable to you.
What is it called? Well, you may call it honest/genuine/authentic copywriting.
It’s the result of years of testing, trial and error & resentment of the conventional way of doing things.
Yes! You can do without all the manipulative sales techniques of mainstream copywriting and get good results.
It starts with learning the theory. Then, once you’ve become familiar with the copywriting process, you’ll then be able to put pen to paper. Everything you need from tools to templates and resources has been included.
This course takes all the confusion and guesswork out of writing copy for web pages, emails, & social media.
Whether you’re a novice copywriter or an experienced copywriter who is tired of the old, unethical way of copywriting through the use of hype and manipulation, this course has the answers to your questions.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs

Authentic Marketers
Freelancers
Authors
Anyone Who Wants To Learn The Lucrative Skill Of Copywriting

もしあなたがそう感じているなら、ぜひこの講座にご参加ください。現役インフルエンサーのよしが、自身の経験と知識を詰め込んだX運用講座で、あなたのX運用を成功に導きます。


なぜ、この講座を受講するとXで成功できるのか？
2万人超のフォロワーを持つ講師が、自身の成功体験に基づいたノウハウを余すところなく伝授
X運用で本当に大切なことを、具体的なロードマップに沿って丁寧に解説
講義を聞くだけでなく、ワークシートを使って手を動かしながら学ぶことで、実践力が身につく
初心者から中上級者まで、広く参考になる学びを提供


この講座で得られること
X運用成功への道筋：成功するロードマップを通じて全体像が理解でき、やるべきことが明確になります。
実例に基づいた学習：2万フォロワー超えの〝よし〟の具体的な事例を通して、現実的な運用方法を習得できます。
個別アカウント設計のためのワークシート：ワークシートを活用し、自身のアカウントに特化した運用戦略を構築できます。


コースの内容
X運用のロードマップ
X運用の目的を明確にする
自分の発信軸を見つける
アカウント設計の基本
競合調査
バズポストの作り方
アフィリエイトの方法
などなど


ワークシート
各講義内容に合わせて、実践的なワークシートをご用意。
講義で学んだことをすぐに実践できるので、着実に成果を挙げられます。


こんな方におすすめ
これからXを始める初心者の方
運用に悩んでいる中上級者の方
Xでビジネスを成功させたい方
インフルエンサーを目指したい方
Xを通じてマネタイズをしたい方
target_audience: X運用をこれから始める初心者から、うまくいかずに悩んでいる又は伸び悩んでいる中上級者

courses.title: How to use storytelling in your business pitch/presentation
courses.bio: Great stories happen to those who can tell them.
objectives: Storytelling techniques
Persuasion through stories
Storytelling in pitches

Introduction: How to get the most out of the class
Before you start: Preparations before you start your story
Your Audience: Steps to get closer to your audience
The Start of your story: The where and when of the story
The Character: The hero: good or bad? Real or Fake?
The Core action part: Why you need conflict and the growth opportunity

requirements: Be ready to learn and use storytelling techniques in your job
courses.description:
Using the power of storytelling in your pitch or presentation can make the difference between winning and losing a client. Stories make potential clients love you and commit to you.
Most business and most speakers don’t use storytelling techniques, because they don’t know how to create that perfect story. They lack the Storytelling skills. They think it’s hard work and some think they aren’t creative enough.
This is understandable. Creating a good story can be hard. It can take up a lot of time if you don’t know how to create that story. That’s why most storytelling efforts fail.
Until you learn the magic formula.
In this class, you will learn the formula of how to craft stories that will have impact. Stories people will remember and stories that sell. A formula you can use time and time again.
This class will make storytelling easy. It will show you the secret ingredient of creating stories that have real impact.


What you’ll learn
By the end of this class students will be able to:
Understand the power of using storytelling
Create powerful stories
Distinguish powerful stories to use for all purposes
Use stories in persuasion efforts
Build a story from start to finish
Use stories to sell
Use powerful storytelling techniques
Learning objectives
The Storytelling course can enhance your ability to:
Engage audiences
Build trust-based relationships
Inspire and influence customers and colleagues
Make your messages stick
Simplify complex ideas
Drive people to action
Make connections
Win more pitches
Get more speaking opportunities
Be more interesting




Why YOU need this
Our lives are full of stories. When you share stories with others, they listen and remember. You will learn how to make better connections and have impact by using stories. You will win confidence and land better jobs or clients.
When you learn the magic formula for telling a story, you’ll have more impact and more success in life.
Who should take this class?
This program is set up for those trying to persuade and convince others. Whether you are an executive, a manager or employee, you can benefit from telling stories.
Learning Resources
The class comes with a textbook that can be downloaded from the class overview pages. The website provides additional and updated material including relevant websites and self-testing tools. You will also be able to directly contact the course teacher!
target_audience: This program is set up for those trying to persuade and convince others.
Beginner storytellers and those that have started before, but didn't get to the next step!
Whether you are an executive, a manager or employee, you can benefit from telling stories.

courses.title: Grow Your Shopify Sales with Email Marketing
courses.bio: Step-by-step guide to building email strategies that convert browsers into loyal customers.
objectives: Master Klaviyo Integration with Shopify
Design and Automate Effective Email Flows
Implement Advanced Segmentation and Personalization
Analyze and Optimize Campaign Performance

Introduction to Klaviyo & Shopify Integr: Welcome to the Course: Overview of what you'll learn.

Crafting Effective Email Campaigns: Creating Your First Email Campaign: Step-by-step process.

Subject Lines and Preheaders: Writing compelling copy.
Testing Your Campaigns: A/B testing for optimization.
Email Flows for Automation: What Are Email Flows?: Introduction to automation.
Setting Up a Welcome Series: Engage new subscribers.
Cart Abandonment Flow: Recapturing lost sales.
Advanced Strategies & Analytics: Personalization Tactics: Dynamic content and product recommendations.
Using Conditional Splits: Advanced flow branching.
Leveraging Predictive Analytics: Understanding customer behavior.
Scaling Your Email Marketing: List Cleaning & Maintenance: Keeping your list healthy.
Holiday Campaign Strategies: Maximizing seasonal opportunities.
Advanced Segmentation: Using purchase behavior and engagement data.
Creating Repeatable Campaign Processes: Streamlining workflows.
Integrating Klaviyo with Other Tools: Expanding your capabilities.
Final Wrap-Up: Building an Email Marketing Calendar: Planning campaigns.
Course Summary & Next Steps: Recap and resources for further learning.

requirements: Basic Understanding of Shopify
No Prior Email Marketing Experience Needed
Willingness to Learn
courses.description:
Are you a Shopify store owner struggling to turn visitors into repeat customers? Or maybe you’ve heard about the power of email marketing but don’t know where to start? This course is designed specifically for you.
Email Marketing for Shopify Store Owners is a complete, no-fluff guide to building and automating your email marketing system—from scratch to sales. Taught by the founder of Outreach Gurkha, a specialized email marketing agency for eCommerce brands, this course brings you practical, proven strategies that generate results.
Whether you're just starting out or already using tools like Klaviyo, you’ll learn how to set up high-converting email flows, write emails that get opened and clicked, and build lasting customer relationships that drive revenue. We’ll cover everything from welcome series, abandoned cart flows, post-purchase sequences, to campaign strategies and segmentation.
No fancy jargon. No unnecessary theory. Just straight-up, actionable email marketing training built around real-world Shopify experience.
By the end of this course, you’ll have a fully functioning email marketing system ready to bring in sales on autopilot.
If you're ready to grow your Shopify store with one of the most ROI-positive channels out there, this is the course for you.
As someone who has helped multiple Shopify brands in the beauty, wellness, and lifestyle niches increase their revenue through email, I know what works—and what doesn’t. I’ve built email systems that now generate over 30% of total store revenue for clients, and in this course, I’m pulling back the curtain to show you exactly how it’s done.
You don’t need a big team or a huge list to get started—just the right strategy, tools, and a willingness to learn. Whether you're a solo founder, a marketing manager, or just getting started with your first store, this course will give you the confidence and skills to make email marketing one of your most powerful growth channels.
target_audience: Shopify Store Owners: Entrepreneurs and business owners looking to leverage email marketing to increase sales, improve customer retention, and build a loyal customer base.
E-Commerce Marketers: Marketing professionals who want to learn Klaviyo's advanced tools to create personalized email campaigns that drive results for Shopify stores.
Beginner Email Marketers: Individuals new to email marketing who want a comprehensive, step-by-step guide to mastering Klaviyo and Shopify integration.
Freelancers and Agencies: Digital marketers and agencies offering email marketing services who want to expand their skills and provide specialized services for Shopify clients.

Anyone Interested in E-Commerce Growth: Whether you're managing your first online store or looking to scale your e-commerce business, this course is perfect for anyone eager to learn actionable email marketing strategies tailored for Shopify.

courses.description:
Dive into the cutting-edge world of artificial intelligence with Outgrow's Implementing AI Masterclass Part-3, a transformative learning experience that builds upon the foundational knowledge established in Parts 1 and 2 of our comprehensive series. Assuming you have completed the previous modules, this course now takes you deeper into the advanced applications and strategic implementations of AI across global industries.
Participants who have gone through Parts 1 and 2 will now explore more nuanced and sophisticated AI transformations, featuring exclusive insights from senior executives at SAP, PepsiCo, MailerLite, Google DeepMind, WIRED, and Royal Dutch Airlines. This immersive course offers an unprecedented, 360-degree view of AI's revolutionary impact across diverse business landscapes.
You will journey through advanced case studies that demonstrate how AI is fundamentally reshaping business strategies, workforce dynamics, technological innovation, and ethical frameworks. From SAP's collaborative intelligence approaches to PepsiCo's strategic transformation methodologies, from MailerLite's marketing technology breakthroughs to Google DeepMind's advanced learning algorithms, this masterclass provides a comprehensive understanding of AI's multifaceted potential.
Each session is meticulously crafted to unpack complex technological trends, offering practical insights into implementing AI solutions, navigating ethical considerations, and driving organizational innovation. By bridging theoretical concepts with pragmatic, industry-specific applications, this course empowers participants to become AI-driven innovators who can anticipate, adapt, and lead in an increasingly intelligent technological landscape.

courses.description:
Welcome to our Email Marketing Mastery Course! If you're ready to take your email marketing to the next level, you've come to the right place. In this course, we'll teach you the strategies and techniques you need to create high-performing email campaigns that generate real results for your business.
We understand that time is money, so we've designed this course to be completed in one sitting. With our video and written content, you'll be able to quickly and easily learn everything you need to know to master email marketing. We'll cover the universal laws of copywriting and design that are essential to creating successful email campaigns. We'll also show you how to leverage the DFY (done-for-you) tools available in Klaviyo to streamline your campaigns and automate your email marketing efforts.
But that's not all. By the end of this course, you'll have everything you need to confidently launch and optimize your email communications, including 2 sign-up forms, a master template, at least 2 flows, 2 campaigns, and a campaigns calendar. And with our emphasis on segmentation and automation, you'll be able to save time and effort while maximizing your ROI.
We'll even show you how to leverage AI (artificial intelligence) tools to supercharge your campaigns and optimize your results. By the end of this course, you'll have the skills and knowledge you need to become an email marketing pro and take your business to the next level.
Don't waste any more time or money on ineffective email marketing. Join us today and unlock the power of email marketing for your business!

courses.description:
كورس "كيف تقوم ببيع كورساتك وخدماتك الاستشارية؟ بيزنس معلوماتي #4"
يعلم الكورس المشتركين بما يلي:
أساسيات التسويق للكورسات الأونلاين: يتعلم المشتركون كيفية التسويق لكورساتهم الأونلاين واستراتيجيات جذب الجمهور المستهدف.
تنبؤ الأرباح من الكورسات الأونلاين: يعرف المشتركون كيفية تحليل وتنبؤ الأرباح المتوقعة من الكورسات الأونلاين وتطوير استراتيجيات فعالة لزيادة الإيرادات.
كتابة محتوى إعلاني مميز: يتعلم المشتركون كيفية كتابة محتوى إعلاني جذاب وجذاب يجذب انتباه العملاء المحتملين.
استراتيجيات كتابة محتوى إعلاني ناجح: يتم تقديم سبع استراتيجيات فريدة ومبهرة لكتابة محتوى إعلاني ناجح يتميز عن المنافسة.
أدوات مميزة لمساعدة في كتابة محتوى إعلاني: يتم تزويد المشتركين بأدوات مميزة ومفيدة لمساعدتهم في كتابة محتوى إعلاني فعال.
إنشاء تصميم إعلاني احترافي باستخدام كانفا: يتعلم المشتركون كيفية إنشاء تصميم إعلاني احترافي باستخدام أداة كانفا.
التسويق للكورسات عبر فيس بوك: يتم تعليم المشتركين كيفية إنشاء صفحة على فيس بوك والقيام بإعلانات ممولة لتسويق كورساتهم على الإنترنت.
كيفية تحصيل الأرباح من الكورسات والخدمات الاستشارية: يتم توضيح كيفية تحصيل الأرباح من الكورسات والخدمات الاستشارية وإدارة العمليات المالية المتعلقة بها.
يعتبر هذا الكورس فرصة رائعة للأشخاص الذين يرغبون في بيع كورساتهم وخدماتهم الاستشارية عبر الإنترنت، حيث سيتعلمون الاستراتيجيات والمهارات اللازمة لتحقيق نجاح مالي وتسويق فعال.


فهذا الكورس هو لكل شخص يرغب في اكتساب المعرفة والمهارات اللازمة في مجال معين. سواءً كنت طالبًا أو عاملاً أو محترفًا، يمكنك الاستفادة من هذا الكورس لتعزيز معرفتك وتحقيق أهدافك المهنية والشخصية. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن هذا الكورس يتيح لك فرصة التواصل مع أشخاص آخرين يهتمون بنفس المجال ومشاركة الخبرات والأفكار. ستكون تجربة الدراسة في هذا الكورس ممتعة ومثمرة وستمنحك الثقة لمواصلة تحقيق نجاحك وتطوير مهاراتك في المستقبل.

courses.title: Supply Side Marketing : prenez le marché à l'envers !
courses.bio: Le Supply Side Marketing est un concept innovant dans le domaine du marketing
requirements: Aucune expérience requise, seulement une appétence pour le marketing et la vente, ou une curiosité piquante !
courses.description: Le Supply Side Marketing consiste à partir d'une offre de produit ou service à remonter vers le marché. Il n'est plus seulement question de réaliser une étude de marché pour savoir s'il est possible de proposer une offre. Vous avez un savoir-faire, une idée de commercialisation de produit ou de service sans savoir si votre idée a sa place dans le marché ? Caractérisez vos avantages, vos bénéfices; dégagez les aspects innovants de votre offre, pour positionner votre produit ou service dans son marché dans la différence par rapport à vos concurrents ! Dans ce cours, vous découvrirez ce nouveau concept marketing intégrant des notions de vente. Dans une démarche smarketing, le Supply Side Marketing trouve sa place au centre. Basé sur du concret, ce cours vous permettra d'acquérir les techniques vous permettant d'élaborer un argumentaire de vente convaincant, et de formuler des messages marketing impactant. Dès la fin de ce cours, vous serez incité(e) à pratiquer pour appliquer ce que vous aurez appris et vous aidez à profiter immédiatement de votre découverte marketing. Nous sommes plus souvent habitués à réaliser des études de marché pour ensuite proposer une offre mais cette fois, je vous propose d’en savoir + sur la démarche renversante du Supply Side Marketing qui inverse la donne ! Et si on prenait le marché à l’envers ? À l’inverse ? Et si on partait de votre offre pour la relier au marché; de votre produit ou service pour le connecter au marché ?
target_audience: Commerciaux, marketeurs
Marketeurs
Agences de communication

courses.description:
The new era is requiring the presence more often in the digital world. We spend an important amount of time online for information, shopping, entertainment or work, but many of us, especially youngsters, are not prepared yet to fully take advantage of what the internet and technology is offering in terms of monetization.
It was identified the need of using social media platforms as a paradox not for socializing, but for promoting our creations or business. The essential aspect here is that although the need is high as a lot of businesses are moving online, not many entrepreneurs know how to use the social networks in their advantage. Having a website/platform/ e-shop nowadays is important but knowing how to populate your web to attract costumers is as important as having it.


We're happy and proud to announce the launch of our "Online promotion" MOOC. The course is destined for beginners that want to learn about online promotion and marketing, and is presented via videos, exercises and quizzes.
On top of that, you have the chance to follow the course in English, Romanian and Italian, and you can easily download the manual accompanying the course.
If you ask yourself what are the main topics of the course, here they are:
What is marketing?
The communication in our work
Branding creation
Web Design
Social Media
Content planning
Specialized applications
SEO/SEM
Going live
Web analytics
Crowdfunding
Four common mistakes in digital marketing
The course will increase the knowledge of the learners and will give them the possibility that once finished the course to be able to understand fully the basics of online promotion and have all the plannings ready in case of taking the decision to go on this path.


We hope you enjoy learning and we're looking forward to having you as a student in the other courses we offer too!


This project was funded through the Erasmus+ programme, within the SoundBeatsTime project.
target_audience: Beginners in online promotion
Potential marketers or workers that want to learn more about this topic

courses.title: The 20 Day Fundraising Challenge
courses.bio: A different learning and a different task each day...all to help you raise more and improve your fundraising!
requirements: You should be able to use a PC at a beginner level
You should have about 30 minutes available each day to allow you to watch the video, read the resources and carry out the challenge. These don't need to be consecutive days!
courses.description:
Welcome to the 20-Day Fundraising Challenge!
Over the course of 20 days you'll learn a bunch of new fundraising skills, tricks and tips to help you raise more money. There's a lecture for each day where I'll assign you a task to help you raise more money for your organization. I'll show you the thinking behind it and why it'll work for you!
You'll learn loads about all sorts of fundraising from individuals and companies, using the phone, e-mail, post, social media, video and more! With this course you'll learn loads, raise more, and even have some fun along the way. (*fun not guaranteed)
I recommend you set aside less than an hour each day to watch each lecture and put it in to practice. But of course the beauty of this course is that you can do it all at your own pace...cram it all in to one day or pick it up whenever you have a bit of spare time.
Take this journey with me and you WILL raise more money!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to raise more money for your organization.
Fundraisers who want to broaden their skills.
Any non-profit, charity, event or start-up that wants to increase their fundraising.

requirements: Maîtrise de la Langue : Une bonne compréhension et maîtrise de la langue dans laquelle vous souhaitez rédiger. Cela inclut une solide connaissance de l'orthographe, de la grammaire et de la syntaxe.
Compétences en Communication : De bonnes compétences en communication pour transmettre des idées de manière claire et engageante.

Familiarité avec Internet : Une connaissance de base d'Internet, des moteurs de recherche et des médias sociaux pour une meilleure compréhension des tendances et de la recherche d'informations en ligne.

courses.description:
Bienvenue dans "Rédaction Web Pro : Créez un Contenu Captivant qui Convertit". Cette formation complète est conçue pour vous guider à travers l'ensemble du processus de rédaction web, que vous soyez un débutant cherchant à acquérir des compétences de base ou un rédacteur expérimenté désirant perfectionner son art.
Ce que Vous Apprendrez :
Dès les premiers modules, vous maîtriserez les fondamentaux de la rédaction web, acquérant une compréhension approfondie des principes de base essentiels. Vous découvrirez des techniques avancées pour créer un contenu qui se démarque dès les premières lignes, captivant votre audience de manière unique.
La relation entre SEO et rédaction web n'aura plus de secrets pour vous. Vous apprendrez à optimiser votre contenu pour les moteurs de recherche sans compromettre la qualité, augmentant ainsi la visibilité de vos écrits en ligne.
La section sur la conversion et les appels à l'action (CTA) vous aidera à comprendre comment inciter vos lecteurs à agir, transformant ainsi votre contenu en résultats concrets.
La rédaction persuasive deviendra une de vos compétences clés. Vous développerez la capacité de persuader et d'influencer positivement votre audience, faisant passer vos messages de manière percutante.
Pourquoi Choisir "Rédaction Web Pro" ?
Notre équipe pédagogique est composée de professionnels de l'industrie, des rédacteurs web chevronnés qui partagent leurs connaissances et leur expertise pour vous guider vers l'excellence.
Les exercices pratiques et projets vous permettront de mettre immédiatement en pratique ce que vous apprenez. Vous recevrez un certificat de réussite à la fin du cours, une reconnaissance officielle de vos compétences nouvellement acquises.
Inscrivez-vous dès aujourd'hui pour transformer votre carrière en rédaction web.  Ne manquez pas cette opportunité de devenir un expert en rédaction web.
target_audience: Les aspirants rédacteurs web qui cherchent à perfectionner leurs compétences.
Les entrepreneurs cherchant à créer un contenu en ligne percutant pour leur entreprise.
Les blogueurs et créateurs de contenu désireux d'optimiser l'impact de leurs publications.

courses.title: GAP Model of Service Quality
courses.bio: The course is further divided into 7 modules

Introductory session of the Course GAP M: Introductory session of the Course GAP Model of Service Quality
Module 04 - GAP2 Service design & Standa: Module 04 - GAP2 Service design & Standard Gap

requirements: No prior knowledge is required. Suitable of all kinds of learners and job-seekers. Genuine interest to learn service marketing.
courses.description:
Friends, In today's competitive world every organization is trying hard to capture the attention of their target customer and to satisfy their needs and wants. Therefore it is absolutely imperative to understand customer expectations especially in service industry because it is very difficult to understand the customer expectation and perception of the service they have received because mostly the service are intangible in nature.
Therefore the purpose of the GAP Model of service quality is to identify the Gap between customer expectations & the actual service received by the customer. And it also explains how to close these gaps so that high quality of service can be delivered.
Thus the objective of this course is to make the participants aware with the knowledge of service quality, GAP Model of service quality and to create understanding of how to close the various gaps to achieve high quality service and how to generate customer satisfaction.
The entire course "GAP Model of Service Quality" is divided into 7 Modules
Module 01 : Service & Service Quality
Module 02 : Introduction to GAP model
Module 03 : GAP1 – Listening Gap
Module 04 : GAP2 – Service design & Standard Gap
Module 05 : GAP3 - Service Performance GAP
Module 06 : GAP4 - Communication GAP
Module 07 : GAP5 - Customer GAP


I welcome and invite you all to join this course as I sincerely believe that it will add immense value to your existing knowledge base especially in terms of understanding of service quality, dimensions of service quality, GAPs in service delivery and how to close those gaps to deliver how quality services.


Thank you so much.
target_audience: Management students, management professional and who has genuine interested in learning service marketing

requirements: There are no specific requirements or prerequisites for taking this course. It is suitable for beginners who want to learn how to create viral videos on TikTok using CapCut, as well as for those who already have some video editing experience and wish to enhance their skills. We are ready to guide you on your successful video content creation journey!
courses.description:
Are you ready to create video content that delights, entertains and connects with millions of people on TikTok? This course will transform you from a TikTok newbie to a master of creating viral content!
In this interactive course, you'll learn all the essential skills to plan, film, edit, and publish amazing videos for TikTok using the CapCut video editing app. But that is not all! We'll also cover effective strategies for increasing the visibility of your videos, understanding your audience, and growing your follower base.
Whether you're an aspiring digital influencer, a social media marketer looking to improve your skills, or just someone who wants to have fun creating videos that wow your friends - this course has something for everyone.
With "How to Create Viral TikTok Videos using CapCut", you will:
Confidently navigate the CapCut interface, using its powerful editing tools to turn your ideas into reality.
Plan and execute videos with engaging storytelling, creative humor and TikTok trends.
Apply stunning visual effects, smooth transitions, animated text and attractive soundtrack to your videos.
Learn effective strategies to increase the visibility of your videos and attract more followers on TikTok.
Stay motivated and creative, even when faced with obstacles and challenges.
So, are you ready to become a TikTok star? Sign up now and start your content creation journey with “Mastering TikTok: How to Create Viral Videos with CapCut”!
target_audience: This course is designed for anyone interested in learning how to create viral videos for TikTok using CapCut. It's suitable for beginners who want to acquire video editing skills and content creation strategies, as well as for experienced content creators who wish to refine their techniques and increase their visibility on TikTok. There are no age restrictions or prior experience required. If you're excited to learn and eager to share your talent through creative videos, this course is for you!

courses.bio: Professional Sales to Unconscious Mind كل ما تحتاجه لتضاعف مبيعاتك بمجهود أقل وفي وقت أسرع وبثقة أكبر مع برنامج الدعم
objectives: معرفة طبيعة المبيعات وأهميتها في نجاح الشركات وما هي عناصر النجاح فيها وهل تناسب الجميع وما هي أهمية تعليم المبيعات؟
ما هي التطورات التي حدثت في السوق والمنافسة وفي سلوك العميل وسنقوم بتحليل كيف يفكر عميله، وكيف يأخذ قراره الشرائي وما هي المؤثرات التي تؤثر عليه؟
كيف يرى العميل القيمة في المنتجات والخدمات التي نبيعها وما هو إدراك العميل عنها لكي نستطيع أن نزيد القيمة أكثر من السعر الذي يدفعه وأكثر من القيمة عند المنافسين
ما هي مراحل العملية البيعية وما هي المطلوب منه في كل مرحلة، وكيف يجذب اهتمام عميله ويبني علاقة الثقة في اللحظات الأولى بتركيزه على المفاتيح الرئيسية
يتعلم البائع كيف يقوم بترتيب الأولويات مع العميل بالأسئلة المؤهلة لكي يستطيع أن يفهم احتياجات عميله وظروفه لكي يستطيع أن يقدم العرض المقنع الأنسب للعميل
يتعلم البائع كيف يستخدم التعاون والتعليم لكي يتفاوض ويدير الحوار لكي يخفف المخاوف ويحل اعتراضاته من أفكاره وكلامه وبالتالي يستطيع أن يغلق البيعة بقوة وسلاسة
يتعلم البائع كيف يقيم علاقة ثقة قوية وصحية بينه وبين عميله تجعله يكسب عميلا للعمر يعتمد عليه ويشتري باستمرار وكيف يخطط الأنشطة البيعية لكي يضاعف مبيعاته
يتعلم البائع كيف يزيد من إصراره وحماسه وتركيزه وكيف يمتلك عقلية النمو التي تمكنه من التطور ومواجهة الصعوبات ويزيد طاقته لكي يحقق أقصى نجاح

requirements: لا توجد أي متطلبات مسبقة إلا رغبتك الحقيقية في مضاعفة مبيعاتك
courses.description:
تدريب احتراف المبيعات للعقل اللاواعي
Professional Sales to Unconscious Mind
(هذا التدريب مقدم للمبيعات في كل الصناعات ما عدا العقارات التي يقدم لها تدريب متخصص)

مع التدريب يأتي برنامج الدعم PSU Support الذي نتابع معك فيه كل الصعوبات التي تواجهك في تطبيق التدريب مدى الحياة


هذا التدريب هو خلاصة خبرة 19 سنة في المبيعات والتسويق والاستشارات الإدارية في مصر والسعودية والإمارات وقطر .. لأكثر من 110 شركة وأكثر من 6000 بائع.

تم بناء هذا الكورس على أحدث أبحاث علم الاقتصاد السلوكي Behavioral Economics وعلم التسويق العصبيNeuromarketing وعلم النفس الإدراكي Cognitive Psychology وبناء على الخبرات والنتائج الحقيقية في مضاعفة مبيعات الشركات والأفراد.


وذلك لأننا طورنا نموذج البيع للعقل اللاواعي .. الذي مكننا من فهم الكيفية التي يفكر بها عقل عميلك وكيف يمكنك قراءة أفكاره وكأنها كتاب مفتوح .. وكيف تستخدم أدوات البيع الحديثة لكي تحقق أعلى اقتناع بالقيمة التي تقدمها وتبني علاقة ثقةقوية وعقلية النجاح التي تمكنك من مضاعفة المبيعات في وقت أسرع وبمجهود أقل وبثقة أكبر في كل خطوة.

بداية من فهم العميل بتحليل طريقة تفكيره .. ونبدأ بجذب الاهتمام من أول تعامل مع العميل .. عن طريق استخدام الأسلوب والكلمات ونبرة الصوت ولغة الجسم .. ثم الأسئلة المؤهلة التي نعرف بها ما هي احتياجات العميل وظروفه .. لكي نقدم العرض الأنسب للعميل .. ونقوم بالتفاوض وحل الاعتراضات من أفكاره هو والمتابعة الصحيحة لكي نغلق المبيعات في الوقت المناسب ونكسب عميل مستمر .. وتتعلم كيف تخطط ما تفعله كبياع لكي تتخطى التارجت .. وتعلم كيف تفكر كبياع وكيف تتخلص من العادات الفكرية السيئة وتمتلك عقلية النجاح لكي تضاعف من مبيعاتك ونجاحك
target_audience: الذين يرغبون في الدخول في مجال المبيعات
المبتدئين في مجال المبيعات ويريدون الاحتراف في المجال
المحترفين الذين يريدون مضاعفة مبيعاتهم
كل من يتعامل مع عميل بشكل مباشر
كل من يريد أن يعرف أكثر عن مجال المبيعات وكيفية تحقيق النجاح فيه
هذا التدريب ليس متخصصا في العقارات لأن المبيعات العقارية لها تدريب آخر
هذا التدريب لا يغطي مواضيع إدارة المبيعات لأن لها تدريب آخر

courses.title: 【한글자막】 인바운드 마케팅: 콘텐츠 마케팅, KPI 및 구글 애널리틱스 마스터하기
courses.bio: 콘텐츠 마케팅을 통한 인바운드 마케팅. KPI 올바르게 설정하고, 올해 KPI 및 성장률 모니터링에 구글 애널리틱스 활용하기
objectives: 오늘날 가장 효과적인 마케팅 전략중 하나인 ‘인바운드 마케팅’을 학습하여 나의 사업에 적용하기
‘쉽게 찾을 수 있는’ 콘텐츠 제작 학습을 통해 자연스러운 트래픽 확보하기
핵심성과지표(KPI) 올바른 사용 방법 및 KPI 모니터링을 위한 구글 애널리틱스 학습하기
전환율 및 관심도가 매우 높은 나의 사업 유형 검색 트래픽 확보하기

인바운드 마케팅 강의 소개: 인바운드 마케팅 유형과 경쟁이라는 도전 과제
고객들은 무엇을 검색하고 어떤 콘텐츠를 원하는가? 무엇을 만들어야 하는가?
창작 콘텐츠의 가치 극대화를 위한 콘텐츠 리퍼포징(repurposing)
인바운드 마케팅의 위험과 여러 가지 리스크
실제 비즈니스 사례와 경쟁에서 이기기 위한 전략
핵심성과지표(KPI)와 구글 애널리틱스(Google Analytics): 강력한 수익 창출을 위한 고객획득비용 및 고객생애가치 및 실제 사례
구글 애널리틱스에서의 사용자 정보 탐색 경로 흐름
구글 애널리틱스 내 트래픽 품질 및 부차적인 측정 지표
이메일을 통한 등록 vs. 지금 판매하기 중 전환 경로 선택하기
‘구매’로 이어지지 않는 이유 티셔츠 사례로 알아보기
사용자 워밍의 단계: 실제 비즈니스에서 고객 끌어들이기-고객과 마주하기-고객 만족의 사례
콘텐츠의 생애 주기: 콘텐츠의 생애 주기: 목표, 개선, 홍보
‘고객 유치 및 온보딩’ 입문하기: 검색 엔진 결과 페이지(Search Engine Results Page, SERP) 및 전환
기존 타이틀/부제와 우리의 타이틀/부제 비교하기 및 직접 만들기 활동
이메일을 통한 리드 워밍: 실제로 리드를 유인할 수 있는 첫 자동 응답 메일
헬륨 10(Helium 10)으로 만든 좋은 자동 응답 메일 사례
추가 요령: 나의 비즈니스에 관심 있는 고객들이 나의 비즈니스를 홍보하도록 만드는 ‘인용 전략(quotables strategy)’
심화 강의: 나의 비즈니스 제휴 프로그램 만들기
심화 강의: 브랜딩, 세일즈, SEO 부스트를 위한 이미지 SEO 전략

requirements: 본 강의 수강을 위해 필요한 요건은 없습니다.
누구나 수강하실 수 있습니다. (본 강의 수강을 위해 필요한 요건은 특별히 없습니다.)
courses.description:
가장 열렬한 고객층을 확보할 수 있는 인바운드 마케팅 전략 알아보기
사업에서 가장 중요한 기준을 인식하고 측정화하는 KPI(핵심성과지표) 식별하기
중요한 데이터 포인트를 분석 모니터링 할 수있는 구글 애널리틱스 사용법 알아보기


여러분의 사이트나 제품에 대하여 최고의 리드와 가장 열렬한 고객층을 확보할 수 있도록 ‘인바운드 마케팅 전략 사용 방법’을 배워 보세요.
그리고 나서, 모니터링 및 개선 작업을 위한 올바른 핵심성과지표(Key Performance Indicators, KPI)를 확인하고 설정할 수 있는 데이터 기반 접근 방식, ‘구글 애널리틱스(Google Analytics)’를 사용하여 여러분의 웹사이트에서 해당 리드가 어떻게 행동하는지 모니터링 해보세요.

[인바운드 마케팅이 좋은 이유]
리드는 ‘수동적인 방식’으로 여러분의 제품이나 사이트를 찾습니다. 하지만 인바운드 마케팅을 통해 여러분은 자신의 사업을 적극적으로 홍보하실 필요가 없기 때문에 콘텐츠를 추가로 만들거나, 사업의 다른 부분에 더욱 집중할 수 있는 시간이 늘어나죠.


[KPI란?]
KPI는 ‘주요 성과 지표’를 뜻합니다. 이 지표들은 여러분이 여러분의 사업에서 가장 중요한 것으로 인식하는 측정 기준입니다. 만약 여러분이 여러분의 KPI를 정확하게 식별하여 집중 향상시켰다면, 여러분의 사업 또한 잘 성장할 수 있습니다.


[‘구글 애널리틱스’를 통한 데이터 기반 접근법]
KPI를 설정했다면 지속적으로 모니터링해야 합니다. 대부분의 개인과 기업에서는 KPI 측정을 위해 분석 소프트웨어를 사용하는데요. 가장 흔하게 사용되는 분석 소프트웨어는 ‘구글 애널리틱스’입니다. 본 강의에서는 여러분의 웹사이트에서 일어나고 있는 일을 정확히 알 수 있도록 여러분이 설정한 KPI와 가장 중요한 데이터 포인트를 모니터링하기 위해 구글 애널리틱스를 올바르게 활용하는 방법에 대해 확인해 볼 겁니다.


빠르게 응답하고 학생들을 신경 쓰는 강사: 어디서도 볼 수 없는 학생 지원]
질문이 있으실 때마다 제가 항상 여기 대기하고 있다는 걸 기억하세요! 저는 24시간 내로 학생들의 질문 중 99%에 대한 답변을 완료하고 있습니다. 많은 학생들이 응답이 없는 선생님들에 대해 이야기하곤 하죠. 하지만, 저는 다음과 같은 이유로 빠르게 응답해 줍니다.
1) 제 학생들을 신경 쓰고,
2) 학생들이 이 강의에서 얻을 수 있는 수익을 모두 얻어갈 수 있기를 바라기 때문이죠.


**강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 내용을 남겨 주세요. 그래야 상세한 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)

requirements: Dentist intending to start own Dental Practice.
courses.description:
What will New Dentists be able to do after this Course:
This Course will help new Dentists to start their own Dental Practice within three months; even if they have lack of practical experience or financial restraints.
In this Course I have explained how to overcome the most common obstacles faced by new Dentists and ensure desired patients right from the day one of their Practice.
This Course will also help new Dentists to gather all the information essential for starting their own Dental Practice at a location they desire; in the City of their choice.
If Students go through this Course in a step by step manner, they will have clear idea about all the 'and Don'ts of Private Practice, and have enough confidence to start their own Dental Practice within three months from now.
Why Three Months and Not Less or More:
Most Dentists who have experience, confidence and financial resource, usually skip the steps mentioned in this Course and start their practice. However, in most cases they land up with an undesired "Long Waiting Period".
They get easily lured by Companies who deal with Social Media and Digital Marketing.
On the other hand, with this Course, if taken seriously, Dentists can get desired patients right from day one of their Practice; without any separate marketing expenses.
Three months period after deciding to start your own Practice; is essential to do proper planning, choosing right location and to build practice faster than their competitors.
Approximately one month is required to decide on the type of clientele.
Second month is required for choosing suitable location for the Practice.
And, Third month is essential for finishing the interior and informing all the persons whom they had met earlier, about starting of their own Practice.
And all along, if students keep meeting people as explained in the Course, they will develop enough contacts for getting desired Patients right from the day one of their Practice.
This method works.
Period of more than three months, may possibly lead to change in circumstances and situations, requiring the Dentist to think fresh..
This Course will not make Dentist a perfect Marketing Person
This Course is designed only to remove all the fears of Dentists and to give practical ideas for actually starting their own Dental Practice, even without sufficient clinical experience or finance to begin with.
I will be having separate Course on "Marketing Your Dental Practice" designed for Practising Dentists, which aims at improving marketing and communication skills like, Presenting Treatment Plan, Handling Objections, Understanding Patient Psychology, Staff management and much more.
This Course will be essential to develop and sharpen the skills of marketing as a continuous process for ensuring consistency in successful practice.
This Course will reach its perfection only if -
This Course will reach its perfection, only if students give their feedback and ask as many questions as they come across..
I will do my best to give solutions for all of them, or add relevant videos to help Dentists further in starting their own Dental Practice.
So, Join Now and Start Planning Your Own Dental Practice, three months from now.
target_audience: This Course is for Dentists who are unable to start their own Dental Practice due to lack of practical experience or having financial restraints.

courses.title: How to write better copy
courses.bio: The five factors that separate average copy from great copy
requirements: You should be tasked with writing marketing copy for your business and want to make it as effective as you can
courses.description:
Copywriting is salesmanship in print. Get it right and you’ve got a powerful tool that will bring people flocking to your business. Get it wrong and it doesn’t matter how good your product or service is, it’ll never sell as well as it deserves to.


In this course I’ll teach you the five key factors that make the difference between average copy and great copy. It will give you the tools – and the confidence – you need to transform your marketing materials and grow your sales.


In part one, we look at the importance of understanding your target market in writing great copy. In part two we look at the concept of features and benefits in writing copy that will appeal to your target market. In part three we consider how to plan your copy for best results. In part four we unlock the most famous copywriting formula and see how it works. And in the fifth and final part we discover the value of proofreading.


This course is perfect for business owners who love what they do but somehow can’t translate that to paper. It’s also ideal for marketing executives who have copywriting in their job description but get the jitters every time they open Word.
target_audience: Business owners who love what they do but somehow can’t translate that to paper
Marketing executives who have copywriting in their job description but get the jitters every time they open Word

requirements: 活动部门工作人员
courses.description:
埋头苦干准备了很久的活动，现场执行还是出现很多问题？面对上百种物料，在材质、工艺、费用方面不懂最优化选择？对灯光、音响等舞美设备的型号和功能特点缺乏专业认知？想要实现从活动执行到项目总控的跨越，却不知如何发力？被执行工作埋没，找不到适合自己的人脉资源圈子和学习渠道？这些问题你是否也曾遇到却不知所措？
为此，三节课邀请了具有超过十年会议活动行业从业经历的国家高级音响师邓兴带来本门课程。
本课程把活动项目执行当中的各类重要环节，通过巧妙拆解，按照物理空间划分为十大模块并建立“活动空间模块思维”。同时以人员、物料、流程三大关键要素为纵坐标，以前、中、后的时间线为横坐标，独创出执行九宫格作为执行的“神兵利器”，涵盖所有重要的执行节点，不管是项目中的人员管理、物料搭建，还是流程解析，都能让你在活动项目执行的“荣耀峡谷”中轻松五杀，所向披靡。通过系统性学习活动执行的思维模型和各项技能，拓宽你的执行边界，帮你从活动执行跨越到项目总控，迈向项目专业化管理的新高度，从此驰骋于活动执行的“战场”。
target_audience: 1.各类活动公司0-3年经验的 “萌新”执行人员 2.各行业主办方活动负责人 3.各类活动项目管理人 4.提供活动服务类公司项目负责人、培训负责人

objectives: Conocer y entender qué es el neuromarketing. Conocer modernas técnicas de comunicación corporativa: neuromarketing, marketing sensorial, psicomarketing.

El Momento Cero de la Verdad: ¿Qué es el momento cero de la verdad?
¿Cómo descubrir el momento cero de la verdad?
El \"por qué\" de las cosas: La Teoría de la Comunicación Efectiva
Los verbos y frases que más incitan a la acción
Conclusión: ¿Cómo obtengo mi certificado del Leadership and Innovation Business Academy?

requirements: Especial interés por el marketing y la publicidad.
courses.description:
¿Cómo toman decisiones los consumidores? ¿A qué hacemos caso, y cómo nuestras respuestas iniciales predicen nuestras decisiones finales? ¿Hasta qué punto son estos procesos inconscientes? Este taller le proporcionará una introducción a algunos de los métodos más básicos en los campos emergentes de la neurociencia del consumidor y el neuromarketing.
Objetivo general
Aprender de un modo práctico qué es el neuromarketing y cómo construir estrategias comerciales ganadoras que acerquen a los clientes a su negocio.
Objetivos específicos
Conocer y entender qué es el neuromarketing.
Conocer modernas técnicas de comunicación corporativa: neuromarketing, marketing sensorial, psicomarketing.
Algunos de los temas tratados en este curso:
• Qué es Neuromarketing.
• El por qué de las cosas.
• Cómo funciona el cerebro.
• Tres niveles cerebrales.
• Las emociones en la toma de decisiones.
• El círculo de oro.
• Los colores, los olores y los sonidos.
• El 95% de nuestras decisiones.
• Creando fidelidad del consumidor.
• Apelando a las emociones.
• Apelando a los sentimientos.
• Neuromarketing en la web.
• Aplicando Neuromarketing a mi estrategia de marketing digital.
• Lenguaje no verbal.
• El comportamiento humano.
• Aplicaciones del neuromarketing.
Al finalizar el programa obtienes DOBLE certificación: certificado de Udemy y certificado del Leadership and Innovation Business Academy.
target_audience: Publicistas, mercadeólogos, periodistas, empresarios y emprendedores.

courses.bio: Master rural marketing strategies from segmentation to implementation for effective penetration and sustainable growth.
objectives: Basic concepts and phases of rural marketing. Understanding the rural marketing model and its framework.

Throughout the course, students will gain comprehensive insights into rural marketing concepts, strategies, and practices

requirements: No requirements for this course. If you wish to pursue a career in this field, then it is the utmost necessity that you should have a willingness to work in the rural areas to get to know about the challenges and also learn from it.
courses.description:
Welcome to the comprehensive course on Rural Marketing! In this course, we will explore the dynamic landscape of marketing in rural areas, where unique challenges and opportunities abound.
Rural markets present a distinct set of characteristics and consumer behaviors that require specialized knowledge and strategies for effective marketing. Throughout this course, we will delve deep into the fundamentals of rural marketing, covering topics such as market segmentation, consumer behavior, product development, branding, retailing, and much more.
Whether you're a seasoned marketing professional looking to expand your expertise or a newcomer eager to understand the nuances of rural marketing, this course is designed to provide you with the essential knowledge and skills needed to succeed in this rapidly evolving field.
Through a combination of theoretical concepts, practical case studies, and real-world examples, you will gain valuable insights into the intricacies of rural markets and learn how to develop strategic marketing plans tailored to meet the needs of rural consumers and businesses.
Join us on this enriching journey as we uncover the secrets to unlocking the vast potential of rural markets and making a meaningful impact in rural communities. Let's embark on this exciting adventure together and explore the fascinating world of Rural Marketing!
Section 1: Introduction
This section provides students with a fundamental understanding of rural marketing by introducing basic concepts and phases. It lays the groundwork for further exploration into the intricacies of marketing in rural areas.
Section 2: Rural Marketing A Conceptual Framework
Here, students delve into the theoretical framework of rural marketing. They explore models and theories specific to rural markets, such as the 4As framework, and learn to differentiate between rural and urban markets. Understanding rural consumer behavior and market dynamics is crucial for developing effective marketing strategies.
Section 3: Rural Market Introduction And Segmentation
In this section, students learn about the unique characteristics of rural markets, including income distribution, consumption patterns, and segmentation variables. They explore various approaches to segmentation and how they can be applied to target specific segments within rural areas.
Section 4: Rural Marketing Research
Students are introduced to the concept of rural marketing research, its evolution, and the tools and methodologies used to gather insights into rural consumer behavior and preferences. They also learn about the challenges associated with conducting research in rural settings and the role of consulting agencies in providing valuable market intelligence.
Section 5: Rural Consumer Behavior
This section focuses on understanding the behavior of rural consumers, including their roles, influences, and lifestyle. By analyzing rural consumption trends, students gain insights into the factors driving purchasing decisions in rural markets.
Section 6: Rural Marketing Mix & New Product Development
Students explore the elements of the rural marketing mix, such as product, price, place, and promotion, and learn how to develop effective marketing strategies tailored to rural audiences. Additionally, they gain an understanding of the stages involved in new product development and how to navigate them in the context of rural markets.
Section 7: Product Life Cycle & Brand Management In Rural Market
Here, students learn about the product life cycle stages and the strategies associated with each stage, focusing on rural market dynamics. They also explore brand management principles and the role of brand loyalty in building successful rural brands.
Section 8: Rural Retailing
This section covers the intricacies of rural retailing, including channel management strategies and the opportunities and challenges associated with organized retailing in rural areas. Case studies of successful rural retail ventures provide practical insights into effective retail strategies.
Section 9: Marketing Strategies For Indian Rural Market
Students delve into specific marketing strategies tailored for the Indian rural market. They learn how to segment the market effectively, develop competitive strategies, and design product, pricing, communication, and distribution strategies suited to rural consumers' needs and preferences.
Section 10: Rural Marketing Of FMCGs
In this section, students explore the unique characteristics of Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCGs) in the rural market context. They analyze the challenges of penetrating rural markets and study case examples of successful FMCG brands' strategies in rural areas.
Section 11: Rural Marketing Of Financial Services
Students examine the marketing strategies employed by banks and insurance companies to cater to rural consumers' financial needs. Case studies provide insights into the challenges and opportunities associated with marketing financial services in rural areas.
Section 12: Marketing Of Agricultural Inputs & Produce
This section focuses on marketing strategies for agricultural inputs such as tractors, fertilizers, and agrochemicals, as well as agricultural produce. Students learn about the challenges unique to these sectors and explore strategies to overcome them.
Section 13: E-Rural Marketing & E-Governance For Rural India
The final section explores the role of technology in rural marketing and governance. Students examine case studies of successful e-rural marketing initiatives and e-governance projects aimed at empowering rural communities and driving economic development.
target_audience: Marketing professionals seeking to enhance their understanding and skills in rural marketing.
Business owners and entrepreneurs aiming to expand their market reach into rural areas.
Students and researchers interested in studying rural market dynamics and consumer behavior.
Professionals working in industries such as FMCG, agriculture, finance, and retail, where knowledge of rural marketing is essential.
Government officials and policymakers involved in rural development initiatives requiring insights into rural marketing strategies.
Consultants and advisors offering marketing services to businesses targeting rural consumers.
Individuals aspiring to pursue careers in rural marketing, market research, or related fields.
Overall, anyone keen on understanding the unique challenges, opportunities, and strategies associated with marketing products and services in rural areas would find this course valuable.

courses.description:
Master Course : Marketing for Startups, Nonprofits, B2B and B2C
Embark on a comprehensive journey through the dynamic landscape of modern marketing with our in-depth course, designed to equip you with essential skills and strategies. Starting with Module 1, "Introduction to Marketing Strategies," you'll delve into foundational concepts such as market segmentation, where you'll explore demographic, psychographic, behavioral, and geographic segmentation strategies through real-world case studies. You'll master the art of setting SMART marketing objectives aligned with business goals, ensuring your efforts are Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound. Additionally, you'll uncover the critical role of marketing research, learning to conduct qualitative and quantitative analyses and perform competitive assessments to inform strategic decisions.
Moving into Module 2, "Digital Marketing Fundamentals," you'll immerse yourself in the realm of digital outreach. From optimizing websites for SEO success to crafting compelling social media strategies across various platforms, you'll gain practical insights into content planning, PPC advertising, and leveraging tools for SEO metrics and ROI analysis. Whether you're navigating Google Ads or managing campaigns on social media, you'll acquire the skills to drive digital engagement and enhance brand visibility effectively.
In Module 3, "Content Marketing and Branding," you'll explore the nuances of brand identity development and content strategy formulation. From defining brand positioning to creating diverse content types such as blogs, videos, and infographics, you'll learn to deploy these assets across strategic distribution channels. Gain expertise in influencer and affiliate marketing, where you'll identify key industry influencers, negotiate partnerships, and measure campaign impact to maximize brand reach and engagement.
Throughout the course, you'll also delve into customer relationship management (CRM) strategies in Module 4, master marketing analytics and A/B testing in Module 5, explore tailored marketing approaches for different industries in Module 6, and address legal and ethical considerations in Module 7. By the conclusion of Module 8, "Strategic Marketing Planning and Execution," you'll be equipped to develop comprehensive marketing plans, execute integrated campaigns, and evaluate success metrics, ensuring you can drive impactful marketing initiatives in any organizational context.
Whether you're a marketing professional seeking to enhance your skills or an aspiring marketer aiming to enter the field, this course provides a robust foundation in contemporary marketing strategies, empowering you to navigate the complexities of today's competitive market with confidence and expertise. Join us and embark on a transformative learning experience that will propel your career forward in the dynamic world of marketing.
In this master course, I would like to teach the 8 major topics:
Module 1: Introduction to Marketing Strategies
Module 2: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
Module 3: Content Marketing and Branding
Module 4: Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
Module 5: Marketing Analytics and Measurement
Module 6: Marketing Strategies for Different Industries
Module 7: Legal and Ethical Considerations in Marketing
Module 8: Strategic Marketing Planning and Execution
Enroll now and Learn today !

تصميم وإدارة قنوات التسويق والتوزيع - الجزء الثاني

requirements: لمستوى المبتدئين وطلبة التسويق
courses.description:
ما هو نظام القنوات التسويقية؟ وما المقصود بشبكة القيمة؟ وما الوظائف الأساسية التي تؤديها هذه القنوات؟
في الكورس الأول من هذه المجموعة، سنسلّط الضوء على واحد من أهم الجوانب العملية في علم التسويق: القنوات التسويقية (Marketing Channels)، ودورها المحوري في نقل القيمة من الشركة إلى العميل.
سنتناول بالتفصيل:
· كيفية تصميم القنوات التسويقية وتخطيطها بشكل استراتيجي.
· القرارات التي يجب على الشركة اتخاذها لإدارة هذه القنوات بكفاءة.
· كيف يمكن للشركات تحقيق تكامل وتناغم بين مختلف القنوات التسويقية وإدارتها بصورة فعالة لتعزيز تجربة العميل وزيادة العائد.
كما سنناقش المفاهيم المرتبطة بالتجارة الإلكترونية (E-Commerce)، والتجارة عبر الهواتف المحمولة (M-Commerce)، والأسس التي يقوم عليها نجاح هذه القنوات في العصر الرقمي.
التركيز الأكبر في الكورس الثاني من هذه المجموعة سيكون على قنوات البيع، وعلى وجه الخصوص: قنوات التجزئة (Retailing)، باعتبارها نقطة الاتصال المباشرة مع المستهلك النهائي.
فهي تمثّل "لحظة الحقيقة"، المرحلة التي تظهر فيها نتائج كافة جهود التسويق والتخطيط الاستراتيجي.
في هذه اللحظة، يتم البيع الفعلي، وتتحدد الأسعار، ودرجة التنافس، وموقع العلامة التجارية في ذهن العميل.
سنتعرّف على تطوّر التجزئة الحديثة وكيف أسهمت التكنولوجيا في تعزيز تجربة المستهلك، وزيادة المبيعات والربحية، رغم التحديات التي يشهدها قطاع التجزئة عالميًا بسبب عوامل اقتصادية وسلوكية وتقنية متنوعة.
كما سنناقش:
· دور التسويق في تعزيز التميز عند نقطة الالتقاء مع العميل.
· مفهوم العلامات الخاصة (Private Labels) التي تصنعها المتاجر لحسابها.
· تجارة الجملة، ودورها في سلسلة التوزيع.
· الأسس الحديثة في اللوجستيات وكيفية إدارتها بكفاءة لخلق ميزة تنافسية.
هذا الكورس يُعد مرجعًا مهمًا لأي شخص يعمل في التسويق، المبيعات، التوزيع، أو إدارة المنتجات، لأنه يُقدّم تصورًا عمليًا متكاملًا حول كيفية إيصال القيمة للعميل من خلال قنوات بيع فعّالة ومتكاملة.


هذه هي الدورات رقم (١٥ – ١٦) من أصل 20 دورة في دبلومة "التسويق الشامل"، يمكنك الإشتراك في هذا الكورس أو الإستفادة بسعر مخفض على الدبلومة المتكاملة (٢٠ كورس) بسعر مخفض جداً




محتويات الكورس رقم ١٥ (الأول من هذه المجموعة):




Marketing Channels and Value Networks القنوات التسويقية وشبكات القيمة
The Role of Marketing Channels دور القنوات التسويقية
Channel-Design تصميم القناة التسويقية
Channel-Management Decisions قرارات إدارة القناة
Channel Integration and Systems تكامل القناة والأنظمة
Conflict, Cooperation, and Competition التعارض والتعاون والمنافسة


محتويات الكورس رقم ١٦ (الثاني من هذه المجموعة):






The Modern Retail Environment منظومة التجزئة الحديثة
Key Retailing Decisions القرارات الرئيسية في عملية التجزئة
Managing Omnichannel Retailing إدارة القنوات المتعددة للتجزئة
Managing Private Labels إدارة العلامات التجارية الخاصة
Wholesaling تجارة الجملة
Case Study – UNIQLO دراسة حالة عن براند يوني كلو
target_audience: كل طلبة التسويق اللي محتاجين منهج شامل ومفصل مدعوم بالخبرة العملية ... كل العاملين في مجال التسويق .. كل أصحاب الشركات ورواد الأعمال وأصحاب المشاريع ... كل اللي مهتم بالمبيعات ... وكل اللي مهتم إنه يغير مساره الوظيفي.

courses.title: B2B Marketing: Customer Journeys and Go-to-Market Strategy
courses.bio: Enhance the communication of your value proposition, while improving your marketing ROI, CX, and customer satisfaction.
objectives: Customer Journey and Benefits: Learn what constitutes a customer journey and why is it important to improve lead generation, win rate, and web optimization.
Go-to-Market Strategy: Develop impactful go-to-market strategies from customer journey discovery and insights.
Using Voice of the Customer (VOC) to Discover Customer Journeys: Get an interview and survey guide to uncover customer journey insights.
Metrics to Measure Go-to-Market Success: Use suitable metrics for every stage of the customer journey to evaluate go-to-market success.
Using Data Analytics to Uncover Journey Insights: Improve your lead conversion rates and make your lead qualification or lead screening more customer-friendly.
Optimal Marketing and Sales: Understand why seamless alignment of marketing and sales to customer journeys is critical for successful go-to-market strategies.

Using Data Analytics for Customer Journe: Analysis of Marketing and Sales Funnel Data
Using Statistical Data Analytics to Remove Customer Journey Hurdles
Go-to-Market Insights and Success Storie: Insights and Success Stories Based on Real-World Examples

requirements: Basic knowledge about marketing concepts
Microsoft Excel
courses.description:
Are Your Marketing and Sales Aligned to Your Customers' Journeys?
Drive customer intimacy by transforming your "Placement" Marketing P to provide ease of information "Access" to customers during their research and decision-making journey. Learn why customer journeys are important, how voice of the customer (VOC) and data analytics can be great tools to discover customer journey insights, and why it's critical to have your go-to-market strategy informed by customer journey inputs.
Quickly learn practical and useful customer journey concepts, based on real-world examples, to help you get started quickly. As an added bonus, get a PDF guide to help you get started with conducting VOC for customer journeys. Also, get spreadsheet-based analyses to help you deploy data analytics to discover journey insights.
This small investment in example-based learning can improve the communication of your value proposition, while enhancing customer experience and satisfaction. Imagine improving your lead generation and win rates while delighting the customer! Wouldn't that make you the marketing genius in your team?
This course is a part of the ValuZition B2B Marketing Specialization to transform your marketing strategy with customer intimacy and data-driven decision making. Learn practical and useful B2B marketing concepts, based on real-world examples, from an accomplished marketing leader. Get tools that can improve your company's revenue growth, profitability, marketing ROI, and CX. Below is a summary of the courses in the Specialization and their outcomes.
1. Leading with Customer Applications: Learn how to engage with customers earlier in their journey to generate influence and preference for your products later in their journey. Trigger your customers to move from status-quo and prefer your solutions over your competitors' by focusing on their jobs-to-be-done and pain points.
2. Strategic Messaging Using Value Proposition Design: Differentiate your products and solutions by focusing on customer outcomes. Increase the impact of your B2B Marketing messaging, copy, content, and sales enablement tools.
3. Customer Segmentation Strategies and Models: Deploy the "Jobs-to-be-done" framework to add strategic depth to your segmentation model. Uncover opportunities for revenue growth, go-to-market optimization, product development, and pricing optimization by discovering and targeting attractive customer segments.
4. Customer Journey and Go-to-market Strategy: Learn why customer journeys are important, how voice of the customer and data analytics can be great tools to discover customer journey insights, and why it's critical to have your go-to-market strategy is informed by customer journey inputs.
5. Pricing Management to Drive Revenue and Margin Growth: Transform your B2B Pricing Strategy from Price to Value. Explore new Pricing Strategies and learn how to effectively use Pricing as a Revenue and Margin Management tool. Learn fast, apply faster from real-world examples and spreadsheet-based analysis tools.
target_audience: Marketing Communications, Digital Marketing, Product Marketing, Marketing Operations professionals and leaders in the B2B domain.
Professionals new to B2B Marketing

courses.description:
FluentCRM y Amazon SES: Email Marketing Efectivo y Económico" es un curso imprescindible para quienes buscan dominar el marketing por correo electrónico de manera efectiva y a bajo costo. Este programa integral abarca desde los fundamentos de FluentCRM, una herramienta poderosa para la gestión de relaciones con clientes, hasta el uso experto de Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) para el envío masivo de emails.


Aprenderás a instalar y configurar FluentCRM junto con Fluent Forms y FluentSMTP, piezas clave en la creación de una estrategia de marketing efectiva. Descubrirás cómo agregar y validar tu dominio en Amazon SES, establecer notificaciones, y crear usuarios específicos para esta plataforma. El curso profundiza en las diferencias entre los correos transaccionales y de marketing, y te enseña a manejar el escritorio de FluentCRM, crear e importar contactos, y utilizar etiquetas y listas para una segmentación precisa.


Además, este curso te guiará a través de los ajustes generales de FluentCRM, la creación de formularios y campañas, tanto simples como recurrentes, y el desarrollo de secuencias de correos y plantillas atractivas. Aprenderás a manejar todos tus correos electrónicos eficientemente y a automatizar procesos para maximizar el impacto de tus campañas. Por último, pero no menos importante, el curso cubre la generación de reportes detallados para que puedas medir y optimizar tus estrategias de email marketing.


Este curso es una oportunidad única para aquellos que desean impulsar su negocio utilizando las últimas herramientas y técnicas en email marketing, todo esto con una inversión mínima.
target_audience: Emprendedores que quieren empezar a usar el email marketing para hacer crecer su negocio.

courses.title: 品牌营销经典理论和工具：大卫･奥格威”品牌形象至上”观点
courses.bio: 以史为鉴，可以知兴亡
objectives: 理论素养的提升：你将深入理解大卫·奥格威的品牌形象至上理论，以及品牌定位的核心概念和工具。这将增强你的品牌营销理论素养，为你在品牌营销领域的实践提供坚实的理论基础。
实践能力的提升：通过课程中的案例分析，你将学会如何将品牌营销理论应用于实际情境中，提升你的品牌营销实践能力。你将能够更准确地识别市场机会，制定有效的品牌策略，并评估和优化营销效果。
创新思维的培养：本课程将激发你对品牌营销领域的创新思维，帮助你跳出传统框架，探索新的品牌营销策略和工具。你将学会如何运用差异化思维来塑造独特的品牌形象，从而在竞争激烈的市场中脱颖而出。
职业竞争力的增强：无论你是品牌营销从业者、企业管理人员还是创业者，本课程的学习都将显著提升你的职业竞争力。你将能够更自信地应对工作中的品牌营销挑战，为企业创造更大的价值。

课程内容: 2.1品牌定位理论和工具
2.2品牌定位理论和工具
3.1品牌形象至上案例
3.2品牌形象至上案例

requirements: 无经验
courses.description:
在当今竞争激烈的商业环境中，品牌已成为企业脱颖而出的关键。但许多企业在塑造和推广品牌形象时，常陷入同质化困境，难以吸引消费者注意。行业现状迫切需要新的理论指导和实践案例来启发创新思维。
本课程《品牌营销经典理论和工具：大卫･奥格威“品牌形象至上”观点》针对品牌营销领域的工作痛点，深入解析大卫·奥格威的品牌形象至上理论。通过课前秀引入品牌形象差异化的重要性，结合品牌定位理论和工具，以及白象方便面等实际案例分析，帮助学员掌握如何构建独一无二的品牌形象。
学习本课程，你将获得突破品牌营销瓶颈的钥匙，学会运用经典理论指导实践，打造具有差异化竞争优势的品牌。无论你是品牌营销从业者还是企业管理人员，这门课都将是你提升品牌影响力的必备之选。
这门课 对于企业或品牌的价值
对于企业或品牌而言，《品牌营销经典理论和工具：大卫･奥格威“品牌形象至上”观点》这门课程具有极高的价值。
在当今市场环境中，消费者面临的选择日益增多，企业和品牌要想在竞争中脱颖而出，就必须具备独特的品牌形象。本课程通过深入解析大卫·奥格威的品牌形象至上理论，为企业提供了一套塑造和推广独特品牌形象的方法论。
通过学习本课程，企业或品牌能够更好地理解品牌定位的核心要素，掌握如何通过品牌形象塑造来吸引和留住消费者。这将有助于提升企业或品牌的知名度和美誉度，进而增强市场竞争力，实现商业成功。
为什么跟这位讲师学这门课
选择跟随本课程讲师学习《品牌营销经典理论和工具：大卫･奥格威“品牌形象至上”观点》，是因为讲师具备深厚的品牌营销理论知识和丰富的实践经验。
讲师不仅深入研究大卫·奥格威的品牌形象至上理论，还结合多个实际案例，能够将这些经典理论生动地呈现给学员，帮助学员更好地理解和掌握。同时，讲师还能够根据当前市场环境的变化，为学员提供前沿的品牌营销策略和思路，使学员能够紧跟市场趋势，不断提升自己的品牌营销能力。
此外，讲师的授课风格亲切、生动，能够激发学员的学习兴趣，帮助学员在轻松愉快的氛围中掌握品牌营销的核心知识和技能。因此，选择跟随本课程讲师学习，将是你提升品牌营销能力的明智之选。
target_audience: 品牌营销从业者：包括品牌经理、市场策划、广告创意人员等，这些人员在日常工作中需要不断接触和应用品牌营销理论，本课程将为他们提供系统的理论学习和实践指导。
企业管理人员：企业高管、部门经理等，他们需要了解品牌形象对企业整体战略的重要性，以及如何通过有效的品牌营销手段提升企业价值。
创业者与中小企业主：初创企业和中小企业往往面临资源有限的挑战，本课程将帮助他们理解如何通过精准的品牌定位和有效的品牌形象塑造，在市场中赢得竞争优势。
市场营销专业学生：相关专业的学生可以通过本课程学习经典的品牌营销理论，了解行业动态，为未来的职业发展打下坚实基础。

courses.title: Komunikasi yang Tepat di Posisi Krisis
courses.bio: Komunikasi yang Tepat di Posisi Krisis
objectives: Memahami konsep krisis dan penyebab terjadinya krisis dalam perusahaan.
Mengetahui peran penting komunikasi dalam manajemen krisis.
Menguasai strategi menghadapi media dalam situasi krisis.
Mampu mempersiapkan perusahaan untuk mengelola dan mengatasi krisis dengan efektif.
requirements: Tidak ada persyaratan khusus untuk mengambil Course ini.
courses.description:
Setiap perusahaan, baik yang kecil maupun yang besar, pastinya tidak akan pernah luput dari kemungkinan mengalami krisis. Yang membedakan adalah sejauh mana mereka mempersiapkan diri untuk menghadapi krisis tersebut, terutama ketika manajemen harus menangani semacam situasi krisis secara langsung. Komunikasi memegang peran yang sangat penting dalam manajemen krisis, terutama ketika berhadapan dengan media yang, jika tidak dikelola dengan baik, dapat terus-menerus mengeluarkan pemberitaan negatif yang merugikan citra perusahaan.
Dalam course ini, kalian akan mempelajari pengetahuan mendasar mengenai krisis, termasuk apa itu krisis dan bagaimana krisis bisa terjadi. Kalian akan diajarkan tentang jenis-jenis krisis yang mungkin dihadapi perusahaan dan dampaknya terhadap operasional dan reputasi. Selain itu, course ini akan membahas peran penting komunikasi dalam manajemen krisis, mengajarkan kalian bagaimana menyusun pesan yang efektif, berkomunikasi secara transparan, dan menjaga kepercayaan publik selama masa krisis.
Kalian juga akan belajar bagaimana menghadapi media dalam situasi krisis, termasuk strategi untuk mengelola pemberitaan dan mengatasi spekulasi yang mungkin muncul. Materi ini mencakup teknik-teknik untuk merespons pertanyaan media, mengatur konferensi pers, dan mengendalikan narasi agar tetap berada di jalur yang benar. Setelah menyelesaikan course ini, kalian diharapkan memiliki pemahaman yang lebih baik tentang bagaimana menangani krisis secara efektif, meminimalkan dampak negatif, dan memulihkan citra perusahaan dengan baik.
target_audience: Beginner

courses.title: Cómo crear una Campaña Universal de Aplicaciones paso a paso
courses.bio: Guía definitiva sobre la creación de Campañas Universales de Aplicaciones de Google Adwords (Universal App Campaigns)

Introducción: Descubre todo el contenido que necesitas para elevar tu App al siguiente nivel
Qué son las Campañas Universales de Aplicaciones
Cómo crear una Campaña Universal de Apli: Cómo crear una Campaña Universal de Aplicaciones. Ejemplo 1
Cómo crear una Campaña Universal de Aplicaciones. Ejemplo 2
BONUS: Cómo promocionar de manera diferente cada región si éstas usan el mismo idioma

requirements: Uso PC nivel usuario
courses.description:
Diferénciate del resto y conviértete en un especialista en Campañas Universales de Aplicaciones.
'Cómo crear una Campaña Universal de Aplicaciones' es un curso enfocado a desarrolladores de apps o videojuegos que quieren elevar su aplicación al siguiente nivel.


Soy María Gil, especialista en ASO y App Marketing. A lo largo del tiempo que llevo trabajando con aplicaciones móviles me he dado cuenta de que aún no hay suficiente conocimiento ahí fuera sobre cómo crear una Campaña Universal de Aplicaciones de manera óptima. Yo misma, cuando empecé a desarrollar y promocionar mis propias apps me encontré con el problema de no saber exactamente cómo poner en práctica este tipo de campañas y si, una vez puestas en marcha, estaban funcionando bien o no. Tiempo después y con unas cuantas apps y campañas a mis espaldas he logrado descubrir cuál es el secreto para que una campaña funcione, proporcione las descargas deseadas y el coste de las mismas sea cada vez menor.


A lo largo del curso aprenderás (con la ayuda de dos ejemplos prácticos):
- Cómo llevar a cabo este tipo de campañas que nos ofrece Google Adwords paso a paso.
- Optimizar las campañas para lograr cada vez descargas a menor coste.
- Construir el anuncio perfecto.
- Ahorrar tiempo y dinero en el crecimiento y posicionamiento de tu app en los mercados.
No pierdas la oportunidad de pertenecer a ese selecto grupo de desarrolladores destacados y aprende a multiplicar las descargas de tu app.


¿Vienes?
target_audience: Desarrolladores de aplicaciones móviles.
Personas interesadas en el Mobile App Marketing.
Quienes deseen adquirir conocimientos específicos sobre las Campañas Universales de Aplicaciones.

courses.title: Incredible Selling
courses.bio: Generate Exceptional Wealth
objectives: After completing this brilliant course entitled "Incredible Selling," the students will embrace extraordinary selling attitude and skills, which will help them to generate exceptional wealth for their company as well as for themselves. They will learn: How to reposition the products or services in the minds of customers? How to reduce post purchase dissonance of customers? How to provide cluster of satisfaction? How to covert generic product into potential product? How to give exceptional sales presentation? How to negotiate and close the sales? How to develop and manage productive dealer network?

Selling Concepts: Golden Rules of Sales and Customers Buying Motives
Incredible Salesperson: Attributes of Incredible Salesperson Part I
Attributes of Incredible Salesperson Part II
Direct Sales: Direct Vs Indirect Sales, and Customers' Prospecting
Servicing the Sales, and Sales Follow-Up
Indirect Sales: How to Build Strategic Partnership With Dealers?
How to Provide Sales Leverage to Dealers?
After Sales Services to Dealers, and Recap

requirements: Be able to read, write, and speak English
courses.description:
Hello friends if you want to be paid for your passion, live large, acquire massive success, and generate enormous wealth in your life, welcome to a brilliant course entitled Incredible Selling. One cannot generate wealth without selling. Incredible salespersons are those who do not want to live average life. They believe in creating their destiny having enormous wealth. They attract massive success in their life and make their presence felt to the world around them. This course is designed to transform an average person into an incredible salesperson who has the tremendous ability to generate extraordinary sales revenue and earnings for his organization as well as for himself.
This course is compiled in 4 modules, Module one puts the light on valuable selling concepts, marketing vs sales, personal selling vs advertising, core process of sales, golden rules of sales, and customers’ buying motives. Module 2 focuses on personal preparation of incredible salespeople. It concentrates on various attributes and skills of a salesperson, which constitutes personal characteristics, sales attitude, knowledge, ability to reposition the products or service, and ability to close the sales. In module 3, eight pure scientific and sequential steps are dealt in detail, which incredible salespeople are following in the direct selling process. These eight sequential steps are customers’ prospecting, seeking appointments, sales presentation, sales demonstration, sales negotiation, closing the sales, servicing the sales, and sales follow-up. Module 4 is putting light on Indirect selling scenario, and various skills required in developing and managing the productive dealer network for the company. In this module the participants will learn about how to build strategic business partnerships with channel partners, and how to provide sales leverage and after sales services to them.
If you really want to create your wonderful destiny with full of abundance, just click and register for this wonderful course entitled incredible selling.
target_audience: All the persons who want to develop their own businesses or who want to develop their career as in business world.

courses.description:
A inteligência artificial está revolucionando o marketing — e este curso foi criado para te mostrar, na prática, como aplicar as principais ferramentas de IA para criar, automatizar e analisar conteúdo com eficiência e criatividade.
Você vai aprender a usar IAs para gerar textos, vídeos, vozes, músicas, sites, apresentações e muito mais, além de automatizar processos com Make e Airtable para economizar tempo, reduzir tarefas repetitivas e organizar sua produção de forma inteligente. Também vai aprender a acompanhar seus resultados com dashboards interativos e análises assistidas por IA.
É o curso perfeito para quem quer se tornar um criador de conteúdo com agilidade, lançar um novo negócio digital (como uma página de memes, um canal temático ou um podcast automatizado), ou até criar personagens realistas e se posicionar como um influencer IA — como um cantor, apresentador ou criador virtual.
E se você já trabalha com marketing, para marcas ou clientes, vai aprender a automatizar seu fluxo de trabalho e ganhar tempo em cada etapa da produção, com ferramentas acessíveis e fáceis de integrar.
Profissionais de marketing que executam ou lideram equipes também vão encontrar aqui o que precisam para ter uma visão consolidada das publicações, entregas e resultados — e tomar decisões estratégicas com base em dados reais.
Tudo isso com aulas práticas, passo a passo, que mostram como montar fluxos reais de conteúdo — desde a ideia até a publicação.
target_audience: Profissionais de marketing que querem usar inteligência artificial para ganhar tempo e escalar a criação de conteúdo
Social media, freelancers e criadores de conteúdo que buscam automatizar tarefas repetitivas e organizar melhor seus fluxos
Empreendedores e donos de pequenos negócios que querem aplicar IA no dia a dia do marketing de forma prática e acessível
Pessoas curiosas sobre IA que querem aprender, na prática, como criar conteúdo com IA e aplicar ferramentas de automação em estratégias de marketing e análise de dados
