requirements: इस कोर्स को लेने के लिए कोई पूर्वापेक्षाएँ नहीं हैं। यह कोर्स सभी स्तरों के शिक्षार्थियों के लिए डिजाइन किया गया है, शुरुआती से लेकर पेशेवरों तक जो अपने मार्केटिंग कौशल को बढ़ाना चाहते हैं।
courses.description:
चैटजीपीटी AI इन मार्केटिंग / GPT-4, आपका स्वागत है!
क्या आपको एक प्रभावी मार्केटिंग अभियान बनाने में मदद चाहिए जो अच्छे परिणाम लाए?
क्या आप अपने मार्केटिंग प्रयासों को AI तकनीक के साथ स्वचालित करना चाहते हैं?
अब और इंतजार न करें, इस व्यापक पाठ्यक्रम में जानिए कैसे चैटजीपीटी का उपयोग करके शुरुआत से अंत तक पूरे मार्केटिंग अभियान बनाए जाते हैं।


पाठ्यक्रम के अंत तक, आप यह सीख पाएंगे:
चैटजीपीटी का उपयोग करके शुरुआत से अंत तक पूरा मार्केटिंग अभियान कैसे बनाएं।
मार्केटिंग अभियानों के लिए चैटजीपीटी की क्षमताओं को समझना।
लक्षित दर्शकों और खरीदार व्यक्तित्व को परिभाषित और अनुकूलित करना।
चैटजीपीटी के साथ प्रभावी सोशल मीडिया पोस्ट तैयार करना।
चैटजीपीटी के साथ SEO-अनुकूलित ब्लॉग पोस्ट विकसित करना।
चैटजीपीटी के साथ ईमेल अनुक्रम विकसित करना।
चैटजीपीटी के साथ एक बिक्री पृष्ठ बनाना।
फेसबुक, गूगल और यूट्यूब के लिए चैटजीपीटी के साथ विज्ञापन अभियान बनाना।
ग्राहक प्रतिक्रिया का विश्लेषण करके उत्पादों और सेवाओं को अनुकूलित करना।
मार्केटिंग अभियानों के लिए पूरा सामग्री कैलेंडर बनाना।
दर्शक अनुसंधान और विश्लेषण के लिए चैटजीपीटी का उपयोग करना।
सोशल मीडिया मार्केटिंग और स्वचालन के लाभों को समझना।
चैटजीपीटी का उपयोग करके असीमित सामग्री विचार उत्पन्न करना।
यूट्यूब वीडियो निर्माण और अनुकूलन के लिए चैटजीपीटी का उपयोग करना।
चैटजीपीटी का उपयोग करके अनुकूलित कीवर्ड्स और ब्लॉग शीर्षक बनाना।
चैटजीपीटी के साथ प्रभावी ईमेल अनुक्रम लिखना।
चैटजीपीटी के साथ यूट्यूब वीडियो बनाना।
चैटजीपीटी का उपयोग करके समीक्षाओं का विश्लेषण करना और उत्पादों और सेवाओं को अनुकूलित करना।
AI मार्केटिंग और चैटजीपीटी की मूल बातें समझना


कुल मिलाकर, यह कोर्स छात्रों को ChatGPT की क्षमताओं का इस्तेमाल करके प्रभावी मार्केटिंग अभियान बनाने के लिए जरूरी ज्ञान और कौशल प्रदान करने के लिए डिजाइन किया गया है। इस कोर्स के अंत तक, छात्र ChatGPT का इस्तेमाल करके पूरी मार्केटिंग अभियान बना पाएंगे, चाहे वह कंटेंट कैलेंडर विकसित करना हो, सोशल मीडिया पोस्ट्स, ब्लॉग पोस्ट्स, ईमेल सीक्वेंस, और बहुत कुछ। साथ ही, वे ग्राहक प्रतिक्रिया का विश्लेषण करने और अपने उत्पादों और सेवाओं को अनुकूलित करने के लिए आवश्यक कौशल से भी लैस होंगे। यह कोर्स उन सभी के लिए आदर्श है जो AI और ChatGPT का इस्तेमाल करके अपने मार्केटिंग परिणामों को बढ़ाना चाहते हैं।


ChatGPT AI के साथ अपने विपणन खेल को बदलने के अवसर का लाभ उठाएं। चाहे आप एक विपणन पेशेवर हों, उद्यमी हों, या छोटे व्यवसाय के मालिक हों, यह पाठ्यक्रम आपको अपने विपणन प्रयासों को अगले स्तर तक ले जाने में मदद करेगा। अभी नामांकन करें और आज ही विजेता विपणन अभियान बनाना शुरू करें!
target_audience: विपणन कौशल और रणनीतियों में सुधार करने के इच्छुक मार्केटर्स।
व्यापक विपणन अभियान बनाने के लिए इच्छुक व्यापार मालिक या उद्यमी।
अपनी विपणन सेवाओं का विस्तार करने में रुचि रखने वाले फ्रीलांसर्स या सलाहकार।
विपणन के लिए AI-संचालित उपकरणों का उपयोग करना सीखने में रुचि रखने वाले कोई भी व्यक्ति।
सोशल मीडिया, ईमेल विपणन, और विज्ञापन कौशल में सुधार करने के इच्छुक व्यक्ति।
विपणन या विज्ञापन में करियर बनाने के इच्छुक छात्र या हाल ही में स्नातक।
अपने उत्पादों या सेवाओं को प्रभावी रूप से विपणन करना सीखने के इच्छुक लघु व्यापार मालिक।
अनुकूलित ब्लॉग पोस्ट, ईमेल, और सोशल मीडिया पोस्ट लिखना सीखने में रुचि रखने वाले व्यक्ति।
आज के डिजिटल युग में विपणन और विज्ञापन की जानकारी बढ़ाने के इच्छुक कोई भी व्यक्ति।

objectives: The fundamentals of service marketing and its role in the modern economy.
The unique characteristics and challenges of marketing services.

Practical insights into pricing, promotion, and process design tailored to services.

Service Sectors: Role of services in Modern Economy
Service Sector Overview An Indian Perspe: Performance of Indias Service sectors Some Indicators
3rd P PLACE: Examples of Place element in service marketing

requirements: Basic understanding of marketing principles. Interest in exploring the dynamics of the service industry. Familiarity with economic concepts is helpful but not mandatory.
courses.description:
This course provides an in-depth exploration of service marketing, focusing on its unique challenges, the dynamic role of services in the economy, and a practical approach to the renowned 8Ps of Service Marketing framework. Designed for professionals and students alike, this course combines theoretical insights with real-world examples to equip learners with the tools needed to thrive in the service-driven market landscape.
Section 1: Introduction
Kickstart your journey with a foundational understanding of service marketing, covering essential concepts and their significance in modern business. This section lays the groundwork for the topics to come, emphasizing the evolution and importance of services in the global economy.
Section 2: Service Sectors
Explore the diverse world of service sectors, their pivotal role in shaping the modern economy, and the evolving environment of services. This section examines the integral position services occupy in driving economic growth and societal development.
Section 3: Service Sector Overview – An Indian Perspective
Gain insights into the performance and characteristics of India’s service sectors. This section combines economic indicators and sectoral analysis to present a comprehensive overview of the service industry's impact on the Indian economy.
Section 4: Marketing Challenges of Services
Understand the unique challenges associated with marketing intangible services. This section delves into issues such as customer perception, service quality, and market positioning, preparing students to overcome real-world hurdles.
Section 5: Goods vs. Services
Learn the key differences between goods and services and how these distinctions influence marketing strategies. This section focuses on the unique aspects of services, including intangibility, perishability, and variability.
Sections 6-16: The 8Ps of Service Marketing
Dive into the renowned 8Ps framework, a cornerstone of effective service marketing strategies:
Product: Discover the intricacies of creating and marketing service offerings, with examples from the entertainment industry.
Price: Explore pricing strategies tailored to services, including case studies and methods to set competitive prices.
Place: Learn the importance of distribution channels in service delivery and analyze real-world examples.
Promotion: Master integrated marketing communication and sales strategies specific to services.
People: Understand the critical role of people in service delivery, with examples from sectors like entertainment.
Process: Learn how to design and customize processes for optimal service delivery.
Physical Evidence: Discover how tangible cues influence customer perception and trust in services.
Productivity: Examine strategies to enhance productivity without compromising service quality, including the application of models like SERQUAL and ESQUAL.
Section 17: Conclusion
Wrap up the course with a comprehensive conclusion that ties together key concepts, frameworks, and strategies. This section emphasizes the practical application of learned skills to address real-world challenges in service marketing.
By the end of this course, students will have mastered the principles of service marketing, equipped to tackle its challenges and implement the 8Ps framework effectively. They will gain insights into service quality models, strategies to bridge service delivery gaps, and methods to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty.
target_audience: Marketing professionals and students looking to specialize in services. Entrepreneurs and business owners in the service sector. Anyone interested in understanding and applying service marketing strategies.

objectives: Освоите классный сервис фриланса кворк
Узнаете как без конкуренции начать получать заказы во время кризиса и карантина
Узнаете как найти заказчиков / исполнителей на фрилансе

Курс Кворк с нуля: Делаем несколько кворков для выявления спроса. Часть 1
Делаем несколько кворков для выявления спроса. Часть 2
Как работать с заказчиком на кворке, правила
Правила выполнения кворка какой срок ставить
Как зарабатывать больше делая клиентов своими постоянными

requirements: Доступ в интернет, все
courses.description:
Что такое Kwork ?

Этот сервис представительно новой концепции фриланса — онлайн-магазин услуг по фиксированной цене, где услуга продается как товар. Такой формат взаимодействия продавцов и покупателей оказался настоящим прорывом. Продавцы смогли заранее обозначить объем и характер работы, которую они готовы выполнить за указанную сумму, а покупатели получили возможность быстро и легко делать заказ без долгих обсуждений.
Уникальность проекта в том, что в рамках него можно купить и продать что угодно — любой талант, любой опыт и любое умение. 64+ подкатегорий услуг - от веб-дизайна и программирования до обзвона и продаж.
Несколько фактов о кворк:
200+ тыс. - активных кворков
1 млн. посетителей ежемесячно
1 млн. пользователей
Сегодня продавцы имеют возможность создавать индивидуальные предложения под конкретные потребности заказчика. Также есть биржа фриланса.

Статистика только одной биржи Кворк за месяц:
Проектов - 19531
На сумму - 112 636 610 руб

Все просто. Заработать можно продавая свои услуги в разных областях.
Или зарабатывать (что для многих будет актуально) без продажи личных навыков.

Детальную информацию вы найдете в уроках данного курса.
Выгоды и преимущества:
Вы можете заработать продавая услуги на сайте во время кризиса и карантина
Вы получите навык по заработку не имея особых знаний
Вы научитесь получать доход не выходя из дома (нужен только интернет)
target_audience: фрилансерам
студентам, ученикам
пенсионерам
мамочкам в декрете
дизайнерам
программистам
для тех, кто хочет получать дополнительный доход

courses.title: DEĞER ODAKLI SATIŞ
courses.bio: Fiyat insanların ödediği, değer satın aldıkları şeydir. Değer Odaklı Satış ile Nasıl Daha Fazla Kazanırsınız?
objectives: Fiyat insanların ödediği, değer satın aldığı şeydir.
Değer Odaklı Satış 80.000'den fazla kişinin katıldığı Türkiye'nin en iyi satış eğitimidir.
Bu eğitimde ne satarsanız satın, sattığınız ürün ya da hizmetin fiyat odaklı değil, değer odaklı olması gerektiğini öğreneceksiniz.
Satışın yıldızı siz olun! Bu iddiamıza, kursun sonunda satışlarınızda aldığınız başarılı yıldızlar ile siz de hak vereceksiniz.
Stratejik Satış Yönetemleri, İleri Satış Teknikleri, Satın Alma, İletişim Yönetimi, İkna, Müşteri Yaşam Döngüsü, Müşteri Memnuniyeti, Müşteri Deneyimi
Ahilik Dönemimde Satış
Klasik Satış Yaklaşımları
Modern Satış Yaklaşımları
Bundan 10 yıl sonra satışta neler değişecek?
Bu Eğitim içinde Artırılmış Gerçeklik Teknoloji Kullanılmıştır.

SATIŞTA DEĞER VE İLİŞKİLER: Satış Değer ve İlişkilerle İlgilidir, Fiyat ile İlgili Değil...

requirements: Bu kurs sonrasında 10 soruluk bir sınav olacaktır.
Okuma makaleleriniz
Kitap Önerileriniz
Ödevleriniz olacak.
courses.description:
Değer Odaklı Satış: Yeni Çağın Satış Stratejisi
Türkiye'nin ilk ve tek değer odaklı satış kursuna hoş geldiniz!


Bu özgün kurs, günümüzün en popüler satış yöntemlerinden biri olan "Değer Satışı" üzerine yoğunlaşıyor ve değeri merkeze koyan bir yaklaşımı benimsiyor. 'Değer Odaklı Satış' kitabının yazarı ve çok satanlar listesinin sürekli üyesi olan eğitmenimiz tarafından tasarlanan bu eğitim, artırılmış gerçeklik teknolojisiyle desteklenmiştir.


Satış alanında başarıyı hedefliyorsanız ve katma değeri artırmanın, müşterilerinizi anlamanın ve onlara istediklerini vermenin yolunu arıyorsanız, doğru yerdesiniz. Bu kurs, değerin ne olduğunu, algılanan değer ve algılama sistemlerinin nasıl işlediğini, stratejik ikna ve retoriği, hikaye tasarımını ve hibrit satış gibi temel konuları inceler. Bu konuların yanı sıra, sizlere satışın sosyolojik ve bilimsel yönlerini de öğretiyoruz.


Kursun ana mesajı basittir: "Fiyat, insanların ödediği şeydir, değer ise satın aldıkları şeydir."


Eğitim boyunca öğreneceğiniz başlıca konulardan bazıları şunlar:


- Değerin tam anlamıyla ne olduğunu ve bir ürün veya hizmet satın alırken karşılaştığımız çeşitli faktörlerin değer algısını nasıl etkilediğini anlama
- İyi bir hikaye nasıl tasarlanır ve nasıl anlatılır
- Metafor ve analoji kullanarak etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurma
- Algı sistemlerini nasıl kullanacağınızı ve müşterilerin satın alma kararlarını nasıl etkilediğini anlama


Kursun amacı, değeri anlamanızı ve satışın sosyolojik ve bilimsel yönlerine yenilikçi bir yaklaşım sunmanızı sağlamaktır.
Başarılı satışın altın kurallarını öğrenin, değer odaklı bir satış stratejisi oluşturun ve potansiyel müşterilerinizin kalplerine değin!
Katılın ve değeri nasıl artıracağınızı, hikayenizi nasıl etkili bir şekilde anlatacağınızı ve müşteri memnuniyetini nasıl en üst düzeye çıkaracağınızı öğrenin.


Değer Odaklı Satış kursu ile satışta yeni bir dönem başlatın!


Ümit ÜNKER

courses.title: Understanding Integrated Marketing: Beginner’s Guide
courses.bio: A Step-by-Step Introduction to Creating Unified Marketing Strategies

Building a Cohesive Content Marketing St: Building a Cohesive Content Marketing Strategy
Understanding the Modern Consumer Behavior, Needs, and Expectations
Identifying Your Target Audience and Buyer Personas.
AI-Powered Lead Generation From Cold to Qualified
Leveraging Email Marketing as a Central: Leveraging Email Marketing as a Central Channel.
Paid Advertising Google Ads, Meta Ads e: Paid Advertising Google Ads, Meta Ads e Retargeting.
Search Engine Optimization (SEO) for Long-Term Visibility.
Setting SMART Marketing Goals Aligned wi: Setting SMART Marketing Goals Aligned with Business Objectives.
Sales Tools and Technology for Consumer Success

requirements: Designed for complete beginners—no experience needed.
courses.description:
Welcome to Understanding Integrated, your step-by-step guide to mastering modern marketing from the ground up. Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to strengthen your foundation, this course breaks down the core principles of integrated marketing—where strategy, channels, and messaging work together for maximum impact. You'll learn how to set clear SMART goals, define your ideal audience, and align every marketing effort with your business objectives.


You will find lessons about:
Understanding Integrated Marketing: Strategy vs. Tactics.
Identifying Your Target Audience and Buyer Personas.
Setting SMART Marketing Goals Aligned with Business Objectives.
Building a Cohesive Content Marketing Strategy.
Leveraging Email Marketing as a Central Channel.
Search Engine Optimization (SEO) for Long-Term Visibility.
Paid Advertising: Google Ads, Meta Ads & Retargeting.
Marketing Automation and CRM Integration.
Lead Generation and Funnel Design.
A/B Testing and Continuous Campaign Optimization.
How to Use Mental Triggers to Boost Sales Through Copywriting.
and more.

Throughout the course, we’ll cover how to create a cohesive content strategy, leverage email marketing as your central hub.
From lead generation and funnel design to automation and CRM integration, you'll discover how to connect the dots and build a marketing system that truly works.
By the end of this course, you'll understand how to execute a seamless, integrated marketing plan that delivers real results. Let’s begin your journey to smarter, more effective marketing!
target_audience: Beginners who want to understand the fundamentals of integrated marketing
Students or professionals exploring a career in marketing or communications
Entrepreneurs and small business owners looking to create consistent marketing strategies
Content creators or social media managers aiming to improve brand messaging across platforms

requirements: 市场营销，广告方面从业人员
courses.description:
当今时代搜索引擎营销（SEM）已成为企业获取客户的重要途径。然而，如何在竞争激烈的市场中高效精准地投放广告，实现业绩增长呢？
为此，三节课邀请了具有10年营销沉淀，拥有线上线下运营经验的胡先务老师带来这门课程。
通过课程的学习，你将明确SEM的基本概念、发展趋势和常用平台。通过对比不同平台的优缺点，帮助您选择最适合企业需求的投放平台。掌握关键词的选取、拓展和优化技巧。了解如何根据用户搜索意图、竞争程度和商业价值等因素来制定关键词策略。学会投放过程中的预算分配、时段设置等策略，帮助您实现广告效果最大化。
target_audience: 1.市场营销、广告行业从业者，希望提升互联网营销技能 2.想转型数字营销，了解互联网线上营销的企业营销人员 3.寻找线上广告投放，掌握互联网实战落地策略的企业或者创业者

courses.description:
Wordpress Woocommerce İle E-Ticaret Sitesi ve Pazar Yerleri
Kurs Açıklaması


Online işletmenizi büyütmek ve başarılı bir e-ticaret platformu oluşturmak için WordPress Woocommerce ile E-Ticaret Sitesi ve Pazar Yerleri kursuna katılın. Şahıs şirketi kurulumu, pazar yerleri entegrasyonu, ödeme alt yapısı ve daha fazlasını öğrenin.


Sıfırdan E-Ticaret Sistemi kursuyla online işletmenizi büyütmenin ve başarılı bir e-ticaret platformu oluşturmanın heyecanını yaşayın! Bu kurs, WordPress Woocommerce ile E-Ticaret Sitesi ve Pazar Yerleri konusunda size ileri seviye bilgi ve beceriler sunmaktadır.


Kurs içeriğinde yer alan şahıs şirketi kurulumu, pazar yerleri entegrasyonu, ödeme alt yapısı ve reklamlar gibi konular, sizi dijital ticaret dünyasında rakiplerinizden bir adım öne çıkaracaktır.


İş dünyasındaki güncel trendlere uygun olarak tasarlanan kurs dili Türkçe'dir ve Türkçe olarak sunulmaktadır. Kurs süresince, şahıs şirketi kurulumu, pazar yerleri entegrasyonu, ödeme alt yapısı, reklam stratejileri ve daha fazlasını ele alacağız. İşte sizin için hazırladığımız geniş kapsamlı kurs içeriği:


Şahıs şirketi kurulumu: E-ticaret yapabilmek için şahıs şirketi oluşturmanız gerekmektedir. Bu kurs sayesinde, "WordPress Woocommerce ile E-ticaret" konusunda uzmanlaşacak ve şahıs şirketi kurulum sürecini kolaylıkla tamamlayabileceksiniz.
Pazar yerleri entegrasyonu: Pazar yerlerine entegrasyon yapmak, ürünlerinizi daha geniş bir kitleye ulaştırmanın önemli bir yoludur. Kurs boyunca, "WordPress Woocommerce ile E-ticaret" konusunda odaklanarak pazar yerleri entegrasyonunu en iyi şekilde öğreneceksiniz.
Ödeme alt yapısı: Güvenilir bir ödeme alt yapısı oluşturmak, müşterilerinizin güvenini kazanmanızı sağlar. İşte bu kursla, "WordPress Woocommerce ile E-ticaret" konusunda ödeme alt yapısı kurmanın inceliklerini öğreneceksiniz.
Reklam stratejileri: Google AdWords, Facebook Business ve diğer pazarlama kanallarıyla etkili reklam stratejileri oluşturarak hedef kitlenize ulaşmanızı sağlayacak ipuçlarını keşfedeceksiniz. "WordPress Woocommerce ile E-ticaret" konusunda reklamcılık stratejileri ve pazarlama araçları hakkında bilgi sahibi olacaksınız.
Server Yönetimi ve Teknik Alt Yapı : Bu kapsamda Vultr ile bir server edinip server üzerinde gerekli ayarlamaları yapıp kurumsal e-posta, DNS ayarları SSL edinimi ve bir takım teknik bilgileri elde edeceksiniz.
Bu kapsamlı kurs, e-ticaret dünyasında başarılı olmanız için gereken tüm temel bilgileri içermektedir. Siz de online işletmenizi kurmak veya mevcut işletmenizi büyütmek istiyorsanız, "WordPress Woocommerce ile E-Ticaret" konusunda uzmanlaşmanız gerekmektedir. Bu kursla, e-ticaret dünyasında rakiplerinizden bir adım öne geçecek ve başarılı bir e-ticaret platformu oluşturabileceksiniz.

courses.title: Marketing, Finding Clients & Pitching for Freelancers
courses.bio: Getting the Work in: How to Market Yourself, Find Clients and Create Great Pitches for Freelancers
objectives: Active marketing: tried and tested freelance marketing techniques that lead directly to commissions.
Downloadable resources include examples of successful 'first approach' emails to clients, which you can adapt to suit you.
An overview of online freelance platforms, plus recommendations of where else freelancers can find work in beyond the go-to sites.
Pitching: how to do it – and how NOT to do it! We break down a successful pitch to a high-profile client and examine how and why freelancers get pitches wrong.
Passive marketing: how to set out your digital stall so you make a great impression when clients find you online.
Downloadable resources include examples of successful pitch emails that led directly to commissions, which you can adapt to suit you.

Active Marketing Part One: Let’s Get Phy: Active Marketing Part One: Let's Get Physical
Active Marketing Part Two: Freelance Pla: Active Marketing Part Two: Freelance Platforms
Pitching: How NOT to do it: Pitching: How NOT to do it

requirements: No prior experience needed. This course is open to all.
courses.description:
This short course covers marketing, finding clients and pitching for freelancers – basically, getting the work in!
Finding work and clients is one of the scariest things for freelancers. 'I'll never get any work,' is one of the things we often hear from people who like the idea of being freelance, but decide against it.
It can also be just as big a worry for those of us who've been in the game for a long time. Most, if not all, career freelancers know that sinking feeling when things start to get quiet. At the other end of the spectrum are those who freelance on a part-time or casual basis, who might be thinking, 'I'd like a little extra work'.
In every case, freelancers need to market themselves and reel in some clients, which is exactly what this course is about.
It's broken down into active and passive marketing techniques. The first involves deliberately getting in touch with clients and letting them know you want to work for them – such as meeting up in person (very effective), online freelance platforms, plus other, more offbeat methods – and is typically the most direct route to getting work.
Passive marketing is all about what people see when they find you online – your social media, portfolio, or website – and we look at how to make those things smart, professional, and appealing to clients.
This course also covers pitching – a common marketing technique for many freelancers – and delves into the differences between successful pitches and truly terrible ones. The downloadable materials include examples of real pitches that led directly to commissions that you can adapt to suit you, as well examples of cold call emails to clients that worked in the real world.
As with all the Bite-Size Freelance courses, this one is designed to be as universal as possible, and the emphasis is on easy, practical methods that you can implement immediately, regardless of who you are, where you are, or what you do.
Both aspiring and existing freelancers can benefit from the techniques covered in this course – and it's short enough to do on your lunch break.
target_audience: Existing freelancers of all types and levels who want to boost their client numbers and get more work.
Aspiring freelancers who want to start their freelance career with a bang.
Anyone who wants to improve their pitching techniques and/or their professional online profile.

This course is designed to introduce you to the cutting-edge world of prompt engineering and its significant impact on modern marketing. requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
■はじめに


こんにちは、本コースの講師「さくちょ」です。


僕は2021年6月から「本業ありきの副業」としてブログをはじめ、2025年4月には個人事業を引き継ぐ形で法人を設立して活動しています。


ブログの｢ブ｣の字も知らず、Twitterすら開いたことなかった完全素人の状態から、ブログ開始後約1年で月10万円のハードルを突破。その後はコンテンツ販売や電子書籍の出版、そしてUdemy講師として活動の幅を広げていきました。


いまは自分軸のブログから始める情報発信の魅力を社会へ広げるために、SNSや音声配信、メールマガジンの配信などに取り組んでいます。



■このコースを受講することで…


このコースを受講していただくと、読者（お客さま）に満足いただける、低価格帯の文章コンテンツを作れるようになります。


ビジネスは、基本的に次の3つの工程しかありません。


1）創る（企画）
2）作る（制作）
3）売る（セールス）


このうち、本講座は「つくる（創る・作る）」にフォーカスしています。


セールスの手法は様々あり、極論を言うと、テクニックを駆使すればモノは何でも売れるでしょう。


しかし、そもそも商品（コンテンツ）をつくれないと始まりません。


自分で商品をつくって販売できるようになると、お客さまの信用を積み上げられるようになり、安定したビジネスの土台を構築できます。


そのため、本講座では数あるコンテンツ形式のうち、副業に取り組む会社員の方でも実践しやすい「文章コンテンツのつくり方」にテーマを絞り、心得（マインドセット）から実践的な方法まで、網羅的に解説いたします。




■広告収益に依存しない「安定」を目指しましょう


オンラインビジネスは、大きく2種類しかありません。


1）広告ビジネス（アフィリエイト・アドセンスなど）
2）直販ビジネス（コンテンツ販売・サービス提供など）


広告ビジネスは自分で商品を作ったり、商品に対する責任がないため、オンラインビジネス初心者にはオススメの収益化方法の1つと言えます。


しかし、広告ビジネスは企業からお金をいただくもの。広告ビジネスを続ける限り、自分で収益をコントロールできず、収益が大きくなればなるほど、不安は大きくなります。


したがって、自分軸のブログで一定の報酬を得られたら、早い段階で直販ビジネス（＝コンテンツ販売）にステップアップし、ビジネスの安定を目指すことが大切。むしろ、今後はこの方法でしか生き残っていけなくなる可能性さえあります。


このコースは、すべてのオンラインビジネス実践者にとって必修と言えるでしょう。




■このコースは全部で9セクションです


セクション01：はじめに
セクション02：コンテンツ販売に挑戦するための心得
セクション03：初めてのコンテンツ販売はnoteがオススメ
セクション04：有料コンテンツを作るファーストステップ
セクション05：有料コンテンツを売るための無料コンテンツ戦略
セクション06：有料コンテンツづくりへのステップアップ
セクション07：講師による有料コンテンツ販売の初体験談
セクション08：よくある質問と回答
セクション09：ラストメッセージ
ボーナスレクチャー


以上、全部で7時間45分のコースです。


■こんな方が受講に向いています


ブログを実践して1,000円以上の収益をあげられるようになり、そこで得たスキルや知識、経験を活かして、さらに個人ビジネスを拡大したい方。また、ブログを更新し続けるだけで、その先が見えず不安になっている方。そして、ブログ・アフィリエイト以外に収益化できる方法を探している方のために、本コースを作りました。


このコースでは、コンテンツビジネスのスタートダッシュとして、必要不可欠な要素を網羅的に解説しております。学んだことをアウトプットできるワークシートも用意しており、その通りに実践していただければ、安定した月5〜6桁の収益を狙うことができるでしょう。


コースの中では、僕がオンラインビジネスを始めて9ヶ月目に、はじめて有料コンテンツを販売した体験談と実績も、すべて赤裸々に公開しておりますので、お楽しみに。


■最後に


本コースに興味をもっていただいた方は、動画終了後に「コース登録」へ進んでください。
もっと検討したいという方はプレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、ぜひ講座を覗いてみてください。
それでは、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！
target_audience: いまからオンラインビジネスへ挑戦したい初心者（副業でもOK）
ブログやSNSで（金額の大小に関わらず）広告収入を得たことがある
自分の商品を作って売ることに憧れや興味があるけど、一歩踏み出せない
テンプレートやAI活用方法を見ながら、マネする形で学びたいと考えている
書くことを通じて、自分の強みや価値を見つけたい（自己理解を深めたい）

objectives: Define the key elements of festival marketing and articulate its impact on consumer behavior.
Develop effective offers using a variety of discount structures and promotional tactics.
Analyze the specific dynamics and consumer behaviors associated with Black Friday, Christmas, and New Year sales.
Formulate comprehensive multi-channel marketing plans incorporating social media, email, and influencer collaborations.
Demonstrate an understanding of consumer protection laws and regulatory standards relevant to festival marketing.
Establish and measure key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess the effectiveness of festival marketing campaigns.
Develop strategies for implementing environmentally sustainable and socially responsible festival marketing campaigns.
Evaluate and integrate digital and traditional marketing channels for a cohesive and effective promotional campaign.
Evaluate and apply strategies for balancing profitability and customer attractiveness in offer creation.
Construct a strategic festival calendar by analyzing market-specific festivals and their potential opportunities

Marketing Festival Season: Offers, Deals: Understanding the Significance of Festival Marketing
Black Friday, X-Mas & New year sales : Deals and benefits of businesses

courses.description:
Course Description: Mastering Marketing Festival Season: Offers, Deals, and Promotions 101
Unlock the secrets to harnessing the power of festivals for unparalleled marketing success with our Master Course in Marketing Festival Season: Offers, Deals, and Promotions 101. In this comprehensive program, you will delve into the intricacies of festival marketing, equipping yourself with the skills and knowledge to create compelling offers, strategically plan promotions, and navigate the legal and ethical landscape of festive campaigns.
Who Should Enroll: This course is tailored for marketing professionals, entrepreneurs, and business owners seeking to maximize their impact during festival seasons. Whether you are new to marketing or looking to refine your festival marketing strategies, this course will provide you with practical insights and actionable tactics.
Key Learning Objectives:
Understanding the Festival Landscape:
Gain insights into the significance of festival marketing and its impact on consumer behavior.
Identify key festival seasons and opportunities, creating a strategic festival calendar.
Crafting Irresistible Offers and Deals:
Develop compelling offers that strike the right balance between attractiveness and profitability.
Design effective deal structures, including limited-time offers and exclusive festival bundles.
Explore the use of limited-edition and exclusive products to create excitement and urgency.
Implementing Strategic Promotions:
Learn to leverage multi-channel marketing, including social media campaigns, email marketing, and influencer collaborations.
Understand the importance of personalization in festival promotions and explore techniques for targeted messaging.
Integrate digital and traditional marketing channels for maximum reach and impact.
Navigating Legal and Ethical Considerations:
Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and consumer protection laws.
Embrace ethical marketing practices to build trust with customers and avoid exploitative tactics.
Explore the importance of environmental sustainability in festival marketing campaigns.
Analyzing Performance and Continuous Improvement:
Evaluate the effectiveness of your festival marketing campaigns using key performance indicators (KPIs) and ROI measurements.
Utilize data insights to identify successful strategies and adapt to market changes.
Develop an iterative approach for continuous improvement and long-term festival marketing success.
By the end of this course, you will be equipped with the skills to create impactful festival marketing campaigns that not only drive sales but also build lasting relationships with your target audience. Enroll now to elevate your marketing strategies and make the most of the lucrative opportunities presented by festival seasons.
In this master course, I would like to teach the 7 major topics :
1. Understanding the Significance of Festival Marketing
2. Crafting Irresistible Offers and Deals
3. Black Friday, X-Mas & New year sales : Deals and benefits of businesses
4. Implementing Strategic Promotions
5. Navigating Legal and Ethical Considerations
6. Analyzing Performance and Continuous Improvement
7. Green Marketing and Consumer Behavior
Enroll now and learn today !
target_audience: All UG and PG Business, General Management, Marketing & Entrepreneurship Students
Interested students to learn about the concepts of Marketing Festival Season: Offers, Deals, and Promotions

courses.bio: Drive Your Own Success
requirements: This course is designed to be accessible to everyone, regardless of prior experience or background. There are no required skills, experience, tools, or equipment needed to enroll. Whether you are a beginner looking to enter the world of sales or a seasoned professional seeking to refine your techniques, this course provides valuable insights and practical strategies for all levels.
courses.description:
Welcome to the Sales Pro. Playbook, the advanced course designed to take you from being a good sales representative to a sales leader who consistently achieves over-target results.
Building on the foundations laid in our Sales Excellence course, this advanced program dives deep into the strategic and analytical aspects of sales. It is tailored for experienced sales reps aiming to sharpen their expertise, improve their planning and execution, and develop the skills needed to lead a sales team in the near future.
What You'll Learn:
Achieve Consistent Growth and Overachievement:
Learn how to create a professional sales plan, perform in-depth market analysis, and segment your target audience effectively. Understand your customers' needs deeply to hit your targets with maximum efficiency.
Stand Out in Meetings, Presentations, and Business Reviews:
Master the art of crafting compelling sales reports and delivering impactful business reviews. Position yourself as a sales expert who can lead and inspire peers and gain trust from managers.
Optimize Your CRM Usage:
Discover advanced CRM strategies and techniques that will elevate your customer relationship management skills, increasing your productivity and customer engagement.
Master Time and Territory Management:
Learn how to manage your time effectively and allocate your efforts smartly across customers and territories. Ensure that you’re focusing on the right clients at the right time for maximum results.
Develop Leadership Skills for Future Team Management:
Enhance your planning, analysis, business awareness, and financial acumen skills – all essential for stepping up into a sales team leader role soon.
Course Format:
The Sales Pro. Playbook is packed with engaging video content, real-world case studies, interactive activities, and practical exercises. Each section concludes with a quiz to test your knowledge and understanding. Upon course completion, you’ll receive a Udemy certification and an opportunity for a one-on-one counseling session to further refine your sales strategy.
Who Should Enroll:
This course is perfect for current sales representatives who have foundational sales knowledge and are ready to take their careers to the next level. If you're aiming to outperform your peers, optimize your sales tactics, and become a potential team leader, this course is your next step.
Join Now and Transform Your Sales Career!
Don’t miss this opportunity to become a sales pro and set yourself apart as a top-performing sales leader. Enroll in the Sales Pro. Playbook today and start your journey towards sales excellence!


هل أنت محترف مبيعات يتطلع إلى تطوير مهاراته والتميز كأفضل أداء؟
مرحبًا بك في دليل محترف المبيعات (Sales Pro. Playbook)، الكورس المتقدم المصمم لنقلك من كونك مندوب مبيعات جيد إلى قائد مبيعات يحقق باستمرار نتائج تفوق التوقعات.
بناءً على الأساس الذي وضعناه في كورس التميز في المبيعات (Sales Excellence)، يغوص هذا البرنامج المتقدم في الجوانب الاستراتيجية والتحليلية للمبيعات. تم تصميمه خصيصًا لمندوبي المبيعات ذوي الخبرة الذين يسعون إلى تحسين مهاراتهم، وتعزيز قدرتهم على التخطيط والتنفيذ، وتطوير المهارات اللازمة لقيادة فريق مبيعات في المستقبل القريب.
ماذا ستتعلم:
1- تحقيق النمو المستمر وتجاوز الأهداف (Overachievement):تعلم كيفية إعداد خطة مبيعات احترافية، وإجراء تحليل عميق للسوق، وتجزئة جمهورك المستهدف بشكل فعال. ستتمكن من فهم احتياجات عملائك بشكل عميق لتحقيق أهدافك بكفاءة عالية.
2- التميز في الاجتماعات والعروض التقديمية ومراجعات الأعمال:إتقان فن إعداد تقارير المبيعات المؤثرة وتقديم مراجعات الأعمال بشكل قوي. ستتمكن من إبراز نفسك كخبير في المبيعات يمكنه قيادة وإلهام زملائه وكسب ثقة المديرين.
3- تحسين استخدامك لنظام إدارة علاقات العملاء (CRM):اكتشف استراتيجيات وتقنيات متقدمة في إدارة علاقات العملاء باستخدام أنظمة الـ CRM، مما سيزيد من إنتاجيتك وتفاعلك مع العملاء.
4- إتقان إدارة الوقت والمناطق الجغرافية:تعلم كيفية إدارة وقتك بشكل فعال وتخصيص جهودك بذكاء بين العملاء والمناطق البيعية. تأكد من تركيزك على العملاء المناسبين في الوقت المناسب لتحقيق أقصى النتائج.
5- تطوير مهارات القيادة لإدارة فريق في المستقبل:قم بتطوير مهاراتك في التخطيط والتحليل والوعي التجاري والمعرفة المالية – كل هذه المهارات أساسية لتصبح قائد فريق مبيعات ناجح في المستقبل القريب.
تنسيق الكورس:
يحتوي دليل محترف المبيعات (Sales Pro. Playbook) على محتوى فيديو تفاعلي، ودراسات حالة من الواقع، وأنشطة عملية، وتمارين تطبيقية. كل قسم من أقسام الكورس ينتهي باختبار لقياس معرفتك وفهمك. بعد إتمام الكورس، ستحصل على شهادة معتمدة من يوديمي، بالإضافة إلى فرصة لجلسة استشارية فردية لتحسين استراتيجيتك في المبيعات.
لمن هذا الكورس:
هذا الكورس مثالي لمندوبي المبيعات الحاليين الذين يمتلكون معرفة أساسية في المبيعات ويرغبون في الانتقال بحياتهم المهنية إلى المستوى التالي. إذا كنت تهدف إلى التفوق على زملائك، وتحسين تكتيكات المبيعات الخاصة بك، وأن تصبح قائد فريق مبيعات محتمل، فهذا الكورس هو خطوتك التالية.
انضم الآن وطور مسيرتك المهنية في المبيعات!
لا تفوت هذه الفرصة لتصبح محترف مبيعات وتتميز كقائد مبيعات من الطراز الرفيع. انضم إلى دليل محترف المبيعات (Sales Pro. Playbook) اليوم وابدأ رحلتك نحو التميز في عالم المبيعات!
target_audience: advanced level Sales Representatives

Identifying Objections and Closing the D: Crafting Effective Rebuttals and Negotiation Tactics

requirements: No experience or skills in delivering a sales pitch.
You will need a desktop or laptop computer.
You will need access to internet.
You must be eager and willing to learn.
courses.description:
In today's competitive business landscape, the ability to effectively persuade and close deals is a critical skill for any sales professional or anyone in a Client-Facing Role. This tutorial will guide you through the essential elements of persuasion, empowering you to captivate your audience and reach an agreement with them. “The Ultimate Sales Pitch Blueprint: Strategies and Examples” will equip you with the strategies, techniques, and practical examples you need to master the art of persuasion and close more deals.
At the end of this course, learners should gain skills and be knowledgeable in the following aspects:
They should be able to know their audience, their specific needs, interests, and pain points of your potential customers.
They shall be able to create a persuasive sales pitch to meet the preferences of your varied audience.
The ability to enhance their sales pitch by incorporating compelling narratives that resonate with your audience.
They must have been equip with strategies to address common objections and turn them into opportunities.
They should Understand different closing styles to confidently guide potential clients toward a decision
The ability to tailor their communication to each prospect’s specific needs and interests.
They Should be able to close with a Clear Call to Action: End your pitch by inviting the customer to take a specific favorable action, such as making a purchase or scheduling a follow-up meeting.
And above all, They should be able to Craft a compelling sales pitch.


This course is divided in to 5 sections, comprising 21 lessons as follows:
1) Section 1: Know your audience and create convincing messaging.
To create a successful sales pitch, it is critical to understand your audience's needs and wants. Thorough audience research helps you identify their pain points, challenges, and goals, allowing you to create a compelling message to meet those needs. This section of the course will treat two most important topics: Understanding your audience and crafting a compelling message to meet your audience preferences.
2) Section 2: Storytelling Technique and Non-Verbal Communication
Storytelling in sales is more than simply an attention-grabbing technique; it's a calculated tactic that can completely change how you interact with customers and close deals. Narratives can evoke emotions, foster empathy, and develop a deeper connection between the customer and the seller. Nonverbal communication skills also play a crucial role in sales interactions. Therefore, a well-crafted story with a good balance of body language brings forth confidence, trust, and success. In line with the above, this section is going to provide insight on how storytelling techniques and non-verbal communication can significantly contribute to providing a successful sales pitch.
3) Section 3: This section covers three stages in the sales process: Identifying and Addressing Common Objections, Crafting Effective Rebuttals, and Closing Techniques.
In the world of sales, objections from potential customers are opportunities, not obstacles. Objections show interest, address concerns, and give you the opportunity to provide value. The art of overcoming sales objections is crucial to closing the deal and increasing sales. Here's a breakdown of each stage:
Objections refer to concerns, hesitations, or barriers raised by prospects that could hinder their decision to make a purchase. Overcoming objections involves addressing the prospect's concerns, easing their doubts, and removing any obstacles that may prevent the sale from closing.
Closing the deal is the final phase of the sales process where the salesperson seeks the prospect's commitment to make a purchase or take the desired action. The primary objective of closing the deal is to secure a favorable outcome, such as a signed contract, a purchase order, or a verbal agreement, thereby completing the sales transaction.
4) Section 4: In the fast-paced world of sales, having the skill to effectively persuade and influence potential customers is absolutely crucial. In the context of sales, persuasion typically takes place when a sales rep is trying to convince a prospect that their product or service is the best solution for their problem. Persuasion is a method of communication that aims to influence the attitudes, beliefs, or behaviors of others.  Advanced persuasion tactics extend beyond basic sales techniques, tapping into the power of psychology, emotion, and subtle influence to craft a compelling and irresistible sales pitch. By utilizing these sophisticated strategies, sales professionals can steer customers towards the desired outcome, overcoming objections and closing successful transactions.
5) Section 5: Practicing and Refining your Pitch and The Various Types with templates.
Practicing and refining your sales pitch involves honing your ability to deliver a compelling and persuasive message to potential customers. A sales pitch can make or break a deal. Thus, this section will explore how to rehearse and refine your sales pitch, which is essential for effective prospecting, identify and describe various types of sales pitches, and provide different sales pitch templates that will help sales professionals organize key points for effective delivery.
whether you are a beginner or in any client-facing role, Join us in "The Ultimate Sales Pitch Blueprints: Strategies and Examples" and transform your sales pitches into powerful tools for success. Enroll now to start your journey toward becoming a master of the ultimate sales pitch!
target_audience: Anyone in a Client-Facing Role: Whether you work in consulting, account management, or client relations, knowing how to deliver a compelling pitch is valuable. It helps build trust, address client pain points, and propose relevant solutions.

Sales Representatives: Naturally, salespeople are the primary audience for sales pitch training. Whether they’re new to the field or experienced, continuous learning helps them refine their pitch delivery, connect with prospects, and close deals more effectively.

Business Development Professionals: Individuals responsible for generating leads and building relationships can benefit from sales pitch training. They learn how to create compelling pitches that resonate with potential clients and encourage further engagement.

Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners: If you’re running your own business, mastering the art of sales pitches is crucial. Whether you’re pitching to investors, partners, or customers, understanding their needs and tailoring your message accordingly is essential.

Marketing Professionals: Marketers often need to present their products or services to potential clients or internal stakeholders. Learning effective sales pitch techniques helps them communicate value propositions convincingly.

Customer Service Representatives: While not directly involved in sales, customer service reps can enhance their interactions with customers by understanding how to deliver concise and persuasive pitches. This skill can lead to upselling or cross-selling opportunities.

Product Managers and Product Marketers: These roles involve understanding the product thoroughly and communicating its benefits to various audiences. Sales pitch training ensures they can articulate product features and value propositions effectively.

courses.title: How to write a good case study
courses.bio: A step by step guide to turning project histories into powerful marketing tools

Part one: What is the aim of a case stud: What is the aim of a case study?
Part two: What elements does a case stud: What elements does a case study need to include?
Part three: How to put together a case s: How to put together a case study
Part four: How to get the tone of your c: How to get the tone of your case study right

requirements: You should be tasked with writing case studies for your company and want to understand how to make them as useful and effective as you can
courses.description:
At its most basic level, a case study is a simple thing: it’s a description of a project. But if you think about case studies in those terms, you’ll be missing a vital opportunity to give powerful examples of:
the size and type of project you work on
the expertise you have
your ability to overcome complex problems and situations
the outcomes you achieve for your customers.


In other words, case studies are some of the valuable things you can have in your marketing toolkit.


In this course, I’ll teach you how to take the plain facts of projects and turn them into compelling case studies that help you to win new clients and position you as the expert in your field.


There are six videos in total, plus PDFs to download for each of them.


The first video is an introduction to me. You can watch it if you want to know a little bit more about me and my credentials, but it isn’t essential to watch.


The second video is an introduction to the course and what it covers.


The next four videos are the course components and they talk you through every element of a good case study.
target_audience: Technical managers who need to turn their everyday experiences into compelling marketing materials.
Marketing executives tasked with turning project information into powerful selling tools.
Business owners who want to use examples of their work to help them attract more clients

物料管控在企业成本管理中占据举足轻重的地位，它直接关系到生产流程的顺畅运作和成本效益的高低。一旦物料管控出现不合理，便可能引发生产中的物料短缺或库存积压，进一步导致生产进度受阻和资源无端浪费。这些问题不仅损害了企业的运营效率，还对其经济效益产生深远影响。
通过本课程的学习，企业能够掌握物料、辅料和欠料的有效管控方法，建立起一套完善的物料控制链。这不仅确保了企业能够按时交付产品，更在降低生产成本、提升资源利用效率方面发挥了关键作用。最终，本课程的学习将助力企业在激烈的市场竞争中保持领先地位，实现可持续发展。

courses.description:
What will Dentists be able to do after this Course:
This Course is designed for Dentists who are already having their own Dental Practice or those who are about to start their own Dental Practice.
Primary goal of this Course is to help Dentists to evaluate themselves for all the essential requirements for making their Dental Practice successful as per their desire.
Once Dentist knows what they want to achieve in both personal and professional life, they will be able to set their goal accordingly.
This course will become a constant guideline to make each of their goal easily achievable.
This Course will keep growing to meet demands of Practising Dentists as and when they meet newer challenges.
This Course will not only make Dentist proficient in managing their Dental Practice professionally, but also make them a better human being in their personal and family life.
How this Course was derived
This Course was derived from personal practice experience of Dr. Vivek Koppikar, as well as from his interactions with hundreds of Dentists and Medical Specialists, both in India and abroad.
Contents of this Course are taken from material and inputs given by Dr. Koppikar during his one-to-one workshops and personal consultancies. All the ideas explained in this Course are actually tried and tested by several Doctors successfully, for more than 15 years.
This Course is backed by exhaustive learning from International Marketing Gurus, which is made applicable for Dentists, practising in any part of the world.
Age and Experience No Bar
Whether you are about to start your Practice or have been practising for 5, 10 or 20 years more, this Course is sure to benefit you.
With experience, challenges of Practice keep changing and desired goal too may differ. However, as this Course is based on basics of Practice Marketing, its applications are too vast.
While this Course will help an absolutely new Practitioners to set their Practice on a right path for successful practice, it will help settled practitioners to achieve desired higher goals and get what they deserved most in shortest possible time.
And most common contribution from this Course is to make Dental Practice ‘Stress-Free’ in every respect without compromising on financial goals.
Achieve your first goal in three months from now:
Once you start this Course, do your learning and exercises regularly in a planned manner with full focus and concentration to achieve your desired goal.
Within ‘Three Months Period’ after you start with this Course, you are sure to achieve your first goal, Thereafter, constant periodic planning and its execution for your next goal, will lead to achieving higher goals in Successful Practice.
This Course aims at improving your marketing and communication skills like, Presenting Treatment Plan, Handling Objections, Understanding Patient Psychology, Staff management and much more.
Revising this Course periodically will develop and sharpen your marketing and management skills further, for ensuring consistency in Successful Dental Practice.
This Course will reach its perfection only if -
This Course will reach its perfection, only if students give their feedback and ask as many questions as they come across. You are most welcome to ask any number of questions through Q/A facility of this Course.
I will do my best to give solutions for all of them, and add relevant videos to help Dentists in maintaining successful in their Dental Practice.
So, JOIN THIS COURSE NOW and move towards making your Dental Practice Successful as desired by you.

courses.title: Análisis de Marketing y Ventas con Excel
courses.bio: ¿Te cuesta sacarle valor a los datos de marketing y ventas? Pues entonces, ¡este es tu curso!
objectives: En este curso te enseñaré a analizar con soltura los datos de marketing y ventas. Para ello, me apoyaré en las soluciones analíticas que ofrece Excel. Además, te daré las claves para que puedas medir el impacto en ventas de dos de las decisiones más importantes que tendrás que tomar en el ámbito comercial: la fijación de precios y el gasto en publicidad. Adicionalmente, te ayudaré a interpretar con rigor la evolución de las ventas y a realizar un pronóstico de ventas utilizando un modelo tan potente como sencillo de implementar como es el Alisado por Medias Móviles Centradas (modelo A-MMC).

Cómo reportar la información de marketin: Gráficos para la visualización de datos.
Tablas dinámicas para el análisis de datos (Excel PivotTables).
Análisis de precios: Elasticidad-precio de la demanda: concepto y medición.
Determinación del precio óptimo con Solver Excel.
Estrategias dinámicas de fijación de precios: Revenue Management.
Medición de la eficacia publicitaria: Efectos de la publicidad sobre las ventas: patrones de respuesta.
Modelos de eficacia del mix de medios publicitario.
Análisis de la rentabilidad de la publicidad online: Pay-Per-Click Advertising.
Análisis de series históricas de ventas: Interpretación de las series históricas de ventas.
Modelización de la tendencia y estacionalidad de las ventas.
Métodos cuantitativos de previsión de ventas.
Taller de pronóstico de ventas: Estimación de ventas a medio plazo con el método A-MMC

requirements: Tener unos conocimientos básicos en la utilización de Microsoft Excel.
courses.description:
En esta formación te ayudaré a tomar mejores decisiones de marketing basadas en datos, lo que se conoce como Data-Driven Marketing. Para ello, el curso cuenta con 4 bloques de contenido, que incluyen 12 lecciones y 1 taller donde te enseñaré a analizar con mucha soltura datos procedentes de las áreas de marketing y ventas de una empresa. Para ello, me apoyaré en las soluciones analíticas que ofrece el programa Microsoft Excel.
A lo largo del curso te daré las claves para resumir, visualizar y analizar estadísticamente los datos comerciales. Además, aprenderás a medir el impacto en ventas de dos de las decisiones más importantes que tendrás que tomar en el ámbito comercial: las relacionadas con la fijación de precios y el gasto en campañas publicitarias.
Adicionalmente, te ayudaré a interpretar con rigor científico la evolución de series históricas de ventas, a cuantificar su tendencia y estacionalidad, y a realizar pronósticos de ventas utilizando un modelo tan potente como sencillo de implementar como es el Alisado por Medias Móviles Centradas (modelo A-MMC).
Todo esto hace que más del 90% del contenido de este curso sea totalmente práctico y que cuando lo finalices te conviertas en un experto en el análisis de datos comerciales con Excel.
target_audience: Profesionales, titulados universitarios y emprendedores del mundo del marketing, las ventas, la investigación de mercados, y el análisis de la información o áreas analíticas relacionadas, que quieran adquirir o reforzar sus habilidades analíticas para sustentar la toma de decisiones en los datos disponibles en las áreas de Comercial y Marketing de una empresa.

courses.description:
Use this course as a tool kit to improve the quality of your talking head videos by adding transparent infographics and "lower thirds". You will create these graphics using Powerpoint and make them transparent using Adobe Premiere. Some other video editors can also create the transparency effect, but the same good result as with Adobe Premiere is NOT guaranteed. So if you don't have Adobe Premiere, do make sure that your video editing software can create the transparency effect (check the list at the bottom).
In this course we're going to create:
2 Lists
2 Name/titles
1 "Post-it" effect
1 "Polaroid" Photo effect
These graphics can be used for your YouTube videos, Online courses, Business/Marketing videos, Interview Videos and more. Basically, whenever a person is talking on camera.
You will learn how to create these graphics with Powerpoint only, and you will probably be surprised how powerful Powerpoint can be. And even though you won't be able to create the most complex effects that can be done with specialized animation software, Powerpoint is a great compromise in terms of quality and creation speed. Once you learn how it works, you will be able to create many other infographics for your videos relatively fast.
However, you will need a video editing software that can do a "Remove Color" effect to make it transparent and add on top of your talking head video, and most decent software can do it. However, not all of them give the same results. For example, Camtasia "remove color" effect is not as good as Adobe Premiere's "Ultra Key" - some shadows don't work, you need to do much more adjustments, but it's still possible. So here is a limited list of software that have *some version* of this effect. If your software is not listed here, it doesn't mean that it can't do it. In that case you should check it for yourself on the internet if this is possible or not. Otherwise, write me privately and I will do the research for you and update the list below.
Adobe Premiere
Camtasia
Filmora
Corel VideoStudio
Final Cut Pro
Pinnacle Studio
For everything else, check the Promo and the Free Preview videos of this course!


[Created by Business Disruptors]
target_audience: YouTubers who want to improve the quality of their Talking Head videos
Online instructors who want to augment their Talking Head videos

requirements: Basic marketing skills, Digital marketing skills, Basic Software skills to develop the agile methodologies
courses.description:
Master course in agile marketing and marketing sprints 2.0
How does Agile Marketing work?
The Agile Marketing approach is based on the values and principles of Agile software development.
Business requests for certain features or applications were lagging behind the launch of technology that addressed those needs in the 90s, which led to Agile. Keeping up with changing demands wasn't easy for software developers.
A rapidly changing market is driving marketing's own Agile renaissance right now. It's a fast-changing world and media consumption changes all the time.
There's no point in having annual marketing plans anymore. An annual plan can't keep up with everything that happens in a year.
It's also easier than ever to access data and get insights. Marketing is getting faster and more agile, and it's more practical too.
How does sprint marketing work?
Sprint marketing involves finishing a big project in a short amount of time. A marketing team can use this strategy to test new and innovative ideas, work on tasks quickly, solve problems creatively, refine products and services, and achieve important business goals. During this time, they can focus on particular areas for improvement and gather valuable insights about products, customers, and best marketing practices. It depends on their business structure, preferences, and other factors how long they want the marketing sprint to last.
It could be generating leads, increasing customer engagement and retention, building a web presence or improving SEO rankings for those who do sprint marketing. Metrics are established throughout the process, progress is measured, and data is tracked. In order to gauge customer satisfaction, engagement, and retention, they often ask for feedback on marketing content. Sprint marketing involves trying out different promotional methods, assessing their success, and revising them. Marketing sprints can help companies minimize risk, save money, and save effort by evaluating techniques before launching a full campaign.
The five major topics I'd like to cover in this master's course are:
1. Introduction and importance of agile marketing and marketing sprints
2. Agile marketing approach, benefits and challenges
3. Agile digital marketing strategy and campaign
4. Marketing sprints: how to plan them and why they're great
5. Marketing Teams: How to Make Sprints Work
target_audience: All UG and PG Business, IT and Marketing students.

Este curso analiza el entorno de la actividad de los servicios dentales desde la óptica comercial: en el entendido que esta actividad es el intercambio de servicios dentales por honorarios, en un mercado cambiante y cada vez más difícil; compitiendo con las otras Prácticas y Clínicas Dentales Independientes, con las Clínicas Dentales propiedad de Inversionistas, Franquicias y  las Redes de Marcas, con un alcance nacional, además de otras Clínicas Dentales en sus zonas de influencia.
El curso analiza la imagen institucional de las Prácticas o Clínicas Dentales y la forma de la localización, decoración, distribución y el aspecto de los locales que afecta la confianza de los pacientes actuales y los potenciales
Da lineamientos para que las Prácticas o Clínicas Dentales usen técnicas básicas de investigación de mercado que les ayuden a conocer mejor las necesidades, expectativas, temores y deseos de sus pacientes y de los pacientes potenciales en su zona
Aborda también los aspectos administrativos y financieros para que los Propietarios, Dentistas y Ejecutivos de las Prácticas dentales o Las Clínicas Dentales puedan sobrevivir económicamente a los avatares e inseguridades del mercado en la “Nueva Normalidad”
Los servicios NO Clínicos (Ambiente tranquilo con temas de decoración relajantes, toallitas húmedas, Televisión visible desde el sillón sin afectar al Dentista, audífonos para escuchar música relajante, etc.) como elementos diferenciadores de la competencia
Las promociones, para evitar que las Practicas Dentales o Clínicas Dentales caigan en ofertas que deteriore la imagen de calidad clínica al asociar a los tratamientos con productos de consumo, para que puedan diseñar y aplicar directamente los precios promocionales a sus ofertas de sus tratamientos dentales
Para hacer Marketing Directo intensivo en sus zonas de influencia, de manera de proteger a sus pacientes de los cantos de sirena de la competencia y a traer pacientes potenciales
La publicidad en medios locales y en las Redes Sociales en la Internet
La Venta Profesional de Tratamientos Dentales para mejorar la aceptación de sus presupuestos
Las relaciones y la atención a los pacientes centrados en su fidelización y que recomienden a la Práctica o Clínica Dental
Si siguen las recomendaciones y ejemplos del curso y fomentan el espíritu de cuerpo con su personal Sanitario (Higienistas) y Administrativo aplicando el Marketing Dental se asegurarán que las otras Practicas o Clínicas Dentales no le quiten pacientes o conseguir  nuevos pacientes insatisfechos de las Franquicias, las redes de Clínicas Dentales de Marcas y las Clínicas Dentales propiedad de las Aseguradoras de Salud  y que su Práctica o Clínica Dental atraiga a más pacientes dentales insatisfechos al competir con servicios, imagen y atención
La realidad es que siendo un curso que tiene más de tres años en Udemy todas sus sugerencias y ejemplos se han convertido hoy en día en un estándar del sector dental, por lo que su Práctica o Clínica Dental Independiente contará con herramientas y estrategias que la harán más competitiva, sobreviviendo al adebacle financiero que esta viviendo su país y el resto del mundo
Son ya casi 100 Prácticas o Clínicas Dentales las que han tomado este curso y todas coinciden  que les ayudó a salir adelante: ¡No pierda esta oportunidad!
target_audience: Propietarios, dentistas, empleados sanitarios (Higienistas) y Personal administrativo de las Prácticas o Clínicas Dentales o cualquier persona relacionada con el sector Dental

También sería conveniente que recibieran el curso los familiares de los Propietarios, Dentistas,  del personal Sanitario y Administrativo, ya que son los que pueden realizar por si mismos actividades para hacer a la Práctica o Clínica Dental más atractiva a los pacientes potenciales

requirements: Entrar a internet
courses.description:
Curso: Domina ChatGPT – De Principiante a Experto en Inteligencia Artificial Conversacional


En la era digital actual, el uso de la inteligencia artificial se ha convertido en una herramienta indispensable para mejorar la productividad, la creatividad y la capacidad de comunicación. Entre las innovaciones más destacadas se encuentra ChatGPT, un modelo de lenguaje desarrollado por OpenAI que ha revolucionado la manera en la que interactuamos con la tecnología. Este curso está diseñado para guiarte paso a paso en el dominio de ChatGPT, desde sus fundamentos básicos hasta las estrategias avanzadas para aplicarlo en diferentes áreas profesionales y personales.


El propósito de este programa formativo es que cualquier persona, independientemente de su nivel de experiencia en tecnología, pueda comprender y aprovechar al máximo el potencial de la inteligencia artificial conversacional. A través de una metodología práctica, sencilla y progresiva, te llevaré de la mano en un recorrido donde aprenderás no solo a usar la herramienta, sino también a pensar estratégicamente en cómo sacarle provecho en tu día a día.


¿Por qué un curso de ChatGPT?


En un mundo donde la información se genera y comparte a gran velocidad, contar con un asistente digital capaz de producir textos, resolver dudas, generar ideas, traducir, crear estrategias de marketing, diseñar guiones, redactar informes o incluso apoyarte en tareas académicas, se convierte en una ventaja competitiva.
Sin embargo, no basta con abrir ChatGPT y escribir una pregunta. El verdadero valor surge al aprender a formular prompts efectivos, estructurar instrucciones claras y aprovechar las funciones que hacen posible obtener respuestas útiles, creativas y personalizadas.


Este curso es la respuesta para quienes buscan transformar la curiosidad inicial en un conocimiento sólido y aplicable en múltiples contextos.


Objetivos del curso
Al finalizar este curso, los estudiantes serán capaces de:
Comprender qué es ChatGPT y cómo funciona a nivel conceptual.
Identificar los diferentes usos de la inteligencia artificial conversacional en ámbitos laborales, académicos, creativos y personales.
Desarrollar la habilidad de crear prompts avanzados que permitan obtener resultados precisos.
Aplicar ChatGPT como herramienta de apoyo en redacción, generación de ideas, planificación de proyectos y atención al cliente.
Integrar ChatGPT en procesos de marketing digital, creación de contenido y productividad personal.
Reconocer los límites y consideraciones éticas del uso de la inteligencia artificial.
target_audience: Estudiantes, amas de casa, profesionales y emprendedores

requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência em marketing ou qualquer outra formação acadêmica.
courses.description:
Adquira a sua credencial para explorar os bastidores do universo fascinante onde o esporte e os negócios se encontram! Neste curso, você mergulhará de cabeça em estratégias de jogo inovadoras e táticas poderosas que podem transformar o amante do esporte em um craque do marketing esportivo.


É a sua chance de entender o coração pulsante do marketing esportivo e, o mais emocionante, como isso se traduz na arena real, muito além dos manuais acadêmicos.


Este curso é a sua credencial para o mundo do esporte e do marketing se entrelaçando de maneira espetacular, revelando oportunidades de carreira tão emocionantes quanto uma prorrogação de tirar o fôlego. Aqui, você não apenas assistirá às tendências da revolução tecnológica moldando o jogo, mas também aprenderá a construir um time de contatos sólidos, fazendo passes precisos para se conectar com as estrelas do setor.


Descubra como elaborar seu próprio evento esportivo, criando jogadas surpreendentes e revolucionando a experiência do público com estratégias criativas inovadoras e estudos de caso inspiradores. O domínio na identificação dos diferentes tipos de torcedores e na satisfação de suas necessidades específicas é a tática vencedora no marketing esportivo.


O próposito do curso Marketing Esportivo Essencial é inspirar e proporcionar a jovens, estudantes, recém-formados e profissionais de todos os setores a oportunidade de fazer parte deste mercado que é tão amplo. São 22 módulos, onde muita experiência e diferentes perspectivas serão compartilhada contigo.


Prepare-se para o jogo.


Seja muito bem-vindo(a)!

requirements: Não há pré-requisitos para participar do curso. O importante é que os alunos façam as leituras indicadas para refletir e fixar o conteúdo apresentado.
courses.description:
A gestão estratégica de distribuidores refere-se ao planejamento e a execução de estratégias que vão possibilitar o cumprimento dos objetivos e o desenvolvimento de parcerias duradouras. Isso envolve a seleção de distribuidores e o treinamento destes em produtos e processos de vendas, bem como a definição e monitoramento de objetivos. É importante estabelecer expectativas claras em termos de metas de vendas e níveis de serviço a serem praticados pelo distribuidor.


Outro ponto importante é a avaliação contínua do desempenho. Isso deve ser feito por meio de indicadores de desempenho, como o atingimento de metas de vendas, cobertura de clientes, prazos de entrega, distribuição de produtos e apresentação dos produtos nos clientes.


Neste curso iremos trabalhar aspectos de gestão, a mentalidade e os comportamentos esperados do profissional responsável pelo atendimento do distribuidor. Será apresentada uma agenda de trabalho deste profissional cobrindo todos os pontos relevantes para que este desempenhe com excelência as suas funções e atinja os objetivos.


Estabelecer protocolos de atendimento e a formação da equipe de representantes de vendas dos distribuidores é um ponto crucial que envolve planejamento, treinamento e realização “coaching” de campo. O foco é tornar o representante de vendas menos transacional e mais agregador ao negócio do cliente, ajudando-o a se desenvolver.


Por fim, outro ponto que será dada atenção no curso é construção do JBP-Joint Business Planning (plano de negócios conjunto) com o distribuidor. Serão apresentadas as etapas de como desenvolvê-lo considerando a preparação por parte do profissional responsável pelo distribuidor, o engajamento e a execução do plano nos clientes.


Tenho a convicção que este curso promoverá reflexões e trará insights de como se estabelecer uma política diferenciada de relacionamento com distribuidores.
target_audience: O curso é indicado para profissionais que atuam tanto na indústria quando em distribuidores onde o objetivo maior é se trabalhar de forma colaborativa para o cumprimento dos objetivos traçados. Profissionais das áreas de vendas, marketing e trade marketing aprenderão como desenvolver  relações sólidas fortacendo as parcerias e ganhos mútuos.

courses.title: Mastering Viral Marketing: Driving Exponential Growth
courses.bio: Learn how to craft impactful viral marketing campaigns that captivate audiences and amplify your brand!
objectives: The fundamentals and purpose of viral marketing.
How to craft presentations and choose the best mediums for viral campaigns.
The various forms of viral marketing, from social media to word-of-mouth strategies.
The advantages of viral marketing, including scalability and resource optimization.
How to implement viral marketing strategies in today’s dynamic business environment.
requirements: Basic understanding of marketing concepts is helpful but not mandatory. An interest in learning innovative marketing techniques. Access to the internet for exploring viral marketing examples and tools.
courses.description:
Viral marketing is a powerful strategy that enables businesses to rapidly spread their message, reach vast audiences, and achieve exponential growth. In this course, students will explore the fundamentals, mediums, and forms of viral marketing, as well as its advantages and applications in today’s fast-paced business environment. From social media to word-of-mouth strategies, this course provides a comprehensive understanding of how to harness the potential of viral marketing for success.
Section-wise Writeup
Section 1: Introduction to Viral Marketing
This section introduces students to the concept of viral marketing, its core purpose, and its growing significance in the digital age. Through engaging examples and insights, students will understand how viral marketing leverages human psychology and technology to spread messages like wildfire.
Section 2: Basics of Viral Marketing
Delving deeper into the foundations of viral marketing, this section explains its essential elements, presentation techniques, and mediums. Students will learn how to choose the right platforms and craft compelling presentations that resonate with audiences, fostering maximum shareability.
Section 3: Forms of Viral Marketing
This section explores various forms of viral marketing, including word-of-mouth, social media, and web forums. It also highlights the importance of consistency (hammering) and continuity in maintaining momentum. Students will gain practical knowledge on how to utilize these forms effectively for their campaigns.
Section 4: Advantages of Viral Marketing
Understanding the benefits of viral marketing is crucial for strategic implementation. This section covers advantages such as scalability, multi-channel usage, and leveraging external resources to enhance reach and impact. By the end of this section, students will appreciate the cost-effective and high-return nature of viral marketing.
Section 5: Viral Marketing in Today’s Business Environment
The final section focuses on the application of viral marketing in modern business scenarios. Students will explore case studies, trends, and strategies for leveraging viral marketing to achieve business goals in a competitive and ever-evolving market landscape.
Conclusion
Viral marketing offers unparalleled opportunities for businesses to amplify their reach and achieve rapid growth. This course equips students with the knowledge and tools to design, execute, and sustain impactful viral marketing campaigns. By mastering these techniques, students will be ready to transform their marketing strategies and drive exceptional results.
target_audience: Marketing professionals aiming to enhance their digital strategies. Entrepreneurs and business owners seeking rapid brand growth. Content creators and social media managers looking to expand their reach. Students and learners interested in innovative marketing practices.

courses.title: Como funciona o Time de Marketing Dentro de uma Empresa
courses.bio: Entenda o que faz cada uma das funções, quais são as agências e times internos que você deve interagir constantemente.
requirements: Não há pré-requisitos
courses.description: Se você chegou agora ao time de marketing, quer fazer uma transição de carreira e mudar para este time ou apenas tem curiosidade em entender como funciona essa equipe que é responsável por garantir a exposição de marca no mercado, acesse este curso! Nele eu conto um pouco mais sobre como cada função trabalha dentro do time e como funciona a gestão das agências parceiras: dia a dia, formas de medir resultados e formas de contratação destes parceiros. O time de marketing é muitas vezes visto como distante do restante da organização e até arrogante. Por isso também dou dicas sobre como tornar a sua área de marketing mais forte dentro da empresa e próxima de todos, através de alianças internas e compartilhamento de informação. Com isso toda a empresa se tornará aliada ao marketing, entendendo suas ações e campanhas e advogando pela marca juntamente com você. Também compartilho algumas sugestões pessoas para que sua carreira no marketing seja sólida dentro de uma organização, afinal, depois de mais de dez anos nesta área, eu pude vivenciar bastante coisa. Este é um curso rápido e com linguagem simples para que você já chegue ao time entendendo seu funcionamento. Isso te salvará muito tempo e sua integração será bem mais rápida e confiante.

requirements: No prior experience or skill required for taking this online course
courses.description:
Let's face it: Selling NFTs (Non fungible Tokens) is NOT easy!
It's actually pretty damn hard...
So If you want to start selling your NFTs you need to become good at Marketing.
Yes, you need to start focusing on Marketing your Non Fungible Tokens.
You can't just expect to list them on Opensea or Rarible and start getting NFT sales.
You've gotta put all your efforts in marketing your NFTs if you really want to end up selling well and make yourself a good amount of money.
Through this course you will learn:
How to build your NFT Brand and become the "Apple" or "Tesla" of NFTs
How to leverage online communities and social medi agroups both on Facebook and Reddit
How you can work your way inside Clubhouse rooms related to NFTs and promote yourself there
How you can leverage Twitter to build awareness around your Brand and find people ready to buy your NFTs
How to go Viral on Social Media, especially on TikTok which is starting to pay close attention towards Non Fungible Tokens
How to find and collaborate with Top influencers in order to help you promoting your NFT Brand
Why you should channel all your focus and energy on one single NFT Marketplace instead of going after all of themù
Are you ready to start selling your NFTs by the truckload?
Alright then, Let's get started selling your NFTs!


NFT promotion is an art in itself. You need social community building, growth hacking, SEO, content marketing, PR, and paid advertising to broadcast your NFT item benefits to your target audience.
Here are the top strategies to promote your NFT:
PR
Public relations is one of the best ways to build a solid online reputation for your business. Using PR for NFT marketing yields a better ROI because with PR, you can send the right message to the right people at the right time.
SEO
Search engine optimization services help to improve the organic visibility of your NFT project. There are several search queries that people enter when looking to buy an NFT. Some examples of search queries are:
Which are the best NFTs to buy?
Where can I buy an NFT?
How to buy an NFT?
Best NFT tokens
List of top-selling NFTs
Where can I buy NFT trading cards?


Influencer Marketing
Influencers are experts in their field, and they have the power to affect the purchasing decision of others. NFTs and social media go hand in hand, and influencers help spread the word about your digital artworks, leading to more traffic acquisition, better project visibility and higher bids.


Social Media Promotion
Beeple’s NFT was sold at Christie’s auction for $69 million. Among all the other factors contributing to this high price, there is a social media factor that should not be overlooked. Beeple has a large social media follower base of more than 2.5 million spread across different channels. Hence, social media is a crucial factor for community building and NFT promotion.

courses.description:
Modernize your team, improve team chemistry, and make every member of your marketing team more efficient!
WHAT IS AGILE MARKETING
Agile marketing is a set of strategies and methodologies that help your team operate more efficiently, be more adaptive to change, learn and evolve faster, and ultimately create products or marketing materials that end up best-in-class, and outcompete your competitors.
USE TIMEBOXING FOR TEAM TIME MANAGEMENT
Timeboxing is an advanced time management technique used by modern Agile development and Agile marketing teams as well as world-leading entrepreneurs such as Elon Musk and Bill Gates - and soon, you too!
GREAT FOR BEGINNERS TO START YOUR TRANSITION TO AGILE MARKETING
This course does not assume prior knowledge of Agile marketing. We'll start from the very basics, define all the necessary terminology, spell out the key concepts, and help you ease into this process at a comfortable step!
EVOLVE YOUR TEAM EFFICIENCY
The word "agile" should be taken somewhat literally. By being more flexible and adaptive, your team will increase its agility, learn faster, make more informed decisions, and ultimately create better products - all while improving over time. So future projects will turn out better and better.
EMBRACE AGILE MARKETING FULLY OR PARTIALLY
You don't have to always follow the strict definition and process of Agile marketing. I'll teach you how to think intelligently about different aspects of Agile marketing, so you can make your own decisions which elements of it are an ideal fit for your team.
Invest in your future! Enroll today!
