courses.description:
Cold email is just like a dart that is thrown in the dark. It might hit or not, but it is important to throw the dart the right way in order to increase the chances of hitting the bulls-eye.
For salespeople and Marketing people who could do cold email the right way,it's been observed response rates from 15 to 20 percent to be exceptional. Some companies have a 44% response rate to their cold emails.
Open rates can be increased by a whopping 49% with A/B split testing in your campaigns.
Split testing is squaring one email off against the other to see which one gets the best results and use the winner as a new test to create another variation with slight variations.
You will be surprised at changing one little word can make a huge difference after a split test.


Open rates can be increased by around 22% by including the recipient’s name in the subject line.
Realistic targets can be set by using the industry average open rates.
Catchy subject lines could increase open rates
Improve your targeting.
Reply rates can be improved with personalized emails.
Split testing can also improve open rates.
Increase reply rates by email follow up.
Bring only the good stuff to people.
Get to the point quickly.
Keep it informal.
Be confident.
target_audience: Cold email
Lead generation
B2B Cold Email
Email Marketing
B2B Cold Email Marketing
Email Marketing Strategies

courses.title: Marketing a Prova di Privacy
courses.bio: Come fare marketing rispettando la privacy
objectives: Quali sono le regole da rispettare per fare marketing diretto nel rispetto della normativa privacy
Differenze fra marketing tradizionale ed automatizzato a fini privacy e registro delle opposizioni
Il consenso al trattamento dei dati per finalità di marketing: quando è necessario, come raccoglierlo e quando dura
Come redigere un'informativa privacy per trattare i dati a fini di marketing

Nozioni di marketing e privacy: Ambito soggettivo della protezione nel marketing
Dati inviati e dati ricevuti: La comunicazione di dati a terzi
Trattare i dati ricevuti da terzi
Il legittimo interesse: Marketing diretto basato sul legittimo interesse
La durata del consenso: Un diamante è per sempre... ma il consenso?

requirements: Non è necessario avere conoscenze precedenti in materia di privacy, imparerai tutto quello che serve ad un esperto marketing
courses.description:
Marketing e Privacy vengono spesso considerati nemici giurati. Il responsabile privacy dell'azienda è l'incubo peggiore del reparto marketing e viceversa. Ma non deve necessariamente essere così!
Fare marketing in modo efficace ma rispettando la normativa privacy è possibile, e in questo corso ti spiegherò come farlo.
Così, non solo ridurrai il rischio di sanzioni, ma la maggiore fiducia ottenuta dai potenziali clienti potrà addirittura migliorare l'efficacia delle tue campagne.
Questo corso è pensato per chi lavora in ambito marketing ed ha bisogno, una volta per tutte, di fare chiarezza su ciò che si può fare con i dati personali e su come farlo. Del resto, in questa materia c'è tantissima confusione. Su blog e social network si leggono le opinioni più disparate e, spesso, prive di ogni fondamento.
Ho quindi pensato di creare un corso che, in modo semplice e non noioso, mettesse ordine una volta per tutte in questa complicata materia.
Anziché con le solite e soporifere slide, ho deciso di farlo con disegni ed animazioni, in lezioni pillole da pochi minuti ciascuna. In questo modo, non pretendo certo di riuscire a divertirvi, ma vorrei almeno insegnarvi qualcosa, senza farvi addormentare.
Dimenticavo, non è necessario avere competenze in materia di privacy. Il corso è adatto a tutti: sia chi è alle prime armi, sia chi si sente già un esperto.
target_audience: Esperti marketing che necessitano di una guida chiara e completa sulle regole da seguire per trattare i dati personali
Imprenditori che vogliono fare marketing nel rispetto della normativa privacy

courses.title: Domine o Mercado da Saúde: Estratégias para médicos
courses.bio: Conquiste sua Jornada na Medicina: Domine o Mercado da Saúde com Estratégias para Médicos de Sucesso
objectives: Desenvolva Presença de Marca Impactante: Aprenda a criar presença no universo on e off que cativam pacientes e refletem a excelência de sua prática médica.
Conquiste Autoridade na sua Área: Descubra técnicas para se tornar uma autoridade respeitada, estabelecendo confiança e atraia um fluxo constante de clientes
Crie seu diferencial competitivo: Crie um posicionamento que não permita a copia e te coloque em uma posição onde você tenha poucos ou nenhum concorrênte
EXTRA: Estratégias para você já sair do curso ganhando mercado, construindo a marca e colocando seu novo POSICIONAMENTO a prova.

INTRODUÇÃO: Introdução: A importância do posicionamento na área da saúde
COMO SEU CLIENTE ESCOLHE: Como Facilitar a Escolha do Seu Cliente Por Você
PROPOSTA DE VALOR: Construindo uma Proposta de Valor (PARTE I)

TORNANDO-SE A PRIMEIRA (OU SEGUNDA) OPÇÃ: Como Funciona o Posicionamento em outras Marcas?
EXTRA: DIRECIONAMENTOS ESTRATÉGICOS: Conhecendo o Mix de Marketing e as Possibilidades Estratégicas
Possibilidades e Exemplos de Caminhos Estratégicos

requirements: Ter conhecimento mínimo sobre as escolhas da sua carreira médica
Ter conhecimento mínimo sobre o mercado de saúde que você está atuando (Quais são os outros profissionais e o que eles estão vendendo)
courses.description:
Bem-vindo ao curso "Domine o Mercado da Saúde: Estratégias para médicos".
Um caminho para conquistar sua Jornada na Medicina: Domine o Mercado da Saúde com Estratégias para Médicos de Sucesso
Em um cenário digital em constante evolução, é crucial para os profissionais de saúde entenderem como se destacar em seu mercado. Este curso abrangente foi meticulosamente elaborado para médicos que desejam elevar sua prática a novos patamares.
Durante o curso, você será guiado para construir uma presença  sólida e envolvente em seu mercado. Aprenderemos desde a presença da sua identidade pública até o desenvolvimento de estratégias de marketing personalizadas. Exploraremos técnicas de posicionamento, possibilitando que você crie seu próprio posicionamento tornando-se relevante e atrativo.
Além disso, abordaremos a gestão de reputação, ajudando você a cultivar uma imagem positiva e a lidar com  essa presença de maneira profissional.
Você ganhará insights sobre como se tornar uma autoridade respeitado na área da saúde, estabelecendo confiança e atraindo pacientes qualificados.
Prepare-se para uma jornada transformadora, onde você não só dominará a prática do posicionamento, mas também as estratégias  essenciais para se destacar no mercado da saúde.
Vamos construir juntos um caminho para o sucesso, combinando a excelência médica com uma presença online poderosa. Matricule-se agora e inicie sua jornada rumo à excelência e prosperidade na medicina moderna!
target_audience: Médicos que estão iniciando seu consultório agora
Médicos que estão iniciando a carreira
Estudantes de medicina

courses.title: Curso Online: Como Escolher Estrategicamente
courses.bio: O Seu Nicho de Mercado
objectives: Definir um nicho com altas possibilidades lucrativas
Ter um Mapa para nunca mais ficarem perdidas
Aprender a analisar o mercado
Criar um curso de uma forma simples e eficaz

Etapa 01: Como Escolher um Nicho Lucrativo de Mercado? Parte 01
Etapa 02: Como Escolher um Nicho Lucrativo de Mercado? Parte 02
Etapa 03: Duas Formas Poderosas de Aprofundar a Pesquisa de Mercado
A Forma Mais Inteligente de Planejar e Estruturar Seu Curso

requirements: O que você irá aprender nesse treinamento você será capaz de aplicar em qualquer nicho
courses.description:
Hoje muitas pessoas estão percebendo cada vez mais as vantagens de criar um curso online.


E a cada dia novos cursos são criados nos mais diferentes tipos de assuntos.


Mesmo assim, muitas pessoas ainda estão presas no pilar mais importante na definição e criação de um curso.


A definição de um nicho de mercado


O motivo?


Elas estão enfrentando o eu que chamo de O Efeito Labirinto.


Esse efeito faz com que elas…


Fiquem travadas em criar um curso que alguém gostaria de comprar porque não conseguem definir corretamente seu nicho de mercado.
Acabam tendo muita dificuldade em criar de uma forma simples e correta seu curso online porque não acertam na forma correta de definir seu nicho.


Para você sair do Efeito Labirinto você precisa encontrar uma saída.


Pra isso vou lhe apresentar o que eu chamo de O Processo de 3 Etapas.


Através desse processo de 3 etapas você será capaz de sair de um mar de dúvidas e confusão para uma visão clara e objetiva sobre como definir seu nicho de mercado.


Na primeira etapa você irá aprender qual o melhor caminho para definir seu nicho.


E aqui eu preciso revelar um ponto muito importante.


Se você deseja vender seu curso online, essa etapa vai ser crucial.


Na segunda etapa você vai conseguir ter um mapa do labirinto, sabendo exatamente o caminho mais lógico para escolher um nicho de mercado.


Na terceira etapa você vai conseguir superar um grande risco do efeito labirinto.


O risco de fazer um trabalho, e perder tempo na criação de um curso que ninguém vai ter interesse.


O conteúdo desse treinamento faz parte de um Serviço Premium onde cobro R $997,00 em consultoria e sinceramente eu não sei até quando manterei ele disponível por esse preço.


O motivo de estar disponibilizado esse treinamento por esse preço é justamente para ajudar o máximo de pessoas a vencerem o efeito labirinto.


Só assim elas conseguiram dar o próximo passo e…


Definir um nicho com altas possibilidades lucrativas
Ter um Mapa para nunca mais ficarem perdidas
Criar um curso de uma forma simples e eficaz




E para tirar qualquer dúvida se esse treinamento é para você.


Comprando hoje e não gostando do treinamento por qualquer motivo você tem até 30 dias  para pedir reembolso seguindo as políticas aqui da plataforma.


Eu preciso ser muito sincero com você, hoje eu vejo muitas pessoas que tem um potencial gigante totalmente travadas, pessoas que eram para estar em um outro contexto em relação aos seus cursos.


Mas por conta do efeito labirinto permanecem perdidas.


E o que vai te fazer sair desse labirinto e simplesmente trilhar um novo caminho.


E utilizando o Processo de 3 Etapas você nunca mais ficará perdido na escolha de um nicho.


Definir um nicho será algo prazeroso e você perceberá a quantidade de oportunidades que existem para criar cursos com muitas possibilidades lucrativas.


Garanta a sua vaga agora.
Um Forte abraço
Sucesso!
target_audience: Esse treinamento é destinado aquelas pessoas que estão perdidas quando o assunto é definir um nicho de mercado para a construção de seus cursos online

courses.title: Cómo crear un ecommerce con poco presupuesto
courses.bio: Aprende a crear una tienda online profesional desde cero en tiempo récord y promocionarla en Google y Facebook
objectives: Aprenderás a crear un ecommerce desde cero con Wordpress y Woocommerce
Aprenderás a diseñar tu sitio con plugins premiun incluidos en el curso
Aprenderás a dar de alta productos y gestionar envíos
Aprenderás a crear anuncios en Facebook y Google para promover tus productos con poco presupuesto
Aprenderás a medir tus resultados con Google Analytics
Aprenderás a optimizar tus campañas

Día 1: Plataforma: Diseña la página de inicio y productos
Configura el envío y forma de pago
Dale un diseño profesional con estas plantillas
Día 2: Marketing: Crea una campaña en Facebook Ads
Crea una campaña en Google Ads
¿Funciona?: Cómo optimizar tu campaña de Facebook Ads
Cómo optimizar tu campaña en Google Ads

requirements: No se necesita experiencia. Aprenderás todo lo que se necesita dentro del curso.
courses.description:
****** Aprende los conocimientos esenciales de Wordpress, Woocommerce, Facebook Ads, Google Ads y crea tu propia libertad creando tu tienda online ******
CURSO CONSTANTEMENTE ACTUALIZADO
No solamente obtendrás más tiempo libre, sino que también en el proceso aprenderás a diseñar desde cero una tienda en línea que te permitirá vender cualquier producto sin necesidad de pagar comisiones y planes mensuales. ¡Tu tendrás el control de tu tienda! También aprenderás a crear anuncios en Facebook y Google Ads con muy poco presupuesto.
¿Vale la pena crear un ecommerce que pagar planes mensuales en otras plataformas?
Sea cual sea el fin para el que quieras crear un ecommerce, es mucho más económico diseñar tu propio sitio que pagar planes mensuales ya que utilizaras servicios que te enseñare a conseguirlos a un precio muy barato. Además, tienes acceso a más herramientas que muchas veces no puedes agregar en una plataforma de pago.
¿Por qué es el momento perfecto para crear un ecommerce?
El comercio electrónico ha tenido un incremento del 80% desde que inicio este año. Eso significa que la gente ya tiene más confianza de comprar en línea y es el momento perfecto para crear tu propia tienda.
Deja atrás a tu competencia iniciando por el camino menos rodado y más renumerado.
No es necesario ser técnico para desarrollar un comercio electrónico
Todos las clases están estructuradas para que inicies tu negocio en menos de 2 días.
Contenido y visión general del curso
Dentro del curso comparto paso a paso el enfoque que utilice para crear y promover tu tienda. Incluyendo:
Lecciones en vídeo HD
Descripción detallada para diseñar un sitio web
Los mejores recursos de estudio
3 estrategias garantizadas para reducir el tiempo de estudio en un 50% o más
Acceso a foros de discusión y preguntas para el instructor
***Este curso cuenta con 30 días de garantía
INVIERTE EN TI MISMO
¡Regístrese ya para obtener la certificación!
target_audience: Dirigido para aquellos que no tengan experiencia con WordPress y quieran desarrollar su propia tienda desde cero

courses.title: 90 Günlük Eylem Planı
courses.bio: Network Marketing işinizi 90 günlük yoğun eylem ile inşa edin
objectives: Takımınızı kurmaya hemen başlayabileceksiniz. Takım kurma konusunda artık bir sorun yaşamayacaksınız. Dahası var. Bu takımınız tarafından da aynen kopyalanacak
İlk ciddi finansal başarılarınızı elde etmeye başlayabileceksiniz. Benim gibi Network Marketing'de sıfır çekmişseniz bu kursla şeytanın bacağını kıracaksınız
Sosyal kanıta dönüşebileceksiniz. İnsanlar size "Peki sen ne başardın?" gibi bir soru sorduklarında onlara kapı gibi sosyal kanıtlarınızı gösterebileceksiniz
Soğuk çevrede nasıl çalışılacağını öğreneceksiniz. Hayatın normal akışı devam ederken her an tanışmış olduğunuz insanlara sponsorluk yapmaya başlayacaksınız
Duruşunuzu çok güçlendirmiş olacaksınız. Artık bu oyunu mutsuz, pasif, zayıf, korkarak, çekinerek değil, mutlu, cesur ve korkusuzca oynamaya başlayacaksınız
Psikolojik hazırlığınızı tamamlayacak, zihinsel altyapıyı güçlendireceksiniz. Yapılması gereken işe karşı psikolojik üstünlüğü artık ele geçirmiş olacaksınız

Giriş: Şu dekontu sen bi cebine koy hele!
Birinci ayda ne yaptım neyi elde ettim?
İkinci ayda ne yaptım neyi elde ettim?
Üçüncü ayda ne yaptım neyi elde ettim?
Dördüncü ayda ne yaptım neyi elde ettim?
Para için mi özgürlük için mi?
Bu iş olmuyor» diyenlere sorduğum 5 soru

requirements: Her hangi bir yetkinliğe, deneyime ihtiyaç yoktur.
courses.description:
Bu kursun süresi yaklaşık 6 saattir.
6 saat sonra çok büyük ihtimalle Network Marketing yaşamınızda tüm hayal kırıklıklarını, başarısızlıkları geride bırakacaksınız.
Ben Network Marketing işine 1997 yılında başladım.
15 yıl boyunca bu sektörde sıfır çektim.
12 yıl boyunca sadece 1 kişiyi kaydettim.
15 yılda 2 kişiyi.
Bu kadar.
2012 yılında çok güçlü bir dizi karar aldım.
Hayat insanı bazen köşeye öyle bir sıkıştırıyor ki, insanın elinde Network Marketing'de başarılı olmak dışında başka bir seçenek kalmıyor.
Benim de başka seçeceğim kalmamıştı.
Derhal bazı kararlar almam gerekiyordu.
Aldığım kararlar şunlardı.
1. 3 ayda 500 kişiye sunum videosunu seyrettirmek.
2. Seyrettirdiğim her kişiden kararını mümkünse hemen, değilse de en geç 72 saat içinde vermesini istemek.
3. 3 ayda 500 kişi sunum videosunu seyretmeden işin nasıl gittiği ile ilgili herhangi bir şekilde yorum yapmamak.
4 ay sürdü.
Network Marketing işimi inşa ettiğim o benzersiz 3 ay.
"Bu iş demek ki böyle inşa oluyormuş" dedirten o 3 ay.
Bir daha asla o kadar çılgınca çalışmak zorunda kalmadığım o 3 ay.
Beni tanıyan, bilenler yıllardır bu hikayeyi bana sürekli olarak anlattırırlar.
Her defasında anlatmam dakikalarımı alır.
Tamamını da bir türlü anlatamam.
Nasıl anlatabilirim?
İşin içinde sadece ses yok ki! Görüntüler de var.
Sonunda hikayemi bir kurs haline getirip yayınlamaya karar verdim.
Anlatması yaklaşık 6 saat sürdü.
Bu kursta yaşadığım o efsane, unutulmaz 3 ayı anlattım.
Böylelikle hem ben her şeyi eksiksiz olarak anlatabildim hem de öğrenme konusunda istekli olan kişi eksiksiz olarak her şeyi ekran görüntüleri ile birlikte görebilme anlayabilme şansını elde etmiş oldu.
Şöyle düşün! Bir cafeye oturmuşuz. Benden hikayemi dinlemek istiyorsun. Ben de 6 saat boyunca her türlü detayı önüne koyarak o anları sana da yaşatarak anlatıyorum. Kahveler senden :)
Keyfini çıkarın!
Saygılarımla,
Yavuz Bağcı
target_audience: Öğrenme isteği olanlar
Girişimci
Bilgiye açık olanlar
Eğitilebilir
Geniş vizyon sahibi
Uzun vadeli düşünebilenler

courses.title: 策展思维：用策展创造“卖货”新价值
courses.bio: 新零售赋能：通过策展创造销售的新价值
objectives: 学习如何运用策展思维，将产品或服务呈现给目标市场，以提升销售效果和市场吸引力。
掌握如何通过策展创造新的销售价值，从而开发创新的销售策略和市场营销方案。
提升对目标市场需求的理解，从而增强企业在竞争激烈的市场中的竞争力。
学习如何通过策展手段优化客户体验，提升客户满意度和忠诚度。

课程内容: 第一章 什么是策展思维
第二章 线下零售需要策展思维
第三章 用策展设计客户体验
第四章 策划能力提高“销售能力
第五章 场景营销创造价值

requirements: 无需前置经验
courses.description: 在当今竞争激烈的市场环境中，传统的销售和市场营销模式已经不能满足企业持续增长的需求。为此，三节课携手黄豆豆老师带来本门课程，旨在帮助学员掌握策展思维的核心概念和实际应用，通过创新的方式提升产品和服务的市场吸引力和销售效果。课程将深入探讨如何从策展的角度重新定义品牌展示和消费体验，以及如何通过策展创造与众不同的市场竞争优势。无论您是销售专业人员、市场营销从业者还是创业者，本课程都将为您提供必备的工具和思维模式，帮助您在激烈的市场竞争中脱颖而出，实现业务增长和品牌价值的最大化。
target_audience: 零售业从业者，特别是销售和市场营销领域的专业人士
品牌经理和营销经理
电商平台运营人员
企业主和创业者，尤其是在产品推广和销售策略方面有需求的人员

courses.description:
** Bestselling A/B testing course on Udemy in the category: A/B testing**

As a Conversion Optimization specialist or as someone working on website A/B testing, your success is often determined by the number of A/B tests you run and the number of test winners you find. So the more tests you run, the higher your chance of success. But very often, the IT department is a major bottleneck for us. When we want to set up a test, it ends up at the bottom of the IT backlog, costing you valuable time and decreasing your chance to be successful in AB testing. If you recognize this situation, then this is the right course for you.
By taking this course you will learn:
HTML
CSS for website AB testing
JavaScript (jQuery) for website AB testing
Data tracking for website AB testing
Setting up 60 to 90% of your own A/B tests without the help of a developer
This helps you to set up and run many more A/B tests and greatly increase your success. The course is set up in a practical and engaging manner. Together, we will start with the absolute basics before building many different kinds of A/B tests on your own website, while we increase the complexity step by step. The course is designed for people with no coding skills, and for those that have some experience already. The learnings in this course are applicable to every testing tool on the market.
Coding for A/B testing course structure
Section 1: Introduction
Section 2: HTML
Section 3: CSS for AB testing
Section 4: jQuery for AB testing
Section 5: JavaScript for AB testing
Section 6: Data gathering for AB testing
Section 7: Debugging & Quality assurance for AB testing
Section 8: Thank you
Of course, there are many web development courses out there. But there is one big difference: As a Conversion specialist, you don’t build websites, you chance them. This requires a completely different focus on coding while also making sure you obtain reliable and trustworthy data. Web development courses help you to build websites, this course helps you to build and run reliable and successful A/B tests.
The course is designed for anyone working on A/B testing. Conversion specialists, growth hackers, and even front-end developers can hugely benefit from this course.
Now let’s get started. Feel free to check out the free preview lectures, or start taking this course right now.
target_audience: Conversion specialists who want to run more A/B tests
Anyone working on A/B testing

courses.title: 【한글자막】 옴니채널 고객경험 관리 (CXM)
courses.bio: 옴니 채널 생태계에서 심리스한 고객 경험을 구축하는 방법 및 고객의 니즈를 충족시킬 수 있는 고객경험 관리 전략을 수립하세요!
objectives: 종합적인 옴니 채널 고객 경험 관리 전략을 수립합니다.
전체 고객 여정에 걸쳐 고객에게 심리스하고 긍정적인 경험을 제공합니다.
상세한 고객여정지도(Customer Journey Maps)를 작성해 봅니다.
탄탄한 구매자 페르소나를 만듭니다.
비즈니스의 가장 중요한 고객 집단(들)을 파악합니다.
심리스한 옴니 채널 경험을 제공하기 위해 조직 구조를 개선합니다.
각 비즈니스 채널의 성과를 평가하고 극대화합니다.
다양한 비즈니스 채널 간 일관성을 구현합니다.
기술을 활용하여 고객 경험과 채널의 성과를 향상시킵니다.
사일로 운영 체제에서 탈피하여 협업 시스템으로 나아가 조직 전체의 능률을 올립니다.
고객과 관련된 핵심 인사이트를 도출합니다.

고객 파악하기: 고객 파악하기 2: 고객 분석 및 사용자 행동 추적 도구
기술 활용 및 통합: 옴니채널 고객 경험 관리에서 기술의 역할 (1부)
옴니채널 고객 경험 관리에서 기술의 역할 (2부)
기술을 선택할 때 고려해야 할 중요 사항

requirements: 마케팅과 고객 경험에 대한 기본적인 이해를 갖추어야 합니다.
courses.description:
옴니채널 고객경험관리(CXM) 강의!
고객의 니즈를 충족시킬 수 있는 고객경험 관리 전략을 수립하세요!


옴니채널 고객경험 관리 (CXM) 강의를 선택해야 하는 이유
옴니채널 고객을 중심으로 한 고객경험관리 (Customer Experience Management; CXM) 과정에 오신 여러분을 환영합니다.
고객여정지도(Customer Journey Map)가 변화하고 있습니다. 고객 여정은 더 이상 A지점에서 B로 가는 직선이 아닙니다.
이제 고객들은 기업과 상호 작용할 때 다수의 채널(multiple channels)을 활용하며, 가장 중요하게도 그러한 채널을 호환적으로, 그리고 동시에 사용하고 있습니다. 이는 긍정적이고 심리스한 고객 경험을 제공하기 위해 서로 다른 채널이 통합적으로 운영될 필요가 있다는 것을 뜻하는데, 이것은 곧 옴니채널 고객경험 관리의 필요성을 의미합니다.
낡고 전통적인 고객 관리 프레임워크를 적용하는 기업들은 오늘날의 고객 니즈를 제대로 충족시키지 못하고 있습니다. 이로 인해 단절되고 부정적인 경험이 초래되어 막대한 이익 손실을 입고 있죠.


이 과정에서 여러분은 채널 전반에 걸쳐 원활하고 심리스한 고객 경험을 제공할 수 있는 종합적인 옴니채널 고객경험 관리 전략을 수립하는 방법에 대해 학습하게 됩니다.


전략은 다음과 같은 섹션으로 나누어져 있습니다:
1. 고객 파악하기:
가장 중요한 고객 집단을 제대로 이해하는 데 사용할 수 있는 다양한 기법과 도구에 대해 알아봅니다.
인구 통계, 행동, 습관, 태도, 선호도 등과 같은 고객에 대한 주요 인사이트를 도출하는 방법에 대해 학습합니다.
이러한 인사이트는 고객 경험 관리(CXM)의 기반이 될 겁니다.
이 섹션에서 다룰 기법은 다음과 같습니다: 질적 및 양적 조사, 고객 분석 및 사용자 행동 추적 도구, 구매자 페르소나, 고객여정지도
2. 채널 간 일관성 구현하기:
채널 간 일관성을 구현하여 서로 다른 채널이 통합적으로 운영되게 하는 프로세스로, 채널 간 이동 시 보다 원활한 고객 경험을 제공합니다.
이 섹션에서는 일관성의 4가지 축을 다룹니다: 1) 디자인 & 미학(Design & Aesthetics), 2) 분류(Categorization), 3) 용어(Terminology), 4) 기능성(Functionality)
3. 기술 활용 및 통합:
옴니채널 고객 경험 관리에서 기술의 중요성과 전략에서 기술이 수행하는 2가지 주요 역할에 대해 알아봅니다.
기술을 사용하여 기업과 고객에게 최상의 서비스를 제공하는 방법을 학습합니다.
조직에서 투자할 기술을 선택할 때 고려해야 할 핵심 사항을 학습합니다.
4. 조직 구조 개선하기:
기존의 운영 체계가 심리스한 옴니채널 경험을 구축하기 위한 회사의 노력에 미치는 부정적인 영향을 살펴봅니다.
심리스한 옴니채널 경험 제공을 위해 도전적이지만 필수적인 조직 구조 개편 작업을 위한 8가지 모범 사례를 살펴봅니다.
5. 고객과 긴밀한 관계 구축하기:
옴니채널 생태계에서 긴밀한 고객 관계를 구축하면 어떠한 모습인지 살펴봅니다.
수많은 채널을 가지고 개인화(personalization)를 이루는 방법에 대해 알아봅니다.
마지막으로, 단일 고객 뷰(Single Customer View) 개념에 대해 알아보고, 이를 구축할 때 직면하는 장애물과 이러한 장애물을 극복하기 위해 취할 수 있는 조치에 대해 학습합니다.


지금 바로 이 과정에 등록하셔서 오늘날 고객들에게 너무나도 중요한 심리스한 옴니채널 경험을 제공하시기 바랍니다!


강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 남겨주세요. 그래야 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)


첫번째 강의에서 만나요!
- Dana
target_audience: 마케터, 전략가, C레벨 임원, 경영진, 기업가 또는 중소기업 대표. 고객 경험을 향상시키고 뛰어난 고객 경험을 만드는 데 관심이 있는 누구나 수강하실 수 있습니다

courses.bio: 不論線上、線下、個人、企業、有資源、沒資源、大品牌、小品牌都一體適用的行銷法則！

courses.description:
如果你Google「行銷」兩字，一秒內就會出現高達 21,200,000 項結果，從以前到現在各式各樣說明行銷的理論，自1960年提出了4P以來不斷推陳出新、不斷的自我增生，行銷的範圍如此廣泛、行銷的工具日新月異，是否可能有一個貫穿所有概念的行銷法則嗎?
我認為可以透過以下公式來詮釋：
M = Contents 內容 X Community 社群 X Commerce 商務
內容 不只是圖、文、設計、包裝、影像等等，你產品本身也屬於內容的一部分。
社群 不只是指線上的社群，它也包括線下的部分，例如你的實體店面會員、你購買一篇雜 誌廣告，這本雜誌的閱讀群也是社群的概念。
商務 是指你交付商品或服務的方式或管道。


如果對這堂課有興趣的朋友，可以先聽聽看第一堂課唷！！！
target_audience: 準備進行行銷活動的行銷專員

Welcome to Inclusive Marketing: From Strategy to Execution. In this course, you’ll learn how to create content, campaigns, and brand experiences that reflect the real diversity of your audience — across race, gender, age, ability, and more.
We'll explore why inclusive marketing matters, how it builds trust and loyalty, and how to avoid common pitfalls like stereotypes and tokenism. We’ll cover the concept of intersectionality, guide you through inclusive global messaging, and tie it all together with marketing fundamentals like the 4 Ps, segmentation, and positioning.


By the end of the course, you’ll be equipped to build campaigns that are not only effective — but inclusive, respectful, and truly representative of the world around you.

courses.bio: Lihai melihat potensi media dan teknik komunikasi pemasaran dari studi kasus brand ternama seperti Nike dan Nikon
objectives: Memahami pentingnya komunikasi pemasaran (marketing communication).

courses.description:
Komunikasi pemasaran terpadu atau Integrated Marketing Communication bisa membantu kalian membangun dan membuat campaign marketing yang jitu serta selaras di market. Hindari beragam kesalahan dalam mengkomunikasikan produk atau jasa yang mengakibatkan produk sulit dimengerti sehingga brand gagal dibangun secara kohesif. Pelajari studi kasus dari brand-brand global yang sukses melakukan marketing communication secara kuat, komprehensif dan konsisten di media manapun mereka berada.


Di kelas ini, kalian juga bisa mengenali dan melihat peluang dari media yang tersedia sebagai alat komunikasi, serta memastikan key message yang selaras penurunannya sehingga memudahkan pemahaman khalayak. Ketahui metriks yang harus diukur untuk bisa mengevaluasi performa komunikasi pemasaran agar budget yang digunakan semakin efisien.


Kelas ini bertujuan untuk:
Memahami pentingnya komunikasi pemasaran (marketing communication).
Membangun value dari penawaran produk maupun jasa yang dimiliki.
Membuat diferensiasi pada produk sebagai dasar key message.
Mengasah creative thinking saat memasarkan dan mengkomunikasikan penawaran.
Memilah dan memilih media sebagai alat komunikasi yang sesuai dengan tujuan bisnis yang ingin dicapai.
Mengetahui metriks serta indikator penting dalam komunikasi pemasaran yang harus diukur.
Mengevaluasi dan menetapkan kesuksesan penggunaan media melalui media planning dan media buying.


Kelas ini cocok bagi:
Brand manager maupun marketing manager yang bertanggung jawab atas brand building dan development di sebuah perusahaan.
Pemilik bisnis atau entrepreneur yang ingin menjalankan inisiatif komunikasi pemasaran untuk usahanya.
Strategic planner, communication strategist atau brand konsultan yang menangani kegiatan komunikasi klien di sebuah agency.
Mahasiswa yang ingin mendapatkan wawasan praktis dan implementasi menyeluruh dari teori yang diajarkan di kelas.

courses.description:
【リアル店舗にかかわる皆さんへ】
ユニクロで買う場合とシャネルで買う場合、同じ“服”というものを買う行為でも“気分（感性）”が違います。
“品質の良し悪し”“価格の高い安い”ではなく、お客様の“期待値”が違うのです。
“期待値”を超える“店舗体験”は大きな満足感を与えます。


この講座では、そんな店舗体験を提供するために
・お買い物する際の人間の感情開放度（抑圧〜心地よく開放）
・お買い物する際の人間の感性価値の分類（利便性〜快適性〜快楽的）
を学びます。


次に店舗内のスペースごとの役割を知ります。


こうすることで各店舗内のスペースでお客さんにどのような体験をしてもらうのか？という、店舗体験の企画につなげます。


参考事例は飲食店からファッションのお店、そして自動車のショールームまで。


最終的に自店における『店舗体験シナリオ』が描けることを目指します。
（『店舗体験シナリオ』のフォーマットもダウンロード可能です）
このシナリオが実践されることで、コロナ禍を乗り越えた先でもお客さんに支持され続けるリアル店舗が生まれます。


またこの講座は、リアルで行われたセミナーの様子を収録しています。実際にセミナーに参加している様な臨場感も味わえます。


中盤にゲスト講師によるセミナーも盛り込みました。
セレクトショップの経営者として、コロナ禍を乗り越えた実践例（店頭A看板、SNS発信、お客様対応）をわかり易く解説してくれています。

courses.bio: How to turn yourself into a Direct Booking Strategist so you can work with hotels on a freelance fee or commission basis
objectives: This course will give you everything you need to know to set up a freelance relationship with hotels, on an upfront fee or commission basis. And it shows you how to automate a lot of the work so you can be working with more than 1 hotel at a time, thereby multiplying your income.

Specifically, after you complete this course you’ll be able to: 1. Understand how the hospitality industry works and spot opportunities. 2. Sell your services to work with hotels as a freelancer, through up-front fees or on commission. 3. Set up a direct marketing system and automate distribution through affiliates. 4. Run financial reports to prove your Return on Investment (ROI). 5. Approach associations and offer your client/hotel as a venue to earn even more commissions and define yourself as a business partner. 6. Set up a 12-month road map that will allow you to manage more than 1 hotel at a time. 7. Earn the title of ‘direct booking strategist’.

This includes step-by-step instruction on how to: Deploy the GuestCentric eCommerce platform for your direct booking campaigns • Create persuasive ads • Segment your email lists so you can launch niche marketing efforts • Write headlines that grab people’s attention • Create fun travel itineraries • Make package offers for different guest segments. This adds ancillary revenue to your client’s bottom line, and yours • Set up an affiliate marketing network so others are doing a lot of the ‘heavy lifting’ for you • Create an opt-in bait piece for your lead-generation strategy… automate delivery… write autoresponders… and create a free VIP club • Boost your bait piece on Facebook and set up PPC campaigns • Call associations and drum up big business • Set up a SendOutCards campaign for anniversary marketing efforts • Create a landing page that automatically sells your service • Set up a newsletter for even more reoccurring revenue • And more...

requirements: You should already have a fundamental understanding of WordPress
You need to enjoy researching and writing
You need to have a basic understanding of financials
Bring your creativity, of course

This system relies on the GuestCentric technology.  I have a demo version for students to learn with – free of charge – but there are some upfront fees when working with clients.  These fees typically range from $200 - $700, a month.  (And you can collect a margin on these fees.)  So I recommend getting your client to cover these fees with a setup fee.  But, this depends on how you structure the overall agreement.  This course also includes a detailed fee range, so you can have an accurate conversation with your clients on this when the time comes.
courses.description:
This course gives you insight into the hospitality industry as well as all the technical skills you need to set up direct response inspired campaigns for independent hotels.
Based on the book, 300% More Direct Bookings in 30 Days, which you can browse on Amazon, this course gives you a system for tracking reservation revenue from anywhere on the web so you can claim a commission on every booking you help hotels generate.  And since hotels are paying sky high commissions of 15%-25%, even 30% to 3rd parties like Booking dot com and Expedia these days, that means that you can easily ask 5%-10% or 15% of top-line revenue for your marketing efforts.  And, best of all, since you own the rights to your marketing assets, that means that you can do the work once and create passive income streams for as long as a hotel is getting business through your channels.
But that's just the beginning.  This system is all about setting yourself up as a hotel's business partner.  You're going to have to watch the intro video to learn exactly what a Direct Booking Strategist is all about.
But please note: The introductory price for this course is just $5 (for the first 10 students).  But, as we pass the 50,100,200 student mark... the price goes up by $5 or $10, so be sure to reserve your spot early so you can save some cash!
So watch the intro video now!
Looking forward to working with you.


All the best,
Jeremiah
target_audience: People that are already working in a hotel, even if it’s in the café.  The concepts that you’re going to learn in this course will make your DOSM (Director of Sales and Marketing) sit up and take notice.
People who have a lot of business connections in the community.  This will make setting up your affiliate network an easy task.
People who are good at creating fun, engaging content, on-line.  Your portfolio will make it easy to sell the idea of ‘helping a prospective hotel with their marketing’.
Anyone who is very ROI focused.  Your skill of balancing earnings against spending will help you fine-tune your strategies over time.
Copywriters.  If you have a passion for writing enticing headlines and persuasive stories, you’ll enjoy a lot of the projects in this program.
Direct marketers.  You’ll take one look at this system and say, “Direct Response = Direct Bookings, Duh!”  That means you will recognize this system like an old friend.

courses.description:
Domine a Arte das Vendas e Multiplique Seus Resultados com o Curso Básico de Vendas em Vídeo-Aulas HD
Você já percebeu como algumas pessoas conseguem vender qualquer coisa com naturalidade, confiança e resultados incríveis, enquanto outras se frustram, mesmo com esforço? A verdade é que vender bem não é um dom — é uma habilidade que se aprende, se desenvolve e se domina com método, prática e direcionamento certo.
E é exatamente isso que o Curso Básico de Vendas oferece: uma formação completa, objetiva e acessível para você aprender a vender com segurança e gerar resultados reais — mesmo que esteja começando do zero.
Se você é autônomo, comerciante, afiliado, vendedor iniciante, pequeno empreendedor ou simplesmente quer aprender a vender suas ideias, serviços ou produtos, este curso é o ponto de partida ideal.
Por que aprender a vender é ESSENCIAL em qualquer área da vida
Vender vai muito além de trocar um produto por dinheiro. A habilidade de vender é a base da comunicação eficaz, da persuasão, da liderança e até dos relacionamentos pessoais. Quem aprende a vender:
Ganha mais dinheiro
Negocia melhor
Se comunica com clareza
Influencia pessoas de forma ética
Cria oportunidades em qualquer área da vida
O que torna o Curso Básico de Vendas a escolha ideal para você
Nosso curso foi criado com um único objetivo: transformar você em um vendedor preparado, confiante e com domínio dos fundamentos que geram resultados reais. Veja o que você encontra dentro do curso:
Vídeo-aulas em alta definição
Todas as aulas foram gravadas em estúdio, com áudio claro, imagem nítida e qualidade profissional, para que você tenha a melhor experiência de aprendizado. Nada de vídeos amadores ou gravações confusas — você vai aprender com clareza, foco e didática pensada para quem está começando.
Conteúdo direto ao ponto
O curso vai direto ao que interessa. Sem enrolação, sem jargões técnicos ou linguagem difícil. Tudo é explicado de forma simples e prática. Você vai entender e aplicar imediatamente técnicas que funcionam.
Aprenda os pilares que todo bom vendedor precisa dominar:
Mentalidade de vendas: como pensar como um verdadeiro vendedor de sucesso.
Abordagem inicial: como despertar o interesse do cliente logo nos primeiros segundos.
Rapport e conexão: técnicas para criar empatia e confiança de forma natural.
Levantamento de necessidades: como entender o que o cliente realmente quer e precisa.
Argumentação e apresentação: como destacar valor, contornar objeções e gerar desejo.
Fechamento de vendas: como conduzir o cliente à decisão final com segurança.
Pós-venda e fidelização: como transformar clientes em fãs e construir reputação.
Aulas com exemplos reais e simulações
Além da teoria, você verá situações práticas, exemplos de diálogos com clientes e simulações de vendas reais. Isso ajuda a entender como aplicar cada técnica no dia a dia, em vendas presenciais, online ou por telefone.
Resultados comprovados por quem aplicou
“Eu nunca tinha vendido nada na vida. Depois de 3 semanas aplicando o que aprendi no curso, fechei meus primeiros 4 clientes. É muito prático e direto. Recomendo a todos.” – Lucas V.
“Trabalho com cosméticos e sentia vergonha de abordar as pessoas. As técnicas de abordagem e confiança do curso mudaram tudo. Hoje vendo com naturalidade e estou mais segura.” – Camila F.
“Achei que já sabia vender, mas vi que estava perdendo muitas oportunidades. Aprendi detalhes que fazem toda a diferença. Curso excelente!” – Eduardo M.
Quem deve fazer este curso
Este curso foi pensado para quem:
Nunca vendeu antes e quer aprender do zero
Já vende, mas sente que falta método e consistência
Quer melhorar seus resultados com vendas diretas ou afiliadas
Trabalha com marketing digital, redes sociais ou e-commerce
É autônomo ou pequeno empreendedor e precisa atrair e manter clientes
Quer melhorar sua comunicação, persuasão e influência
Mesmo que você ache que “não leva jeito para vendas”, este curso vai mostrar que vendas é uma habilidade treinável, e que com as técnicas certas, qualquer pessoa pode se tornar um vendedor eficaz.
Vantagens exclusivas ao adquirir agora
Acesso vitalício: estude no seu tempo, sem pressa, e assista às aulas quantas vezes quiser
Atualizações gratuitas: você receberá novos conteúdos adicionados ao curso sem pagar nada a mais
Certificado de Conclusão: para valorizar ainda mais seu currículo e seu portfólio profissional
Bônus especial: ao se inscrever hoje, você ainda recebe um eBook com 20 scripts prontos de vendas para usar em diferentes situações!
Superando as objeções mais comuns
“Eu não sou bom com pessoas.”
O curso ensina justamente como se comunicar melhor, lidar com objeções e criar conexão — mesmo que você seja tímido ou ache difícil se expressar. Acredite, você vai se surpreender com sua evolução.
“Não tenho tempo.”

Sua nova fase começa agora. Tome a decisão que vai mudar seus resultados.
Você pode continuar fazendo o que sempre fez — ou pode investir em si mesmo, aprender a habilidade mais poderosa do mercado e abrir portas que hoje talvez pareçam fechadas.
Não importa sua idade, formação ou experiência. Com este curso, você vai aprender a vender de forma ética, estruturada e com confiança. E isso muda tudo.
Não adie sua transformação. Vender é viver — e você merece viver com mais autonomia, resultados e crescimento.
target_audience: Marketeiros, Publicitários, Blogueiros, Empreendedores, Vendedores e pessoas interessadas em estudar os aspectos mais diversos que envolvem os procedimentos de vendas

courses.title: ChatGPT & MidJourney AI Prompt Engineering for Entrepreneurs
courses.bio: Master ChatGPT & MidJourney prompt engineering - AI tools to enhance your digital presence and streamline your business.
objectives: By the end of the course, the student will be confident and competent using ChatGPT and other AI tools for business, or pleasure.
Understand why being specific in prompts helps ChatGPT give clear and detailed answers.
Learn how asking follow-up questions can make ChatGPT’s answers more accurate.
Discover how to break down complex questions into simpler parts and adjust prompts based on previous answers.
Know the different ways to interact with ChatGPT, like casual talk, formal help, or technical support, and how to switch between them.
Use AIPRM to improve your prompt writing for better ChatGPT responses.
Learn to set word and format limits to guide ChatGPT’s responses effectively.
Find out how to keep context in multiple turns to have natural and coherent conversations with ChatGPT.
Create prompts for specific roles like tutor, assistant, or storyteller to get suitable responses.
Adapt prompts for specific fields like healthcare, finance, and education for more relevant answers.
Know how to use other AI tools for creating images.
Make prompts that inspire ChatGPT to write creative things like stories and poetry.
Get ChatGPT to work with images you upload.
Use ChatGPT for help with data analysis, technical explanations, and coding.
How to use the mobile app to simulate a job interview, solve maths problems, or use it as a live translator.
Use ChatGPT to help with the tasks involved in building a website.
Write engaging and SEO-friendly content for blogs, social media, and emails using ChatGPT.
Ensure your AI-generated content is accurate, transparent, and ethically sound.
Stay updated with the latest AI and prompt engineering trends through books, articles, online courses, and communities.

Types of Prompts: Creating Bullet Points, Summaries & Simplifying Complex Concepts
Asking for Additional Resources, Research Studies and Links
Adding Fun Facts, Quotes, and Jokes
Using ChatGPT for Brainstorming and Ideas
Working with Excel Spreadsheets and Graphs (Paid version only)
Create Images with ChatGPT (Paid version only)
Prompt Modifiers for Better Responses: Roles: Who is Responding at ChatGPT?
Common Challenges and Solutions: Recognizing and Addressing Biases in Responses
AI to Help Create a Website: Creating Images and Social Media Posts
Seeking Advice on Security and Common WordPress Issues

requirements: Basic computer skills and familiarity with navigating the internet.
An internet connection.
Interest in AI applications to help with everyday tasks
courses.description:
This course is your gateway to mastering two of the most powerful AI tools available today: ChatGPT and MidJourney. With a focus on prompt engineering for both platforms, you'll learn not only how to harness the full potential of ChatGPT but also how to create stunning visual content with MidJourney. The course includes a complete mini-course on MidJourney, giving you the skills to generate compelling images alongside your expertly crafted text.
In the latest updates, I've also added a section on using ChatGPT as a coding assistant, to create applications. You can do this, even if you have zero experience in programming, as ChatGPT will help every step of the way. In this section, I create a C++ app, and a Python app, as well as a Chrome extension. We'll end the section looking at how ChatGPT is a miracle-worker when it comes to Regex.
By integrating AI into your business and daily life, you can drastically reduce the time spent on routine tasks while elevating the quality of your output. The secret to great AI results lies in great prompts—knowing how to ask the right questions to get the most valuable answers. This course aims to make you a prompt engineering pro, equipping you with the skills to draw the best from both ChatGPT and MidJourney.
But what can these AI tools do for you?
ChatGPT can help manage and maintain your website, write engaging content, and assist in creating various types of media, such as videos and blog posts. It helps generate high-quality articles, marketing copy, video scripts, and even emails, all while supporting multiple languages. Meanwhile, MidJourney empowers you to create striking visual content, perfect for enhancing your digital presence.
Both tools together can transform your social media strategy, generate creative project ideas, and provide data-driven insights to refine your digital marketing campaigns. This frees up your time to focus on strategic decision-making and scaling your business.
Integrating ChatGPT and MidJourney into your workflow will lead to:
Increased efficiency
Higher-quality content
More effective digital marketing strategies
This course provides practical insights and hands-on experience, enabling you to leverage AI for entrepreneurial success. By mastering these tools, you’ll stay ahead in the competitive digital landscape and achieve greater success in your business endeavours.
Harness the power of ChatGPT and MidJourney, and turn them into your personal assistant and creative partner. In today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape, artificial intelligence is a game-changer, offering unparalleled opportunities for innovation and efficiency.
One minute from now, YOU could:
Have a fully optimized SEO article on any topic, even if it’s new to you.
Create stunning visuals to accompany your written content, tailored to your brand.
Craft persuasive marketing copy for your sales page, based on your unique input.
Analyse vast amounts of data, gaining valuable insights and summaries.
Translate documents in over 95 languages or use ChatGPT as your real-time translator abroad.
Debug or write programming code in languages like C++, Ruby, PHP, HTML/CSS, and SQL.
Create images to be used on your website, include things like buttons and icons. All in a style you define, to match your website precisely.
Generate creative ideas for projects, marketing campaigns, and problem-solving.
Have a new poem, short story, or chapter of a book.
Develop a comprehensive outline for a course, book, or project you are working on.
Overcome writer's block with unlimited new ideas.
Summarize multiple documents into concise, meaningful overviews.
Create engaging social media posts with recommendations for optimal posting times.
Be learning how to program simple apps for yourself, or others, using the power of ChatGPT and free tools.
... even if you don't know where to start.
"ChatGPT & MidJourney Prompt Engineering for Entrepreneurs" is a comprehensive online course designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge to leverage the power of both ChatGPT and MidJourney effectively.
Course Objectives
The primary objective of this course is to empower anyone interested in AI to use ChatGPT and MidJourney effectively in their daily lives, whether for business or personal projects. We’ll teach you how to master these tools so you can achieve the best results, no matter your goals.
What is covered in this course:
Section 1: Course Introduction: An introduction to the course and instructor, as well as the ChatGPT interface.
Section 2: Tips for Using ChatGPT: Students will learn to craft clear, detailed prompts, ask follow-up questions, use iterative querying techniques, understand interaction modes, and utilize AIPRM for better prompts.
Section 3: A.C.E Prompt Engineering: Using my A.C.E. Prompt Engineering Technique.  Students will master avoiding ambiguity, providing context, giving step-by-step instructions, using examples for clarity, testing and refining prompts, and analysing responses for improvement.
Section 4: Types of Prompts: Students will request facts, craft responses, create summaries, adapt content, simplify concepts, evaluate options, find research, use images in your prompts, generate fun facts, outlines, comparisons, and much more.
Section 5: Prompt Modifiers: Students will learn to add prompt modifiers to enhance the A.C.E. Prompt Engineering method for even better results.
Section 6: Common Challenges and Solutions: Students will minimize misunderstandings, rephrase and clarify prompts, recognize and address biases, correct errors, understand limitations, and set realistic goals for outcomes.
Section 7: CustomGPTs (Previously Called Plugins): Students will use and integrate CustomGPTs into their workflows for enhanced productivity and tailored solutions.
Section 8: AI Image Tools: Students will use DALL-E for image generation and explore MidJourney for creative images.
Section 9: Using ChatGPT for Editing Content: Students will use command prompts for editing, expand and summarize text, proofread, and get feedback on their writing with ChatGPT.
Section 10: AI to Help Create a Website: Students will create website mockups, generate logos and taglines, find and install plugins and themes, find SEO keywords, generate blog ideas and content, and solve WordPress issues.
Section 11: Emails: Students will use ChatGPT to create email replies to business emails, create email marketing sequences and use ChatGPT for multilingual email support.
Section 12: YouTube: Students will use ChatGPT to generate video scripts, titles, descriptions, tags, and fix closed captions for better YouTube content.
Section 13 – Chatting with ChatGPT: Students will use voice commands, engage in conversations, simulate job interviews, find step-by-step solutions for math problems, and use ChatGPT as a live language translator.
Section 14: Programming with ChatGPT: An introduction to using ChatGPT to create apps, even if you have zero programming skills.
Section 15: MidJourney Minicourse: A complete MidJourney Mini-Course to help you create better images.
Section 16: Resources: Students can learn about the history of AI, and ethical considerations to using it.


Conclusion
"ChatGPT & MidJourney AI Prompt Engineering for Entrepreneurs" is designed to provide you with practical knowledge and hands-on experience, enabling you to effectively use both ChatGPT and MidJourney, along with other AI tools. Whether your goal is to streamline business operations, enhance your content creation, produce stunning visuals, or improve your digital marketing strategies, this course offers the insights and skills needed to harness the full power of AI for entrepreneurial success. Join us on this journey to master ChatGPT and MidJourney, and transform the way you create, operate, and grow your business in the digital age.
target_audience: Webmasters & Entrepreneurs, including Content Creators, Digital Marketers, SEO Specialists, Social Media Managers, Bloggers, Online Course Instructors, Freelancers, Customer Support Agents, Small Business Owners, Marketing Professionals, Educators, Technical Writers, Data Analysts, Developers, E-commerce Managers, Project Managers, Startup Founders, and AI Enthusiasts

courses.description:
E-ticaret ile üniversite yıllarında tanıştığım bu ağ organizasyonunda binlerce kişiye eğitim ve danışmanlık verdim. Normal ticarette çok çalışıyordum lakin yeterince kazanamadığımı fark ettim. Daha sonra kendime ait bir internet şirketi kurdum. Kurduğum bu sayfaya binlerce ürünün veri tabanından dropship yapmayı öğrendim. Sürekli ürün satıyordum. Telefondan, tablete, bilgisayardan, mutfak robotuna kadar vs. birçok ürünü bir üreticiden alıyor ve tüketim ağına sokuyordum. Lakin burada sürekli ben çalışmak zorundaydım. Aslına bakarsanız sürekli artan pasif bir gelir arayışındaydım. Bir zaman sonra işin benden bağımsız gitmesini istiyordum. Ama burada aracı şirketin batması sonucu işlerimi yoluna koyamadım doğrusu.
Bu arada eticaret sektöründe hepsiburada, n11, trendyol ve hatta amazon gibi sitelerde açmış olduğum mağazalarımdan ürünlerimi satıyordum. Bu tarz pazaryerlerinde de kesilen komisyon oranlarından dolayı benden bağımsız olarak işlerin büyümesi sekteye uğradı.
Ben sistem adamıyım. Evet biliyorum, bir fabrikam yoktu, lakin istiyordum ki bir fabrika misali işler benden bağımsız bir şekilde yürüsün ve büyüsün.
Doğru işi bulmak ve doğru insanlarla bu işi doğru zamanda yapmak istiyordum.
Ve aradığım fırsat ayağıma kadar geldi. İçerisinde mlm yapısını barındıran ama aslında bir affiliate tarzı olan bir e-ticaret sistemi güzel olurdu. Karlılığın bir kereliğine mahsus olmadığını ispat eden ve gideceğimiz yolda bizleri birbirimize bağlı kılan ama bağımsızlığımızın olduğu bir iş modeli.
Zaman ve mekandan bağımsız olarak özgürce çalışma imkanı sağlayan bir sistem.
Eğer siz de e-ticaret ağımızla işinizi bugün başlatmak, büyütmek ve sektörde yerinizi sağlamlaştırmak istiyorsanız bu eğitim tam size göre.
Bu eğitim kısa kısa video sunumlarla altyapıyı anlamanız açısından oldukça sade hazırlanmıştır.
Giriş, gelişme ve sonuç kısımları ile bir kere eğitimi bitirdiğiniz takdirde artık geriye sadece uygulama kısımlarını yapmak kalıyor.
Siz de e-ticarete bugün başlayın, yönetin ve büyütün...
target_audience: Network marketing yapanlar veya kötü tecrübeyle bırakmış olanlar
Ağ pazarlamaya başlamak ve öğrenmek isteyenler
E-ticaret konusunda bilgi sahibi olmak isteyen bireyler
İnsanlarla etkileşimde bulunmayı sevenler

courses.description:
عالم البيزنس النهارده ممكن يتلخص في أربع كلمات بسيطة .. إنتج أكتر بموارد أقل
التكلفة في السوق وعوامل التضخم العالمي بتضغط على الشركات بشكل كبير، ميزانيات الشركات ومصروفاتها أصبحت تحت الميكروسكوب.
ولذلك مش غريب إن كتير من الشركات في الوقت الحالي مهتمين بالذكاء الاصطناعي، الذكاء الاصطناعي بيقدم مميزات كتيره بتساعد على تحسين الإنتاجية والأداء بشكل كبير ومؤثر، وده بيخلي حتى الشركات الصغيرة تقدر تزود جودة وكمية شغلها بشكل ملحوظ، وكمان بيرفع مستوى التوقعات والتخصيص واللي كانت قبل كده بمستوى أقل بكتير مع البرمجيات العادية.
هانتعلم مع بعض ونعرف ايه هي تكنولوچيا الذكاء الاصطناعي بالضبط وايه انواعها واستخداماتها، وتعالى كمان نتعرف على ٨ استخدامات مهمة في مجال التسويق والبيزنس، وهانستعرض اشهر وأهم الأدوات اللي ممكن تستخدمها عشان تسوق لشغلك، ومش هانكتفي بالكلام النظري لا كمان هانستعرض تجارب عملية ودراسات حالة من اكبر الشركات العالمية ونعرف ازاي حققوا نجاح باستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي في التسويق، وكمان هاخليك تعرف ازاي تطبق نظام الذكاء الاصطناعي داخل شركتك.
الكورس ده مهم جداً لكل اللي بيشتغلوا في التسويق والمبيعات ولكل رواد الأعمال واصحاب الشركات ولكل اللي حابب يبدأ بيزنس بأقل تكلفة وافضل واسرع نتايج، هاتعرف ازاي تزود مبيعاتك وإنتاجيتك وتخفض تكلفتك وترفع ربحيتك.
أنا شخصياً اعتمدت على الذكاء الاصطناعي في اعداد هذا الكورس، سواء في الأبحاث أو حتى في كتابة وصياغة بعض المحتوى.
محتويات الكورس:
.1 تعريف الذكاء الاصطناعي
.2 استخدامات الذكاء الاصطناعي في مجالات التسويق
.3 اشهر أدوات الذكاء الاصطناعي الحالية
.4 تطبيقات عملية من واقع الشركات العالمية
.5 كيفية البدء في تطبيق الذكاء الاصطناعي داخل شركتك
.6 تحديات متعلقة بالذكاء الاصطناعي
ياللا اشترك في الكورس وأوعدك إنك تدخل عالم كبير وجديد من التطور والذكاء والمميزات، عالم جديد تقدر فيه إنك تفتح لنفسك مجالات كبيرة للتطور والنمو.
target_audience: الطلبة
موظفين التسويق
رواد الأعمال
أصحاب الشركات
ادارة المبيعات

courses.description:
Questo corso fornisce le nozioni base per progettare un ottimale allestimento delle vetrine e le regole del Visual Merchandising, nello specifico per le FARMACIE.
E' rivolto ai Farmacisti e loro collaboratori, ma anche a  chi desidera entrare nel mondo del Visual come professione, sia a Visual junior che intendono approfondire concetti ed expertise, sia pure a commercianti o venditori che abbiano già una qualche dimestichezza con gli argomenti sviluppati.
Vengono descritti sia i principi fondamentali e le regole Basic, sia pure trucchi e scorciatoie pratiche utili a velocizzare la realizzazione di vetrine belle, scenografiche e che soprattutto aiutino a migliorare i risultati di vendita.
E’ quindi un percorso a 360 gradi nel mondo della Comunicazione e della Percezione: facciamolo assieme.
Cosa imparerai
Essere in grado di progettare ed allestire le vetrine di un negozio
Essere in grado di progettare e realizzare una scenografia per la vetrina, anche con materiali low cost.
Essere in grado di modificare correttamente il layout di un negozio
Essere in grado di gestire a livello Basic la comunicazione social in linea con lo stile delle vetrine
Conoscere e gestire le dinamiche della percezione e della comunicazione
Esistono dei requisiti o dei prerequisiti per il corso?
Non è necessario avere esperienze pregresse
E' importante avere curiosità ed interesse per questo argomento: il percorso sarà molto più piacevole.
A chi è rivolto questo corso:
Chiunque voglia approfondire le tecniche di esposizione del prodotto, sia che lavori in un negozio o anche se interessato per curiosità
Chi vuole avvicinarsi al mondo del Visual, sia per iniziare la professione, sia per capire i meccanismi della percezione.
target_audience: Farmacisti, Visual Junior che desiderano approfondire, chiunque voglia avvicinarsi e conoscere meglio questa professione
Chiunque abbia la curiosità di conoscere o approfondire le regole della Vetrinistica e del Visual Merchandising per una farmacia.

requirements: 无需销售经验，零基础可上手。
courses.description:
对于经营企业客户业务（也就是2B业务）的公司来说，销售团队和售前工程师团队共同组成了业务拓展的核心力量，业内有个经典说法：“销售搞定人，售前搞定事”。售前工程师，作为谙熟技术、产品和服务的技术人员，在支持销售人员开展销售活动、成功签订合同获得业务方面，发挥着关键的作用，是企业发展的关键技术资源。而如果售前工程师缺乏必须的销售技能，又没有接受过系统化的专业培训，成为销售环节的明显短板，那么企业的业务发展必将遇到不可逾越的障碍，会不断的错失业务机会和发展窗口。
如果你是一位售前工程师，你有没有经常遇到以下的挑战，感到十分困惑和迷茫？
上述种种问题，您是否考虑过贵公司的售前人员技能不够专业、经验不够丰富、能力不够充分可能也是根源之一呢？或者说如果系统的提升了公司售前人员的专业能力，上述问题将得到有效的缓解呢？
当前大量企业的销售管理人员和售前管理人员面临的挑战是：如何借鉴国际先进企业正规的、成熟的售前支持方法和管理机制，实现客户真正信赖、依靠技术而不是低价赢标、项目合同内容规范严谨可交付等目标？如何针对售前人员进行系统的、专业的培训，避免售前成为销售力量的短板，甚至成为提升销售成功率的关键力量？与其投入大量的资源给项目交付团队填坑，不如投资提升售前技能，在项目售前阶段的源头上消除项目风险隐患。
target_audience: 渴望系统提升专业技能和工作绩效的中级、高级售前工程师
希望转行做售前的“小白”

courses.description:
Want to start an easy home business that is fun and has huge potential? Maybe you are a graphic designer that has a bunch of designs sitting around that you don't know what to do with.
This course is for anyone that is interested in starting a print on demand merchandise business.
What is print on demand merchandise?
This is an excellent business model that allows you quickly take designs and have them printed on many different types of merchandise (t-shirts, mugs, hoodies, etc). The best part is there are companies that will fulfill AND ship the order to your customers directly!
I will show you step-by-step how to start a new print on demand business and the best way to set everything up to greatly improve your chances of success. There is a perfect combination of a marketplace and printing partner that make this very easy to do and you will be getting buyer traffic that is interested in your merchandise from the very beginning.
You should have experience with computers and have a general understanding of the Internet. If you can browse the Web, check e-mail, use Facebook, or use any other computer software and can follow directions then you can definitely do this!
Also, you do not have to be a graphic designer or have any experience. I show you how easy it is to make designs OR you can outsource the work for cheap.
I've been running this type of business for a while now I wanted to share my knowledge with you and show you why this has so much potential.
Ready to start? Jump in and start your journey now...
target_audience: Anyone that wants to start a home business
Graphic designers that want to sell their designs online
Anyone that wants to start a t-shirt business

courses.description:
Master Course in Hyperlocal Marketing 2.0
In the dynamic landscape of digital marketing, mastering hyperlocal strategies has become essential for businesses aiming to connect with their local audience effectively. This comprehensive Master Course in Hyperlocal Marketing 2.0 is designed to equip marketing professionals, business owners, and digital enthusiasts with the advanced skills and knowledge needed to thrive in the hyperlocal marketing space.
Module 1: Introduction to Hyperlocal Marketing This module lays the foundation by providing an in-depth understanding of hyperlocal marketing, exploring key concepts, terminologies, and dissecting successful case studies. Participants will gain insights into the evolution of hyperlocal strategies and learn to overcome common challenges.
Module 2: Advanced Hyperlocal SEO Techniques Delve into the intricacies of local SEO with a focus on advanced techniques. From local keyword research to on-page optimization and mobile strategies, participants will learn how to enhance their website's visibility in local searches, ensuring a strong online presence in specific regions.
Module 3: Geotargeted Advertising and Social Media Strategies Uncover the power of geotargeted advertising on platforms like Google Ads and Facebook. This module also explores leveraging social media for hyperlocal engagement, including creating geotagged content and collaborating with local influencers to amplify brand reach.
Module 4: Data Analytics and Performance Measurement Equip yourself with the tools and knowledge needed to measure the success of hyperlocal campaigns. Learn to interpret data from various analytics tools, track key performance indicators, and implement A/B testing for continuous improvement, ensuring optimal results for hyperlocal marketing efforts.
Module 5: Hyperlocal Content Strategy and Community Building Craft a compelling hyperlocal content strategy that resonates with local audiences. Explore community-building initiatives, both online and offline, and discover sustainable practices to foster long-term connections with local communities.
By the end of this Master Course, participants will not only understand the nuances of hyperlocal marketing but will also possess the skills to implement advanced strategies, measure performance effectively, and build lasting connections with their target audience at the local level. This course blends theoretical knowledge with practical applications, empowering participants to navigate and excel in the evolving realm of hyperlocal marketing.
In this master course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics:
Module 1: Introduction to Hyperlocal Marketing
Module 2: Advanced Hyperlocal SEO Techniques
Module 3: Geotargeted Advertising and Social Media Strategies
Module 4: Data Analytics and Performance Measurement
Module 5: Hyperlocal Content Strategy and Community Building
Enroll now and learn today !

courses.description:
Are you a content creator, blogger, educator, student, or marketer looking to boost your productivity with the power of AI? This course is designed to help you unlock the full potential of ChatGPT for all types of content creation — even if you’re a complete beginner.
In this step-by-step course, you'll learn how to use ChatGPT, a powerful AI chatbot built by OpenAI using Generative AI, to create high-quality content quickly and efficiently. Whether you're writing blog posts, video scripts, essays, quizzes, or generating images — this course will guide you through each use case with hands-on examples, templates, and real-world tips.


What Is ChatGPT?
ChatGPT is an advanced conversational AI tool that can understand natural language and generate text, images, ideas, and solutions on demand. Powered by Generative AI, it helps users produce content, solve problems, and automate repetitive tasks using simple language-based instructions.
You don’t need to be a tech expert — just bring your curiosity and creativity!


What You Will Learn
ChatGPT Fundamentals : Understand how ChatGPT works, how to use it effectively, and the key features that make it powerful for content creators.
Content Creation with ChatGPT
Learn how to generate blog posts, YouTube scripts, essays, email newsletters, quizzes, social media posts, and more using well-structured prompts.
Creating Images with ChatGPT
Discover how to use ChatGPT’s integration with tools like DALL·E to create visual content such as illustrations, infographics, marketing images, stickers, and educational visuals.
Different Use Cases of ChatGPT
Explore various creative and professional applications — from writing and design to learning support, planning, and brainstorming.
Top 10 Prompt Templates
Use proven prompt templates tailored for different content goals. You’ll get a set of customizable prompts for blog writing, ads, image generation, storytelling, and more.


Who This Course Is For
Content creators who want to write faster and better
Bloggers, YouTubers, educators, and marketers
Students who want help with writing essays and learning
Freelancers and professionals who want to use AI as a creative assistant
Anyone interested in learning modern content creation with AI
By the end of this course, you’ll be confident using ChatGPT to create content in minutes — not hours. You’ll learn how to turn ideas into polished results using structured prompts and best practices.
Whether you're writing, designing, planning, or just exploring AI tools for fun — this course gives you the practical skills you need to create like a pro.
Enroll now and start your journey into the future of content creation with ChatGPT!

courses.description:
Corporate communications is defined as activities involved in managing both internal and external communications in a workplace – this can include internal presentations, staff newsletters, media releases for journalists, investor correspondence, social media and more.
In this course, we'll discuss how corporates communicates with different stakeholder to strengthen their brand equity, and together we'll see what it takes to work in this amazing field, and how to develop a successful communication campaign.
The course will cover the following key points:
What is Corporate Communications
Importance of Corporate Communications
Corporate Communications Framework
Difference between marketing and corporate communications
How its reflected in organizations
Skills & Capabilities needed to work in field
Myths & challenges about Corp. Comms
Develop a Corporate Communications Campaign
target_audience: Anyone interested in communications, branding, and marketing

Phát triển kỹ năng phân tích & ứng dụng dữ liệu để thiết kế chiến dịch marketing dựa trên khoa học thần kinh và tâm lý học hành vi.
ối ưu hóa trải nghiệm khách hàng và tăng tỷ lệ chuyển đổi, áp dụng được ngay vào công việc hoặc dự án cá nhân.
Truyền cảm hứng tư duy chiến lược và sáng tạo, kết hợp khoa học và nghệ thuật trong marketing.

Trải nghiệm Khách hàng: Bố cục cửa hàng & “Dòng chảy” khách tham quan

“Nudging” giá & lựa chọn – Tránh bẫy quá nhiều option
Kiểm tra và đồ án Capstone Project c: Đồ án cuối khóa - capstone project

requirements: Không cần kinh nghiệm.
courses.description:
Trước khi học khóa này, tôi từng nghĩ neuromarketing chỉ đơn giản là “đo sóng não” hay vài chiêu tâm lý để bán hàng hiệu quả hơn. Nhưng giờ thì tôi hiểu, đó là một hệ thống kiến thức toàn diện, kết hợp khoa học thần kinh, tâm lý học, và chiến lược marketing để thực sự chạm vào cảm xúc và vô thức của khách hàng.
Tôi nhớ rõ khoảnh khắc nhận ra sự khác biệt giữa “muốn” và “thích” – một khái niệm tưởng chừng nhỏ, nhưng lại thay đổi hoàn toàn cách tôi nhìn nhận chiến dịch marketing. Hay như khi khám phá sức mạnh của Peak–End Rule: chỉ cần biết cách tạo cao trào cảm xúc và kết thúc ấn tượng, bạn có thể khiến thương hiệu in sâu vào trí nhớ khách hàng lâu dài.
Cảm xúc và sự thay đổi tư duy
Khóa học đã khiến tôi “lột xác” trong cách tiếp cận marketing. Tôi không còn chỉ chăm chăm vào những con số như CTR hay conversion rate, mà bắt đầu đặt câu hỏi: “Bộ não khách hàng đang cảm nhận điều gì ở từng khoảnh khắc?”
Tôi nhận ra marketing không chỉ là bán sản phẩm, mà là thiết kế trải nghiệm cảm xúc – từ màu sắc bao bì, mùi hương cửa hàng, đến giai điệu nền hay cách bố trí sản phẩm để dẫn dắt “dòng chảy” khách tham quan.
Cảm giác thật sự phấn khích khi biết rằng mình có thể dùng khoa học để sáng tạo, không phải đoán mò hay dựa vào may rủi.
Ứng dụng thực tế và tác động rõ rệt
Ngay trong lúc học, tôi đã áp dụng một vài kỹ thuật:
Thêm yếu tố nudge giá bằng hiệu ứng “mồi” (decoy effect) để khách dễ chọn gói cao cấp hơn.
Sử dụng mùi hương nhẹ tại quầy để tạo cảm giác thư giãn, khiến khách ở lại lâu hơn.
Kết quả? Tỉ lệ chuyển đổi tăng thấy rõ, khách hàng phản hồi tích cực hơn, và tôi thì thấy mình kiểm soát được “trò chơi” marketing hơn bao giờ hết.
Vì sao bạn nên học khóa này
Nếu bạn đang làm marketing, kinh doanh, hay đơn giản muốn hiểu cách con người ra quyết định, đây là khóa học không thể bỏ qua. Bạn sẽ:
Hiểu sâu cách bộ não xử lý thông tin và cảm xúc.
Biết cách đo lường những phản ứng vô thức mà khảo sát truyền thống bỏ qua.
Thiết kế chiến dịch không chỉ đẹp mắt, mà còn thực sự tác động đến hành vi mua hàng.
Khóa học “Neuromarketing từ vỡ lòng đến nâng cao – Masterclass” không chỉ cung cấp kiến thức, mà còn truyền cảm hứng để bạn tư duy như một nhà khoa học và sáng tạo như một nghệ sĩ.
Tôi tin rằng, một khi đã trải nghiệm, bạn sẽ không bao giờ nhìn marketing theo cách cũ nữa.
Nếu bạn sẵn sàng khai phá sức mạnh của khoa học thần kinh trong marketing, hãy tham gia và tự mình cảm nhận sự thay đổi – như tôi đã trải qua.
target_audience: Marketer & Chuyên viên truyền thông muốn nâng cao hiệu quả chiến dịch dựa trên dữ liệu khoa học.
Nhà quản lý thương hiệu (Brand Manager) cần công cụ để hiểu sâu hơn hành vi khách hàng.
Chủ doanh nghiệp & Nhà sáng lập startup muốn tăng doanh thu và tối ưu trải nghiệm mua hàng.
Nhà nghiên cứu thị trường & Chuyên gia UX/UI muốn áp dụng neuromarketing vào thiết kế trải nghiệm người dùng.
Sinh viên ngành Marketing, Quản trị kinh doanh, Tâm lý học mong muốn trang bị kỹ năng và kiến thức mới để tạo lợi thế cạnh tranh trong sự nghiệp.

courses.title: Curso de Email Marketing para Empresas Alavancar suas Vendas
courses.bio: Aprenda a Configurar e Otimizar o Interspire para Melhorar a Entrega de Emails

Modulo 2: Criando Grupo de usuário | e criando usuário de uso!

requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência, pois irei te passar o passo-a-passo de como configurar seu próprio Servidor.
courses.description:
O público-alvo deste curso são pessoas que têm familiaridade com o uso básico de software e que desejam aprender a configurar e gerenciar seu próprio servidor de email marketing. Essas pessoas podem ser proprietários de empresas, profissionais de marketing, freelancers ou empreendedores que desejam melhorar sua estratégia de email marketing e ter mais controle sobre suas campanhas de envios. É importante ressaltar que é necessário ter interesse em tecnologia e disposição para aprender novos conceitos e práticas de email marketing. Este curso é ideal para aqueles que desejam ter mais autonomia e economizar custos ao gerenciar suas próprias campanhas de email marketing.
Além disso, este curso pode ser especialmente útil para pequenas empresas e empreendedores que não têm recursos financeiros para contratar serviços de email marketing de terceiros. Ao aprender a configurar e gerenciar seu próprio servidor de email marketing, eles podem economizar dinheiro e ter mais controle sobre o conteúdo, a segmentação e a frequência das campanhas de envios.
O curso é projetado para ser acessível e fácil de seguir, mesmo para aqueles que não têm conhecimentos prévios sobre servidores de email. Todos os conceitos e etapas são explicados de forma clara e detalhada, com exemplos práticos e demonstrações em vídeo. Além disso, há um fórum de discussão onde os alunos podem fazer perguntas e compartilhar experiências com outros participantes do curso.
Por fim, é importante ressaltar que este curso é uma oportunidade única de adquirir habilidades valiosas de email marketing e tecnologia. Com a crescente importância do email marketing como ferramenta de comunicação e vendas, ter conhecimento sobre como configurar e gerenciar seu próprio servidor de email pode ser uma vantagem competitiva no mercado. Se você está procurando se destacar no mundo do email marketing, este curso pode ser o primeiro passo para alcançar seus objetivos.
target_audience: Iniciantes

courses.bio: Learn and Pass AWS Certified Developer Associate DVA-C02 Certification | Ace your AWS Certified Developer Exam
objectives: This course covers every concepts to Pass AWS Certified Developer Associate DVA-C02 Certification
Latest Updated course AWS Certified Developer Associate DVA-C02 Certification
Learn and Clear AWS Certified Developer Associate DVA-C02 exam confidently and Ace your AWS Certified Developer Exam
Have some labs and Real world Examples
requirements: No AWS Cloud experience is necessary, we'll use the AWS Free Tier
courses.description:
Only AWS Certified Developer Associate that you need. This course covers everything to Pass the Exam and Learn AWS concepts. The AWS Certified Developer – Associate course is a comprehensive training program designed for developers seeking to deepen their expertise in building, deploying, and maintaining applications on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform. This course equips you with the essential knowledge and practical skills required to develop cloud-native applications that leverage AWS’s scalable infrastructure, services, and security features. Ideal for software developers, cloud engineers, and IT professionals, this course focuses on hands-on experience with AWS tools, SDKs, and best practices for secure and efficient cloud application development.
Throughout the course, You will gain an in-depth understanding of core AWS services, including compute services like AWS Lambda and Amazon EC2, storage options such as Amazon S3, and database solutions like Amazon DynamoDB and Amazon RDS. The course emphasizes serverless application development, giving learners practical exposure to event-driven architectures and integrating AWS services to build scalable and resilient systems. By exploring AWS’s developer tools like AWS CodeCommit, CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, and CodePipeline, participants learn how to implement continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines that streamline the software development lifecycle.
By the end of the course, You will be expected to have a solid foundation in designing, deploying, and debugging AWS-based applications. You will be equipped with the practical knowledge to optimize performance, implement robust security measures, and manage the full application lifecycle on AWS. This course serves as a stepping stone for developers aiming to validate their cloud skills, enhance their career prospects, and contribute effectively to cloud-driven projects within their organizations.
target_audience: This AWS Certified Developer Associate course is for anyone wanting to obtain the knowledge to pass the  AWS Certified Developer Associate Certification

Google Nano Banana Viral Image FX: The Photoshop Alternative


Be honest: Photoshop takes years—late nights, endless tutorials, trial-and-error menus. It’s powerful, but it’s a grind. But
Google Nano Banana is different.


It’s free, and you can type a prompt—or just say it—and the edit happens. “Make the sky neon.” “Smooth skin keep pores.” “Put a supercar beside me.” “Swap the outfit to red.” Done in seconds. No layers. No headaches.


This course is your shortcut to world-class, viral images without Photoshop. You’ll walk away with a copy-paste prompt library, repeatable recipes, and the confidence to ship visuals that even seasoned Photoshop pros would call “impossible.”

Replace Photoshop for everyday edits with a faster, simpler workflow.
Talk to your edits-voice or one-line prompts for instant results.
Create viral visuals on demand for thumbnails, ads, products, and portraits.
Spend minutes, not months-no sleepless learning curve.

If you’ve ever thought, “I don’t have years to learn Photoshop” this is your sign: you don’t need to.

courses.title: You and Your Book on Radio, and TV: Moving From Fear to Fun
courses.bio: Moving Moving Past Fearing Interviews to Enjoying Interview and Promoting Your Book on Radio, Podcast, and TV

How to Get Booked on a Radio Show: How to Get Booked on a Radio Show
How to Prepare for Your Radio Interview: How to Prepare for your Radio Interview
How to Handle an Unfriendly Interview Qu: How to Handle an Unfriendly Question
Learn about the Radio Show and the Host: Learn About the Radio Show and the Host

requirements: No experience is necessary. Just bring yourself and your desire to learn.
courses.description:
If you have a fear of public speaking, you have Glossophobia, and you are not alone. 75% of people have Glossophia. Many authors fear doing an author interview.
Author Debra Parmley used to be one of them until she learned how to move from fearing author interviews to having fun with them. In this class, she will teach you how she moved from never wanting to do an interview again to hosting a live blog talk radio show where she did the interviewing. Debra knows both sides of an interview.
In this class, Debra Parmley, a former radio host of "Book Lights" for Readers Entertainment on BlogTalk Radio, teaches:
Why is a radio, podcast, or TV interview beneficial?
How do you get booked to do an interview?
How to prepare a good press release.
Preparing to be interviewed on camera, or off, scripted or live improv.
How to handle an unfriendly question.
Taking back control of the interview, and empowering yourself to put the focus back on your book.
Ways to optimize your interview before the show, during a live interview, and after the show with promotion.
How you can move from fearing the interview to having fun with your interview.
A course worksheet will help authors address their concerns about interviews.
An additional handout includes links to examples of shows Debra discussed and shows authors can approach for interviews.
target_audience: From beginning authors to experienced authors, this course will teach you how to overcome your fear of doing interviews and how to do them successfully.

courses.description:
Introduction: In order to create a successful sales page with artificial intelligence, you will need to include certain elements that will appeal to potential customers. These elements may include a strong headline, persuasive copy, and an enticing call to action. You will also need to make sure that your page is optimized for search engines so that potential customers can easily find it.
This course will help you create a successful sales page by using artificial intelligence. You will learn how to use AI to create a sales page that is effective and efficient. You will also learn how to use AI to optimize your sales page for conversion.
Sales pages have a profound impact on business success. Great sales pages drive sales and conversions, while poorly done sales pages can cause potential customers to back out of preparing to buy your products.
In this course, we will go over how to use this artificial intelligence technology to boost your sales page copy. We're providing you with an easy-to-use step-by-step video explanation to help make well-written sales pages.
We will also cover some important copywriting tips with a variety of examples taken from an AI writing robot that produces top-notch copywriting after a quick couple of minutes.
Why do I need a sales page template? Creating effective sales letters is not difficult, and since they've been around for several decades, their principles have been distilled into a formula that you can easily follow and works flawlessly.
Actually, once you know how to work with the method shown in this course, you'll start to observe the same elements on every sales page you read.
How can AI help me write sales copy? AI copywriters behave in a similar way to computers that improve at chess from listening and learning from the best.
Advances in artificial intelligence have enabled AI copywriting machines that were trained to utilize artificial intelligence to read hundreds of thousands of successful sales page lines and compile their own distinctive writing style.
So, by directing the program to provide limited input to the AI, you are led to 100% original, high-quality content that can be generated instantaneously.
What You Will Learn: The course will teach you the tactics to create Amazing sales pages that convert, including:
Developing a Marketing Sales Page: Attract buyers with compelling content.
Improving Your Copy: Enhance your writing to be more persuasive and effective.
Boosting Conversion Rates: Increase the percentage of visitors who become customers.
Making Your Page More Appealing: Ensure your sales page is visually and contextually attractive.
Increasing Sales: Learn the strategies to drive more sales through optimized sales pages.
Why You Should Take This Course:
Learn how to use artificial intelligence to create a successful sales page.
Use AI to research your target audience, understand their needs, and create a sales page that speaks to them.
Optimize your sales page for conversion to make more sales and grow your business.
Learn how to use AI to improve your conversion rates and increase your sales.
Understand how to use AI to optimize your sales page for search engines.
Enroll Now and Create your first sales page today!
Course Features:
Step-by-step video lessons
Practical demonstrations and examples
Tips for creating effective sales pages
Interactive exercises and quizzes
Ongoing support and engagement through discussion forums
Bonus resources and downloadable guides
Who Is This Course For:
Marketers and business owners
Entrepreneurs looking to increase their sales
Anyone interested in learning how to create effective sales pages
Requirements:
No prior experience with AI or sales pages required
A willingness to learn and apply new techniques
