courses.description:
Hi Sobat Ilmu! Dalam suatu industri, memberikan service excellence kepada pelanggan merupakan suatu hal yang sangat penting. Karena dengan itu pelanggan akan merasa bahwa dirinya diperhatikan secara khusus oleh perusahaan dan dapat membawa dampak positif bagi perusahaan saat pelanggan tersebut menceritakan tentang apa yang ia rasakan.
Namun dalam upaya menerapkan service excellence pun banyak hal yang harus dipelajari dan diperhatikan dari mulai bagaimana sikap dan penampilan sampai mempelajari fokus dari pelanggan. Nah dikelas ini, Anda akan mempalajari itu semua bersama dengan trainer yang telah berpengalaman dibidangnya dan dikemas secara menarik sehingga mudah untuk dipahami. Bersama pengajar yang memiliki Pengalamannya selama 25 tahun sebagai seorang Sales Korporasi dan Rekanan Bank untuk Produk International Trade Finance di 3 Bank Asing yang kaya dengan pengalaman tentang Client, Leadership dan Funding Management serta kecintaan ke beberapa bidang Olahraga, membuat Mia mendalami pengetahuan tentang Wellness dan Wealth Planning saat memutuskan berhenti bekerja. Beberapa Sertifikasi sebagai Coach di Bidang Corporate Wellness, Life, dan Leadership serta Wealth Planning, telah diraih. Profesi baru ini telah membuat Mia membantu banyak klien secara professional, baik untuk klien individu maupun Korporasi. Beberapa kali kerap pula menjadi narasumber untuk Talk Show dan Pembicara Seminar Publik atau Korporasi. Yuk ikutin kelas Cariilmu segera!
target_audience: Pelatihan ini cocok untuk pekerja kantoran diindustri jasa, terutama yang langsung berhadapan dengan pelanggan. Bisa dibidang perbankan, Jasa keuangan, Kantor Konsultan, dibidang hospitality dan bidang lainnya.

在当今竞争激烈的商业环境中，政商企大客户销售成为了众多企业拓展业务、提升业绩的关键领域。然而，政商企市场的复杂性、客户需求的多样性以及销售过程的挑战性，都给销售人员带来了极大的考验。本课程旨在通过深度剖析政商企环境，帮助学员精准把握客户需求，实现销售业绩的飞跃。
课程将重点讲解如何精准把握客户需求，包括客户需求的分析方法、挖掘技巧以及客户关系管理等。此外，课程还将分享一系列实战销售技巧和策略，如谈判技巧、销售团队建设、客户关系维护等，帮助学员在实际销售工作中更加得心应手。
通过本课程的学习，学员将能够全面掌握政商企大客户销售的核心技能和策略，提升自己在复杂市场环境中的销售能力和竞争力。我们期待每一位学员都能够通过本课程的学习，成为政商企大客户销售领域的佼佼者，为企业的持续发展和业绩增长贡献自己的力量。

courses.title: Marketing Management: Masterclass
courses.bio: Marketing, Digital Marketing, Marketing Mix, Master Class, Marketing Management
objectives: Define Marketing Management and Design a Customer Driven Marketing Strategy
Understand and Analyze the Marketing Environment and Consumer Behaviour
Apply Market Segmentation, Targeting and Positioning
Understand and Apply the Four P's , Product, Price, Promotion and Place

Introduction to Marketing Management: 1.2. Creating and Capturing Customer Value in Marketing
Buyer Behaviour: 3.1. Consumer Markets and Consumer Buying Behaviours
3.2. Business Markets and Business Buying Behaviours

requirements: No experience needed. You will learn everything you need to know about Marketing in the course.
courses.description:
This comprehensive online course in Marketing Management is designed to provide you with a strong foundation in the principles, strategies, and practices that drive successful marketing. You will gain valuable insights into how to create effective customer-driven strategies, understand consumer behavior, and apply the core concepts of marketing to real-world business challenges.
Chapter 1: Define Marketing Management and Design a Customer-Driven Marketing Strategy
In this opening chapter, we will introduce you to the core concepts of marketing management. You will learn the role of a marketing manager in an organization and explore the process of designing a customer-driven marketing strategy. This chapter will focus on identifying customer needs, creating value propositions, and aligning marketing strategies with organizational goals to achieve business success. You’ll gain an understanding of strategic marketing planning and the importance of customer-centric approaches in today’s market.
Chapter 2: Understand and Analyze the Marketing Environment
This chapter examines the external and internal factors that influence marketing decisions. You will learn how to analyze the marketing environment, including factors such as economic, social, technological, and competitive trends, as well as legal and regulatory aspects that affect marketing strategy. Through case studies and examples, you’ll gain the ability to identify opportunities and threats within the market and learn how to adapt marketing strategies to a constantly changing business landscape.
Chapter 3: Consumer Behavior
In this chapter, we delve deep into understanding the psychological, social, and cultural factors that influence consumer decision-making. You will learn about the consumer decision-making process, the factors that drive buying behavior, and how marketers can use these insights to create targeted and personalized marketing campaigns. This chapter covers the stages of consumer behavior, including problem recognition, information search, evaluation of alternatives, and post-purchase behavior, helping you better understand how to meet consumer expectations and build brand loyalty.
Chapter 4: Apply Market Segmentation, Targeting, and Positioning
This chapter focuses on one of the most critical aspects of marketing—identifying and targeting the right market segments. You will learn how to segment the market based on demographic, geographic, psychographic, and behavioral factors. After segmenting the market, we will cover the process of targeting the most profitable segments and positioning your product or brand to effectively reach and resonate with your chosen audience. This chapter will equip you with the tools to design tailored marketing campaigns that meet the specific needs of different market segments.
Chapter 5: Understand and Apply the Four P's: Product, Price, Promotion, and Place
The final chapter explores the Four P’s of marketing—Product, Price, Promotion, and Place—and how these elements interact to deliver value to consumers. You will learn how to develop and manage products, set competitive prices, design promotional strategies, and determine the right distribution channels to ensure product availability. This chapter will provide you with a holistic understanding of the marketing mix and how to apply it in the development of a successful marketing strategy. You’ll gain practical insights into product lifecycle management, pricing strategies, promotional tactics, and distribution networks.

By the end of this course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of marketing management principles and strategies. You will be equipped with the skills to develop customer-centric marketing strategies, analyze market trends, understand consumer behavior, and effectively apply the Four P’s to drive business growth. This course will prepare you to navigate the complex world of marketing and make strategic decisions that deliver results for your organization.
target_audience: Anyone interested to know and master Marketing.

courses.description:
Mastering the Art of Inbound Marketing: Elevate Your Skills Today!
In the ever-evolving landscape of digital marketing, staying ahead of the curve is essential for success. One of the most powerful and proven strategies is Inbound Marketing. If you're ready to take your marketing skills to the next level, consider enrolling in a Master Course of Inbound Marketing. In this master course, we'll explore the key components and benefits of such a course, helping you understand why it's a game-changer for marketers aiming to thrive in the digital era.
Understanding Inbound Marketing
Before delving into the master course, let's briefly revisit the fundamentals of Inbound Marketing. Unlike traditional outbound methods, Inbound Marketing focuses on attracting, engaging, and delighting your audience. By creating valuable content and establishing meaningful connections, businesses can convert strangers into loyal customers.
The Need for Mastery
In today's competitive market, a basic understanding of Inbound Marketing is no longer sufficient. To truly stand out and drive results, marketers need to master the intricacies of this methodology. A specialized master course can provide the in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience required to navigate the complexities of modern digital marketing.
Course Highlights
Content Creation and Strategy: Learn the art of crafting compelling content that resonates with your target audience. Develop a strategic approach to content creation that aligns with your business goals.
SEO Optimization: Explore advanced techniques for optimizing your content to rank higher on search engines. Uncover the latest trends and algorithms to stay ahead in the ever-changing SEO landscape.,

courses.title: Les fondamentaux de l’hôtellerie du luxe
courses.bio: Découvrir le secteur de l'hôtellerie et le produit hôtelier.
objectives: - Découvrir le secteur de l'hôtellerie et le produit hôtelier
- Se sensibiliser au savoir-vivre français et à la spécificité des palaces et hôtels de grand Luxe
- Comprendre l'organisation du secteur, la segmentation des marques et les acteurs de l'hôtellerie
- Appréhender le réseau de distribution et les stratégies de promotion
requirements: Aucune expérience nécessaire
courses.description:
Bienvenue dans ce cours sur l’hôtellerie.

Avec près de 20 ans d'expérience dans le secteur du Luxe, j'ai collaboré avec de nombreuses maisons hôtelières dans la croissance et la pérennisation de leurs marques ainsi que la formation de leurs équipes commerciales. J’ai organisé de multiples événements au sein des palaces parisiens iconiques pour faire découvrir ces lieux majestueux et le savoir-faire français. Depuis 10 ans, j'enseigne mon savoir et ma passion pour l’hôtellerie et les services du Luxe dans les universités et écoles de commerce du monde. Je suis honorée de partager ce contenu avec vous !

L'hôtel est l'un des services les plus anciens de nos civilisations. Si le Covid a gelé pour quelques temps l’activité du tourisme dans le monde, elle reprend ses quartiers et montre un nouveau visage mêlant traditions et authenticité. Il fait bon vivre dans ces lieux hors du temps. Le savoir-vivre français est au cœur du secteur dans lequel il rayonne mondialement. Ce cours vous ouvre les portes de ce monde fascinant. Connaître l'histoire, les notions et le vocabulaire de l'hôtellerie est un jeu d'enfants. Et la découverte des stratégies business employées vous offre un avantage majeur si vous souhaitez évoluer dans ce secteur ou vous lancez à votre compte.


Suivre l'intégralité du cours vous permettra d'obtenir la certification LMA (Luxury Marketing Académie à Paris) à la fin.

Les objectifs de ce cours sont les suivants :
- Découvrir le secteur de l'hôtellerie et le produit hôtelier
- Se sensibiliser au savoir-vivre français et à la spécificité des palaces et hôtels de grand Luxe
- Comprendre l'organisation du secteur, la segmentation des marques et les acteurs de l'hôtellerie
- Appréhender le réseau de distribution et les stratégies de promotion
-Intégrer un groupe hôtelier de Luxe ou lancer son concept dans les services haut de gamme
target_audience: Tous les nivéaux

courses.title: Comunicação de Marketing
courses.bio: Conquiste seu cliente do tradicional ao digital
objectives: Comunicar-se com o cliente de forma eficaz.
Conhecer diversas ferramentas da comunicação de marketing que podem ser utilizadas para o seu negócio, desde as mais tradicionais até o meio digital.
Planejar a comunicação mais efetiva para o seu cliente.
Identificar os canais são mais efetivos para abordar o cliente potencial.
requirements: Gostar de Comunicação
courses.description:
Como se comunicar com o cliente? Que canais são mais efetivos para abordar o cliente potencial? Os meios tradicionais perderam seu espaço para o digital? Onde está o cliente? Que conteúdos o cliente gostaria de receber?
Nesse curso você vai conhecer diversas ferramentas da comunicação de marketing que podem ser utilizadas para o seu negócio, desde as mais tradicionais até o meio digital. Algumas ferramentas são simples, de baixo investimento e muito eficientes! Outras requerem um planejamento mais robusto e exigem investimentos mais altos. Que tal conhecer todas elas antes de bombardear o seu cliente com mensagens muitas vezes indesejadas? Tome decisões de forma estratégica e planeje a comunicação mais efetiva para o seu cliente!
Neste curso você vai aprender em detalhes como ocorre a comunicação com o cliente, o processo de comunicação, seus elementos, como elaborar mensagens, os diversos tipos de abordagens e canais que podem ser utilizados. Todas as ferramentas de comunicação são minuciosamente explicadas: Atendimento Pessoal ao Cliente, Marketing Direto, Promoção de Vendas, Merchandising, Propaganda e Publicidade e Marketing Digital. Ao final do curso, você terá a estrutura completa de um Plano de Comunicação Integrada de Marketing, com método simples e prático, permitindo a aplicação imediata em organizações dos mais variados segmentos, portes e localidades.
Tudo isso com a instrução da Mirela Jeffman dos Santos, que é professora com 10 anos de experiência no ensino superior, atuando em disciplinas de marketing, comportamento do consumidor, pesquisa mercadológica, empreendedorismo, criatividade, metodologia científica, práticas inovadoras de ensino e aprendizagem. Atuou como coordenadora acadêmica dos cursos de gestão na Faculdade Faccentro. Atuou como Professora Pesquisadora na Unisc vinculada ao PPGAd e nos cursos de Administração, Marketing e Comunicação nas modalidades presencial, à distância e híbrido.
Bacharel em Administração. Especialista em Docência Universitária. Mestre em Administração e Negócios. Doutora em Administração com ênfase em Marketing.
target_audience: Profissionais da área de Marketing, comunicação, publicidade, estudantes de administração, marketing e comunicação social e demais pessoas interessadas na área de comunicação de marketing.

courses.title: Marketing zum Nulltarif
courses.bio: Marketingideen für den kleinen Geldbeutel
objectives: Sammlung kostenloser Kommunikationsinstrumente
Sammlung kostengünstiger Instrumente

Grundlagenwissen Öffentlichkeitsarbeit
requirements: Computer
Grundlagenwissen im Marketing
courses.description:
Um auf dem Markt erfolgreich zu sein, musst du dich gegen viele andere Marktteilnehmer behaupten.
Das ist Fakt und nachvollziehbar, allerdings ist ein marketingaufwand auch immer mit großen Kosten verbunden. Es gibt nicht wenige Unternehmen, die eine große Summe ihres Kapitals in Marketing und Kommunikationsmaßnahmen stecken. Doch was machen Unternehmen und Startups, die ihr Geld in die Produktentwicklung und Mitarbeiter investieren müssen? - Ist es zwangsläufig so, dass man viel Geld ins Marketing stecken muss?
Nein, nicht unbedingt!
- In diesem Kurs sprechen wir darüber, welche Marketingmaßnahmen auf dem Markt sind, die für dich komplett kostenlos sind oder zumindest einen Bruchteil der eigentlich zu erwartenden Summen kosten. In verschiedenen Lektionen und Kapiteln stelle ich dir Möglichkeiten des Online- und Offlinemarketings vor, die einigen Unternehmen bereits Erfolge gebracht haben und auch weiterhin abliefern. Außerdem lernst du Strategien, wie du deine Kreativität fürs Marketing nutzen kannst.


Wir beschäftigen uns in diesem Kurs mit den folgenden Punkten:
Online Marketing
SEO
Public Relations
Offlinemarketing
Marketing Psychologie
Kreatives Marketing
Dieser Kurs ist ein "lebender Kurs". Das bedeutet, ich werde diesen regelmäßig um neue Lektionen ergänzen.


Natürlich ist die Ergänzung auch von der Kurs-Community abhängig. Wenn du auf brilliante Marketing-Ideen und Konzepte stoßen solltest, kanndt du diese gerne mit der Community teilen und diesen Kurs für alle Teilnehmer mit weiterentwickeln.
target_audience: Startupunternehmer
Blogger
Mitarbeiter in Marketingabteilungen
Mitarbeiter in Werbeagenturen
Menschen mit Gründungsabsicht
Schüler und Studenten

Vous souhaitez maîtriser la vente B2B et booster vos performances commerciales auprès des entreprises ? Ce cours est conçu pour vous, que vous soyez entrepreneur, commercial, ou dirigeant de PME.
Dans un environnement compétitif, savoir vendre efficacement à des professionnels est une compétence incontournable. Ce cours vous guide pas à pas pour développer une stratégie de vente B2B performante, concevoir des offres irrésistibles, et maximiser vos conversions grâce à des techniques modernes de prospection et de suivi.
Ce que vous apprendrez :
Les bases de la vente B2B et les erreurs courantes à éviter.
Comment bâtir une audience et attirer l’attention des prospects.
La création d’offres commerciales percutantes et crédibles.
Les meilleures méthodes de prospection : emailing, phoning, vidéo marketing, et visites commerciales.
L’importance d’un suivi structuré pour conclure vos ventes.
Pourquoi suivre ce cours ?
Méthodes éprouvées : Apprenez des stratégies claires et applicables, adaptées aux réalités du marché B2B.
Exemples concrets : Découvrez des cas pratiques et des outils pour mettre en œuvre vos nouvelles compétences immédiatement.
Résultats garantis : Développez une approche commerciale efficace et durable pour attirer et fidéliser vos clients professionnels.
À qui s’adresse ce cours ?
Entrepreneurs cherchant à développer leurs ventes aux entreprises.
Commerciaux débutants ou intermédiaires voulant maîtriser des techniques modernes.
Responsables marketing ou dirigeants souhaitant structurer leur stratégie B2B.
Freelances et consultants désirant élargir leur clientèle professionnelle.
Inscrivez-vous dès maintenant et transformez vos prospects en clients fidèles grâce à une stratégie de vente B2B optimisée !
target_audience: Ce cours s'adresse à :  Entrepreneurs souhaitant améliorer leurs ventes aux entreprises et structurer leur démarche commerciale. Commerciaux débutants ou intermédiaires cherchant à maîtriser les techniques modernes de vente B2B. Responsables marketing ou dirigeants de PME souhaitant bâtir des stratégies efficaces pour attirer et convertir des clients professionnels. Freelances et consultants désireux de développer leur portefeuille client en B2B.

courses.title: Personal Branding: You Deliver a Great Elevator Pitch
courses.bio: Personal Branding - You can communicate one good idea in less than 30 seconds
objectives: Deliver an effective elevator pitch
Rehearse efficiently using video

You Can Deliver a Great Elevator Pitch E: Learn the Secret of Great Elevator Pitches

Practice the Efficient, Smart Way: Practice Your Personal Branding Homework Using the TJ Walker AI Clone
A Lifetime of Great Elevator Pitches In: Rehearse Your Personal Branding Homework and Get Instant Feedback
Time to Give TJ a Piece of Your Mind
Update - You Should Get on the TikTok App Now
Housekeeping Matters: 7 Steps For Getting the Most Out of this Course
$10,000 Guarantee This Course Will Make You a Better Communicator
One Last Chance to Make This Course Better for Your Permanent Learning Library
Bonus Section: Reading for Your Personal: Here Is How You Can Get your Certificate of Completion for this Course

requirements: Students will need to record themselves speaking using a cellphone camera or webcam
courses.description:
Personal Branding. Imagine delivering an elevator pitch to an executive who holds the future to your dreams, and the person says "sounds interesting, please call my office and schedule a meeting. I'd like to talk to you in more depth about this idea." Wouldn't it be great to know that you can entice anyone into wanting a meeting with you after just a 30 second conversation? Nothing will enhance your personal branding as much as the ability to communicate an elevator pitch in a concise and compelling manner.
In this How to Deliver an Elevator Pitch course you will learn the following:
* How to craft a tight, focused elevator pitch
* How to rehearse on video
* How to appear confident and relaxed
* How to make sure your message is interesting and memorable
*How to demonstrate excellent personal branding
This personal branding course is delivered primarily through spoken lectures. Because the skill you are learning is speaking related, it only makes sense that you learn through speaking.
The skill you will learn in this class is not primarily theoretical or academic. It is a skill that requires physical habits. That is why you will be asked to take part in numerous exercises where you record yourself speaking on video, and then watching yourself. Learning presentation skills is like learning how to ride a bicycle. You simply have to do it numerous times and work past the wobbling and falling off parts until you get it right.
This personal branding course contains numerous video lectures plus several bonus books for your training library.
TJ Walker has been coaching and training people on their presentation skills for 30 years. Now, through the power of Udemy's online platform, he is able to give you the same high quality training that he gives in person to CEOs, Fortune 500 executives, and Presidents of countries. Only you can now receive the training at a tiny fraction of the normal fee for in-person training.
How long this course takes is up to you. The longest part of the course involves you speaking on video, critiquing yourself, and doing it over until you like it. But if you get to the point where you love how you look and sound when you present it will be well worth the time spent. And having this skill will save you time for all future presentations in your life.
You can begin improving your presentation skills right now. You may have an opportunity to speak out as soon as tomorrow, so why waste another day worried that your presentation skills are not up to high standards. Please enroll today.
Course updated on July 30, 2015
There is a 100% Money-Back Guarantee for this course. And the instructor also provides an enhanced guarantee.
What others say about this personal branding course:
"5 Stars! Despite having been a speaker for many years and taken several colleges, online and private lessons, I found myself drawn to listen to TJ Walker, and I am thrilled to learn from this master of communications! He makes every other course seem like a prologue and I know I am going to be the confident, well prepared speaker that I always sought to become. The magnitude of material and the pieces of golden wisdom are so practical to today's environment. It hardly seems possible that a teacher of this quality would be so giving and available to the average person like myself, when he is qualified to coach Kings and Dignitaries. Only one-third through the course and already my Charity fundraising efforts are more effective because I have gained skills to improve my communication, both my message and my delivery. The clarity of TJ Walker's delivery demonstrates his message in action. Follow him on Facebook and YouTube for greater depth if you find yourself improving from absorbing his work as I have. Do the assignments promptly and you will improve with each session. Worth the investment of time and that is what I value most, TJ WALKER delivered value with each session, and made the most of my time." Debbie Tudor

What others say about the instructor:

“TJ Walker's single-minded devotion to presentation has made him the #1 expert for executives seeking guidance on speaking to the public and media." Bob Bowdon, Anchor/Reporter, Bloomberg Television
“TJ Walker is the leading media trainer in the world." Stu Miller, Viacom News Producer
(TJ Walker's Media Training Worldwide) “The world's leading presentation and media training firm."Gregg Jarrett, Fox News Channel Anchor

Job seekers
Executives

courses.title: 经典品牌营销理论和工具——罗瑟·瑞夫斯的USP理论
courses.bio: 以史为鉴，可以知兴亡
objectives: 品牌营销主要发展历史和脉络--懂营销史

2.品牌定位理论：瑞夫斯的USP理论
3.USP经典案例

requirements: 本课程对学员无特定要求，欢迎所有感兴趣者参加学习。
courses.description:
从追溯品牌营销的发展历程，理清其历史脉络，到深度解析罗瑟·瑞夫斯的品牌定位理论与 USP理论，为你筑牢理论根基。课程将详细讲解 USP 理论的各个方面，通过真实生动的 USP 经典案例，让你明白如何精准挖掘产品的独特卖点。同时，深入阐释 USP 核心理论的模型工具，手把手教你如何运用工具制定营销策略。更会聚焦国内市场，探讨 USP 在国内的应用实践，分析本土成功案例的亮点与经验。

ブログをこれから始めたい方、記事を書いてもなかなか見てもらえない方におすすめです。

courses.title: İhracat Müşterisi Bulma Yöntemleri
courses.bio: İnterneti kullanarak dış ticarette yurtdışından ihracat müşterisi bulma yöntemleri

Giriş: İhracat pazarına nasıl girilir ve markamızın bilinirliğini nasıl arttırabilir
Büyük şirketlerin satın alma platformlar: Büyük şirketlerin satın alma platformları ve satın alma ofisleri

requirements: İnternet bağlantısı ve bilgisayar yeterlidir
İngilizce orta ya da az bilmeleri yeterlidir. Terimleri ve cümle kalıplarını ihracat çalışmaları yaptıkca öğrenecekler
courses.description:
Bu kursumuzda internet ve diğer geleneksel yöntemlerle yurtdışında müşteri bulup, firmamızı yurtdışına açılma ve ihracat yapmamızı öğreniyoruz
İhracat bir firmanın büyümesi, ürünlerinin globalleşmesi hem ciro artışı hem de ürünlerin yurtiçi ve yurtdışı rekabete göre üretilmesi için gereklidir.
İhracat yapan firmalar yurtiçindeki ekonomik dalgalanmalardan etkilenmezler ve her zaman nakit akışları olur. İhracat yapan firmalar yurtiçinde de rekabete hazırdırlar.
Bu kursumuzda internette kolayca bulabileceğiniz ihracat müşterileri bulma yöntemleri yanında benim hem iş yaşantımda kullandığım hem de firmaların yurtdışına açılmalarına danışmanlık toplantılarında uyguladığım ve güzel sonuçlar aldığım yöntemleri de anlattım. Halihazırda bir firmanın ihracat departmanında yurtdışı satışcı olarak çalışan ya da çalışmayı düşünen kişiler ile firma sahipleri bu kurstan çok fayda göreceklerdir.
Anlattığım bu yöntemler sadece teori de değil aynı zamanda pratik te kullandığım yöntemlerdir. İnternette görebileceğiniz, teoride var olan fakat pratikte pek işe yaramayan yöntemleri bu kursta anlatmadım.


İhracatın firmalara doğrudan faydaları şunlardır.
-Pazar payını genişletme fırsatı verir.
-Eğer iç pazarda kapasite tam kullanılmıyor ise,üretimi artırma imkanı sağlar.
-İç pazara olan bağımlılığı azaltır,yada iç pazardaki durgunluğu telafi etme imkanı verir.
-Dış pazarlara girerek, iç pazardaki rekabeti yayma imkanı verir.
-İç pazarda denenmiş ve test edilmiş ürünleri ihraç ederek dış pazara girilmesi, pazar araştırması maliyetini azaltır.
-Uluslararası pazarlarda yaşanan yoğun rekabet, ihracatçıları,ürünlerini pazarın ihtiyaçlarına göre uyarlamak için teşvik eder,böylece teknolojik know-how düzeyinde gelişme sağlanır.
target_audience: Bir firmada yurtdışı satış departmanında çalışan ya da çalışmayı planlayanlara, dış ticaretçi olmak isteyenlere yönelik
ihracat yapmak isteyen herkese yöneliktir

courses.title: 供应链时间管理
courses.bio: 供应链管理
objectives: 了解流程的每个环节
分析不同场景下的订单履行流程，提供针对性的解决方案
确保交付的管控思路
了解管理整个供应链管理流程并有效控制关键节点，以保障及时交付

介绍: 订单履行流程设计工作坊案例

requirements: 供应链相关
courses.description: 供应链时间管理对于确保企业高效运作和客户满意度至关重要。为了有效管理供应链时间，首先需要清晰梳理客户订单履行流程。从接收订单到最终交付，每个环节都需精心策划与监控。我们将通过深入了解流程的每个环节，分析不同场景下的订单履行流程，提供针对性的解决方案。在流程设计工作坊中，我们将分享具体的步骤和方法，结合真实的订单履行流程案例进行深入剖析。此外，还将探讨如何确保交付的管控思路，以及制定订单评审规则，确保整个供应链管理流程得到有效监控，关键节点得到及时控制，从而保障订单能够按时、准确地交付给客户。
target_audience: 供应链相关人员

courses.description:
Deixa eu te falar, esse é um método que foram investido milhões em dólares até chegar na sua mais alta performance, conhecido como Spin Selling, este método abrangente oferecer uma imersão detalhada nas estratégias eficazes para conduzir conversas de vendas persuasivas e orientadas para soluções. Desde a abordagem inicial até o fechamento do negócio, você aprenderá como aplicar habilmente as quatro etapas fundamentais do Spin Selling - Situação, Problema, Implicação e Necessidade de Solução - para identificar as necessidades do cliente, superar objeções e fechar vendas de alto impacto. Com instrução prática, estudos de caso reais e simulações de vendas, este curso capacita você a dominar as técnicas avançadas necessárias para se destacar no competitivo mundo das vendas 1 a 1.

Existem várias razões pelas quais o SPIN Selling pode ser uma técnica eficaz para aumentar as vendas de um vendedor. Algumas das principais razões incluem:

Foco nas necessidades do cliente: O Spin Selling ajuda o vendedor a se concentrar nas necessidades do cliente, em vez de simplesmente tentar empurrar um produto ou serviço.
Maior eficácia de vendas: Ao se concentrar nas necessidades do cliente, o Spin Selling pode ser mais eficaz do que outras técnicas de vendas, pois ajuda a identificar as reais necessidades do cliente e a oferecer soluções que atendam a essas necessidades.
Aumento da confiança do cliente: O Spin Selling pode ajudar a aumentar a confiança do cliente no vendedor, pois demonstra que o vendedor está genuinamente interessado em ajudar o cliente e não apenas em fazer uma venda rápida.
Melhora da produtividade: Ao se concentrar nas necessidades do cliente, o Spin Selling pode ajudar o vendedor a ser mais produtivo, pois ajuda a evitar o desperdício de tempo e esforço em clientes que não têm interesse no produto ou serviço oferecido.
Construção de relacionamentos mais fortes: O Spin Selling ajuda a construir relacionamentos mais fortes com os clientes, pois demonstra que o vendedor está disposto a ouvir e entender as necessidades do cliente, o que pode levar a vendas repetidas e referências de clientes satisfeitos.
target_audience: Profissionais de Vendas Iniciantes: Pessoas que estão começando suas carreiras em vendas e desejam aprender as bases sólidas e as melhores práticas para se tornarem vendedores bem-sucedidos.

Vendedores Experientes em Busca de Aprimoramento: Profissionais de vendas que já têm experiência no campo, mas que desejam aprimorar suas técnicas, adotar abordagens mais eficazes e alcançar resultados ainda melhores.

courses.description:
Beaucoup de gens font de l'Email Marketing.
Mais la plupart le font mal !
Ils n'ont pas de réelle stratégie, obtiennent des résultats médiocres, et finissent par "balancer" des emails peu efficaces sans réelle conviction, à une base mal entretenue... Certains finissent même par penser que "l'email est mort..." Quel gâchis.
En tant qu'expert de l'emailing, j'obtiens pour mes meilleures campagnes de prospection des taux d'ouverture >80% et de réponse >60%, avec des ventes conséquentes à la clé !


C'est avec un grand plaisir que je vous partage dans ce cours tout ce que j'ai appris à force de tests et d'itérations successives sur plusieurs centaines de campagnes email.
Ce cours est issu à l'origine des formations que j'ai données en présentiel, soit pour des entreprises me sollicitant directement, soit pour un panel de professionnels du marketing en poste dans le cadre de leur formation continue, au travers d'organismes tels que l'Institut Supérieur du Marketing. Au lieu de répéter toujours et toujours la même chose, j'en ai fait un cours au format vidéo, que vous pouvez suivre sur Udemy à votre rythme n'importe quand et n'importe où.


> Qu'allez-vous apprendre dans ce cours ?
Connaître les généralités et les indicateurs de performance classiques de l'emailing
Choisir la meilleure Stratégie Emailing selon votre situation pour atteindre vos objectifs
Configurer ou vérifier la configuration des paramètres techniques

Créer et entretenir une base email saine
Ecrire des objets et des contenus d'email percutants à l'aide des personas et du copywriting
Mesurer votre indicateurs de performance, le retour sur investissement de vos campagnes, et adopter une approche "test & learn"


> Y a-t-il des exigences ou prérequis pour ce cours ?
Il n'y a aucun prérequis en termes de compétences pour ce cours. Il s'agit d'un cours complet qui fonctionne étape par étape, approprié à la fois pour les débutants et les personnes souhaitant approfondir leurs connaissances en email marketing. Permettez-moi néanmoins de vous demander :

requirements: No special requirements
Desire to learn more about distribution management
courses.description:
Most manufactures don't sell their products directly to the final users, between them stands a set of intermediaries performing a different roles to aid the company product/ service to reach the target audience, speed of distribution or how quickly the product reach the customer is very important in channel management decision company;s must be very careful in selecting channel members, channel members need to be trained and motivated to do the best for the manufacturer, channel members also need to be evaluated and periodically channel arrangements need to be modify to meet current market trends .
It is not by- force that an organisation should select intermediaries for distribution functions it can be done by the company itself if all conditions are favorable. Finding the das in inventory for your business will show ou the average number of days it takes to sell our inventory. The lower the number you calculate, the better return on your assets you're getting. If you're not sure where to start, do not worry. Calculating days in inventory is actaully pretty straightforward and we'll walk you through it step-by-step below. Inventory turnover means how many times a business sells and replaces its inventory in a given period of time. A low turnover rate indicates unproductive assets and lower profits. The company is holding on to too much excess inventory because it is not selling fast enough. A high turnover rate may be an indication of lost sales as products may be out of stock when a customer wants to buy them.

courses.bio: A experiência de compra
objectives: Transformando a experiência: Aprenda como transformar a experiência de compra do seu cliente e agregar valor aos seus produtos.
Valorizar a imagem: Aprenda a valorizar a imagem da empresa através de elementos chaves que as grandes marcas utilizam.
As tendências Aprenda a importância das tendências de moda e como é possível prever e se preparar para elas.
Aprenda com as melhores: Conheça a técnica usada por grandes marcas como Snupy, Estoque, Le Lis Blanc e SouQ, Abercrombie, Victoria 's Secret e muito mais!

Visual Merchandising: A coerência na experiência de compra

requirements: Não é necessário ter conhecimento prévio.
courses.description:
Se você trabalha no varejo e tem interesse em aprender mais sobre visual merchandising, este é o programa perfeito para você. Visual merchandising não é apenas uma técnica de exposição de produtos, mas uma estratégia poderosa para transformar a experiência de compra do cliente e agregar valor aos seus produtos.
Para donos de loja, entender a importância do visual merchandising é essencial. Inovar no ponto de venda (PDV) pode ser um grande diferencial de mercado. Aprender a organizar e exibir produtos de maneira atraente não só atrai mais clientes, mas também incentiva compras por impulso e melhora a percepção da marca. Com este programa, você descobrirá como criar um ambiente de loja que se destaque da concorrência e promova uma experiência de compra memorável.
Profissionais de trade marketing também se beneficiarão imensamente. São eles os responsáveis por transformar o PDV em mais um formato de comunicação com o cliente, proporcionando experiências diferenciadas. Aprender a utilizar visual merchandising para destacar produtos e criar displays cativantes pode aumentar significativamente as vendas e fortalecer a conexão com os clientes. O curso mostrará como o ambiente de loja pode ser tão impactante quanto qualquer campanha publicitária.
Para publicitários e profissionais de marketing, entender que o PDV pode gerar resultados tão significativos quanto uma campanha online é crucial. O curso ensinará a usar visual merchandising de forma estratégica para maximizar o impacto no PDV. Ao dominar essas técnicas, você poderá criar campanhas de marketing integradas que aproveitam ao máximo todos os pontos de contato com o consumidor.
O programa cobre várias áreas essenciais, incluindo como transformar a experiência de compra do cliente e agregar valor aos produtos. Você aprenderá a valorizar a imagem da empresa através de elementos chaves que as grandes marcas utilizam. Entender as tendências de moda e como prever e se preparar para elas é outra habilidade fundamental que será desenvolvida.
Além disso, você terá a oportunidade de aprender com as melhores marcas do mercado. Descubra as técnicas usadas por gigantes como Snupy, Estoque, Le Lis Blanc, SouQ, Abercrombie, Victoria's Secret e muitas outras. Estas empresas têm décadas de experiência em criar ambientes de loja que encantam e fidelizam clientes. Conhecer suas práticas de visual merchandising será uma fonte inesgotável de inspiração e aprendizado.
Em resumo, este programa oferece uma abordagem abrangente e prática sobre visual merchandising, proporcionando as ferramentas e conhecimentos necessários para transformar qualquer ponto de venda em um ambiente atraente e eficaz. Seja você um dono de loja, profissional de trade marketing ou um publicitário, este curso será um investimento valioso para impulsionar suas habilidades e melhorar seus resultados no varejo.
target_audience: Donos de loja: Para os donos que querem inovar, entender a importância do Visual Merchandising é essencial e um grande diferencial de mercado.
Trade demarketing: Os profissionais que são responsáveis por transformar o PDV em mais um formato de comunicação com o cliente, proporcionando experiências diferenciadas.
Publicitários e Marketing: Para quem trabalha com comunicação, entender que o PDV pode gerar tantos resultados quanto uma campanha online, basta usar de forma estratégica.

Course Content & Overview
You will learn step-by-step through the donor meeting, help you plan exactly what to say, and how to make the ask for a donation. You'll learn the 8-Step Pitch Path system to help you share with your donors the great work you are doing and the impact you are having on the world.


Part 1: The Mindset
Do I even need a pitch?
Why it all starts with a Big Vision
The Mindset of a Successful Fundraiser
Part 2: Building Your Donor Pitch
3 Reasons Why People Give
8 Steps of the Pitch Path: How to build a great pitch

Part 3: Perfecting Your Pitch

How to Practice Your Donor Pitch
How to Start Your Pitch in a Donor Meeting
How to Use Your Pitch on a Phone Call
Advanced Pitch Strategies


Who is this for?
The ideal student is someone who works in fundraising either for a nonprofit or helping a nonprofit. This works for existing nonprofit organizations and start-ups. The course is designed to make it as easy as possible for you to build your donor pitch and feel confident knowing exactly what to say at your next donor meeting.


Money-Back Guarantee
If you are not completely satisfied with the class for any reason, simply return the course within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.


Want to begin?

courses.title: Neuromarketing Masterclass - The Complete Guide
courses.bio: Learn how marketers are applying Neuromarketing principles in advertising, product design, packaging, placement etc
objectives: How do consumers make decisions
How does the brain and subconscious thinking work
Strategies used by marketers to influence decisions
Key elements that need to be kept in mind while influencing consumer decisions
Fundamentals and advanced principles of neuromarketing
How can neuromarketing principles be applied to various areas of work
Differences between traditional marketing and market research approaches and neuromarketing

Key Elements: Four Cognitive Principles that guide Consumer Behavior
Future of Neuromarketing: Challenges with Traditional market research approaches
Neuromarketing Techniques for Measuring Consumer Responses

requirements: There are no prerequisites for this course
courses.description:
Neuromarketing is taking the marketing world by storm. It’s a new discipline that is very quickly evolving the way marketers are influencing consumers and their buying decisions. Neuromarketing leverages three core disciplines of marketing, market research, and brain science. The reason why Neuromarketing is rapidly becoming popular is that it leverages how the human brain reacts and responds to specific marketing incentives. This ensures that the marketing efforts and their effectiveness is well measured and accurate.
Neuromarketing leverages research using a wide array of cutting-edge and innovative ways through biometric and brain signals to examine consumer behavior and create relevant marketing strategies. The rapid increase in the uptake of neuromarketing across various business domains and applications across industries is making it imperative that marketers take heed and start applying them to their businesses as well.
This course will provide a very comprehensive guide on this new way of neuromarketing. Whether you are exploring implementing neuromarketing in your organization or wanting to up your knowledge on this new phenomenon, this is the right course for you. Through this course, you will get to learn:
. Why do people buy what they buy
. Factors that go in the decision-making process
. Cognitive principles which shape decisions
. Role of emotions
. Key elements of the consumer behavior
. How are companies applying the neuromarketing principles
. How do marketers influence the decisions of consumers
. Insights into the functioning of the human brain
. Why are marketers preferring neuromarketing over the traditional marketing approaches
. Core tenets and drivers of neuromarketing
. Difference between neuromarketing and traditional marketing approaches
. Journey of the evolution of neuromarketing and its history
. Core elements of neuroscience, behavioral economics, social psychology, and marketing
. Application of neuromarketing principles across key areas of brand, product creation, advertising, shopping, online business, and entertainment
. Various modern measures of consumer responses like eye tracking, electro-dermal activity, response times, etc
. Four key steps in the consumer decision-making process
. Changes in the ways of measuring marketing effectiveness
. The Neuromarketing model for consumer thinking and behavior
. Application of neuromarketing principles across key business areas
. Impact on branding, product and packaging, design, and product testing
. Evolution of the buying process
. Impact of neuromarketing on online business and entertainment
. Ethical concerns arising out of developments
. Key benefits for consumers, marketers, and businesses
. Cutting-edge techniques and innovation in measuring consumer responses
. Future application of neuromarketing
Our team of experts has carefully curated the course content. You will find that this is by far the most comprehensive course on Neuromarketing. So go ahead and take the course!
See you in the course!
Regards,
Team Wizdom
target_audience: . Professionals who want to learn more about Neuromarketing
. Professionals who want to explore Neuromarketing as a career opportunity
. Professionals who want to explore implementing Neuromarketing in their organizations or for their products/services

requirements: Dieser Kurs ist für jedes Level geeignet. Spezielle Vorkenntnisse sind nicht notwendig.

courses.description:
Hast du dich schon einmal gefragt, was Menschen zum Kaufen bewegt? Warum sind einige Unternehmen weniger erfolgreich als andere, obwohl die Produkte gleichwertig sind? – Dies liegt an Marketingmaßnahmen, die bei einigen erfolgreicher sind als bei anderen. Doch was macht die erfolgreichen Marketingmaßnahmen aus? Warum laufen diese besser als andere?
Der Grund liegt in der Psychologie des Marketings.


Einige Unternehmen schaffen es, die Psyche ihrer Kunden gezielt anzusprechen und sie damit zum Kaufen zu bewegen. Doch was ist ihr Geheimnis? Was machen diese Kommunikatoren anders als andere?
In diesem Kurs wirst du die Antworten auf diese spannenden Fragen erhalten. Kurz und knackig werde ich dir Lektion für Lektion psychologische Muster und Tricks zeigen, die du schnell in deine Marketingstrategie einfügen kannst.
Dabei ist es egal, ob du Student im Bereich Marketing bist, ein Verantwortlicher in einem Unternehmen oder ein Onlineunternehmer: die in diesem Kurs vermittelten Informationen sind für jeden Bereich relevant und können auf verschiedenen Ebenen angewendet und zum Einsatz gebracht werden.


Wir beginnen mit grundlegenden Informationen zur Marketingpsychologie. Diese sind wichtig, damit du die Zusammenhänge zwischen Psychologie und einem erfolgreichen Marketing verstehst. Du wirst von Beginn an abgeholt und bist in der Lage, den Kaufentscheidungsprozess und die mentale Verarbeitung deiner Kunden zu verstehen.
Danach geht es um die konkrete Beschäftigung mit deiner Zielgruppe. Du wirst lernen, wie du deine Zielgruppe definierst und mit welchen Mitteln du sie besser kennenlernen kannst. Ich werde dir Tricks zeigen, wie du dich in die mentale Welt deiner potenziellen Kunden hineinbewegst und sie Schritt für Schritt besser verstehst. Nur so kannst du die Marketinginstrumente an deine Zielgruppe auch psychologisch anpassen.
Bei den verschiedenen Ebenen des Marketing-Mix gibt es einige Tricks, die du anwenden kannst, um psychologische Erfolge zu erzielen. Diese werde ich dir in Bezug auf die 4P und 7P des Marketing-Mix vorstellen.
Das Thema Verkaufspsychologie werden wir zudem genauer betrachten und Schritt für Schritt deinen Erfolg im Sales und im Copywriting verbessern. Auch das Onlinemarketing werden wir genauer beleuchten. Vom UX-Design und den psychologischen Effekten dahinter bis zum Vertrauensaufbau und Social Media ist hier vieles dabei. Zum Schluss werden dir psychologische Effekte aufgezählt, die du unabhängig von deinen Werbemitteln anwenden kannst.
Worauf wartest du also? Nimm deinen Marketingerfolg in die eigene Hand und starte jetzt durch, mit psychologischen Effekten, deinen Erfolg planbarer zu machen.
target_audience: Geschäftsführer
Selbstständige und Freiberufler
Mitarbeiter im Marketing
Studenten und Schüler

Como reconstruir áudios e melhorar qualidade com IA

requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência prévia em Inteligência Artificial ou programação. Basta ter um computador ou celular com acesso à internet para praticar os exemplos e aplicar as estratégias apresentadas.
courses.description:
Você já ouviu falar do poder do ChatGPT e da Inteligência Artificial, mas ainda não sabe como usar essa tecnologia para gerar resultados reais no seu dia a dia? Este curso foi criado para mostrar, de forma prática e acessível, como aplicar o ChatGPT em negócios, estudos, produtividade e carreira profissional.
Ao longo das aulas, você vai aprender desde os fundamentos essenciais, entendendo como a ferramenta funciona e como fazer as perguntas certas, até estratégias avançadas para ganhar dinheiro online, criar conteúdos profissionais, aumentar sua produtividade e se destacar no mercado de trabalho.
No módulo de monetização, você vai descobrir como usar o ChatGPT para criar fontes de renda, seja como afiliado, criando produtos digitais, ou até mesmo acelerando processos de vendas e marketing.
No módulo de marketing digital, aprenderá a criar posts para redes sociais, e-mails persuasivos, roteiros de vídeo, anúncios para Facebook, Google e até e-books completos com a ajuda da IA.
Se você é estudante ou profissional, vai descobrir como usar o ChatGPT para escrever redações, resumos, propostas comerciais, além de treinar para entrevistas de emprego.
E para o uso pessoal, ainda verá como o ChatGPT pode auxiliar em treinos, dietas e até na organização da rotina.
Esse é um curso completo, feito para iniciantes e profissionais, que querem aprender a usar o ChatGPT e a Inteligência Artificial de forma prática, estratégica e lucrativa.
target_audience: Este curso é destinado a empreendedores, afiliados, profissionais de marketing, estudantes e qualquer pessoa que deseja usar o ChatGPT de forma prática para aumentar a produtividade, criar conteúdos, otimizar estudos e até mesmo explorar novas formas de renda online.

courses.title: Design Thinking Desde Cero: Aprende a Innovar
courses.bio: Explora,experimenta y evoluciona.
objectives: Comprender y aplicar las cinco fases del Design Thinking para resolver problemas de manera creativa e innovadora en cualquier industria.
Diseñar soluciones centradas en el usuario, utilizando herramientas prácticas para la investigación, ideación y prototipado.
Desarrollar habilidades de pensamiento crítico y creatividad, impulsando la generación de ideas disruptivas y efectivas.
Implementar estrategias de innovación en proyectos reales, mejorando procesos, productos o servicios en empresas y emprendimientos.
Utilizar herramientas y técnicas de prototipado y testeo, validando ideas de manera ágil para optimizar productos, servicios o experiencias de usuario.
Facilitar sesiones de Design Thinking en equipos de trabajo, promoviendo la colaboración y el enfoque centrado en el usuario para la toma de decisiones .

Design Thinking en acción: Lecciones de: Cómo IKEA y Airbnb triunfaron con la metodología Design Thinking
Aplicación del Design Thinking en Mi Emprendimiento, Trabajo o Empresa
Comprender al Usuario: Empatizar y Defin: Design Thinking en Acción: Empatizar y Definir para una Solución Efectiva
De la Idea al Prototipo: Innovación en A: Idear y Prototipar: Construyendo Soluciones Innovadoras
Fase 5: Testear en Design Thinking: Validación de Prototipos: Testeo en Design Thinking
Las 5 Fases del Design Thinking en Acció: Refuerza tu Proceso Creativo: Revisión de las 5 Fases con Casos Reales
Crea Mapas Mentales para Potenciar tu Cr: Diseña Mapas Mentales para Impulsar tu Creatividad
La Importancia del Pensamiento Crítico e: La Importancia del Pensamiento Crítico en el Emprendimiento
Design Thinking desde Cero: Reflexiones: Design Thinking, con su enfoque centrado en las personas
Design Thinking: Innovación centrada en las personas en la actualidad

requirements: Este curso está diseñado para principiantes, por lo que no se requiere experiencia previa en Design Thinking o innovación. Sin embargo, para aprovecharlo al máximo, se recomienda:
Actitud abierta y creativa para explorar nuevas formas de resolver problemas.
Interés en la innovación y la mejora de productos, servicios o procesos.
Acceso a una computadora o dispositivo móvil con conexión a Internet para seguir las lecciones y materiales.
Cuaderno y lápiz o herramientas digitales (como Miro, Mural o Notion) para tomar notas y realizar ejercicios prácticos.
courses.description:
Design Thinking Desde Cero: Aprende a Innovar
¿Quieres aprender a innovar y resolver problemas de forma creativa?
En este curso de Design Thinking Desde Cero, descubrirás cómo aplicar esta metodología en proyectos reales para generar soluciones innovadoras centradas en las personas. No importa si trabajas en negocios, educación, tecnología o cualquier otro sector: Design Thinking te ayudará a crear ideas que marquen la diferencia.
Aprenderás las cinco fases esenciales del Design Thinking:
Empatizar: Comprende las necesidades reales de los usuarios.
Definir: Identifica el problema con claridad.
Idear: Genera ideas creativas y disruptivas.
Prototipar: Convierte tus ideas en soluciones tangibles.
Testear: Valida y mejora tu solución con usuarios reales.
¿Qué obtendrás en este curso?
Conocimientos aplicables a cualquier sector o industria.
Ejercicios prácticos y recursos descargables.
Un enfoque claro y estructurado para innovar con éxito.
Ejemplos y casos reales para que aprendas de manera dinámica.
Herramientas para aplicar Design Thinking en tu día a día.


La innovación no es solo para unos pocos, es una habilidad que todos podemos desarrollar. Atrévete a pensar diferente, a desafiar lo convencional y a crear soluciones que realmente impacten el mundo. ¡Este es tu momento!
¡Empieza hoy y transforma tu forma de innovar con Design Thinking!
target_audience: Este curso está dirigido a todas las personas interesadas en aprender y aplicar Design Thinking para resolver problemas de manera innovadora. Es ideal para:
Emprendedores y dueños de negocios que buscan crear productos y servicios centrados en el usuario.
Profesionales del marketing, diseño, tecnología y educación que desean mejorar su creatividad y habilidades de innovación.
Equipos de trabajo y líderes que quieren implementar metodologías ágiles y mejorar la colaboración.
Estudiantes y cualquier persona curiosa que quiera desarrollar su pensamiento creativo y encontrar soluciones efectivas en distintos ámbitos.

courses.title: المدخل لمجال الوساطة العقارية
courses.bio: مدخلك لمجال الوساطه والمبيعات العقاريه
objectives: فهم لعبة الوساطة العقارية و المعرفة بأساسياتها و متطلباتها الرئيسية من أساس واقعى وعملى ناتج عن ممارسة و تجربة وليس دراسة نظرية فقط
الوعى بالتحديات المدركة و الغير مدركة فى المجال العقارى بالنسبة للمبتدىء فى المجال لتجنب الأخطاء و لتحسين الفرص
امتلاك الخريطة الذهنية لمراحل لعبة الوساطة العقارية بحيث يتمكن المبتدىء من انطلاقة البداية من دون شعور بالتوهان
تعويض المبتدىء فى المجال عن التدريبات المكتبية الأساسية فى الشركات و المعروف عنها فى المجال بعدم نفعها و جديتها

Introduction: مقدمة و نبذة عن محتوى الكورس
محاضرة 2 - العميل من هو ؟: جزء 2 - العميل الفعلى و العميل المحتمل
التسعير - ( Pricing ) - محاضرة 4: جزء 3 - دور العلامة التجارية فى عملية التسعير
أدوات التسعير - ( Pricing tools ) - محاض: جزء 1 - أدوات التسعير فى مجال الوساطة العقارية
جزء 2 - كيفية تحديد ميزانية العميل المشترى
جزء 3 - نصائح للوسيط العقارى فى مسألة التسعير
جزء 4 - تحدى التسعير فى الوقت الحالى و كيفية التعامل معه
المعاينة - ( Showing or Viewing ) - محاض: جزء 1 - تعريف و اهمية مرحلة المعاينة
جزء 2 - قواعد عامة و نصائح للوسيط العقارى (1)
جزء 3 - قواعد عامة و نصائح للوسيط العقارى (2)
التقفيل ( Closing ) - محاضرة 8: جزء 1 - تعريف و قواعد و نصائح عامة
جزء 3 - خطوة (1) علامات التقفيل Closing signs
جزء 4 - خطوة (2) العروض و العروض المقابلة Offers
جزء 5 - خطوة (3) - مقابلات التفاوض Closing meeting

requirements: موبايل او لاب توب للمتابعه فقط , ولا حاجة لأى خبرات سابقة
courses.description:
- مدخلك لمجال الوساطة العقارية .. دروس و محاضرات كاملةوحاه من الخبرالإستراتيجية السابقة .. المحتوى التدريبي مختصر هو يعتبر كورس تأسيسى من حقيقة عملى و ممارسة و تجربة مش نظر بس ... لا غنى عنه كمدخل لمجال الوساطة العقارية ، يبدأ فى المجال بداية صح من غير توهان و بعد ظهور الأخطاء و مع كامل للتحديات اللى هتقابلها فى بداية مارس فى المجال و ازاى متبادلها
- الكورس مصمّم علشان يجاوبك على الاسئلة الرئيسية اللى بتدور فى كل واحد عايز يدخل المجال العقارى .. فيه هتلاقى المفاهيم الرئيسية اللى هتتعرفها فى كل اللاينات سواء كان مدن جديدة او قديمة او كذلك هتحتاج ف شركة تطوير او شركة تسويق او هتشتغل فريلانسسو سواء هتشتغل سكنى او شغال او ادارى او طبى او كل دول او غيرهم .. المفاهيم الرئيسية زى :
- من هو العميل - يعتمد - التسعير - المعاينة - التقفيل - و مفاهيم تانية مهمة هتلاقيها ف المحتوى جوا الكورس
- كورس المدخل لمجال الوساطة العقارية هيعوضك عن التدريبات التقليدية حسب المجال الحقيقي واللى مش بتضيف معرفة تعرف فعلا السوق بحكمى و الاهم هو فهمه لدورك فية كوسيت واية حدود الدور دا بالظبط والمفاهيم و الادوات و المهارات الأساسية اللى لازم تتعلمها تعرف تعرف و تبدأ و تكمل وتتعلم المجال فاهم اللعبة الكويس و فاهم هي بتدور ازاى بالظبط
- محتوى الكورس عن بعد محتوى متكامل متكامل اللى بتتناول تطبيقات زى " بالكامل - انواع العملاء - مصطلحات العقارية بالانجليزية - نسبة التحميل - وغيره " كل دى تستفيد تقدر تدور عليها و تجيبها من مصادر .. لكن ف الكورس هنا لو اتكلمنا عن حاجة من دول بتبقا فى سياق الكورس نفسة ومش هتكون على الاساس .. الكورس مركز ( الفباء ) وساطة عقارية
- الوعد اللى بنقدمة ان الكورس دا هيوفر عليك ما لا تقل عن سنة كاملة من الشغل و الخبرة و الاخطاء ف المجال الحقيقي دا كفائدة مباشرة لكن كفائدة الشيء بالى هتقدر تبدع و تكمل عليه ف اللى اتعلمته ف الكورس دا فى السنين اللى جاية هبقا اكتر بكتير باذن الله
- بنوعدك فى المحتوى هنا انك سمعت كلام مش هتسمعه فى اى محتوى تدريبى تانى ف المجالى الحقيقي كله و دا " تحدى " .. و بالتوفيق باذن الله
target_audience: المبتدئين المهتمين بالدخول لمجال الوساطة و المبيعات العقارية
العاملين فى ذلك المجال منذ فترة بسيطة

courses.title: Visual Merchandising and Display
courses.bio: A comprehensive and up to date visual merchandising course combining retail design, marketing and display techniques.
objectives: The theory behind retail marketing and design. Plus how to implement visual merchandising strategies and displays to increase a retailers revenue.

Module 3-Store Design (Part 1): How to draw your own planogram
Module 8- Visual Merchandising Trends: Your next steps towards being a visual merchandiser

requirements: No
courses.description:
Have you ever come home from a store and bought more than you intended?
Has a window display ever stopped you in your tracks?
Has the smell and music in a store ever triggered an emotion?
Who is behind this magic?... A Visual Merchandiser.


Visual merchandising is a key element to any successful retail industry. It is the skill of implementing techniques and visual displays to maximise sales.
Whether you are thinking of a career in retail, want to expand your skillset or are a business owner who wants to learn ways to increase your sales...this is the course for you!
This Visual Merchandising and Display online course is the perfect way to learn the art and science behind being a visual merchandiser. This marketing practice uses floor plans, colour, lighting, fixtures, displays and other elements to attract customers.
In this course we start from the beginning covering the theory of retail marketing including consumer behaviour, retail branding, store design, target markets and product placement.
Putting theory into practice, then learn the techniques to merchandise products, execute store displays and steps to create retail windows. In addition the course offers practical presentations to learn how to draw planograms and identify a stores focal points.
The end result is the knowledge to be a successful visual merchandiser, increase retail sales and have a new set of skills to further your career.
I have combined my third level study of retail (management and marketing) and my ten years experience being a visual merchandiser to create this comprehensive and up to date online course.
target_audience: The course is suitable for both students and retailers. Students interested in a career in visual merchandising, people who want to expand their skillset or entrepreneurs looking to increase their revenue.

如何用说故事的营销方式去打动消费者

requirements: 具备基础的营销知识
courses.description:
随着疫情的影响，主力消费群体的消费习惯转变，消费者更期待随时随地随性进行“场景触发式购物”，把各种生活场景“触发”为“零售场景”，场景营销的定义以及覆盖面再次被延伸。在交易主导权回归用户的新零售时代，消费者的需求愈发个性化，更加注重服务体验，充分利用各个渠道获取产品相关信息，在碎片化场景中多渠道购物。如何将线上线下相结合，通过精准化、体验式为主的方式，了解用户并满足和引导消费需求。新零售时代，行业内人才的缺失或许是当下实体商业数字化进程中最大的挑战，传统思维有太多的桎梏。既不能停留在过去的经验里，也不能光靠自己的想象。实体商业的场景营销应该怎么做，如何重构人与商业连接的新方式，这门课想邀您加入学习，打开新的商业营销模式，一起向未来。

courses.title: Generative AI in E-commerce
courses.bio: Practical Applications of AI in E-commerce for Business Growth

Introduction to Generative AI: What is Generative AI & How It Works?
The Role of AI in E-commerce: Inventory Management and Supply Chain Optimization
Generative AI Applications in E-commerce: AI-Powered Customer Service : Chatbots and Customer Services
Bias and Fairness in AI with Regard to D: Strategies to Address Bias and Fairness

requirements: Basic Understanding of E-commerce
Interest in AI and Technology
No Prior AI Experience Required
Access to a Computer and Internet:
courses.description:
In the fast-evolving world of e-commerce, staying ahead of the competition means leveraging the latest technologies to enhance customer experiences, optimize operations, and drive growth. Generative AI is at the forefront of this transformation, offering powerful tools and techniques to revolutionize how online businesses operate.


"Generative AI in E-commerce" is a comprehensive course designed to guide you through the exciting potential of AI in the e-commerce sector. Whether you're an e-commerce professional, digital marketer, entrepreneur, or technology enthusiast, this course will equip you with the knowledge and skills to harness the power of AI for your business.


What You'll Learn:


Foundations of Generative AI: Begin with a clear understanding of what Generative AI is, how it works, and why it's becoming a game-changer in the e-commerce industry.
AI-Driven Personalization: Discover how AI can create highly personalized shopping experiences, from product recommendations to dynamic pricing, tailored to individual customer needs.
Automated Content Creation: Learn how Generative AI can streamline content creation, automating everything from product descriptions to visual content, helping you save time and maintain consistency across your online store.
AI in Customer Service: Explore the role of AI-powered chatbots and virtual assistants in enhancing customer service, providing instant support, and improving customer satisfaction.
Inventory Management and Forecasting: Understand how AI can optimize your supply chain, predict demand, and ensure you always have the right products in stock.
Ethical Considerations: Delve into the critical ethical issues surrounding AI in e-commerce, including data privacy, bias, and fairness, and learn how to implement AI responsibly.
Future Trends: Stay ahead of the curve by exploring the future trends in AI, including voice commerce, augmented reality, and AI-powered virtual shopping experiences.


Who This Course Is For:


E-commerce Professionals: Looking to enhance their skill set and implement cutting-edge AI technologies in their operations.
Digital Marketers: Interested in leveraging AI for personalized marketing and improved customer engagement.
Entrepreneurs and Business Owners: Who want to innovate their online stores and stay competitive in a rapidly changing market.
Technology Enthusiasts: Keen to explore the practical applications of AI in a dynamic and growing industry.
AI and Data Science Students: Aspiring to understand the real-world applications of Generative AI in e-commerce.


Course Features:

Comprehensive Modules: Covering everything from foundational AI concepts to advanced applications in e-commerce.
Hands-On Learning: Practical exercises and projects that allow you to apply AI tools and techniques in a real-world context.
Case Studies: Learn from real-world examples of successful AI implementations in e-commerce, as well as lessons from challenges faced by industry leaders.
Ethical AI Practices: Insights into the ethical use of AI, ensuring that your implementations are fair, transparent, and compliant with regulations.
Future-Proofing Your Business: Prepare for the future by understanding emerging AI trends that will shape the e-commerce landscape.


Prerequisites:


Basic Understanding of E-commerce: Familiarity with e-commerce concepts and operations.
Interest in AI and Technology: A passion for exploring new technologies and their applications.
No Prior AI Experience Required: This course is beginner-friendly, with all AI concepts introduced from the ground up.


By the end of this course, you'll be equipped to implement Generative AI strategies in your e-commerce business, driving innovation, improving customer experiences, and positioning your store for long-term success in an increasingly competitive market.


Join us and take the first step towards revolutionizing your e-commerce business with the power of AI!
target_audience: E-commerce Professionals: Individuals working in e-commerce who want to explore how Generative AI can enhance customer experiences, optimize operations, and drive sales.
Digital Marketers: Marketing professionals looking to leverage AI-driven tools for personalized marketing campaigns, content creation, and customer engagement in the e-commerce sector.
Entrepreneurs and Business Owners: Online store owners and entrepreneurs interested in integrating AI into their business strategies to stay competitive and innovative in the market.
Technology Enthusiasts: Anyone with an interest in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and the future of technology in e-commerce, regardless of their current knowledge level.
AI and Data Science Students: Students and learners in AI, data science, or related fields who want to understand practical applications of Generative AI in a real-world industry like e-commerce.

courses.bio: Marketing de réseau (VDI) : Comment créer un support de formation et d'accompagnement ultra pro pour tout exploser !

Formation complète: Le problème qui empêche de réussir en MLM
Etape 0 : Pourquoi créer un support de formation ?
Etape 1 : Avoir fait les bases au démarrage
Etape 2 : Comment faire une bonne activation d'un nouveau membre ?
Etape 3 : Création du support de formation
Etape 4 : Et une fois la théorie assimilée ? Lancer les actions
Etape 5 : Comment l'accompagner sur la durée
Etape 6 : Place à l'autonomie ! Enfin pas tout à fait...

requirements: Aucune expérience requise.
courses.description:
L'univers du marketing relationnel est rempli d'opportunités à saisir.

Nous pouvons faire démarrer des personnes tout le temps, partout, en face à face ou à distance, et réussir rapidement.


Mais il y a un gros problème. Vous recrutez et vos membres recrutent, mais peu de ces distributeurs deviennent des leaders ambitieux qui réussissent.

En plus, vous avez des distributeurs dans votre équipe qui ne recrutent quasiment jamais ou qui ne savent pas former leurs propres membres. Impossible d'évoluer.


La raison ? Les vendeurs indépendants ne savent pas mettre en place un système de formation professionnel pour aider leurs membres à obtenir plus de clients et distributeurs.


Sans oublier les parrains/marraines pas toujours très compétents rarement là pour aider.

Dans cette formation, je vous partage mon expérience de ces dernières années dans le marketing relationnel.

Vous y apprendrez tout pour maîtriser la formation et l'accompagnement de vos membres :
- Les aider à devenir des leaders qui performent et qui créent des grosses équipes.
- Les méthodes pour créer un support de formation simple, professionnel, et duplicable dans toutes vos lignées.
- Les stratégies pour transformer un débutant en machine à recruter et vendre, sans votre aide.


Mais aussi, un plan d'action pour vous lancer dès aujourd'hui :
- Je vous montre ma propre manière de procéder qui m'a aidé à créer ma liberté financière grâce à mon équipe et comment vous devez faire la même chose..


L'argent facile et la réussite facile n'existent pas, mais le marketing relationnel offre des opportunités incroyables pour réussir rapidement, si on a les bonnes méthodes.

Je m'appelle Bruno. Le MLM est mon métier depuis 2017 avec succès, et je compte vous expliquer comment réussir à votre tour.

Bienvenue dans cette formation !
target_audience: La formation est destinée à toute personne en Marketing relationnel qui veut réussir.

courses.title: 実体験ブログで楽しく安定収益！SEOに強い個人ブログならではの記事の書き方や少ないアクセスでも成果が出る運営術を公開
courses.bio: あなたの経験や興味のあることをテーマにしたブログなので記事が書きやすく、少ないアクセスでも長期的に収益を生み出すブログ運営術を徹底解説します。「ブログのジャンル選定やキーワードリサーチにつまづいている、効率的に収益化したい」という人は必見！
objectives: 苦手なジャンルを無理に選ばなくても、自分の“好き・経験”を活かせるテーマ設定法
個人ブログでもSEOからの集客で収益を生むことができるブログの運営方法
共感と信頼を得られる体験ベースの記事の書き方
アクセスを集める記事と収益を発生させる記事の作り方
少ないアクセスや少ない記事数でも高い収益率を実現するブログの作り方
AI時代でも価値が薄れない、「自分にしか書けない体験」でブログを差別化する方法

はじめに: このコースの全体像と学べること
なぜ実体験ブログがおすすめなのか
講師のブログ実績
このコースで得られる未来
このコースの対象者
コースを受講する上でのお願い
ワークシートをダウンロードする方法
ワークシートのダウンロードはこちら

Googleが求めるコンテンツとは？
個人ブログの強みを活かした実体験ブログとは？
実体験ブログのSEOにおけるメリット
実体験ブログの読者におけるメリット
実体験ブログ運営者自身のメリット
実体験ブログのテーマ・ジャンルの探し方: このセクションで学べること
自分の経験を棚卸ししてテーマの種を見つけよう
テーマ選定①：失敗した経験・つらかった経験
テーマ選定②：過去に悩んでいたこと、今悩んでいること
テーマ選定③：仕事、資格、習い事
テーマ選定④：得意なこと
テーマ選定⑤：好きだったこと・今好きなもの
テーマ選定⑥：今興味のあること、これからやってみたいこと
失敗しない実体験ブログのテーマ選定方法: このセクションで学べること
市場が安定 or 伸びているか確認する
検索需要（ニーズ）があるか確認する
マネタイズできるアフィリエイト案件のあるジャンルを選ぶ
ジャンルを狭めて特化する

おすすめランキング記事の基本構成

「各商品・サービスの詳細」を書く

集客記事のキーワード選定＆記事の書き方: このセクションで学べること

キーワードのライバルチェック方法

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
■はじめに


こんにちは、講師のでーぴーです。


僕は副業で3年半ブログに取り組み、ブログ収入が本業を超えるようになったため脱サラをしました。
現在は専業で複数のブログを運営しています。


ブログの稼ぎ方はたった1つしかないわけではなく、さまざまな収益方法があります。
いろんなタイプのブログがあるのですが、僕は1つ1つ実際に自分で実践し、そのさまざまなタイプのブログ収益法で成果を出してきました。


今回はその中の1つ『実体験ブログ』について解説します。




■このコースの概要説明


「あなたの実体験やこれから経験すること、興味のあることで収益化する方法を知りたくありませんか？」


このコースでは、あなたの経験やスキル、興味のあることを活かし、1つのテーマに特化した「実体験ブログの作り方」を徹底解説します。
特別なスキルや派手な実績がなくても大丈夫です。


ChatGPTなどのAIによる自動生成コンテンツがあふれる中で、
あなたにしか書けない“リアルな体験”こそが、読者に届き、信頼を生み、商品を売る力になります。


また、これからの時代、体験談をベースとしたブログはSEO対策の点でもますます価値が高まるでしょう。


実体験ブログのテーマ選び＆テーマ選定時に注意すべきこと
実体験ブログの基本構造と必要な記事
キーワードの見つけ方と注意点
読者に刺さる記事の構成とSEOライティング
収益化につながる導線の作り方
これらをステップ形式で丁寧に解説。


毎日更新や、記事を量産し続けるスタイルではありません。
自分のペースで、自分の体験を活かしながら、「少ない記事数でも成果が出るブログ」をつくることができます。


このブログ講座は、“普通の人”が“ありのままの自分”で収益を得られるようになる実践型のコースです。




■このコースを受講することで…


特別なスキルがなくても、自分の体験を活かして収益を生み出せるようになる
自分の好きなテーマで記事を書き続けることで、ブログ運営が楽しくなる
「何を書けばいいのか」「どう構成すればいいのか」が明確になり、記事作成に迷わなくなる
少ない記事数やアクセスでも効率的に収益化できる仕組みが理解できる
AIにはできない“自分にしか書けない言葉”で差別化する、強いブログを育てられるようになる
一過性で終わらず、長く読まれるブログを構築できる


■こんな方が受講に向いています


特別なスキルや実績がなくても、これまでの体験や経験を活かして収益化したい人
好きなこと・得意なことを活かして、無理なく続けられる副業を探している人
ブログに挑戦したけど、思うように収益化できずにモヤモヤしている方
記事数を増やすのではなく、少ない記事でも結果が出る方法を知りたい方
短期的な成果だけでなく、長期的に収益を生み続けるブログを作りたい人
AI時代でも“自分にしか書けない記事”でSEOに強いブログを作りたい人


■このコースは全部で11セクションです


セクション1：はじめに
セクション2：個人ブログの強みを活かした実体験ブログの特徴
セクション3：実体験ブログのテーマ・ジャンルの探し方
セクション4：失敗しない実体験ブログのテーマ選定方法
セクション5：実体験ブログの全体像
セクション6：体験談を"売れる記事に変える"口コミレビューの書き方
セクション7：体験を活かして書く信頼されるランキング記事
セクション8：集客記事のキーワード選定＆記事の書き方
セクション9：実体験ブログに関するよくある質問
セクション10：このコースのまとめ
セクション11：ボーナスレクチャー


全部で7時間57分のコースです。
その他、必要に応じてワークシートが用意されています。ワークシートに沿って実践していただくことで、実体験ブログの構築を進めることができます。


■最後に
本コースに興味をもっていただいた方は、動画終了後に「コース登録」へ進んでください。もっと検討したいという方はプレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、ぜひ講座を覗いてみてください。


それでは、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！

短期的な成果だけでなく、長期的に収益を生み続けるブログを作りたい人
AI時代でも“自分にしか書けない記事”でSEOに強いブログを作りたい人

courses.title: How To Write Headlines Like The Copywriting Masters
courses.bio: 20 Headline Types & 84 Fast, Easy Formulas Proven To Get More Sales / Desired Actions
objectives: The FASTEST way to write irresistible headlines that get the action you desire.
20 headline types to give you plenty of variety for your headlines.
84 headline templates (based on master copywriters) that you can quickly and easily adapt so you won’t waste hours thinking of ideas for your headlines.
Essential headline tips and guidelines from master copywriters of the last century - with numerous examples of headlines that made $millions.
The psychology behind the headlines - what makes them pull your prospect’s emotions.
How to use power words to add even more impact to your headline. (Plus a FREE PDF of 300+ power words/phrases that you can refer to whenever you are stuck.)
Tips on headline layout and style to make your words really grab the eyeballs of your target audience.
The actual purpose of a headline - and it's not what you think.
20 practice sessions to reinforce each lesson.

Intro and General Headline Tips From Mas: Intro and Headline Tips From Master Copywriters
Quiz Re Intro and Headline Tips From Master Copywriters
More Headline Tips From Master Copywriters
Quiz re More Headline Tips From Master Copywriters
Your Free Bonuses and What To Do Next: Congratulations and What To Do Next

requirements: No prior knowledge necessary but an interest in "what makes people tick" (i.e. their wants, fears, emotions, etc.) would be useful.
courses.description:
This course is a concise, easy, step-by-step guide on how to write headlines that grab attention and get the action you require. This may be to:
Get your prospects to read your email;
Request further info;
Download a free PDF;
Sign up for a newsletter;
Subscribe to a service, and especially to
Buy a product.


Or, if you are an author, you can use this course to come up with ideas for a book title and chapter titles. Again, you may be a video producer or course creator and need to find the right headline for your product. No matter how brilliant your goods and services are, you won't make any sales if your target audience isn't aware of you or your products. To get noticed you need expert copywriting skills and this starts with knowing how to write headlines that grab attention and compel your prospects to keep reading.
You’re probably aware that nowadays our attention span is reducing plus there's a lot more information fighting for our attention, so how do you get your message to stand out from the crowd?

The solution is to be able to write headlines that are so irresistible that your prospect can't bear not to find out more.

So how do you write these compelling headlines?

This course will show you how quick and easy it is as I take you step-by-step through 20 different headline types and more than 80 templates that you can adapt for your own business. You will see examples of successful headlines written by the best copywriters of the last century. You will understand the psychology behind these headline types and how to include power words to make the headlines even more effective.


This course is not just theory. I'll give you practical sessions at the end of each lesson on headline types to reinforce what you have learnt during the session and to build your confidence. There are also tips and guidelines from the best copywriters of the last century together with a couple of downloadable quizzes to check you have remembered these important facts.


What's more, there’s a bonus section with four essential bonuses that will be invaluable for you when writing headlines. All can be downloaded as PDF’s for easy reference.

In the first bonus section you’ll get guidelines on layout and style for your headlines. There are tips on fonts, colours, italics, when to use bold and more.


The second bonus is a list of over 300 power words that you can use to make your headlines more effective and powerful. This includes 20 power words recommended by David Ogilvy, expert copywriter and founder of the advertising agency Ogilvy and Mather. Again, this is downloadable so you can use it as a reference guide for ever. This information is priceless and even on its own is easily worth the price of this course.

Bonus three is a 12 point headline checklist plus a 5 point image checklist.


Finally, bonus four is a list of recommended reading if you want to learn more about copywriting, not just headlines. These are classic textbooks and are recommended by master copywriters. If you read these, your copywriting will come on in leaps and bounds. I found them invaluable.


At the end of the course you will be able to:
write irresistible headlines that will compel your prospects to keep reading and to take the required action - and, in particular, to buy your goods or services;
select the most appropriate of the 20 headline types to get the action you require;
empathise better with your target audience by understanding the psychology behind the different headline types, i.e. you will be able to get inside their heads and relate to their problems, fears, anxieties, hopes, desires and dreams;
choose the best power words to arouse the relevant emotions of your target audience;
write headlines faster and more easily by adapting over 80 templates which have been proven not just to work but to make millions by the master copywriters of the last century. This will save hours of time and also the misery and stress of “writers block."
So you have the security of knowing that you're not starting from scratch. These tried and tested templates have been used by the most brilliant copywriters of the last century and proven to work over and over again and to make many millions of dollars.

What’s more, there’s no need to worry about whether this course is right for you. It is backed by Udemy’s 30 day guarantee so in the unlikely case that you decide it’s not suitable you can ask for your money back without any quibbles.

So don't waste any more time struggling for the right words and potentially losing hundreds if not thousands of pounds / dollars. Split testing has shown that just changing one or two words can double, triple or even quadruple your sales. Join me now and discover the formulas that made so many businesses rich. Then you too can share their success.
target_audience: Beginner freelance copywriters
Business owners struggling to get noticed
Charities and other non-profit organisations
Marketers / Email marketers and Advertisers
Sales people
Web designers
Authors, freelance writers and journalists
Bloggers
Public speakers who wish to know how to grab attention.

courses.title: Mastering Email Deliverability: The Comprehensive Guide
courses.bio: Unlock the Secrets to Maximizing Reach, Ensuring Compliance, and Enhancing Email Marketing Performance
objectives: Learn essential email deliverability metrics and their impacts.
Master SPF, DKIM, and DMARC for enhanced email security.
Improve sender reputation through effective practices.
Use AI to predict and improve email engagement rates.

Module: 1 Introduction to Email Delivera: Critical Metrics to Track for Optimal Email Deliverability
Module 2: Understanding Email Infrastruc: Understanding Email Infrastructure like SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol)
Role of ESPs (Email Service Providers) in Email Deliverability

What is DMARC Record in Email Deliverability
Tools to Check the DNS Configuration
Module 4: Email Reputation - Factors Inf: Types of IPs to select while sending Email Campaigns
Module 5: Legal Compliance and Standards: Overview of email-related laws ( CAN SPAM )
